content of data breach notification letter  subject  security incident impact your godaddy web host account 
 
dear  name   
 
we regret to inform you that your godaddy web host account credential have be impact by a security incident  we recently discover suspicious activity on some of our server and immediately initiate an investigation  our investigation reveal that an unauthorized individual have access to your login information use to connect to ssh on your host account  however  we have no evidence that any file be add or modify on your account  
 
we have take measure to block the unauthorized individual from our system and be continue to investigate the potential impact across our environment  a a precautionary measure  we have reset your host account login information to prevent any potential unauthorizedaccess  you will need to follow the step provide to regain access to your account  
 
we recommend that you conduct an audit of your host account to ensure that everything be in order  please note that this incident be limit in scope to your host account  your main godaddy com customer account and the information store within it be not accessible to the threat actor  
 
we apologize for any inconvenience this may have cause and want to assure you that we take this matter seriously  a a gesture of goodwill  we be provide you with one year of website security deluxe and express malware removal at no cost  these service will run scan on your website to identify and alert you of any potential security vulnerability  if a problem arise  you can contact our security team for assistance  
 
if you have any question or need further assistance  please call insert call center number and hour of operation  thank you for your business  and we apologize again for any inconvenience  
 
sincerely  
 
demetrius come the explanation mention  unauthorized individual have access to your login information use to connect to ssh on your host account   indicate this be a result of a hack incident

dear attorney general miller  
 
we represent informatics  inc   informatics   the website host of www mycountyparks com  a website maintain by iowa county conservation system  icc   with respect to a data security incident  hereinafter  the incident  describe in more detail below  informatics and icc take the security and privacy of the information in their control seriously  and have take step to prevent a similar incident from occur in the future  
 
  nature of the security incident  
 
on april     icc be first alert to feedback receive from several icc website user who discover that fraudulent purchase be make on their payment card after use the www mycountyparks com website  icc then quickly inform informatics  inc   the host of www mycountyparks com to investigate  on april     informatics alert icc that a technical investigation perform by informatics reveal previously undiscovered evidence that an unknown individual have place a malicious code on www mycountyparks com a early a january     the malicious code be use to intercept payment card information of www mycountyparks com website user who make purchase on the website between the date of january     and april     upon discovery  step be take to swiftly secure the icc website  such a the removal of the malicious code  at this time  icc and informatics have no evidence to indicate that the attacker responsible for the attack may have view or otherwise acquire any personal information of consumer affect by this incident other than their name  address  and payment card information  
 
  number of iowa resident affect  
 
two thousand five hundred eighty     iowa resident be potentially affect by this security incident  an incident notification letter address to these individual be mail on may     by first class mail  a sample copy of the notification letter be include with this letter  
 
  step take  
 
informatics and icc have take step to prevent a similar event from occur in the future  and to protect the privacy and security of potentially impact individual information  those step include strengthen it cybersecurity posture  such a the removal of the malicious code that cause the incident  and provide potentially impact individual with timely notice of the incident and complimentary identity theft restoration and credit monitor service for a period of twelve    month  
 
  contact information  
 
informatics and icc remain dedicate to protect the sensitive information in their control  if you have any question or need additional information  please do not hesitate to contact me at anjali daswilsonelser com or       
 
very truly yours  
 
enclosure user make fraudulent purchase with their payment card after use the website  indicate a compromise of credit card information

content of data breach 
 
the city of fullerton  the city  be issue this notice to inform individual of a data privacy event that may have affect the security of personal information  
 
what happen  
 
the city discover unauthorized post on a public website contain confidential city information  an investigation be immediately launch to identify the source of the activity and confirm the security of the network  a third party forensic investigator be also engage to determine the nature and scope of the event  during the investigation  it be discover that an internal data storage account be access by unauthorized user on multiple occasion from  through june     the investigation reveal that the data include copy of email and attachment contain certain protect information  a a precaution  the entire content of the storage account be review to identify the information that may have be accessible within the account  write notice be provide to individual whose information be find in the data storage account  however  a small number of file present in the data storage account at the time of the access be not recover and be unable to be review  
 
what information be involve  
 
on october     write notice be provide to a small number of individual whose sensitive information be find in the access data storage account  however  because a small number of file present within the data storage account be not able to be recover  the city be provide this additional notification  the personal information that may have be present within these small number of file may include name and social security number  driver license number  payment card information  medical or health information  and or passport number  however  the city be unable to confirm the content of these file or whether sensitive information be present in these file  
 
what be we do  
 
the city take the security of employee and citizen information seriously  the city immediately secure the account at issue  review exist security measure  and be work diligently to implement additional security measure to ensure the security of the entire network  the city be also provide information about this event and about the step individual can take to help safeguard personal information  in addition  the city be offer identity monitor service through kroll  
 
what you can do  
 
the city encourage individual to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review their account statement  and to monitor their credit report for suspicious activity  under u s  law  individual be entitle to one    free credit report annually from each of the three    major credit report bureau  to order a free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       individual may also contact the three    major credit bureau directly to request a free copy of their credit report  individual have the right to place a security freeze on their credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in their credit report without express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in an individual name without consent  however  use a security freeze to control who get access to the personal and financial information in an individual credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  an individual cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on their credit report  should an individual wish to place a security freeze  they should contact the major consumer report agency list below  
 
experian 
po box  
allen  tx  
    
www experian com freeze center html 
 
transunion 
p o  box  
woodlyn  pa  
    
www transunion com credit freeze 
 
equifax 
po box  
atlanta  ga   
    
www equifax com personal credit report service 
 
in order to request a security freeze  the follow information must be provide  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc   
  social security number 
  date of birth 
  if an individual have move during the past five    year  the address where the individual have live over the prior five    year 
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill 
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military the city of fullerton discover unauthorized post on a public website contain confidential city information  an investigation be launch and it be discover that an internal data storage account be access by unauthorized user on multiple occasion from  through june     contain copy email and attachment with sensitive information  
content of data breach notification letter  dear   name     
 
we regret to inform you of a data security incident involve orchard medical consult that may have result in unauthorizedaccess to some of your personal information seriously and apologize for any inconvenience this incident may cause  this letter contain information about what happen  step we have take  and the resource we be make available to you to help protect your identity  
 
what happen  
 
on january     we discover that an unauthorized individual potentially gain access to a single employee email account  upon discovery of the incident  our information technology department take swift action and prevent any further unauthorizedaccess  
 
what information be involve  
 
on february     after an extensive investigation to determine what information may have be access  we discover that some of your personal information  include your name  date of birth  in extremely limit circumstance social security number  and or limit medical information  such a diagnosis  treatment plan  and or health history  may have be access by the unauthorized individual  we have no evidence of misuse of anyones information a a consequence of this incident and have report this incident to the appropriate government regulator  
 
what we be do and what you can do  
 
although we be unaware of any misuse of your or anyones information  to help relieve concern and restore confidence follow this incident  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for one year provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  additional information describe your service be include with this letter  
 
we take the security of all information in our control seriously and be take step to help prevent a similar event from occur in the future  this include but be not limit to implement multi factor authentication  force password change  strengthen the security of our email tenant  and report the incident to government regulator a require  
 
other important information  
 
please know that the protection and security of your personal information be of our utmost priority  and we sincerely regret any concern or inconvenience that this matter may cause you  if you have any question  please do not hesitate to call     monday through friday    a m  to   p m  mountain time  
 
sincerely  
 
robin orchard 
president and owner 
orchard medical consult 
 
additional important information  
 
for resident of hawaii  michigan  missouri  virginia  vermont  and north carolina  it be recommend by state law that you remain vigilant for incident of fraud and identity theft by review credit card account statement and monitor your credit report for unauthorized activity  
 
for resident of illinois  iowa  maryland  missouri  north carolina  oregon  and west virginia  it be require by state law to inform you that you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  whether or not you suspect any unauthorized activity on your account  you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  to order your free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com  or call toll free at      you can also order your annual free credit report by mail a complete annual credit report request form  available at  to  annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga     
 
for resident of iowa  state law advise you to report any suspect identity theft to law enforcement or to the attorney general  
 
for resident of oregon  state law advise you to report any suspect identity theft to law enforcement  include the attorney general  and the federal trade commission  
 
for resident of maryland  rhode island  illinois  new york  and north carolina  you can obtain information from the maryland and north carolina office of the attorney general and the federal trade commission about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft

for resident of massachusetts  it be require by state law that you be inform of your right to obtain a police report if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
for resident of all state  
 
fraud alert  you can place fraud alert with the three credit bureau by phone and online with equifax   transunion   or experian   a fraud alert tell creditor to follow certain procedure  include contact you  before they open any new account or change your exist account  for that reason  place a fraud alert can protect you  but also may delay you when you seek to obtain credit  a of september     initial fraud alert last for one year  victim of identity theft can also get an extend fraud alert for seven year  the phone number for all three credit bureau be at the bottom of this page  
 
monitor  you should always remain vigilant and monitor your account for suspicious or unusual activity  
 
security freeze  you also have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you need to make a request to each consumer report agency  you may make that request by certify mail  overnight mail  regular stamp mail  or by follow the instruction find at the website list below  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that if you be request a credit report for your spouse or a minor under the age of   this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past five year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible  display your name and current mail address  and the date of issue  a of september     it be free to place  lift  or remove a security freeze  you may also place a security freeze for child under the age of   you may obtain a free security freeze by contact any one or more of the follow national consumer report agency  
 
equifax security freeze 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga

impact mobile home community  impact mhc  be write to notify you of an incident that may affect the security of some of your personal information  while we be unaware of any actual or attempt misuse of your information  this letter provide information about the incident and the resource available to you to help protect your information from possible misuse  should you feel it be appropriate to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on july     impact mhc become aware of suspicious activity relate to an employee email account  we immediately launch an investigation to determine what may have happen  work together with a lead computer forensics firm  our investigation determine that an unauthorized individual or individual access several employee email account between july     and july     two of the email account be access between october     and july     
 
because we be unable to determine which email message in the account may have be view or acquire by the unauthorized actor  we review the entire content of the impact email account to identify what personal information be accessible to the unauthorized actor s   due to the large volume of email to be review  this be a very lengthy and labor intensive process  on february     we identify the individual potentially impact by this incident after a thorough programmatic and manual review of the email account  once we confirm the individual who be potentially affect  impact mhc work to identify contact information for the impact individual and begin prepare an accurate write notice of this incident  
 
what information be affect  
 
although we cannot confirm whether your personal information be actually access  view  or acquire without permission  we be provide you this notification out of an abundance of caution because such activity cannot be rule out  the follow type of your information be locate in an email or attachment that may have be access or acquire by an unauthorized actor  your name and variable text   
 
what be we do  
 
information privacy and security be among our highest priority  impact mhc have strict security measure in place to protect the information in our possession  upon learn of this incident  we quickly change all employee email account password and take step to secure the account  we be currently implement additional technical safeguard and employee training to prevent similar future incident  
 
what can you do  
 
although we be not aware of any fraudulent misuse of your information  we arrange to have id expert monitor your identity for  year at no cost to you a an add precaution  please review the instruction contain in the attach step you can take to protect your information to enroll in and receive these service  impact mhc will cover the cost of this service  however  you will need to enroll yourself in the credit monitor service if you would like to do so

santa rosa   rohnert park oral surgery  sros rpos  be write to notify you of an incident that may affect the privacy of some of your personal health information  you be receive this letter because you be a current or former patient of  or be previously refer to  sros rpos  while we be unaware of any actual or attempt misuse of your information  this letter provide detail of the incident  our response  and resource available to help protect your information from possible misuse  should you feel it be appropriate to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on march     sros rpos learn of unusual activity in one of it email account  we immediately commence an investigation  work with third party forensic investigator  to assess the nature and scope of the activity  the investigation determine that the email account be subject to unauthorizedaccess between december     and march     although we have no evidence to suggest that specific information in the email account be access  in an abundance of caution  we undertake a comprehensive review of the entire content of the email account to confirm the type of information contain in the account and to whom it relate  
 
what information be involve  
 
our investigation determine the information present in the email account include your name and the follow data element s     variable data     
 
what be we do  
 
we take the security of personal information in our care seriously  upon learn of this incident  we move quickly to assess the security of our system  reset password  and to notify potentially impact individual  a part of our ongoing commitment to information security  we be also review and enhance exist policy and procedure  we also report this incident to law enforcement and notify necessary state and federal regulator  in an abundance of caution  we be also notify potentially impact individual  include you  so that you may take further step to best protect your information  should you feel it be appropriate to do so  
 
a an add precaution  we be also offer myidcare identity theft protection service through id expert  myidcare service include   year of credit and cyberscan monitor  a    insurance reimbursement policy  and fully manage identity theft recovery service  if you wish to activate myidcare service  you may follow the instruction include in the step you can take to protect your information  
 
what can you do  
 
please review the enclose step you can take to protect your information  you may also enroll to receive the credit monitor and identity theft protection service we be make available to you  sros rpos be make these service available at no cost to you  however  you will need to enroll yourself in these service  
 
for more information  
 
we recognize that you may have question not address in this letter  if you have additional question  please call our dedicate assistance line at       toll free   monday friday    a m  to   p m   pacific time  exclude u s  national holiday

step you can take to protect your information

  website and enrollment  go to  and follow the instruction for enrollment use your enrollment code provide at the top of the letter  please note the deadline to enroll be august     
 
  activate the credit monitor provide a part of your myidcare membership  the monitor include in the membership must be activate to be effective  note  you must have establish credit and access to a computer and the internet to use this service  if you need assistance  myidcare will be able to assist you  
 
  telephone  contact myidcare at      if you have question about this event to speak with representative about the appropriate step to take to protect your credit identity  
 
monitor your account 
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  promptly change any involve account password  and to review account statement  credit report  and explanation of benefit form for suspicious activity  under u s  law you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also contact the three major credit bureau directly to request a free copy of your credit report  you may wish to stagger your request so that you receive a free report by one of the three credit bureau every four month  
 
you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below  
 
experian 
p o  box  
allen  tx  
    
www experian com freeze center html 
 
transunion 
p o  box  
woodlyn  pa  
    
www transunion com credit freeze 
 
equifax 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga   
    
www equifax com personal credit report service 
 
in order to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  your full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  if you have move in the past five year  provide the address where you live over the prior five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    and 
  if you be a victim of identity theft  include a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft

fraud alert  
you may place a fraud alert in your file by call one of the three nationwide credit report agency above  a fraud alert tell creditor to follow certain procedure  include contact you before they open any new account or change your exist account  for that reason  place a fraud alert can protect you  but also may delay you when you seek to obtain credit  
 
security freeze  
you have the ability to place a security freeze on your credit report  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you may be able to use an online process  an automate telephone line  or a write request to any of the three credit report agency list above  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that if you be request a credit report for your spouse  this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past five year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible  display your name and current mail address  and the date of issue

notice of data breach 
 
dear account holder  
 
the chronicle of higher education  inc  take data security very seriously and we understand the importance of protect the information we maintain  we be write to inform you about an incident that may have involve some of your information  this notice explain the incident  measure we have take  and some step you can take in response  
 
what happen  
 
on may     the chronicle conclude our investigation and analysis of a data security incident that involve unauthorizedaccess to one of our server  the chronicle learn about the incident after receive an internal alert about suspicious activity on the server  upon learn of this  the chronicle take the server offline  a lead cybersecurity firm be engage to assist with the investigation  and law enforcement be notify  through our investigation  the chronicle determine that unauthorized party exploit a vulnerability in the server  through which they be able to obtain administrative account credential for the server  the unauthorized party then log in to the server on february     and access a database on the server that contain credential for online account to chronicle com  philanthropy com  and chroniclevitae com  
 
what information be involve  
 
our investigation determine that the server access by the unauthorized party contain a database with your username s  and hash and salt password s  for your online account s  to chronicle com  philanthropy com  and or chroniclevitae com  the password s  for your account s  be not in plain text but have be alter through a cryptographic hash and salt process  which render the actual password s  indecipherable to third party  although access to the hash and salt password would not allow access to your account s   we be notify you out of an abundance of caution because our investigation be unable to rule out the possibility that unauthorized party could bypass the cryptographic hash and salt process  
 
what you can do  
 
the next time you log in to your online account s   you will be prompt to change your password s   also  if you use the same username s  and password s  for any other online account  we recommend that you change your password there a well  
 
what we be do  
 
to date  we have no evidence that there have be any unauthorizedaccess to your online account s   however  out of an abundance of caution  we want to let you know this happen and assure you we take it very seriously  in addition to reset the password s  to your online account use stronger hash and salt technology  we have take step to help prevent a similar incident from occur in the future  include the replacement of the server with the unauthorizedaccess  a well a additional procedure to further expand and strengthen security process  
 
for more information  
 
we regret any inconvenience or concern this may cause you  if you have any question  please contact      monday friday    a m  to   p m   eastern daylight time  
 
sincerely  
 
ken sand

tip for guard against identity theft 
 
   review your bank  credit card  and debit card account statement over the next twelve to twenty four month and immediately report any suspicious activity to your bank or credit union  
 
   monitor your credit report with the major credit report agency  
equifax       www equifax com 
experian       www experian com 
transunion       www transunion com 
 
under vermont law  you be entitle to a free copy of your credit report from those agency every twelve month  call the credit report agency at the telephone number on the report if you find  
 a  account you do not open  
 b  inquiry from creditor that you do not initiate  or 
 c  inaccurate personal information  such a home address and social security number  
 
   if you find suspicious activity on your credit report or other account statement  call your local police or sheriff office and file a report of identity theft  get a copy of the police report  you may need to give copy of the police report to creditor to clear up your record  and also to access some service that be free to identity theft victim  
 
   if you find suspicious activity on your credit report or on your other account statement  consider place a fraud alert on your credit file so creditor will contact you before open new account  call any one of the three credit report agency at the number below to place fraud alert with all of the agency  
equifax     
experian     
transunion     
 
   you may also get information about security freeze use the below address  
equifax    
experian    
transunion    
 
if you do not have internet access but would like to learn more about how to place a security freeze  contact the vt attorney general office at        toll free in vermont only   
 
   even if you do not find suspicious activity on your credit report or your other account statement  it be important that you check your credit report for the next two year  just call one of the number in paragraph  above to order your report or to keep a fraud alert in place  
 
helpful information about identity theft  security freeze  and obtain a free copy of your credit report be available on the vt attorney general website   another helpful source be the federal trade commission website   the letter state that the information of the recipient be mistakenly send to an employer due to a process error and not a result of any external breach or physicalloss

over the last several week  our company have work closely with the u s  treasury and small business administration  sba  to process more than   paycheck protection program  ppp  loan application with the sba  provide more than  billion in financial relief for small business in need  we be write to advise you that in preparation for submission of loan application to the sba  bank of america  the bank  upload some client loan application to a limit access  control sba test application platform  this platform be design to allow authorize lender to test the process for submit ppp application to the sba prior to the actual submission process  
 
during test  we discover information include in your application may have be visible for a limit time period to a limit number of other lender and their vendor authorize by the sba to participate in the program  there be no indication that your information be view or misuse by these lender or their vendor  and your information be not visible to other business client apply for loan  or to the public  at any time  this do not affect the actual submission of ppp loan application to the sba  
 
below we provide more detail information for you  and respond to question you may have  
 
what happen  
 
authorize lender be require to submit loan application to the sba through the sbas loan application platform  on april   the bank upload some client loan application information to the sbas test application platform  which authorize lender and their vendor also use to test their loan submission process  we quickly recognize other authorize lender and their vendor may have have the ability to view the applicant information we upload  it be critical to note that there be no indication that any of the participate lender or their vendor view or misuse your information  the bank request and confirm the removal of the information from the sbas test website the same day  there be no impact to the submission of your loan application to the sba  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information that may have be briefly visible to limit authorize lender and their vendor include business contact and business information about the company of which you be a principal owner  such a business address and tax identification number  tin   a a principal owner  personal information about you  such a your name  address  social security number  phone number  email address and citizenship may have be involve  
 
what we be do

we have take the follow precaution  
 
we conduct our own internal investigation to protect and minimize any financial impact to you  
 
a an additional measure of protection  bank of america have arrange for a complimentary two year membership in an identity theft protection service provide by experian identityworks sm  you will not be bill for this service  this product provide you with identity detection which include daily monitor of your credit report from the three national credit report company  experian  equifax and transunion   internet surveillance  and resolution of identity theft  this service will expire at the conclusion of the complimentary period and will not automatically renew  any renewal of service elect by the customer be pay for by the customer and do directly through experian identityworks sm  bank of america have no involvement with respect to any offer  product or service from or through experian identityworks sm that the customer may choose to enroll in beyond the complimentary membership  to learn more about the complimentary membership and enroll  go to  enter your activation code and complete the secure online form  you will need to enter the activation code provide below to complete enrollment  if you prefer to enroll by phone  please call experian identityworks sm at

enc  important tip on how to protect personal information 
 
important tip on how to protect personal information 
 
we recommend that you take the follow precaution to guard against the disclosure and unauthorized use of your account and personal information  
 
review your monthly account statement thoroughly and report any suspicious activity to u  
 
report lose or steal check  credit or debit card immediately  
 
never provide personal information over the phone or online unless you have initiate the call and know with whom you be speak  
 
do not print your driver license or social security number on check  
 
safeguard atm  credit and debit card  memorize pin  personal identification number  and refrain from write pin  social security number or credit card number where they could be find  
 
store cancel check  new check and account statement in a safe place  
 
reduce the amount of paper you receive contain personal information  sign up for online statement  direct deposit and pay bill online  
 
tear up or shred any pre approve credit offer to which you do not respond  
 
a a general best practice  we recommend that you change  and regularly update  exist password and pin number and monitor all your account s  include any additional account s  you may have with other financial institution to prevent or detect the occurrence of any unauthorized fraudulent activity  
 
review your credit report at least once every year  make sure all information be up to date and accurate  and have information relate to fraudulent transaction delete  for a free copy of your credit bureau report  contact annualcreditreport com or call      
 
for more information about guard your account and personal information  a well a our online practice  please visit our website www bankofamerica com privacy

you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below

have be accomplish  what impact  if any  they may have have on data  and what step they could take to thwart future unauthorizedaccess to data through the aeries sister use the same or similar mean data without authorization

notice of data breach 
 
dear host customer  
 
we be write to inform you of a data security incident that may have affect the aeries student information system  
 
what happen  
 
we want to inform you that your database may have be subject to unauthorizedaccess involve your parent and student data  in late november   aeries software become aware of unauthorized attempt to access data through the aeries sister  we immediately begin an investigation into whether these attempt have be successful and  if so  how they have be accomplish  what impact  if any  they may have have on data  and what step we could take to thwart future unauthorizedaccess to data through the aeries sister use the same or similar mean  at the time  internal investigation do not reveal any compromise of the aeries sister or data  nevertheless  aeries software deploy a series of security patch in the december    version of the aeries sister which address the result of our internal investigation  
 
then  in late january   we be inform by a locally host district that their database may have be previously subject to unauthorizedaccess  they have inform local authority  and a criminal investigation be underway  we now understand that the investigation by the authority be ongoing and we be work closely with local law enforcement and federal authority a well a the district to determine what transpire  by whom it be perpetrate  and what impact  if any  it may have have on data  in work with the district and law enforcement official  in march  we be able to expand our earlier investigation with the new information a to the method use by the individual who have access data without authorization  specifically  we determine that the unauthorizedaccess have include parent and student login information  physical residence address  email  and password hash  with access to a password hash  weak  common or simple password  can be deconstruct to gain unauthorizedaccess to parent and student account  accord to the result of our investigation  there be evidence to suggest that your database in our host environment may have be subject to unauthorizedaccess by this mean  however  we understand the perpetrator have be take into custody and the unauthorizedaccess have be terminate  
 
what information be involve  
 
at the moment  our investigation have reveal parent and student login information  physical address  email  and password hash have be subject to unauthorizedaccess  
 
what we be do 
 
while there be no evidence to suggest that your data be misuse  aeries software policy require that we notify our customer whose data may have be subject to unauthorizedaccess  out of an abundance of caution  we strongly recommend that you reset the account password for your parent and student a soon a possible  to assist our customer with password security  in the march th version of aeries  a new feature be release to provide system administrator the ability to run a process that reset the password for parent and or student in the pwa table and send an email that include a link for that account to reset their password  we strongly recommend ensure all password meet parameter which reflect industry security best practice  such a  
 
  force user to change password every  month  minimum  
  day prior to expiration to notify user    day  minimum  
  minimum length    character 
  require a special character 
  require letter and number 
  require upper and lower case 
 
aeries documentation can be find here  aeries password requirement 
 
it be also important to understand that upon be make aware of these vulnerability  we take immediate action to ensure that critical patch be deploy to ensure that the vulnerability be no longer a threat to the system  in addition  we have take additional technical measure to prevent future incident and we be adopt new security protocol to increase protection of all customer data  in addition to allocate several resource to perform a rigorous internal security audit  we will also be engage an independent third party to assist u in conduct a complete audit and analysis of our system security  
 
what you can do 
 
while our password guideline be optional  we strongly recommend ensure all password meet parameter which reflect industry security best practice  such a  
 
  force user to change password every  month  minimum  
  day prior to expiration to notify user    day  minimum  
  minimum length    character 
  require a special character 
  require letter and number 
  require upper and lower case 
 
for more information on password setting  the documentation can be find here  aeries password requirement  documentation for the new reset parent student account can be find here  reset parent student account password  
 
there be nothing to suggest that any data be access reveal social security number  credit card number  financial account information  or other information directly impact your credit rate  nevertheless  if you suspect your personal information have be misuse  visit the ftcs site at identitytheft gov to get recovery step and to file an identity theft complaint  your complaint will be add to the ftcs consumer sentinel network  where it will be accessible to law enforcer for their investigation  in addition  you can contact all three major credit bureau to request that your credit report be send to you  free of charge  for your review  even if you do not find any suspicious activity on your initial credit report  the federal trade commission  ftc  recommend that you check your credit report periodically  thief may hold steal information to use at different time  check your credit report periodically can help you spot problem and address them quickly  
 
for more information 
 
we will continue to follow up with any additional recommendation  detail  or bulletin that you should be make aware of a more information come in  for more information  please email legalaeries com  aeries software become aware of unauthorized attempt to access data through the aeries sister and be later inform that a locally host district database may have also be subject to unauthorizedaccess  the investigation reveal unauthorizedaccess that include parent and student login information  physical residence address  email  and password hash  there be evidence to suggest that database in the host environment may have be subject to unauthorizedaccess  although the extent of the breach be uncertain

dear recipient  
 
we be write with important information regard a recent security incident  the privacy and security of the personal information we maintain be of the utmost importance to the richards group  richards group   a such  we want to provide you with information about the incident  explain the service we be make available to you  and let you know that we continue to take significant measure to protect your information  
 
what happen  
we recently learn that a richards group employee email account may have be compromise by an email phishing attack result in unauthorizedaccess to the email box  
 
what we be do  
upon learn of the issue  we immediately commence a prompt and thorough investigation  a part of our investigation  we have be work very closely with external cybersecurity professional experience in handle these type of incident  after an extensive forensic investigation and manual email review  we discover on april     that the impact email account that be access between november     and february     contain some of your personal information  we have no evidence that any of the information have be misuse  nevertheless  out of an abundance of caution  we want to make you aware of the incident

what happen

prevent identity theft and fraud 
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant to protect against potential fraud and or identity theft by  among other thing  review your account statement and monitor credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you should also promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incident of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  include the police and your state attorney general  a well a the federal trade commission  ftc   you may wish to review the tip provide by the ftc on fraud alert  security credit freeze  and step you can take to avoid identity theft  for more information and to contact the ftc  please visit www ftc gov idtheft or call   id theft        you may also contact the ftc at  federal trade commission   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc

credit and security freeze  
 
you may have the right to place a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file so that no new credit can be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a credit freeze be design to prevent potential credit grantors from access your credit report without your consent  if you place a credit freeze  potential creditor and other third party will not be able to get access to your credit report unless you temporarily lift the freeze  therefore  use a credit freeze may delay your ability to obtain credit  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a credit freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  since the instruction for how to establish a credit freeze differ from state to state  please contact the three major credit report company use the contact information above

the airport be follow up on the attach notice of data breachange the password for any account where you use the same password a for sfoconstruction  for more information  please contact sfo by email  marcomflysfo com  
 
to  all airport commission employee 
 
from  airport it 
 
subject  notice of data breach 
 
what happen  
 
sfoconnect com and sfoconstruction com be the target of a cyberattack in march   the attacker insert malicious computer code on these website to steal some user login credential  user possibly impact by this attack include those access these website from outside the airport network through internet explorer on a window base personal device or a device not maintain by sfo  
 
what information be involve  
 
at this time  it appear the attacker may have access the impact user usernames and password use to log on to those personal device  
 
what we be do  
 
the malicious code be remove from the affect website  sfoconnect com and sfoconstruction com be take offline  the airport also force a reset of all sfo relate email and network password on monday  march     
 
what you can do

step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity 
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
copy of credit report  you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free     or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can print this form at  you also can contact one of the follow three national credit report agency

fraud alert  you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least  day  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  there be no charge to place  lift  or remove the security freeze  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement  or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc  or from your respective state attorney general about step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state  resident of maryland  north carolina  and rhode island can obtain more information from their attorney general use the contact information below

content of data breach notification letter  dear value member of our mint community  
 
we be write to notify you of a data security incident involve your personal information  we describe below what happen  what information be involve  and what mint be do to address this matter  we also outline what step you can take in response  include promptly change your password to your mint account  we be take this matter very seriously and sincerely regret any concern it may cause you  
 
what happen  
 
we recently become aware of a report that mention mint a one of ten company impact by a potential cybersecurity incident  we promptly undertake an investigation  with the assistance of outside forensic expert  the investigation determine that  on may     unauthorized actor obtain information from our user account database  since determine this on may   we have be continue to investigate a expeditiously a possible to assess what information be impact and to identify and notify affect user  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information obtain include  
 
  your name 
  your login credential to your mint account  consist of your email address and password  your password be not in plaintext but be in a code format generate through a cryptographic process know a hash and salt  which be design to make your password unreadable  
  if you provide the follow information to mint  your telephone number  bill address  and ship address e  
 
what information be not involve  
 
base on our investigation to date  we have no reason to believe that the follow information be affect  
 
  your payment or credit card information 
  your address book information 
  your photo or personalize information that you add to mint design 
 
what we be do  
 
we be continue to investigate this incident diligently  with the ongoing assistance of outside expert  we also promptly notify u s  federal law enforcement authority and be closely cooperate with their investigation  in addition  we be review our security protocol and have take step to enhance security  
 
what you can do  
 
your password be hash and salt and not store in plaintext  in an abundance of caution  however  please change your password at your earliest convenience  to change your password  
 
  go to your mint account page at   
  click change password 
  enter your current and new password 
  click change password  
 
if you forget your password  you can reset it here   you should choose a strong password that be not easy to guess  a an additional precaution  you should change your password for any other online account for which you use the same email address and password combination  
 
a always  please be cautious of any unsolicited communication that ask you to provide your personal information electronically and avoid click on link or download attachment from suspicious email  mint will never ask you for your financial information via email or phone  it be a good practice to monitor your account and any credit report you receive for any sign of suspicious activity  
 
other guidance  include how to obtain a free credit report  be provide in the attach additional resource  which we encourage you to review  
 
for more information  
 
please call our toll free hotline      monday through friday from   a m  to   p m  u central time  exclude major u holiday  information be also available on our website  www mint com dataincidentnotice  
 
again  we regret any concern this incident cause you  the trust of our customer be of the utmost importance to u  and we be commit to maintain that trust  
 
sincerely  
 
the mint team

content of data breach notification letter  dear   name     
 
we regret to inform you that orchard medical consult experience a data security incident that may have result in unauthorizedaccess to some of your personal information seriously and apologize for any inconvenience this incident may cause  this letter contain information about what happen  step we have take  and the resource we be make available to you to help protect your identity  
 
what happen  
on january     we discover that an unauthorized individual potentially gain access to a single employee email account  upon discovery of the incident  our information technology department take swift action and prevent any further unauthorizedaccess  
 
what information be involve  
on february     after an extensive investigation to determine what information may have be access  we discover that some of your personal information  include your name  date of birth  in extremely limit circumstance social security number  and or limit medical information  such a diagnosis  treatment plan  and or health history  may have be access by the unauthorized individual  we have no evidence of misuse of anyones information a a consequence of this incident and have report this incident to the appropriate government regulator  
 
what we be do and what you can do  
although we be unaware of any misuse of your or anyones information  to help relieve concern and restore confidence follow this incident  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for one year provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  additional information describe your service be include with this letter  
 
we take the security of all information in our control seriously and be take step to help prevent a similar event from occur in the future  this include but be not limit to implement multi factor authentication  force password change  strengthen the security of our email tenant  and report the incident to government regulator a require  
 
other important information  
please know that the protection and security of your personal information be of our utmost priority  and we sincerely regret any concern or inconvenience that this matter may cause you  if you have any question  please do not hesitate to call     monday through friday    a m  to   p m  mountain time  
 
sincerely  
robin orchard 
president and owner 
orchard medical consult 
 
additional important information 
for resident of hawaii  michigan  missouri  virginia  vermont  and north carolina  it be recommend by state law that you remain vigilant for incident of fraud and identity theft by review credit card account statement and monitor your credit report for unauthorized activity  
 
for resident of illinois  iowa  maryland  missouri  north carolina  oregon  and west virginia  it be require by state law to inform you that you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  whether or not you suspect any unauthorized activity on your account  you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  to order your free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com  or call toll free at      you can also order your annual free credit report by mail a complete annual credit report request form  available at  to  annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga     
 
for resident of iowa  state law advise you to report any suspect identity theft to law enforcement or to the attorney general  
 
for resident of oregon  state law advise you to report any suspect identity theft to law enforcement  include the attorney general  and the federal trade commission  
 
for resident of maryland  rhode island  illinois  new york  and north carolina  you can obtain information from the maryland and north carolina office of the attorney general and the federal trade commission about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  
 
for resident of massachusetts  it be require by state law that you be inform of your right to obtain a police report if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
for resident of all state  
fraud alert  you can place fraud alert with the three credit bureau by phone and online with equifax   transunion   or experian   a fraud alert tell creditor to follow certain procedure  include contact you  before they open any new account or change your exist account  for that reason  place a fraud alert can protect you  but also may delay you when you seek to obtain credit  a of september     initial fraud alert last for one year  victim of identity theft can also get an extend fraud alert for seven year  the phone number for all three credit bureau be at the bottom of this page  
 
monitor  you should always remain vigilant and monitor your account for suspicious or unusual activity  
 
security freeze  you also have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you need to make a request to each consumer report agency  you may make that request by certify mail  overnight mail  regular stamp mail  or by follow the instruction find at the website list below  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that if you be request a credit report for your spouse or a minor under the age of   this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past five year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible  display your name and current mail address  and the date of issue  a of september     it be free to place  lift  or remove a security freeze  you may also place a security freeze for child under the age of   you may obtain a free security freeze by contact any one or more of the follow national consumer report agency  
 
equifax security freeze

what happen

what information be involve  
 
r co cannot state with certainty that your information be access  however  the information that be potentially subject to unauthorizedaccess include your name  address  and payment card data  account number  card expiration date  and security code   
 
what we be do  
 
you be be notify because your personal information very seriously  a soon a we discover the incident  we immediately take step to address it  include work with computer forensic specialist to determine the full nature and scope of the incident  
 
a an add precaution  r co be also offer you access to  month of complimentary credit monitor and identity protection service through experian  the cost of this service will be pay for by r co  instruction on how to enroll in the credit monitor and identity protection service can be find in the enclose information about identity theft protection  
 
what you can do  
 
you can enroll to receive the free credit monitor and identity restoration service be provide by r co  we also recommend that you review your credit and debit card account statement to determine if there be any discrepancy or unusual activity list  if you see anything you do not understand or that look suspicious  or if you suspect that any fraudulent transaction have take place  you should call the bank that issue the credit or debit card immediately to report the issue  
 
for more information

information about identity theft protection 
 
to help protect your identity  we be offer a complimentary  year membership of experians identityworkssm  this product provide you with superior identity detection and resolution of identity theft  to activate your membership and start monitor your personal information  please follow the step below  
 
  ensure that you enroll by  august     your code will not work after this date   
  visit the experian identityworks website to enroll    
  provide your activation code

monitor your account  
 
r co remind you to always remain vigilant against incident of identity theft  to review your account statement  and to monitor your credit report and explanation of benefit form for suspicious activity  under u s  law  you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also contact the three major credit bureau directly to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  
 
pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below  
 
transunion 
p o  box  
chester  pa  
    
www transunion com credit freeze 
 
experian 
p o  box  
allen  tx  
    
www experian com freeze center html

p o  box  
atlanta  ga

  your full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  if you have move in the past five    year  provide the address where you have live over the prior five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    
  if you be a victim of identity theft  include a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft  
 
the credit report agency have one    to three    business day after receive your request to place a security freeze on your credit file report the data breach th

el distrito escolar unificado de inglewood  el  distrito   se compromete a proteger la confidencialidad y seguridad de la informacin de nuestros estudiantes y la de sus padre  estamos escribiendo para informarles acerca de un incidente reciente que involucr sus datos  este aviso explica el incidente  las medidas que se han tomado y algunos pasos que puede tomar en respuesta  
 
que pa  
 
el distrito utiliza el sistema de informacin de estudiantes aeries para proporcionar a los estudiantes y a sus padre acceso en lnea a informacin sobre eventos y horarios escolares  a fine de noviembre del   aeries se enter de que una persona no autorizada explot una vulnerabilidad en el software aeries que permitira el acceso a la informacin de los padre y estudiantes  tras el descubrimiento  aeries comenz una investigacin y la polica inici una investigacin para identificar a la persona responsable  que aeries cree que ahora est bajo custodia policial  el  de abril del   aeries notific al distrito que esta persona pudo haber accedido al sistema aeries del distrito  
 
que informacin estuvo involucrada  
 
la informacin a la que accedi el perpetrador inclua potencialmente el nombre del padre y o estudiante  la direccin de su casa  el nmero de telefono  la direccin de correo electrnico y la contrasea con hash  una forma de hacer que la contrasea real sea indescifrable para terceros  para el sistema aeries  
 
lo que puede hacer 
 
a pesar de que no tenemos evidencia de que su informacin personal haya sido mal utilizada  deseamos informarle que esto sucedi y asegurarnos de que lo tomemos muy en serio  aunque no se accedi a la contrasea en s  e posible que una persona con suficiente tiempo y habilidad pueda descifrar la contrasea  por lo tanto  por precaucin  se le pedir que cambie su contrasea la prxima vez que inicie sesin en su cuenta  adems  si usa la misma contrasea para otras cuentas en lnea  tambien recomendamos cambiar la contrasea de esas cuentas  
 
que estamos haciendo  
 
entendemos la importancia de proteger la privacidad y la seguridad de la informacin personal  y lamentamos cualquier inconveniente o preocupacin que pueda causar este incidente  para ayudar a evitar que algo como esto vuelva a suceder en el futuro  instalamos el parche de software que aeries puso a disposicin para remediar la vulnerabilidad que permita a persona no autorizadas acceder a nuestro sistema aeries  adems  nosotros y aeries estamos revisando nuestros reglamentos y procedimientos existentes para mitigar cualquier riesgo asociado con este incidente y para prevenir mejor incidentes en el futuro  
 
para m informacin 
 
no disculpamos por cualquier inconveniente que esto pueda causarle  si tienes alguna pregunta  por favor llame      o      o mande un correo electrnico iusdtechnicalsupportinglewoodusd com  
 
sinceramente  
 
erika f  torres  ed d   msw 
county administrator the sensitive information of student and their parent from the online student information system be access by an unauthorized person exploit a vulnerability in the software  the perpetrator have access to the name  address  phone number  email address  and hash password of the parent and student  
content of data breach 
 
dear recipient  
 
we be write to inform you about a data breachool district  lbusd  take the confidentiality and security of our student and their parent information seriously  and we regret any inconvenience or concern this incident may cause  
 
what happen  
lbusd use the aeries student information system to provide student and their parent with online access to information regard school event and schedule  in late november   aeries discover that an unauthorized individual attempt to exploit a vulnerability in the aeries software that would allow access to student and parent information  aeries later determine that the exploit be successful  upon discovery  aeries begin an investigation  and law enforcement launch an investigation to identify the person responsible  who aeries believe be now in police custody  on may th    aeries confirm to u that this individual may have access the other district aeries system  we then conduct our own investigation and on may     determine that the individual do access parent and student data within the lbusds aeries system  
 
it be our understand that over  school district in california have be impact by this incident  
 
what information be involve  
the information access by the perpetrator potentially include parent and or student name  home address  email address  and hash password  a form of render the actual password indecipherable to third party for the aeries system  
 
what you can do 
even though we have no evidence that your personally  if you use the same password for other online account  we recommend change the password for those account a well  after the school year close  we will change the password to all student account  
 
what we be do 
we understand the importance of protect the privacy and security of personal information  and we be take step to prevent unauthorizedaccess to the account involve  we be require all account holder whose account be involve to change their password  to help prevent something like this from happen again in the future  we install the software patch that aeries make available to remedy the vulnerability that allow the unauthorized individual to access our aeries system  in addition  we and aeries be review our exist policy and procedure to mitigate any risk associate with this incident and to better prevent future incident  
 
for more information 
we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you  if you have any question  please email helpdesklbusd org

what happen 
 
catholic charity be recently the victim of a ransomware attack  the attack be discover on march     while we do not know for certain  presumably the ransomware be deploy sometime between the close of business on friday  march     and early morning on monday  march     upon discover the attack  we immediately shut down our entire system and begin investigate  we notify the fbi and retain a forensic firm to conduct a thorough investigation  while we initially try to recover the data from our backup  we be unable to do so  ultimately  we end up pay the attacker and recover all of our data  we do not have any evidence that the attacker or anyone else have misuse any of the data subject to the attack  however  we do know that an unauthorized person or person have access to the data for a short period of time  therefore  we be notify you of the incident

best practice to protect personal information 
 
  review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity 
 
remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  include your state attorney general and the federal trade commission  ftc   to file a complaint with the ftc  go to identitytheft gov or call   id theft       complaint file with the ftc will be add to the ftcs identity theft data clearinghouse  which be a database make available to law enforcement agency  
 
  obtain and monitor your credit report 
 
obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free     or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can access the request form at  or you can elect to purchase a copy of your credit report by contact one of the three national credit report agency  contact information for the three national credit report agency for the purpose of request a copy of your credit report or for general inquiry be provide below

other important information 
 
  place a fraud alert on your credit report

  security freeze 
 
in some state  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file  a security freeze  also know a a credit freeze  make it harder for someone to open a new account in your name  it be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to apply for a new credit card  wireless phone  or any service that require a credit check  the description of the event state that there be an unauthorizedaccess of peterson   smith computer system by malware name ryuk  a forensic investigation reveal that ryuk be active on the q drive  where some personal information of peterson   smith employee be access

content of data breach notification letter  we be write to inform you of a recent data security incident that may have result in unauthorizedaccess to payment card data use on our website  www superstrokeusa com  at super stroke usa  we take the privacy and security of your personal information seriously and be continuously evaluate and improve our security and payment system to ensure your information be secure  
 
we recently discover that our e commerce website be modify with malicious code that capture payment card data a it be enter on the website during a purchase  we immediately engage external forensic investigator and data privacy professional to conduct a thorough investigation into the incident  a a result of this review  we determine that the payment card information potentially access relate to transaction make through our online store between october     and march     
 
the information that may have be acquire in this incident include customer name  credit or debit card number  card expiration date  and cvvs   or  digit code on the front or back of the card   we conclude on may     that you complete a transaction at our website during the window of compromise with your card end in last four digit of card number  and your card information may be at risk  no other personal information of yours be at risk a a result of this incident  
 
because we value our relationship with you  we want to make you aware of the incident and what we be do to further secure your information  we have implement enhance security safeguard to help protect against similar intrusion and be conduct ongoing monitor of our website to ensure that it be secure and clear of any malicious activity  
 
below be precautionary measure you can take to protect your personally  you should always remain vigilant in review your financial account statement for fraudulent or irregular activity on a regular basis  a a best practice  you should also call your bank or card issuer if you see any suspicious transaction  the policy of the payment card brand such a visa  mastercard  american express  and discover provide that you be not liable for any unauthorized charge if you report them in a timely manner  you should also ask your bank or card issuer whether a new card should be issue to you  
 
if you have any further question regard this incident  please call our dedicate and confidential toll free response line at phone number  this response line be staff with professional familiar with this incident and knowledgeable on what you can do to protect against misuse of your information  the response line be available monday through friday  eastern time  
 
other important information  
 
  place a fraud alert  you may place an initial one year fraud alert on your credit file  at no charge  a fraud alert tell creditor to contact you personally before they open any new account  to place a fraud alert  call any one of the three major credit bureau at the number list below  a soon a one credit bureau confirm your fraud alert  they will notify the others
