transunion llc      
 
  consider place a security freeze on your credit file  if you be very concern about become a victim of fraud or identity theft  you may request a security freeze be place on your credit file  at no charge  a security freeze prohibit  with certain specific exception  the consumer report agency from release your credit report or any information from it without your express authorization  you may place a security freeze on your credit report by contact all three nationwide credit report company at the number below and follow the state direction or by send a request in write  by mail  to all three credit report company  
 
equifax security freeze   or     
experian security freeze   or     
transunion security freeze   or     
 
in order to place the security freeze  youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal information have be use to file a false tax return  to open an account  or to attempt to open an account in your name or to commit fraud or other crime against you  you may file a police report in the city in which you currently reside  
 
  obtain a free credit report  under federal law  you be entitle to one free credit report every  month from each of the above three major nationwide credit report company  call     or request your free credit report online at www annualcreditreport com  once you receive your credit report  review them for discrepancy  identify any account you do not open or inquiry from creditor that you do not authorize  verify all information be correct  if you have question or notice incorrect information  contact the credit report company  
 
  additional helpful resource  even if you do not find any suspicious activity on your initial credit report  the federal trade commission  ftc  recommend that you check your credit report periodically  check your credit report periodically can help you spot problem and address them quickly  if you find suspicious activity on your credit report or have reason to believe your information be be misuse  call your local law enforcement agency and file a police report  be sure to obtain a copy of the police report  a many creditor will want the information it contain to absolve you of the fraudulent debt  you may also file a complaint with the ftc by contact them on the web at www ftc gov idtheft  by phone at   idtheft        or by mail at federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc   your complaint will be add to the ftcs identity theft data clearinghouse  where it will be accessible to law enforcement for their investigation  in addition  you may obtain information from the ftc about fraud alert and security freeze  super stroke experience an unauthorizedaccess to payment card data use on their website  between october and march  a a result of a modify e commerce website with malicious code that capture payment card data  the breach only involve the payment card data  customer name  credit debit card number  card expiration date and cvvs

notice of data breach 
 
fabfitfun value your membership in our community and respect the privacy of your information  which be why we be write to let you know about a recent data security incident that involve your personal information  
 
what happen  
 
our technical team recently discover that a third party have illegally place malicious code on the  extension of our website  our analysis have determine that the code be place on the shop portion of the site on may nd  and it be discover shortly thereafter on may th a part of a routine review of our site  shop be not highly traffic at this time and the code do not impact other  more frequent portion of our website such a add ons and box purchase  although only a very limit number of member be impact  we have since be able to determine that you be likely one such member  
 
what information be involve  
 
if you complete a purchase on the shop site between may nd and may th of this year  we have reason to believe that your name  address  city  state  zip code  phone number  email address  credit card number  cvv code  and card expiration date be expose  although we be not aware of any specific misuse of your information  we strongly urge you to take the step detail below  if you be in the process of check out but do not complete a purchase during this window  we have reason to believe that your name  address  city  state  zip code  phone number  and email address be expose  we do not believe your credit card number  cvv code  and card expiration date be expose  however  we be unable to confirm this with certainty  we be send you this letter in an abundance of caution and we still urge you to take the step detail below  
 
what we be do 
 
we take immediate step to mitigate this incident by remove the malicious code from our site  we also activate our incident response plan  conduct an internal investigation  and retain advisor to assist in the investigation and response  a with any incident of this nature  we be also of course review our information security policy and practice to determine what  if anything  we can do to further guard against this type of intrusion and to improve site security  we be deeply appreciative that you have choose to be a part of the fabfitfun community and we be determine to make sure that you be happy with that decision  we be provide you with a complimentary one year annual membership a a token of our appreciation for your business  at the end of your current membership  we will add four pre pay box to your account and give you select perk during that same time period  once you have receive the four pre pay box  your original subscription will continue unless and until you decide otherwise  
 
what you can do 
 
we urge you to immediately contact your bank that issue your credit card  the relevant phone number should be print on the back of your card  and follow their recommendation  you should also closely monitor your credit card account statement for suspicious activity  if you see discrepancy or unusual activity  immediately call your bank  under federal law and card company rule  customer who notify their payment card company in a timely manner upon discover fraudulent charge will not be responsible for those charge  you may report any fraudulent charge to your local police or sheriff office in order to file a police report for identity theft and to obtain a copy of the report  you may need to provide copy of the police report to creditor in order to clear any fraudulent charge from your record  you can also take additional action describe on the attachment to this letter  
 
for more information 
 
if you have any question  please contact our customer service team at    or email privacyfabfitfun com for more information  we offer you our sincere apology that this incident occur  
 
sincerely  
 
michael broukhim  co ceo 
fabfitfun  inc

security freeze  
 
under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement

dear name  
 
we be write to notify you of an incident that may affect the privacy of some of your information  while to date we have no evidence to suggest that information potentially affect by this incident have be misuse  we take this incident very seriously and be provide you with detail of the incident and the resource available to you to help protect your information from possible misuse  should you feel it be appropriate to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on april     allergy   asthma medical group of the bay area discover that it berkeley physician office be break into during the evening of april     we immediately initiate an investigation during which we learn that three laptop be steal  while these laptop be secure  we be take a conservative approach that the bad actor s  may have gain access to them  accordingly  we perform a diligent review to determine what information be present on the laptop and to whom that information relate  
 
base on that review  we learn that certain limit information relate to your feno result be potentially viewable on the laptop  
 
what information be involve  
 
your name  date of birth  allergy   asthma medical group id number  physician name  and feno test result that include a graph of such result  
 
our review confirm that the bad actor s  do not have access to your financial information  such a a social security number  credit card number  insurance information  or medical record  the only information that may have be accessible on the laptop be that describe above involve your feno result  
 
what be we do  
 
information privacy and security be among our highest priority  upon learn of this incident  we take immediate action and change all laptop and mainframe password  while we have strict security measure in place to protect information in our possession  we be currently review those security measure in response to this incident to identify and implement any potential enhancement to our security and privacy policy  we be also conduct additional employee training on our technical  administrative  and physical security and privacy safeguard  further  we be report this incident to law enforcement and appropriate state and federal regulator  
 
what can you do  
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to regularly review your account statement  and to monitor your credit report for suspicious activity and to detect error  we be in the process of secure the service of a company to provide identity monitor at no cost to you for twelve    month  please contact michele zorovic at    if you wish to enroll in the credit monitor and identity theft restoration service  under u s  law you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       finally  you can further educate yourself regard identity theft  fraud alert  security freeze  and the step you can take to protect yourself  by contact the consumer report agency  the federal trade commission  or your state attorney general  
 
for more information  
 
we recognize that you may have question not address in this letter  if you have any question or need additional information  please feel free to contact me directly at       
 
a mention above  to date  we be unaware of any actual or attempt misuse of your information  nevertheless we be provide you this notification out of an abundance of caution  we remain commit to safeguard the privacy and security of our patient information and sincerely regret and apologize for any inconvenience or concern this incident may cause you  
 
sincerely  
 
michele zorovic 
risk manager the physical group id number  physician name  and feno test result

dear rocklin unify school district family  
 
we be write to inform you about a data security breach with this software  we do not believe there be any reason to be alarm or unduly concern  but we want you to be inform about what happen  
 
timeline with information provide to u from aeries  
 
on april     we be inform that there may have be unauthorizedaccess to the aeries sister on november th    the initial report be focus on aeries host database  which we do not use  our student information system be house on our own server here in rocklin  on may     we learn that it may have also affect on premise database similar to ours  follow direction provide by aeries  we immediately contact aeries and get confirmation on may     that our data be also access  
 
this breach may have reveal parent and student login information  physical residence address  email address  and encrypt password  however  no other data element be impact a a result of this incident  social security number  credit card data  or other personal information be not keep in our aeries database  with access to encrypt password  unauthorized people may be able to deconstruct weak  common or simple password and subsequently enable unauthorizedaccess to parent and student account and data store in the aeries sister  
 
we have be inform that local and federal law enforcement official be notify of the incident  charge be file  and the people responsible be arrest  the investigation of their misconduct be continue  while there be no evidence to suggest that your specific data be misuse  out of an abundance of caution  we will reset the account password for all parent and student begin tuesday  may     to reset your password  please follow the forget password link on the aeries parent student portal  
 
further  we will be enforce stricter password security guideline a an add precaution against the possibility of future such incident  all new password will employ the follow guideline  
 
  force user to change password every  month  minimum  
  day prior to expiration to notify user    day  minimum  
  minimum length    character 
  require a special character 
  require letter and number 
  require upper and lower case 
 
we have no reason to believe that any data be access reveal sensitive information such a social security number  credit card number  financial account information  or other information directly impact your credit rate  rocklin unify school district do not keep this type of information associate with your aeries account  nevertheless  if you suspect your personal information have be misuse  visit the federal trade commission site at identitytheft gov to get recovery step and to file an identity theft complaint  your complaint will be add to the ftcs consumer sentinel network  where it will be accessible to law enforcement for their investigation  
 
for link and more information  go to www rocklinusd org databreachnology service expert will respond and help you in a timely manner  
 
thank you

dear sir or madam  
 
we represent interstate  interstate  locate at  th avenue ne  po box   sioux center  iowa   and be write to notify your office of an incident that may affect the security of some personal jurisdiction  
 
nature of the data event 
 
on or about april     interstate discover that personal information of it employee may have be access by an unauthorized third party in connection with a data security incident experience by paperless pay  paperless pay be a vendor interstate previously utilize to provide employee with access to their paystubs and w form  with the assistance of third party forensic specialist  paperless pay determine that an unknown third party access a paperless pay server that store information of interstate employee on february     while the investigation by third party forensic specialist be able to confirm access to the paperless pay server  the investigation be unable to rule out access to interstate employee information on the server  
 
the information that could have be subject to unauthorizedaccess include name  address  and social security number  
 
notice to iowa resident 
 
on or about june     interstate provide write notice of this incident to all affect individual  which include six hundred eighty three    iowa resident  write notice be be provide in substantially the same form a the letter attach here a exhibit a  
 
other step take and to be take 
 
upon discover the event  interstate move quickly to investigate and respond to the incident and notify potentially affect individual  interstate be no longer utilize the service of paperless pay and be seek assurance that paperless pay be destroy any information of interstate employee from their system  interstate be also provide access to credit monitor service for one year  through kroll  to individual whose personal information be potentially affect by this incident  at no cost to these individual  
 
additionally  interstate be provide impact individual with guidance on how to better protect against identity theft and fraud  include advise individual to report any suspect incident of identity theft or fraud to their credit card company and or bank  interstate be provide individual with information on how to place a fraud alert and security freeze on one credit file  information on protect against tax fraud  the contact detail for the national consumer report agency  information on how to obtain a free credit report  a reminder to remain vigilant for incident of fraud and identity theft by review account statement and monitor free credit report  and encouragement to contact the federal trade commission  their state attorney general  and law enforcement to report attempt or actual identity theft and fraud  
 
contact information

dear recipient  
 
pen factory value and respect your privacy and be commit to keep your information confidential  our commitment to these value include notify individual if we believe the confidentiality of their personal information  
 
on april     we learn an unauthorized third party place malicious computer code on our website   upon learn of the incident  we promptly remove the malicious code and conduct an investigation  the code be active from september  until april     and be design to collect information type into the website checkout page a customer make purchase and deliver that information to the unauthorized third party  
 
we be notify you because  a a result of our investigation into this incident  on may     we determine that you make a purchase on our website during the time the malicious code be active  a a result  some of your information  include your name  email  address  and credit or debit card information  may have be obtain by the third party  the incident do not impact your social security number  we have take step to alert the credit card brand of the incident so they can monitor your account for potential fraudulent activity  finally  we have take additional technical step to further secure pen factorys website and prevent this type of incident from occur in the future  we also recommend that you check your debit or credit card statement for fraudulent charge  
 
we value the trust you place in u to protect your privacy and apologize for any inconvenience or concern this incident might cause  for further information and assistance  please call     from   a m  to   p m  et  
 
sincerely  
 
robert lack 
 
robert lack 
 
executive vice president 
 
pen factory 
 
  
 
additional important information 
 
a mention above  your social security number be not impact so we do not believe your identity be at risk a a result of this incident  nonetheless  a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant to protect against potential fraud and or identity theft by  among other thing  review your account statement and monitor credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you should also promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incident of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  include the police and your state attorney general  a well a the federal trade commission  ftc   you may wish to review the tip provide by the ftc on fraud alert  security credit freeze and step to you can take to avoid identity theft  for more information and to contact the ftc  please visit www ftc gov idtheft or call   id theft        you may also contact the ftc at  federal trade commission   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc   
 
under massachusetts law  you have the right to obtain any police report file in regard to this incident  if you be the victim of identity theft  you also have the right to file a police report and obtain a copy of it  massachusetts law also allow consumer to place a security freeze on their credit report  a security freeze can be place without any charge  a security freeze prohibit a credit report agency from release any information from a consumer credit report without write authorization  however  please be aware that place a security freeze on your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prevent the timely approval of any request you make for new loan  credit mortgage  employment  house or other service  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you must send a write request to each of the three major consumer report agency by regular  certify or overnight mail at the address below or  if available  comply with the consumer report agencys online security freeze request procedure  
 
equifax security freeze 
 
    
 
www equifax com 
 
p o  box  
 
atlanta  ga  
 
experian security freeze 
 
    
 
www experian com 
 
p o  box  
 
allen  tx  
 
transunion security freeze 
 
    
 
www transunion com 
 
p o  box  
 
woodlyn  pa  
 
in order to request a security freeze  you may need to provide the follow information  
 
  your full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
 
  social security number  
 
  date of birth  
 
  if you have move in the past five    year  provide the address where you have live over the prior five year  
 
  proof of current address such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
 
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    and 
 
  if you be a victim of identity theft  include a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft  
 
the credit report agency have three    business day after receive your request to place a security freeze on your credit report  the credit bureau must also send write confirmation to you within five    business day and provide you with a unique personal information include name  email address  and credit debit card information have be obtain by an unauthorized third party

what happen

credit and security freeze  you may have the right to place a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  so that no new credit can be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a credit freeze be design to prevent potential credit grantors from access your credit report without your consent  if you place a credit freeze  potential creditor and other third party will not be able to get access to your credit report unless you temporarily lift the freeze  therefore  use a credit freeze may delay your ability to obtain credit  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a credit freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  since the instruction for how to establish a credit freeze differ from state to state  please contact the three major credit report company a specify above to find out more information

while there be no evidence to suggest that your specific data be misuse  out of an abundance of caution  we will send you an email with a link to change your aeries parent portal password on monday  june     student password information to the aeries parent portal be not impact a their access be tie to their google account  and not store in aeries  
 
we consider it important for you to understand that upon be make aware of this incident  aeries software take immediate action to ensure the security of the system and have take additional measure to prevent future incident  include  but not limit to  engage an independent third party to assist in conduct a complete audit and analysis of their system security  
 
if you have any question  please send an email to aerieshelpbousd u

content of data breach notification letter  may    
 
dear customer  
 
castro valley health  inc  take the privacy and protection of your personal information  please review the information provide in this letter for step that you may take to protect yourself against any potential misuse of your information  if after read this letter you continue to have question or concern  you may call the toll free number at the bottom of this letter during regular business hour  
 
what happen  
 
the incident occur when certain information about castro valley health  inc s patient inadvertently be transfer during   to a third party website call docker hub  castro valley health  inc  first become aware of this incident on april     and promptly remove the information from the docker hub site  the transfer information be heavily code and therefore not readable without significant decode  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information that be transfer to the docker hub site include  patient name  an entry that say start of care admission visit  the name of the nurse  physical record number  and the start of care date  
 
what information be not involve  
 
the information do not include social security number  driver license number  tax id number or bank account information  importantly  the information also do not include clinical or diagnostic information  note  plan or order  
 
castro valley health  inc s response  
 
castro valley health  inc  begin investigate the incident immediately after learn of it  we have no information indicate anyone have use any of the patient information from the docker hub website  or that anyone other than the personal security audit and risk assessment  and enhance our policy and procedure  
 
additional step you may wish to take  
 
step you may wish to take include  
 
  get current copy of your medical record from your healthcare provider and medical insurer and review them for any incorrect personal information or unauthorized treatment  procedure or prescription  
 
  monitor any medical notice and activity on your account  and 
 
  place fraud alert or credit freeze on your account to prevent or warn you if anyone without your authority try to open an account in your name  you can check your credit report at annualcreditreport com from any one of the three major credit bureau equifax  experian  and transunion and place a fraud alert on your credit report  their contact information be below  
 
equifax      
 
transunion      
 
experian      
 
if you have reason to believe that your medicare or medicaid information be be improperly use  report that online or call  hhs tip

content of data breach notification letter  dear parent  
 
we be write to inform you of a recent incident involve your data at fairfield suisun unify school district  the district   our commitment to protect the confidentiality and security of our student information and that of their parent be unwavering  this notice explain the incident  measure that have be take  and some step you can take in response  
 
what happen  
 
the district use the aeries student information system to provide student and their parent with online access to information regard school event and schedule  in late november   aeries discover that an unauthorized individual exploit a vulnerability in the aeries software that would allow access to student and parent information  upon discovery  aeries begin an investigation  and law enforcement launch an investigation to identify the person responsible  who aeries believe be now in police custody  on may     aeries notify u that this individual may have access the district aeries system  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information access by the perpetrator potentially include parent and or student name  home address  phone number  and login information for the aeries system  consist of email address and hash password   a form of render the actual password indecipherable to third party  
 
what you can do 
 
even though we have no evidence that your personally  if you use the same password for other online account  we recommend change the password for those account a well  
 
what we be do 
 
we understand the importance of protect the privacy and security of personal information  and we regret any inconvenience or concern this incident may cause  to help prevent something like this from happen again in the future  we install the software patch that aeries make available to remedy the vulnerability that allow the unauthorized individual to access our aeries system  in addition  we be work with aeries to review our exist policy and procedure to mitigate any risk associate with this incident and to better prevent future incident  
 
for more information 
 
we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you  if you have any question  please call the superintendent office at     or email lindamafsusd org  
 
sincerely  
 
chris clark 
director of technology support service

content of data breach notification letter  dear  
 
we be write to inform you of a recent security incident that occur at ottawa kent insurance agency  the privacy and security of personal information  
 
on or about november     an unknown third party gain unauthorizedaccess to a single email account at ottawa kent  the intruder use the account to send spam email to contact within the account  we immediately terminate the unauthorizedaccess by force a password change and launch an investigation to analyze the extent of any compromise of the email account and the security of the email and attachment contain within it  throughout our investigation  we work with outside cybersecurity professional who regularly investigate and analyze these type of incident  
 
after a thorough review of the content of the email account  we determine on may     that the account contain your full name and social security number  to date  we be not aware of any report of identity fraud or improper use of your information a a direct result of this incident  however  out of an abundance of caution  we want to make you aware of the incident and explain the service we be make available to help safeguard you against identity fraud  
 
we be offer you a one year membership in mytrueidentity provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  to protect you from potential misuse of your information  for more information on identity theft prevention and mytrueidentity  include instruction on how to activate your one year membership  please see the additional information provide in this letter  
 
this letter also provide other precautionary measure you can take to protect your personally  you should always remain vigilant in review your financial account statement and credit report for fraudulent or irregular activity on a regular basis  
 
if you have any further question regard this incident  please call our dedicate and confidential toll free response line that we have set up to respond to question  this response line be staff with professional familiar with this incident and knowledgeable on what you can do to protect against misuse of your information  the response line be available monday through friday    a m  to   p m  eastern time  
 
we apologize for any inconvenience this incident may have cause and want to assure you that we be commit to maintain the privacy of personal information  
 
other important information  
 
  enroll in complimentary  month credit monitor  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for one year provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  
 
  place a fraud alert on your credit file  we recommend that you place an initial one year fraud alert on your credit file  at no charge  a fraud alert tell creditor to contact you personally before they open any new account  
 
  consider place a security freeze on your credit file  if you be very concern about become a victim of fraud or identity theft  you may request a security freeze be place on your credit file  at no charge  
 
  obtain a free credit report  under federal law  you be entitle to one free credit report every  month from each of the three major nationwide credit report company  
 
  additional helpful resource  check your credit report periodically can help you spot problem and address them quickly  if you find suspicious activity on your credit report or have reason to believe your information be be misuse  call your local law enforcement agency and file a police report  
 
if this notice letter state that your financial account information and or credit or debit card information be impact  we recommend that you contact your financial institution s  to inquire about step to take to protect your account s   include whether you should close your account s  or obtain new account number s   
 
sincerely  
 
ottawa kent insurance agency there be unauthorizedaccess to a single email account which be compromise by a third party  the personal information contain in the email account be review to determine the extent of the breach  
content of data breach 
 
what happen  
 
the retirement system contract with vendor to provide sfers member with online access to their account information  one of the vendor  up inc   set up a test environment on a separate computer server which include a database contain data from approximately   sfers member account a of august     the server data be not subsequently update  on march     up inc  learn that this server have be access by an external on february     the vendor promptly shut down the server and begin an investigation  the vendor find no evidence that the information of sfers member be remove from it server  but at this time  it cannot confirm that the information be not view or copy by an unauthorized party  on march     the vendor notify sfers of the server breach and both sfers and the vendor continue to investigate the potential exposure of data  
 
what information be involve  
 
social security number  ssn  and bank account number be not include in the data file that be potentially breach  
 
for active sfers member  
 
if you have not register on the sfers website  the specific information pertain to you a of august     that may have be expose due to the breach include the follow

content of data breach notification letter  june    
 
notice of data breach 
 
dear sir or madam  
 
tait tower manufacture llc  tait  take data security very seriously and understand the importance of protect the information it maintain  we be write to inform you about an incident that may have involve some of your information  this notice explain the incident  measure we have take  and some step you can take in response  
 
what happen  
 
on april     tait become aware of a data security incident in which an unauthorized party access a tait computer server and the email account of certain tait personnel  upon learn of the incident  tait immediately take it server and it system offline and a lead cybersecurity firm be engage to assist with the investigation  although the investigation be ongoing  the investigation have reveal that the unauthorizedaccess begin on february     
 
what information be involve  
 
taits investigation into this matter be ongoing  but tait have determine that the server content and email account access by the unauthorized party may have contain some individual name  address  email address  date of birth  social security number  or financial account number  
 
what you can do  
 
to date  tait have no reason to believe that any of the information maintain in the server and email account be misuse  out of an abundance of caution  we encourage you to remain vigilant by review your financial account statement for any unauthorized activity  if you see charge or activity you do not authorize  we suggest that you contact your financial institution immediately  a a precaution  we be prepare to offer credit monitor at no charge to those individual potentially affect by this incident  for more information or to sign up for credit monitor  please call our dedicate call center for this issue at     
 
what we be do  
 
tait regret any inconvenience or concern this may cause  we have take step to help prevent a similar incident from occur in the future  such a add multi factor authentication and deploy endpoint monitor system  a well a additional action to further expand and strengthen our security process  
 
for more information  
 
for any question you may have regard this data security incident  please call our dedicate call center for this issue at    monday through friday  from   a m  to   p m   eastern time  
 
sincerely  
 
adam davis 
chief creative officer 
 
additional step you can take  
 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      you can also contact the three nationwide credit report company below  
 
  equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
  experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
  transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you may also consider contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  you may be ask to provide a copy of the police report to creditor to correct your record  
 
contact information for the federal trade commission be below  
 
  federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert  
 
there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit there be unauthorizedaccess to a tait computer server and email account of certain tait personnel by an unauthorized party  
content of data breach 
 
dear parent guardian  
 
we be write to inform you that your aeries parent portal account password have be reset due to a potential security threat  yuba city unify school district  the district  take the confidentiality and security of our student information and that of their parent seriously  we be address a recent incident that may have involve your data  this notice explain the incident  measure that have be take  and some step you can take in response  
 
what happen  
 
the district use the aeries student information system to provide student and their parent with online access to information regard school event and schedule  in late november   aeries learn that an unauthorized individual attempt to exploit a vulnerability in the aeries software that would allow access to student and parent information  aeries later determine that the exploit be successful  upon discovery  aeries begin an investigation  and law enforcement launch an investigation to identify the person responsible  who aeries believe be now in police custody  on may     we learn that this individual may have access the district aeries system  base on our own investigation of the information available  we cannot rule out the possibility that parent and student data in the district aeries system be access  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information accessible to the perpetrator potentially include parent and or student name  home address  phone number  email address  and hash password   a form of render the actual password indecipherable to third party for the aeries system  
 
what you can do 
 
even though we have no evidence that your personal information have be misuse  we want to let you know this happen and assure you we take it very seriously  even though the password itself be not access  it be possible that an individual with enough time and skill could eventually decipher the password  therefore  out of an abundance of caution  your password have be reset  you will find a temporary password in this email that you can use to log in to your account and create a new password  your new password must include the follow  
 
  lower case letter 
  at least one    upper case letter 
  at least  special character 
  at least  number 
  contain at least eight    character 
 
you will also be require to change your password at least every six month  additionally  if you use the same password for other online account  we recommend change the password for those account a well  
 
what we be do 
 
we understand the importance of protect the privacy and security of personal information  and we regret any inconvenience or concern this incident may cause  in order to avoid the possibility of unauthorizedaccess to the account involve  we have reset all password for the district aeries system and be require all account holder to create a new password the next time they log in to their account be involve to change their password  to help prevent something like this from happen again in the future  we install the software patch that aeries make available to remedy the vulnerability that allow the unauthorized individual to potentially access our aeries system  in addition  we and aeries be review our exist policy and procedure to mitigate any risk associate with this incident and to better prevent future incident

notice of data breach

what happen  
the district student information system developer  aeries software  inc   dba eagle software   be notify in late november  of unauthorized attempt to access data through the aeries sister  in response  they immediately begin an investigation into whether these attempt have be successful and  if so  how they have be accomplish  what impact on data  if any  and what step they could take to thwart future unauthorizedaccess to data through the aeries sister use the same or similar mean  at the time  their investigation do not reveal any compromise of the aeries sister or data  nevertheless  aeries software deploy a series of security patch in the december    version of the aeries sister which address the find of their internal investigation  
 
in work with the district and law enforcement official  in march  aeries software be able to expand their earlier investigation with the new information a to the method use by the individual who have access data without authorization  specifically  they determine that the unauthorizedaccess have include parent and student login information  physical residence address  email address  and password hash  with access to a password hash  weak  common or simple password can be deconstruct to gain unauthorizedaccess to parent and student account  
 
what information be involve  
parent and student login information  physical residence address  email address  and password hash  however  no other data element be impact a a result of this incident  
 
what we be do 
while there be no evidence to suggest that your data be misuse  state law require that we notify our family whose data may have be subject to unauthorizedaccess  out of an abundance of caution  we have reset the portal account password  it be also important to understand that upon be make aware of these vulnerability  aeries software take immediate action to ensure that critical patch be deploy to ensure that the vulnerability be no longer a threat to the system  in addition  aeries software have take additional technical measure to prevent future incident  and they be adopt new security protocol to increase protection of all student data  aeries software will also be engage an independent third party to assist them in conduct a complete audit and analysis of their system security  
 
what you can do 
we have no reason to believe that any data be access reveal sensitive information that would directly impact your credit rate  if you suspect your personal information have be misuse  visit the ftcs site at identitytheft gov  you can also contact all three major credit bureau to request that your credit report be send to you  free of charge  for your review

what happen  
 
begin in march   i learn that a limit number of my client have experience fraudulent tax file  upon learn of this fraud  i hire an independent computer forensic investigator to determine if there be a compromise of my network  to date  the forensic investigator have find no suspicious activity on my system  we have ask our tax software provider to launch their own investigation a well  our forensic investigation be ongoing  and i dont yet know whether any of your information be compromise  but i want to let you know before the investigation be complete so you can take step to protect yourself  
 
what information be involve

  do not spend this money  a it must be return to the irs  
  contact your bank fraud department and let them know that the money be deposit a a result of a fraudulent tax file  and that the deposit should be reverse a soon a possible

additionally  if you know or suspect you be a victim of tax relate identity theft  the irs recommend the follow step

if you believe you may be a victim of tax fraud but have not receive a letter c from the irs  you should fill out and submit irs form   which be available at irs gov  i can provide you with a copy of that form and assist you with fill it out if you would like  if you plan on file on extension  please contact me for more information

what you can do

you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a credit report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that place a security freeze on your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prevent the timely approval of any request you make for new loan  credit  mortgage  employment  house  or other service  
 
to place a fraud alert or security freeze on your credit file  contact each credit report agency directly

the federal trade commission  ftc  also recommend regularly review statement from your account and periodically obtain your credit report from one or more national credit report agency

content of data breach notification letter  june    
 
re  notice of data breach 
 
dear family  
 
we be write to inform you about an incident potentially affect some of your student personal information  we value all our student and family and be provide this notice to outline some step you may take to help protect yourself  
 
what happen 
 
on june     kipp socal be notify of an issue involve unauthorizedaccess to a data file contain certain student information  the issue be find when a vendor that we contract with discover that our github page contain the data file have an incorrect privacy set  allow our data file to be searchable within the confine of github from october     through june     the page may have be access seven time by individual or robot during the time it be expose  you be receive this notice because we determine that your student information be among those that be access without authorization  
 
what information be involve 
 
the student information be store on a data platform call github that kipp socal and many other public organization use for data management  the page contain the data file include student name  address  birth date  race ethnicity  primary language  and primary disability  social security number be not include in the file  the issue have be resolve  and we do not have any evidence that the information have be misuse  
 
what we be do 
 
after kipp socal learn of the issue  we immediately delete the data file and inactivate the github page  conduct a full audit of github and other data platform  and put additional layer of security into place for future protection  we take the safety and security of our student information very seriously and reinforce our pledge to make our school safe zone  we be in the process of conduct data security audit across all of our system to ensure that this be an isolate incident and it do not happen again  
 
what you can do 
 
we recommend you be on the alert for any suspicious activity relate to your financial account and credit report  despite no social security number or driver license or identification card number be part of this file  we encourage you to regularly monitor your statement and record to ensure there be no transaction or other activity that you do not initiate or authorize  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc   you can review your credit information by contact the three credit bureau and have the option of place a fraud alert on your account  the three credit bureau contact information be list below  
 
equifax 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga   
    
www equifax com 
 
experian 
p o  box  
allen  tx  
    
www experian com 
 
transunion 
p o  box  
chester  pa  
    
www transunion com 
 
you be also entitle to a free credit report every year from each of these agency at  www annualcreditreport com 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
    
 
for more information 
 
we regret this incident and apologize for any concern it may have cause you  protect your information be incredibly important to u  a be address this incident with the information and assistance you may need  if you have question or concern  please do not hesitate to contact your school leader or the kipp socal data team at datakippsocal org  
 
sincerely  
 
marcia aaron 
chief executive officer 
kipp socal public school 
 
 de junio de  
 
re  aviso de violacin de datos 
 
estimadas familias  
 
le escribimos para informarle sobre un incidente que podra afectar alguna de la informacin personal de su estudiante  valoramos a todos nuestros estudiantes y familias y  le estamos proporcionando este aviso  para describir algunos pasos que puede seguir para ayudar a protegerse  
 
lo que pa 
 
el  de junio de   kipp socal fue notificado de un problema relacionado con el acceso no autorizado  a un archivo de datos que contiene informacin de ciertos estudiantes  el problema se encontr  cuando un proveedor que contratamos  descubri que nuestra pgina de github que contena el archivo de datos  tena una configuracin de privacidad incorrecta  permitiendo que nuestro archivo de datos  se pueda buscar dentro de los lmites de github desde el  de octubre de   hasta el  de junio de   la pgina puede haber sido visitada siete veces por individuos o robot  durante el tiempo que estuvo expuesta  est recibiendo este aviso porque determinamos que la informacin de su estudiante  se encontraba entre aquellas a las que se accedi sin autorizacin  
 
qu informacin estuvo involucrada 
 
la informacin del estudiante se almacen en una plataforma de datos llamada github  que kipp socal y muchas otras organizaciones pblicas  utilizan para la gestin de datos  la pgina que contiene el archivo de datos inclua nombres de estudiantes  direcciones  fechas de nacimiento  raza etnia  idioma primario y discapacidad primaria  nmeros de seguro social no se incluyeron en el archivo  el problema ha sido resuelto  y no tenemos evidencia  de que la informacin haya sido mal utilizada  
 
lo que estamos haciendo 
 
despus de que kipp socal se enter del problema  de inmediato eliminamos el archivo de datos e inactivamos la pgina de github  realizamos una auditora completa de github y otras plataformas de datos  y  aplicamos capas de seguridad adicionales  para futuras protecciones  
 
no tomamos muy en serio la seguridad de la informacin de nuestros estudiantes y  reforzamos nuestro compromiso de hacer que nuestras escuelas sean zona seguras  estamos en el proceso de realizar auditoras de seguridad de datos en todos nuestros sistemas  para asegurarnos de que este  sea un incidente aislado y que no vuelva a suceder  
 
lo que puede hacer 
 
le recomendamos estar alerta para cualquier actividad sospechosa relacionada con sus cuentas financieras e informes de crdito  a pesar de que no hubo nmeros de seguro social  o nmeros de licencia de conducir  o de tarjeta de identificacin que formaron parte de este archivo  lo alentamos a que supervise peridicamente sus estados de cuenta y registros  para asegurarse de que no haya transaccidentidad  a las autoridades policiales apropiadas  a su fiscal general del estado y oa la comisin federal de comercio  ftc   
 
puede revisar su informacin de crdito comunicndose con las tres agencias de crdito  y tiene la opcin de colocar una alerta de fraude en sus cuentas  la informacin de contacto de las tres agencias de crdito se detalla a continuacin

p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
    
 
para m informacin 
 
lamentamos este incidente y le pedimos disculpas por cualquier preocupacin que pueda haberle causado  proteger su informacin e increblemente importante para nosotros  al igual  que abordar este incidente con la informacin y la asistencia que pueda necesitar  si tiene preguntas o inquietude  por favor no dude en contactar a su lder escolar o al equipo de datos kipp socal en datakippsocal org 
 
atentamente

content of data breach notification letter  dear recipient  
 
we be write to inform you of a recent security incident that have occur  at mckinney   company  cpa  we take the privacy and security of personal information very seriously  we want to provide you with information about the incident  explain the service we be make available to you  and assure you that we be take significant measure to protect your information  
 
what happen  
 
we receive notice from our tax software company that some of our client  federal tax return have be fraudulently file  if you be one of those client  we have already contact you  or the primary filer  directly by phone  
 
what we be do 
 
upon learn of the issue  we immediately secure our tax software and commence a prompt and thorough investigation  a part of our investigation  we have work very closely with external cybersecurity professional to analyze our internal system for any unusual or unauthorized activity and to determine if any information be at risk  we also immediately notify the internal revenue service of the issue and continue to work with them  
 
what information be involve  
 
on may     the forensic investigation conclude that an unauthorized third party access our system in april  and may have acquire certain individual client information  include your full name and social security number  to the extent you provide your bank account information  rout and check account number  to u  that information may have be access a well  the compromise information include the personal information of primary individual filer  spouse  and dependent  each person on the tax return will be notify separately of this incident  
 
what you can do 
 
to protect you from potential misuse of your information  we be offer a one year membership in experian identityworkssm credit b  this product help detect possible misuse of your personally  you should always remain vigilant in review your account statement for fraudulent or irregular activity on a regular basis  
 
if your tax return be fraudulently file  we have be work with you to file a paper return along with a form   identity theft affidavit  with the irs  if you have not receive a phone call from u notify you that a fraudulent return be file with your information  then your return be not affect and will be e file by our firm when it be complete  to the extent that you provide your bank account information to u  you may contact your financial institution to inquire about step to take to protect your account  include whether you should close your account or obtain a new account number  
 
for more information 
 
we apologize that this incident occur  we be commit to maintain the privacy of our client information and have take many precaution to help safeguard it  we continually evaluate and modify our practice to enhance the security and privacy of our client information and have take step to prevent further unauthorizedaccess to client record  
 
if you have any further question regard this incident  please call our dedicate and confidential toll free response line that we have set up to respond to question at phone number  this response line be staff with professional familiar with this incident and knowledgeable on what you can do to help protect against misuse of your information  
 
sincerely  
 
mckinney   company  cpa

information about identity theft protection guide  contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  equifax  experian  transunion  phone      p o  box  atlanta  georgia  www equifax com phone      p o  box  allen  texas  www experian com phone      p o  box  atlanta  ga   www transunion com 
 
free credit report  we remind you to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      you can also order your annual free credit report by mail a complete annual credit report request form  available from the u s  federal trade commission  ftc  website at www consumer ftc gov  to  annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga    
 
for colorado  georgia  maine  maryland  massachusetts  new jersey  puerto rico  and vermont resident  you may obtain one or more  depend on the state  additional copy of your credit report  free of charge  you must contact each of the credit report agency directly to obtain such additional report s   
 
security freeze  security freeze  also know a credit freeze  restrict access to your credit file  make it harder for identity thief to open new account in your name  you can freeze and unfreeze your credit file for free  you also can get a free freeze for your child who be under   and if you be someone guardian  conservator  or have a valid power of attorney  you can get a free freeze for that person  too  how will these freeze work  contact all three of the nationwide credit report agency equifax  experian  and transunion  if you request a freeze online or by phone  the agency must place the freeze within one business day  if you request a lift of the freeze  the agency must lift it within one hour  if you make your request by mail  the agency must place or lift the freeze within three business day after it get your request  you also can lift the freeze temporarily without a fee  dont confuse freeze with lock  they work in a similar way  but lock may have monthly fee  if you want a free freeze guarantee by federal law  then opt for a freeze  not a lock  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that if you be request a credit report for your spouse  this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past five year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible  display your name and current mail address  and the date of issue  
 
for new mexico resident  you may obtain a security freeze on your credit report to protect your privacy and ensure that credit be not grant in your name without your knowledge  you may submit a declaration of removal to remove information place in your credit report a a result of be a victim of identity theft  you have a right to place a security freeze on your credit report or submit a declaration of removal pursuant to the fair credit report and identity security act  
 
for colorado and illinois resident  you may obtain information from the credit report agency and the ftc about security freeze  
 
fraud alert  a fraud alert tell business that check your credit that they should check with you before open a new account  a of september     when you place a fraud alert  it will last one year  instead of  day  fraud alert will still be free and identity theft victim can still get an extend fraud alert for seven year  
 
for colorado and illinois resident  you may obtain additional information from the credit report agency and the ftc about fraud alert

dear sonicbids user  
 
we be write to inform you of an incident that may impact the security of your sonicbids username and password  we be provide you with information about the event and a reminder to use strong password to protect your online account  
 
what happen  
 
on may     we learn that certain sonicbids usernames and password be publicly accessible a a result of a data privacy event involve our third party cloud host service  which we use to store information relate to sonicbids user  we immediately launch an investigation and determine that an unauthorized actor have access sonicbids cloud instance and obtain usernames and password for certain individual  the actor then make this information publicly accessible for a limit period of time  out of an abundance of caution  we immediately reset all sonicbids user password  include yours  we also conduct a thorough review of the information that be publicly available to confirm the identity of individual whose credential be publicly accessible and provide them with notice a soon a reasonably possible  a part of our investigation of this incident  we determine that the unauthorizedaccess to our cloud instance occur on december     
 
what information be involve  
 
our investigation determine that the incident impact your name and sonicbids username and password  
 
what we be do  
 
protect the privacy and security of our user personal information be among our highest priority  we immediately take step to respond to this incident and continue to implement enhance security protocol to prevent a similar event from occur in the future  our immediate step include take the sonicbids site offline  force password reset for all user  and ensure appropriate permission be restore prior to relaunching the site  we also work with outside computer specialist to identify and remediate any potential vulnerability within our network  we retrain our staff on data security and be notify regulatory authority a require by law  weve also be in contact with federal law enforcement and be cooperate a require  
 
what you can do  
 
you can review the enclose step you can take to protect personal information  although your password have already be reset by our customer support team  we encourage you to rotate your account password often and to refrain from use the same password for multiple online account  to reset your sonicbids password in the future  you may use the follow link    
 
for more information  
 
we recognize that you may have question about this incident that be not address in this email  if you have additional question  please call our toll free assistance line at        be  pm est  exclude u s  holiday  you may also contact u at supportsonicbids com or write to u at p o  box  white plain  ny   
 
we sincerely regret any inconvenience this incident may cause you  we remain commit to safeguard the information in our care and will continue to take step to ensure the security of our system  
 
sincerely  
 
sonicbids customer support team 
 
step you can take to protect personal information 
 
monitor account 
 
under u s  law  you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also contact the three major credit bureau directly to request a free copy of your credit report  you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below  
 
experian 
po box  
allen  tx  
    
www experian com freeze center html 
 
transunion 
p o  box  
woodlyn  pa  
    
www transunion com credit freeze 
 
equifax 
po box  
atlanta  ga   
    
www equifax com personal credit report service 
 
in order to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  your full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  if you have move in the past five    year  provide the address where you have live over the prior five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    
  if you be a victim of identity theft  include a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft  
 
a an alternative to a security freeze  you have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on your file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the agency list below

to parent or legal guardian of patient name  
 
we be write to inform you about a data security incident that may have affect your child information  codemetro provide software solution to apply behavior analysis provider  include customer name  from which your child may have receive service  
 
what happen  
 
on april     codemetro system suffer a ransomware attack  which be detect within hour of it deployment  upon discovery  we take immediate step to contain the threat and engage a third party forensic firm to investigate the incident and assist with remediation effort  we also notify federal law enforcement authority of the incident  
 
our investigation have find that prior to deploy the ransomware  the criminal be able to access a database server and deploy tool to copy and remove some data  the database server contain health relate patient information  
 
what information may have be involve  
 
a a result of the investigation  we be able to determine that your personal information may have be potentially involve  and we notify your child provider of the incident on or about may     the patient information that be involve may have include  
 
  information to identify and contact the patient  such a patient name  patient picture  parent legal guardian name  guarantor name  address  email address  phone number  date of birth  gender  and ethnicity   
  school information  school name  individualize education program  iep  start and review date  assessment and psychological evaluation date  and eligibility type  type of behavioral or developmental condition or impairment

  medical information  date of enrollment with your aba provider service  authorize service  allot time number of session  diagnostic code and modifier  charge reimbursement rate  outcome  and provider name   
 
if your child be cover under tricare  the health insurance id number may be a guarantor legal guardian social security number  
 
what we be do  
 
a soon a we discover the incident  we promptly launch a forensic investigation  contact law enforcement  and take step to remediate the incident  we take data security incident very seriously and have work to implement the necessary step to ensure the continue protection of your data  in response to this incident  we have enhance our security and monitor a well a harden our system to minimize the risk of any similar incident in the future  
 
we have arrange to offer you credit monitor for a period of one year  at no cost to you  through epiq  you have until date to activate these service  and instruction on how to activate these service be include in the attach reference guide  
 
what you can do

reference guide 
 
review your account statement 
 
carefully review statement send to you from provider a well a from your insurance company to ensure that all of your account activity be valid  report any questionable charge promptly to the provider bill office  or for insurance statement  to your insurance company  
 
provide any update personal information to your health care provider 
 
your health care provider office may ask to see a photo id to verify your identity  please bring a photo id with you to every appointment if possible  your provider office may also ask you to confirm your date of birth  address  telephone  and other pertinent information so that they can make sure that all of your information be up to date  please be sure and tell your provider office when there be any change to your information  carefully review this information with your provider office at each visit can help to avoid problem and to address them quickly should there be any discrepancy  
 
order your free credit report

content of data breach notification letter  june    
 
first name last name 
 
address 
 
city  state zip 
 
notice of data breach 
 
what happen  
 
on or about june     h r block conduct an internal security review and determine that an unauthorized party may have previously use your username and password to access your myblock account on or about april     upon learn of this situation  we immediately lock your account  base on our review  it appear the unauthorized party obtain your login credential from a source other than h r block  identity thief use a variety of tactic to steal consumer usernames and password  include  phishing email website  malware and compromise other third party site where you may have reuse your login credential  
 
what information be involve  
 
prior to u lock your account  the unauthorized party may have view your personal information  such a your name  address  phone number  social security number  and tax return  
 
what we be do  
 
by lock your account  we have protect it from any further unauthorizedaccess  we continue to monitor account activity  to help safeguard you from potential misuse of your confidential information  we have arrange for you to receive  month of identity protection under experian identityworkssm at no cost to you  if your tax return contain information about a spouse  dependent  or third party  please contact u at     to obtain identity protection for these individual  this notice be not delay due any request by law enforcement  
 
what you can do  
 
we want to make you aware of the step you should take to guard against identity fraud  first  please enroll in the  month of identity protection from experian identityworkssm  second  please review the enclosure to learn more about other step you can take to protect yourself  
 
activate and use experian identityworkssm  
 
from the date that you set up your account  experian identityworkssm will enroll you in tri bureau credit monitor and you will receive alert regard any change in your credit file  you can review and verify these credit alert  this service also include a    identity theft insurance policy and  month enrollment in experian identityworkssm identity restoration  if need  experian identityworkssm have a simple internet base verification and enrollment process  to sign up for coverage go to  you will need to provide the redemption code s  that be list below  which be valid for enrollment up to  day from the date of this letter  once you have enter your redemption code  click on sign up now on the right side of the page and follow the website instruction  please note that if you enroll online  part of the sign up process may include receive a phone call from the experian identityworkssm soon after you initiate the registration process  
 
experian identityworkssm registration code s   
 
first name last name  experian code 
 
alternatively  if you do not wish to register over the internet  you can enroll by phone at      representative be available to assist you from  be  pm central time monday through saturday  the experian identityworkssm service will be valid for one year from the date you register for it  if you have question about the experian identityworkssm or it coverage  please contact experian directly at     and reference engagement number db  
 
additional step we recommend you take  
 
review your financial statement carefully  we encourage you to activate the experian identityworkssm service be offer at no cost to you  whether or not you accept the experian identityworkssm service  we recommend you remain vigilant about regularly review personal financial statement  include your credit card and bank account statement  
 
obtain a free credit report  you may request a free copy of your credit report once every  month by visit  or by call     toll free  you can print a copy of the request form at   
 
review your credit report carefully  look for any account you do not open or inquiry from creditor that you do not initiate  also  look for personal information  such a your home address or social security number that be inaccurate  if you see anything that be wrong or that you do not understand  call the credit report agency at the telephone number on the report  
 
for more information  
 
we understand that an incident of this nature can be unsettle  we strive to ensure a high level of data security and integrity for our client  should you have any question or other concern about this matter  please do not hesitate to contact h r block by phone at      
 
sincerely  
 
h r block h r block determine that an unauthorized party may have access customer myblock account use obtain login credential on or about april     and view personal information such a name  address  phone number  social security number  and tax return  
content of data breach notification letter  dear   name     
 
we be write to inform you of a recent incident that may have affect the security of some of your personal information be present in an affect email account at the time of the incident  
 
the information involve in the incident include your name and   breach element    to date  we be unaware of any actual or attempt misuse of your personal information a a result of this incident  
 
information privacy and security be among our highest priority  upon learn of this incident  we quickly take step to confirm the security of our system  include our employee email account  we reset password for le duff email account  implement increase security measure for email account access  conduct additional employee training  and be currently review our policy and procedure relate to data security  a a precautionary matter  we provide notice to relevant regulatory authority  
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review your account statement  and monitor your credit report for suspicious activity  although we be not aware of any fraudulent misuse of your information  we arrange to have experian monitor your identity for  year at no cost to you a an add precaution  please review the instruction contain in the attach step you can take to protect your information to enroll in and receive these service  le duff america will cover the cost of this service  however  you will need to enroll yourself in the credit monitor service if you would like to do so  
 
if you have additional question  please contact our dedicate assistance line at     monday through friday from   a m  to   p m  central time  you may also write to le duff america  inc  at  merit doctor   suite   dallas  texas  or contact u by email at legalnoticesleduffamerica com

christine johnson
