re  notification of data security incident 
 
dear   firstname     lastname     
 
we be write to inform you of a potential data security incident involve american medical technology  amt  that may have involve your personal information  at amt  we take the privacy and security of all information we collect and store very seriously  
 
what happen  
 
on or about december     we discover suspicious activity within an employee email account  we immediately engage a third party forensic firm to perform an investigation into our email tenant  after an extensive and comprehensive investigation and data mining process  on may     we learn that your personal information may have be available to the attacker during the incident  we be send you this letter to notify you about the incident and provide information about step you can take to protect your information  
 
what information be involve  
 
base on our investigation  your social security number  medical record number  diagnosis information  health insurance policy or individual subscriber number  medical history information  hipaa account information  driver license state identification number  or taxpayer id number  may have be impact by this incident  
 
what we be do  
 
we engage two separate information security company to review our email system  we implement improvement per their recommendation to increase the security of our email system  we have also implement additional safeguard to improve data security on our web server infrastructure  in addition  we be offer identity theft protection service through id expert  the data breach and recovery service expert  to provide you with myidcare  myidcare service include   month of credit and cyberscan monitor  a    insurance reimbursement policy  and fully manage id theft recovery service  with this protection  myidcare will help you resolve issue if your identity be compromise  
 
what you can do  
 
we encourage you to enroll in the free credit monitor and insurance service by use the enrollment code at the top of this letter and go to  or call     myidcare expert be available monday through friday from  be    pm central time  please note the deadline to enroll be september     
 
for more information  
 
you will find detail instruction for enrollment on the enclose recommend step document  also  you will need to reference the enrollment code at the top of this letter when call or enroll online  so please do not discard this letter  please call    or go to  for assistance or for any additional question you may have  
 
sincerely  
 
jeremy white 
chief privacy officer 
american medical technology

step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
copy of credit report  you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free     or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can print this form at  you also can contact one of the follow three national credit report agency  
 
transunion

chester  pa

atlanta  ga  
    
www equifax com 
 
free annual report 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
    
www annualcreditreport com 
 
fraud alert  you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least  day  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze  under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state  you also have the right to obtain any police report file in regard to this incident  contact information for the ftc be  federal trade commission   pennsylvania ave  nw  washington  dc   www consumer ftc gov and www ftc gov idtheft       resident of new york  maryland  north carolina  and rhode island can obtain more information from their attorney general use the contact information below

notice of data breach 
 
dear   first name     last name    
 
southern farm bureau life insurance company take the security and privacy of information in our care seriously  we be write to inform you of a recent incident that might have involve your personal information  a discuss below  to address this situation  we be offer one year of identity protection and restoration service  at no cost to you  we apologize for any inconvenience this incident may cause  
 
what happen  
 
on january     we learn that  for  minute on that day  an unknown third party access  remotely and without authorization  the corporate email box of one of our employee  during our investigation of this incident  we determine that the corporate email box of another one of our employee be access  remotely and without authorization  between november    and november     in light of the employee job function  their email box include certain personal information  present in document that include insurance application and other relate documentation  
 
what information be involve  
 
you be receive this notice because we recently determine that the information in the subject email box include your name and one or more of the follow of your personal information  social security number  driver license or government issue identification card number  digital signature  medical information  and or financial account information  the investigation have be unable to determine whether the perpetrator in fact access your particular information  and we be not aware of any misuse of your information  however  out of an abundance of caution  we want to inform you of the step we have take and be currently take in hope of mitigate any potential misuse of your information  
 
what be we do  
 
upon learn of the incident  we launch an investigation and work diligently to determine the scope of the incident and identify potentially affect individual  we also notify law enforcement of the incident  in addition  we have take action to prevent a similar incident from occur in the future  include the implementation of multi factor authentication across the enterprise  along with the implementation of geo block of foreign connection  we have also maintain and enhance our training to reinforce protection of sensitive information  
 
to ease any concern you might have about this situation  at no cost to you  we be offer you identity theft protection service through id expert  a data breach and recovery service company  to provide you with myidcare  myidcare service include   month of credit and cyberscan monitor  a    insurance reimbursement policy  and fully manage id theft recovery service  with this protection  myidcare will help you resolve issue if your identity be compromise  
 
to enroll  please call      or visit    
enrollment code   xxxxxxxx   
 
what can you do  
 
you should remain vigilant by review your bank  credit card  debit card and other financial account statement over the next twelve    to twenty four    month and immediately report any suspicious activity  we also encourage you to contact id expert with any question and to enroll in free myidcare service by call     or go to  and use the enrollment code provide above  myidcare expert be available monday through friday from  be    pm central time  please note the deadline to enroll be september     
 
again  at this time  there be no evidence that your information have be misuse  however  we encourage you to take full advantage of this service offer  myidcare representative have be fully verse on the incident and can answer question or concern you may have regard protection of your personal information  
 
for more information 
 
we fully appreciate the importance of protect your personal information  and we apologize for any inconvenience cause by this incident  you will find detail instruction for enrollment in the enclose recommend step document  also  you will need to reference the enrollment code at the top of this letter when call or enroll online  so please do not discard this letter  
 
please call     or go to  for assistance or for any additional question you may have about enroll in myidcare  should you have any question about your policy y  with southern farm bureau life insurance company  please contact our policy service department toll free at      by e mail at servicesfbli com  or by mail at p o  box   jackson  mississippi

security freeze  
 
you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  there be no charge to place  lift or remove the security freeze  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement

personal information of a minor

content of data breach notification letter  aa v  client 
 
notice of data breach 
 
to   name     
 
we be write to inform you about a data security incident that may have affect some of your personalysis  aba  provider  include your current  or former  employer    customer name    
 
what happen  
 
on april     codemetro system suffer a ransomware attack  which be detect within hour of it deployment  upon discovery  we take immediate step to contain the threat and engage a third party forensic firm to investigate the incident and assist with remediation effort  we also notify federal law enforcement authority of the incident  our investigation have find that prior to deploy the ransomware  the criminal be able to access a database server and deploy tool to copy and remove some data  the database server contain employee payroll information  
 
what information may have be involve  
 
a a result of the investigation  we be able to determine that your personal information may have be involve  and we notify your employer of the incident on may     the employee information may have include  name  address  social security number  ssn   driver license number  and date of birth  
 
what we be do

  place a security freeze on your credit file

step you can take to further help protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
copy of credit report

fraud alert  
 
you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least one year  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze  
 
under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  
 
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state  contact information for the ftc be  federal trade commission   pennsylvania ave  nw  washington  dc   www consumer ftc gov and www ftc gov idtheft       resident of new york  maryland  north carolina  and rhode island can obtain more information from their attorney general use the contact information below

notice of data breach 
 
dear   firstname     middlename     lastname     namesuffix    
 
  bb text  companyname      gain   be commit to protect the confidentiality and security of the information we maintain  we be write to inform you that we recently identify and address a data security incident that may have involve your information  this notice explain the incident  measure we have take  and some step you can take in response  
 
what happen  
 
on may     gain conclude it investigation of an incident involve some of our system  gain first learn of suspicious system activity on april     during a routine review of login activity  upon identify the suspicious activity  gain immediately start an investigation with the assistance of a lead cyber security firm  through this investigation  gain determine that an unauthorized party may have access some of our computer server between the date of april    and april     upon learn of this  gain secure the involve server and take them offline  
 
what information be involve  
 
we have undertake a comprehensive review of the data that could have potentially be access a a result of the incident and have determine that the data relate to some of our current and former customer  the information include your name in combination with your   bb text  impacteddata     your social security number be not involve in this incident  to date  we do not have any evidence that any of your information have be misuse  
 
what we be do  
 
to help prevent something like this from happen in the future  gain have implement additional security measure  include the deployment of enhance monitor and alert software  
 
what you can do  
 
we remind you to remain vigilant to the possibility of fraud by review your financial account statement for any suspicious activity  you should immediately report any suspicious activity to your financial institution  please see the page that follow this notice for additional step you may take  
 
for more information  
 
if you have any question  please call   forexgo      monday through friday  from   a m  to   p m   eastern time  
 
sincerely  
 
  bb text  signatoryinfo    
 
additional step you can take 
 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
 
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
 
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert  
 
there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  
 
you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  
 
there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  
 
for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number and other personal information  
 
after receive your freeze request  each credit bureau will provide you with a unique pin  personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  
 
a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  
 
if you opt for a temporary lift because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit bureau  the unauthorized party may have access some of the computer server between april    and april     indicate a hack by an external

notice of data breach 
 
dear first name  
 
joseph j  gormley  cpa value and respect your privacy and be commit to keep your information confidential  our commitment to these value include notify individual if we believe that the confidentiality of their personal information very seriously and highly recommend you carefully review the information contain in this letter to best protect yourself in the future  
 
what happen  
 
on may     we be inform that our server experience an intrusion  the intruder or intruder place malware on our server and by do so  may have gain access to our customer name  address  social security number  tax return  and information use to file tax return  we retain outside vendor to evaluate our system and corrective action be immediately implement  the investigation be continue and we be unable to affirmatively confirm which file  if any  be actually access  out of an abundance of caution  we be notify those whose information be potentially access  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information may have include name  address  social security number  tax return  and information use to file tax return  
 
what we be do 
 
cyber attack continue to increase and evolve  for this reason  and to help prevent this type of incident in the future  we be actively enhance our data security procedure  we have remove all malicious code on our system  enable other cybersecurity layer of protection  and have implement security upgrade to our system  we be currently in the process of communicate with all necessary consumer report and governmental agency  
 
what you can do 
 
  change your password on any account that may have be breach and remember to use unique password across different account  
 
  remain vigilant and monitor your credit and identity by review your account statement and monitor credit report for any unauthorized activity  under federal law  you also be entitle every  month to one free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit bureau  to obtain a free annual credit report  go to www annualcreditreport com or call      you may wish to stagger your request so that you receive a free report by one of the three credit bureau every four month  
 
  initiate a fraud alert which will warn lender that you may have be a fraud victim  when you request a fraud alert be add with any of the three major credit bureau  the bureau you contact will notify the other two and alert will be add with those bureau a well  this extra precaution will notify any potential lender that they should contact you before grant any new line of credit in your name  this fraud alert will stay on your credit report for  day  and you can renew the fraud alert when it expire  
 
  keep an eye on your financial account by visit your online bank and financial account  and set up any alert feature they may have  this may keep you notify of any unusual activity  should it occur  
 
  report any suspect incident of identity theft to local law enforcement  your state attorney general  or the federal trade commission  
 
  place a security freeze  by place a security freeze  someone who fraudulently acquire your personal credit report bureau list below in write to place the freeze  keep in mind that when you place the freeze  you will not be able to borrow money  obtain instant credit  or get a new credit card until you temporarily lift or permanently remove the freeze  
 
in order to request a security freeze  you may need to provide all the follow information  
 
  your full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
 
  social security number  
 
  date of birth  
 
  if you have move in the past five    year  provide the address where you have live over the prior five year  
 
  proof of current address such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
 
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc   
 
  if you be a victim of identity theft  include a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft

notice of data breach 
 
what happen 
 
eagle community credit union  eagle ccu  be commit to the privacy of individual and take the protection of personal information  
 
we recently discover that  on february     someone outside of eagle ccu temporarily access an eagle ccus employee email account without authorization  upon learn of the situation  we promptly contain the incident the morning of february    by secure the employee email account to prevent further access and begin an initial internal investigation into the incident  we also hire a lead forensic security firm to further investigate the incident and confirm the security of our computer system and network  the security firm investigation show no internal wrongdoing and verify eagle ccu computer system and network be secure  
 
on april     our investigation determine that the email account contain some of your personal information be contain in the relevant account  we be also commit to take step to help prevent something like this from happen again  include review our technical control and increase security training for all staff member  
 
what we be do 
 
although we be not aware of any instance of fraud or identity theft  we be offer a complimentary one year membership of experian identityworkssm credit b  this product help detect possible misuse of your personal information provide in this letter  
 
what information be involve 
 
a part of our investigation  we search for any personal information that could have be view  the impact information contain in the relevant email account vary by individual but may have include your name  financial account information  and or your social security number  
 
what you can do 
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend you remain vigilant to protect against potential fraud and or identity theft by  among other thing  review your account statement and monitor credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you should also promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incident of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  include the police and your state attorney general  a well a the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
other important information 
 
you may wish to review the tip provide by the ftc on fraud alert  security credit freeze and step to you can take to avoid identity theft  for more information and to contact the ftc  please visit www ftc gov idtheft or call   id theft        you may also contact the ftc at  federal trade commission   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc   
 
credit report  you may obtain a free copy of your credit report once every  month from each of the three national credit report agency by visit www annualcreditreport com  by call toll free      or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can print a copy of the request form at   
 
alternatively  you may elect to purchase a copy of your credit report by contact one of the three national credit report agency  contact information for the three national credit report agency for the purpose of request a copy of your credit report or for general inquiry be a follow  
 
equifax     www equifax com p o  box  atlanta  ga  
 
experian     www experian com p o  box  allen  tx  
 
transunion     www transunion com p o  box  chester  pa  
 
fraud alert  you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  a fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit report for one year  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any new account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three national credit report agency use the contact information list above  additional information be available at   
 
credit and security freeze  you may have the right to place a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  so that no new credit can be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a credit freeze be design to prevent potential credit grantors from access your credit report without your consent  if you place a credit freeze  potential creditor and other third party will not be able to get access to your credit report unless you temporarily lift the freeze  therefore  use a credit freeze may delay your ability to obtain credit  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a credit freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  since the instruction for how to establish a credit freeze differ from state to state  please contact the three major credit report company a specify below to find out more information  
 
equifax security freeze     www equifax com p o  box  atlanta  ga

dear saddleback valley unify school district family  
 
we be write to inform you of a data security incident that affect aeries  the district student information system  sister   aeries sister store and provide access to certain student and parent information for saddleback valley unify school district  we be one of the hundred of district use aeries sister that be affect by this incident  svusd have be a customer of aeries for over  year  and in that time have have no unauthorizedaccess or data incident with this software  we do not believe there be any reason to be alarm or unduly concern  but we want you to be inform about what happen  
 
timeline with the information provide to u from aeries  
 
on april     we be inform there may have be unauthorizedaccess to the aeries sister on november th    the initial report be focus on aeries host database  which we do not use  our student information system be house on premise on our own server  on may     svusd learn that the aeries incident may have also impact on premise database  follow direction provide by aeries  we immediately contact aeries and receive confirmation that our data be also access  
 
this incident may have reveal parent and student login information  physical residence address  email address  and encrypt password  however  no other data element be impact because of this incident  social security number  credit card data  or other personal information be not keep in our aeries database  with access to encrypt password  unauthorized people may be able to deconstruct weak  common  or simple password and subsequently enable unauthorizedaccess to parent and student account and data store in the aeries sister  
 
we have be inform that local and federal law enforcement official be notify of the incident  charge be file  and the people responsible be arrest  the investigation of their misconduct be continue  while there be no evidence to suggest that your specific data be misuse  out of an abundance of caution  we will reset the account password for all parent begin wednesday  june     to reset your password  please follow the forget password link on the aeries parent student portal  begin thursday  june     both parent and student will be able to view the new student password in the family portal by navigate to student info   student data  student will begin use their new password monday  july     
 
further  we be encourage stricter password security guideline a an add precaution against the possibility of future such incident  all new password should employ the follow guideline  
 
  recommend user to change password every  month  minimum  
  recommend minimum length    character 
  recommend a special character 
  require letter and number 
  recommend upper and lower case letter 
 
we have no reason to believe that any data be access reveal sensitive information such a social security number  credit card number  financial account information  or other information directly impact your credit rate  saddleback valley unify school district do not ask nor keep this type of information associate with your aeries account  nevertheless  if you suspect your personal information have be misuse  visit the federal trade commission site at identitytheft gov to get recovery step and to file an identity theft complaint  your complaint will be add to the ftcs consumer sentinel network  where it will be accessible to law enforcement for their investigation  
 
for link and more information  go to  here you will also see what action aeries be take to prevent this from happen to our school district and others in the future

fraud alert

security freeze  
 
under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  
 
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc or from your respective state attorney general about step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state  resident of maryland  north carolina  and rhode island can obtain more information from their attorney general use the contact information below  
 
federal trade commission 
 pennsylvania ave  nw 
washington  dc

in an effort to help relieve concern a a consequence of this incident  we be provide you with complimentary service to help monitor your identity for twelve    month  whether or not it be affect  we have secure the service of kroll  a global leader in risk mitigation and response  and their team have extensive experience help people who have sustain an unintended with this letter

what happen  
on may     westech detect that a ransomware infection begin encrypt file store on our network  
 
what we be do  
upon learn of this issue  we contain the threat by disable all unauthorizedaccess to our network  restore all encrypt data  and immediately commence a prompt and thorough investigation  a part of our investigation  we have be work very closely with external cybersecurity professional experience in hand these type of incident  after an extensive forensic investigation and manual document review  we discover on june    that certain impact file contain your personal information be acquire from our network  we have no evidence that any of the information have be misuse  nevertheless  out of an abundance of caution  we want to make you aware of the incident

step to protect the security of your personal information 
 
by take the follow step  you can help reduce the risk that your personal information may be misuse  
 
  enroll in identityworkssm  you must personally activate identity monitor for it to be effective  the notice letter contain instruction and information on how to activate your identityworkssm membership  experians identityworkssm product will provide the follow  
 
  experian credit report at signup  see what information be associate with your credit file  daily credit report be available for online member only  
  credit monitor  actively monitor your credit file at experian for indicator of fraud  
  identity restoration  identity restoration specialist be immediately available to help you address credit and non credit relate fraud  
  experian identityworkssm extendcare  you will receive the same high level of identity restoration support even after your identityworkssm membership expire  
   million identity theft insurance  provide coverage for certain cost and unauthorized electronic fund transfer  
 
please direct question about the identityworkssm product to experian  a credit card be not require for enrollment in identityworkssm  enrollment in identityworkssm will not affect your credit score  the term and condition for this offer be locate at www experianidworks com restoration  
 
  review your credit report  you can receive free credit report by place a fraud alert  under federal law  you also be entitle every  month to one free copy of your credit report from each of the three national credit bureau  to obtain a free annual credit report  go to www annualcreditreport com or call      you may wish to stagger your request so that you receive a free report from one of the three credit bureau every four month  
 
  review your account statement  you should carefully review for suspicious activity the statement that you receive from credit card company  bank  utility  and other service  
 
  remain vigilant and respond to suspicious activity  if you receive an email or mail alert from experian  contact an identityworkssm identity resolution agent toll free at     or visit www experianidworks com restoration for additional information  you should consider change your username  password  security question  and security answer to your online account  if you notice suspicious activity on an account statement  report it to your credit card company or service provider and consider close the account  you should also consider report such activity to your local police department  your state attorney general  and the federal trade commission  
 
  you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  a security freeze will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit file without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  please understand that place a security freeze on your credit file may delay  interfere with  or prevent the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make for a new loan  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  
 
a security freeze do not apply to a person or entity  or it affiliate  or collection agency act on behalf of the person or entity  with which you have an exist account that request information in your credit report for the purpose of review or collect the account  review the account include activity relate to account maintenance  monitor  credit line increase  and account upgrade and enhancement  
 
to place a the organization be the victim of a ransomware attack on their information system by an external which gain unauthorizedaccess to some information store on their own information system

a part of our investigation  we also find documentation use to manage our internal corporate credit card program that contain instance of employee corporate cardholder name and card number  and expiration date in some instance  we provide notice to the issuer of the card about these account and we have be inform that they have not see an increase in fraudulent activity on these account  while we do not believe that this will create a risk of harm to our employee relate to this information  out of an abundance of caution we be notify all of our employee who have active corporate credit card account  we will begin provide notice to approximately  employee with active corporate credit card account reside in new hampshire

telephone  contact myidcare at      to gain additional information about this event and speak with knowledgeable representative about the appropriate step to take to protect your credit identity  
 
monitor your account  always remain vigilant against incident of identity theft  review your account statement  and monitor your credit report and explanation of benefit form for suspicious activity  under u s  law you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also contact the three major credit bureau directly to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  
 
should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below  
 
transunion 
p o  box  
chester  pa  
    
www transunion com credit freeze 
 
experian 
p o  box  
allen  tx  
    
www experian com freeze center html

p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
    
www equifax com personal credit report service 
 
in order to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  your full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  if you have move in the past five    year  provide the address where you have live over the prior five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    
  if you be a victim of identity theft  include a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft  
 
the credit report agency have one    to three    business day after receive your request to place a security freeze on your credit file report  base upon the method of the request  the credit bureau must also send write confirmation to you within five    business day and provide you with the process by which you may remove the security freeze  include an authentication mechanism  
 
upon receive a direct request from you to remove a security freeze and upon receive proper identification from you  the consumer report agency shall remove a security freeze within one    hour after receive the request by telephone for removal or within three    business day after receive the request by mail for removal  
 
a an alternative to a security freeze  you have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on your file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  
 
should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the agency list below  
 
transunion 
p o  box  
chester  pa

dear sir or madam  
 
we write on behalf of our client  accedian network u inc    accedian    to notify you of a security incident that result in the unauthorizedaccess of the personal information of one new hampshire resident  
 
on may     accedian discover it be the victim of a ransomware attack  the external threat actor be able to gain access to accedians system  infect certain system with ransomware and exfiltrating data off of certain server in the system  once accedian become aware it have be subject to a ransomware attack  the system be contain by shut down all server and machine  accedian also immediately put in place an incident response plan and retain forensic expert to contain the incident and determine it scope  
 
additional containment and responsive measure take include  
  password reset and multi factor authentication for all gsuite user  
  separate rout from firewall  
  build a new firewall to support web filter  
  build a green network with additional vlans  
  revalidating all internal route    ip   
  rebuild an active directory  window    
  change vpn protocol and security   factor authentication  certificate   and 
  deploy enterprise wide antivirus malware end point security  
 
during the investigation  the forensic expert advise that there be insufficient evidence from the log to identify all file access by the attacker  and what data be transfer to the attacker infrastructure during the incident  
 
on june     however  accedian receive information from the attacker on the file access and what data have be transfer during the incident  upon receipt of this information  accedian immediately undertake an assessment to determine the scope of individual affect in the unite state  from this review  accedian determine that the personal information of one new hampshire resident be access by the attacker  include name  address  resume  salary or fee schedule  social security number  tax form bank detail for direct deposit purpose and photo identification  
 
to help protect the identity of impact individual  we be offer a complimentary  year membership of identity theft and credit monitor solution from cyberscout  this product provide superior identity detection and resolution of identity theft  the affect individual will be notify of the incident on july     a copy of the notification letter be enclose  
 
if you have any question or need further information regard this incident  please contact me at      or julie himonortonrosefulbright com  
 
very truly yours  
 
julie himo

dear bhusd parent guardian  
 
beverly hill unify school district  the district  be commit to protect the confidentiality and security of our student information and that of their parent  we be write to address a recent incident that may have involve your data  this notice explain the incident  measure that have be take  and some step you can take in response  
 
what happen  
 
the district use the aeries student information system to provide student and their parent with online access to information regard school event and schedule  in late november   aeries learn that an unauthorized individual attempt to exploit a vulnerability in the aeries software that would allow access to student and parent information  aeries later determine that the exploit be successful  upon discovery  aeries begin an investigation  and law enforcement launch an investigation to identify the person responsible  who aeries believe be now in police custody  on april     we be notify by aeries that this individual may have access the district aeries system  we then contact aeries  and on may     we be inform that the individual do access parent and student data within the district aeries system  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information accessible to the perpetrator potentially include parent and or student name  home address  phone number  email address  and hash password   a form of render the actual password indecipherable to third party   for the aeries system  
 
what you can do 
 
even though we have no evidence that your personally  if you use the same password for other online account  we recommend change the password for those account a well  although this incident be the result of a vulnerability in aeries system  not the district  we have take this opportunity to review the district security a well  to further strengthen account security  your new password must include the follow  
 
  lower case letter 
  at least one    upper case letter 
  at least  special character 
  at least  number 
  at least eight    character  
 
what we be do 
 
we understand the importance of protect the privacy and security of personal information  and we regret any inconvenience or concern this incident may cause  in order to avoid the possibility of unauthorizedaccess to the account involve  we be require all account holder whose account be involve to change their password  to help prevent something like this from happen again in the future  we install the software patch that aeries make available to remedy the vulnerability that allow the unauthorized individual to potentially access our aeries system  in addition  we and aeries be review our exist policy and procedure to mitigate any risk associate with this incident and to better prevent future incident

  claim information 
  date of birth 
  demographic information

what you can do

content of data breach 
 
we be write to inform you of a data security incident that occur with one of our due diligence vendor that we hire to perform service on some of our loan  include yours  we also want to let you know about the service we be offer to you at no charge to help protect your continue privacy  at this time  we have no reason to believe that your personal information have be access or use inappropriately  however  we be write this letter to explain what happen  what information be involve  what we have do  and what you can do to protect your continue privacy  
 
first  we want to explain why we have your personally make the loan to you  be responsible for process your payment and provide you with customer service  the fact that you be receive this letter from u do not mean that there have be any change in your mortgage or your relationship with that other company  
 
what happen  
 
we recently learn that earlier this year  a vendor we hire to perform due diligence service on some of our loan experience a ransomware attack on it system  because the incident leave the vendor system inaccessible to the vendor  the vendor do not know all detail of the incident or the information affect  
 
what information be involve  
 
while we have no indication that your personal information  which be encrypt a require by our contract with them  be access or take from it system by the attacker  however  give the nature and circumstance of the attack  we decide  a a precautionary measure  to make credit the breach be cause by a ransomware attack on a due diligence vendor system  leave the vendor system inaccessible and compromise the vendor information

what you can do

under u s  law  you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also contact the three major credit bureau directly to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
you also have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who may access the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency

dear attorney general mcdonald  
 
wilson elser moskowitz edelman and dicker llp  wilson elser  represent eshel  aminov   partner llp  eshel aminov   an accounting and financial service firm  with respect to a potential data security incident  hereinafter  the incident  describe in more detail below  eshel aminov take the security and privacy of the information in it control seriously  and have take step to prevent a similar incident from occur in the future  
 
  nature of the security incident  
 
begin on or about march    and end on or about may     eshel aminov experience a business email compromise in which an unknown cyberattacker gain access to eshel aminovs business email environment a a result of an email phishing scheme  
 
eshel aminov do not know what  if any  personal information belong to it client be either acquire or access by the unknown cyberattacker a a result of this incident  however  the individual responsible for the incident have the mean to access and or acquire unencrypted document within eshel aminovs business email environment that contain social security number  financial information  payment card information  and tax relate information of eshel aminovs client  
 
again  at this time  eshel aminov have no evidence that the cyberattacker actually view or acquire any personal information have occur due to the incident  
 
eshel aminov first discover the incident on or about may     at which time it swiftly take step to secure it business email environment  eshel aminov have since go to great length to identify and notify any individual who be potentially impact a result of this incident include    a thorough internal review of ten of thousand of client file    the hire of a third party vendor to organize and process eshel aminov client mail data and    the hire of a third party vendor to arrange for any potentially affect individual to receive credit monitor and identity theft protection service  
 
  number of new hampshire resident affect  
 
on or about april     eshel aminov finish identify a population of six    new hampshire resident that be potentially affect by this incident  incident notification letter address to these individual be mail on july     via first class mail  a sample copy of the two version of the incident notification letter be mail to potentially affect resident of new hampshire be include with this letter  
 
  step take  
 
eshel aminov have take step to prevent a similar event from occur in the future  these step include reset eshel aminov employee access credential through a global firm wide password reset  implement additional layer of security to eshel aminovs email platform  and review the way confidential information be transmit within the firm  additionally  eshel establish a new client portal for secure transfer of data  eshel aminov have also provide potentially impact individual with notice of the incident and complimentary  online credit monitor and identity theft protection service to all notify resident of new hampshire for twelve    month  
 
  contact information  
 
eshel aminov remain dedicate to protect the sensitive information within it control  if you have any question or need additional information  please do not hesitate to contact me at anjali daswilsonelser com or

content of data breach notification letter  dear recipient  
 
i be write to inform you about a recent security incident that may have compromise your personal information very seriously  and we want to assure you that we be take significant measure to protect your information  
 
we recently discover that an unauthorized individual may have gain access to a limit number of employee email account between january     and march     we immediately launch an investigation with the help of outside cybersecurity professional to analyze the extent of the compromise and the security of the email and attachment contain within them  after a comprehensive investigation and document review  which conclude on june     we find that the compromise email account s  contain your full name and social security number  
 
while we be not aware of any report of identity fraud or improper use of your information a a direct result of this incident  we want to make you aware of the situation and provide you with information about the service we be make available to help safeguard you against identity fraud  a a precautionary measure  we be offer you a complimentary one year membership of experian identityworkssm credit b  this product help detect possible misuse of your personal information and provide you with identity protection service focus on immediate identification and resolution of identity theft  enroll in this program will not hurt your credit score  and you can find instruction on how to activate your complimentary one year membership in this letter  
 
in addition to the complimentary membership  we suggest that you take other precautionary measure to protect your personal information  such a place a fraud alert and or security freeze on your credit file and obtain a free credit report  you should also remain vigilant in review your financial account statement and credit report for fraudulent or irregular activity on a regular basis  
 
we apologize for any inconvenience this incident may have cause you  we be commit to maintain the privacy of personal information  
 
if you have any further question regard this incident  please call our dedicate and confidential toll free response line at phone number  the response line be staff with professional familiar with this incident and knowledgeable on what you can do to protect against misuse of your information  the response line be available monday through friday   a m  to  p m  eastern time  
 
sincerely

additional detail regard your  month experian identityworks credit b membership  
 
a credit card be not require for enrollment in experian identityworks credit b  
 
you can contact experian immediately without need to enroll in the product regard any fraud issue  
 
identity restoration specialist be available to help you address credit and non credit relate fraud  
 
once you enroll in experian identityworks  you will have access to the follow additional feature  
 
  experian credit report at signup  see what information be associate with your credit file  daily credit report be available for online member only   
  credit monitor  actively monitor experian  equifax  and transunion file for indicator of fraud  
  experian identityworks extendcaretm  you receive the same high level of identity restoration support even after your experian identityworks membership have expire  
   million identity theft insurance    provide coverage for certain cost and unauthorized electronic fund transfer  
 
activate your membership today at website or call phone number to register with the activation code above  
 
what you can do to protect your information  
 
there be additional action you can consider take to reduce the chance of identity theft or fraud on your account s   please refer to website for this information  if you have any question about identityworks  need help understand something on your credit report  or suspect that an item on your credit report may be fraudulent  please contact experians customer care team at phone number  
 
  place a fraud alert on your credit file  
 
whether or not you choose to use the complimentary  month credit monitor service  we recommend that you place an initial one year fraud alert on your credit file  at no charge  a fraud alert tell creditor to contact you personally before they open any new account  to place a fraud alert  call any one of the three major credit bureau at the number list below  a soon a one credit bureau confirm your fraud alert  they will notify the others  
 
equifax 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
www equifax com

p o  box  
allen  tx  
www experian com

p o  box  
chester  pa  
www transunion com 
    
 
  consider place a security freeze on your credit file  
 
if you be very concern about become a victim of fraud or identity theft  you may request a security freeze be place on your credit file  at no charge  a security freeze prohibit  with certain specific exception  the consumer report agency from release your credit report or any information from it without your express authorization  you may place a security freeze on your credit report by contact all three nationwide credit report company at the number below and follow the state direction or by send a request in write  by mail  to all three credit report company  
 
equifax security freeze 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
  
    
 
experian security freeze 
p o  box  
allen  tx  
  
    
 
transunion security freeze 
p o  box  
chester  pa  
  
    
 
in order to place the security freeze  youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
if your personal information have be use to file a false tax return  to open an account or to attempt to open an account in your name  or to commit fraud or other crime against you  you may file a police report in the city in which you currently reside  
 
if you do place a security freeze prior to enroll in the credit monitor service a describe above  you will need to remove the freeze in order to sign up for the credit monitor service  after you sign up for the credit monitor service  you may refreeze your credit file  
 
  obtain a free credit report  
 
under federal law  you be entitle to one free credit report every  month from each of the above three major nationwide credit report company  call     or request your free credit report online at www annualcreditreport com  once you receive your credit report  review them for discrepancy  identify any account you do not open or inquiry from creditor that you do not authorize  verify all information be correct  if you have question or notice incorrect information  contact the credit report company

dear attorney general macdonald  
 
we be write to notify you of two potential data security incident involve approximately   new hampshire resident  
 
in   morgan stanley close two data center and decommission computer equipment that process client information in both location  a be customary  we contract with a vendor to remove the data from the device  we subsequently learn that certain device believe to have be wipe of all information still contain some unencrypted data  the  data center event    
 
separately  in   morgan stanley disconnect and replace computer server  the  waas device   in local branch office  those server have store information on encrypt disk that may have include personal information  during a recent inventory  we be unable to locate a small number of those device  the manufacturer subsequently inform u of a software flaw that could have result in small amount of previously delete data remain on the disk in unencrypted form  the  waas device event    
 
we have work with outside technical expert to understand the fact and any potential risk for both event  we be not aware of any access to or misuse of personal information in connection with either of these incident  
 
for both event  we investigate the disposition and handle of the device  and work with outside technical expert to understand any potential risk to customer data in light of the technical characteristic and configuration of each of the relevant device  in addition  we have continuously monitor active account a well a internet and  dark web  forum for any evidence of misuse of morgan stanley data and have not detect any unauthorized activity relate to the incident  
 
nonetheless  we decide that  in an abundance of caution  on july     we would provide notice of the data center event and the waas device event to individual whose information may have be on the device when they leave our possession  
 
data that potentially could have remain on the device may have include account name and number  at morgan stanley and any link bank account   social security number  passport number  contact information  date of birth  and asset value and hold data  note that any data on the device do not contain credit or debit card number or password that could be use to access financial account  
 
we be notify approximately   new hampshire resident who may have be affect via a write notice that will be deliver by the u s  postal service or  where electronic communication have be authorize by the customer  via our e communication system  a sample copy of the notice be attach hereto  
 
a note above  we have continuously monitor this situation and have not detect any unauthorized activity relate to this incident  in addition  for any potentially impact account  we have institute enhance security procedure  include continuous fraud monitor and monitor of information about malicious online activity and evidence of misuse of any morgan stanley data  we have also arrange with experian to provide any potentially affect individual with credit monitor service for  month at no charge to them  
 
finally  in addition to the measure describe above  we have take step to further strengthen control aim at reduce the risk that such an incident could occur in the future  
 
to the extent you have any question about this notification  please contact my colleague  akinyemi akiwowo at      or akinyemi akiwowomorganstanley com for additional information

notice of data breach 
 
we be write to inform you of potential data security incident relate to personal information for your morgan stanley account s   
 
what happen 
 
in   morgan stanley close two data center and decommission the computer equipment in both location  a be customary  we contract with a vendor to remove the data from the device  we subsequently learn that certain device believe to have be wipe of all information still contain some unencrypted data  separately  in   morgan stanley disconnect and replace a computer server in a local branch office  that server have store information on encrypt disk that may have include personal information in connection with either incident  nonetheless  because it be possible that data associate with your account s  could have remain on some of the device when they leave our possession  in an abundance of caution  we want to make you aware of these matter and what we be do to protect you  
 
what information be involve 
 
the data pertain to your account s  may have include certain personal information of the individual s  associate with your account s   include account name and number  at morgan stanley and any link bank account   social security number  passport number  contact information  date of birth  asset value  and hold data  the data do not contain morgan stanley online password  
 
what we be do 
 
we have continuously monitor these situation and have not detect any unauthorized activity relate to the incident  in addition  we have institute enhance security procedure on your account s   include continuous fraud monitor and monitor of information about malicious online activity and evidence of misuse of any morgan stanley data  
 
additionally  we have arrange with experian to provide you with their experian identityworkstm credit monitor and fraud detection service for  month at no charge to you  to take advantage of this offer  please visit the experian identityworks website at www experianidworks com credit by october     and reference the redemption code s  note below  additional redemption code be available if you would like coverage for other individual in your household associate with your account s   
 
 
 
 
at any point during the  month period  you be also eligible for free identity restoration service from experian  if you need assistance enroll in experian identityworks or have question about the product  please contact experians customer care team at    or     international   be prepare to provide engagement number db a proof of eligibility for the identityworks service by experian  
 
what you can do 
 
in addition to enroll in the credit monitor service  we have include a list of resource for protect yourself against potential misuse of your personal information with this letter  
 
for more information 
 
if you have any question  please contact a member of your morgan stanley team or the client service center at    or     international   if you have any question  please contact a member of your morgan stanley virtual advisor team at     enclose be a standard reference guide with additional information on the protection of personal information  
 
we understand the importance you place on data security  and we take our responsibility to protect your information very seriously  we sincerely regret any inconvenience or concern these matter may cause you  
 
supplemental information for the protection of personal information 
 
avoid phishing  please use caution when respond to third party who request disclosure of your personal information  
 
you should never provide personal information via email request or screen pop ups  legitimate agency company do not ask for this type of information in an email  we will never ask for your account password by email or by phone  
 
remain vigilant  a always  you should monitor your statement for any activity you do not recognize  contact u immediately to report any suspicious activity  
 
you also should not click link or open attachment send from atypical or unknown sender  even if they appear to be legitimate  pay special attention to link that purportedly take you to website or other resource relate to this incident or offer you service to assist with this incident  when in doubt  call your regular morgan stanley contact to verify the legitimacy of the communication  
 
order your free credit report  you be entitle under u s  law to one free credit report annually from each of the three nationwide consumer report agency  to order your credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at     we encourage you to remain vigilant by review your account statement and monitor your free credit report  
 
federal fair credit report act right  you also have right under the federal fair credit report act  fcra   which promote the accuracy  fairness  and privacy of information in the file of consumer report agency  more information be available at   
 
obtain a police report  you may be entitle by state law to obtain a police report relate to this matter  however  to our knowledge  no such report exist  if you be the victim of identity theft  you also have the right to file a police report and obtain a copy of it  
 
fraud alert and security freeze  you can place a fraud alert or security freeze on your credit report  free of charge  by call any of the toll free number provide below  unlike a fraud alert  you must place a security freeze on your credit file at each consumer report agency individually  for more information on fraud alert and security freeze  you also may contact the ftc a describe below  you may have to submit personal information to obtain the security freeze  include name  social security number  date of birth  and photograph of a government id

notice of data breach 
 
dear account holder  
 
the chronicle of higher education  inc  take data security very seriously  and we understand the importance of protect the information we maintain  we be write to inform you about an incident that may have involve some information relate to your online account s  to chronicle com  philanthropy com  and or chroniclevitae com  this notice explain the incident  measure we have take  and some step you can take in response  
 
what happen  
 
on june     the chronicle complete our investigation of report we receive that some of our data may have become accessible online  through the investigation  we confirm that unauthorized party make data for some online account to chronicle com  philanthropy com  and chroniclevitae com accessible online  upon learn of this  the chronicle launch an investigation with the assistance of a lead cybersecurity firm  and law enforcement be notify  through the investigation  the chronicle determine that unauthorized party have exploit a vulnerability in one of the chronicle server  through which they be able to obtain limit account information  
 
what information be involve  
 
our investigation determine that the account information post online only contain your name  email address  username s   and password s  for your online account s  to chronicle com  philanthropy com  and or chroniclevitae com  although the chronicle hash and salt password for online account in our database  mean that a cryptographic process be use to render the actual password indecipherable to third party and that they be not maintain in plain text  the unauthorized party be able to bypass the cryptographic hash and salt process  make the password for some online account accessible in plain text  
 
what you can do  
 
the chronicle reset password to all online account on june     so that the password for the account be no longer valid  if you have not log in since that date  the next time you log in to your online account s   you will be prompt to change your password s   also  if you use the same username s  and password s  for any other online account  we recommend that you change your password there a well  
 
what we be do  
 
to date  we have no evidence that there have be any unauthorizedaccess to your online account s   however  out of an abundance of caution  we want to let you know this happen and assure you we take it very seriously  in addition to reset the password s  to all online account use stronger hash and salt technology  we have take step to help prevent a similar incident from occur in the future  include the replacement of the server with the unauthorizedaccess  a well a additional procedure to further expand and strengthen security process  
 
for more information  
 
we regret any inconvenience or concern this may cause you  if you have any question  please call      monday friday    a m  to   p m   eastern daylight time  
 
sincerely  
 
ken sand 
 
ken sand 
 
general manager  online 
 
 prior to   account holder create usernames for their online account that be different than their email address  for online account create after   the usernames be the email address the account holder list when they create their online account  
 
additional step you can take  
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  
 
contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow

dear   first and last name

a soon a we learn of this issue  we take step to prevent any further theft of our member personal investigation  we have also retain an independent forensic firm  the follow detail be base on our current understand of this incident but may be subject to change  
 
what happen  on june     a financial institution alert lacba that there be malicious code present on specific portion of it website  lacba org  further investigation of the incident establish that the malicious code be present at least a early a may     
 
what information be involve  our internal investigation indicate that the information compromise a a result of this incident include your first and last name   digit payment card number s   username  password  attorney bar number  if use a a username   and any other information you type into the website at that time  
 
what we be do  we have eliminate the code that enable unauthorizedaccess to the personal necessary change  
 
what you can do  if you have not already do so  you should change your lacba org password and your password for all other online account for which you use the same username or email address and password  we recommend that you contact the financial institution that issue the payment card you use on lacba org and alert them to the compromise of your payment card information  we also recommend that you review your account statement for any suspicious or unauthorized charge between at least a early a may     and the present  and to contact your financial institution if you identify any such charge  in addition  we recommend that you regularly review statement from your account and periodically obtain your credit report from one or more of the national credit report company  
 
for more information  if you have any question or concern  please contact u at

stan bissey
