re  notice of data breach 
 
i be write on behalf of collabera  inc   collabera  to inform you of an incident that may have involve your personal step you may wish to take  
 
what happen  
on june     collabera identify malware in it network system consistent with a ransomware attack  we promptly restore access to our data from backup file  and immediately launch an investigation to determine the nature and scope of this event  on june   we become aware that the unauthorized party obtain some data from our system  we be work with outside expert and law enforcement to conduct a more detail review of the incident  
 
what information be involve  
base on our investigation to date  we believe the incident likely involve some employee personal information  the information potentially involve vary  but may have include first and last name  mail address  telephone number  social security number  date of birth  employee benefit and employee verification information  passport visa information  and email address  
 
what we be do  
we take the security of your personal information  
 
in addition  we be offer you complimentary credit monitor for two year through experian  one of the world lead expert in identity protection  a describe below  
 
what you can do  
please review the enclose attachment call prevent identify theft and fraud for more information on way to protect against the potential misuse of your information and remain vigilant in monitor your financial account  
 
because we care about protect your identity and your financial health  we be offer a complimentary two year membership in experians identityworkssm  this product provide you with superior detection and resolution of identity theft  to activate your membership and start monitor your personal information  please follow the step below  
 
ensure that you enroll by      your code will not work after this date   
visit the experian identityworks website to enroll    
provide your activation code  
 
if you have question about the product  need assistance with identity restoration or would like an alternative to enroll in experian identityworks online  please contact experians customer care team at      by     be prepare to provide engagement number db a proof of eligibility for the identity restoration service by experian  
 
fraud and identity restoration 
in addition to the forego  we have arrange for free identity restoration support in the event of fraudulent use of your information  it be available to you for two year from the date of this letter regardless of whether or not you participate in identityworks  and do not require any action on your part at this time  
 
if you believe there be fraudulent use of your information and would like to discuss how you may be able to resolve those issue  please reach out to an experian agent at       if  after discuss your situation with an agent  it be determine that identity restoration support be need  then an experian identity restoration agent be available to work with you to investigate and attempt to resolve each incident of fraud that occur  include  a appropriate  help you with contact credit grantors to dispute charge and close account  assist you in place a freeze on your credit file with the three major credit bureau  and assist you with contact government agency to help restore your identity to it proper condition   
 
the term and condition for this service be locate at www experianidworks com restoration  you will also find self help tip and information about identity protection at this site  
 
we strongly encourage you to carefully review your bank  credit card  and other financial statement regularly  if you see any transaction you dont recognize or which appear suspicious  notify your financial institution immediately  a well a experian  
 
we sincerely regret any inconvenience this incident may cause you  if you have additional question  please call the customer assistance line at      monday through friday from  a m  to  p m  cst  and saturday and sunday from  a m  to  p m  cst

mike chirico 
senior director  human resource 
collabera  inc  
 
prevent identity theft and fraud

merani hospitality  inc   merani  be commit to protect the privacy of the information entrust to u and take this responsibility seriously  this commitment extend to notify individual when their information may be compromise  
 
on may     merani discover that certain of our customer information could have be obtain by a third party that place unauthorized computer code on payment process system use at the parkway prime restaurant locate at  buffalo avenue  niagara fall  ny   the code may have target certain personal information of customer who make credit card purchase at the restaurant between february    and may     this information include customer name  credit or debit card number  cvv code and expiration date  
 
upon identify the incident  merani promptly remove the code from it system and retain a forensic security firm to investigate the incident  merani have also notify law enforcement  additionally  we have take step to alert the credit card brand of the incident so they can monitor affect customer credit and debit card account for potential fraudulent activity  finally  we have take additional technical step to further secure the restaurant payment process system to prevent this type of incident from occur in the future  
 
merani encourage individual to remain vigilant to the possibility of fraud and identity theft by review credit card  bank  and other financial statement for any unauthorized activity  if individual detect any suspicious activity  they should notify the entity with which the account be maintain  and promptly report the suspicious activity to appropriate law enforcement authority  include the police and their state attorney general  in addition  anyone look for information on fraud prevention can review tip provide by the ftc at www ftc gov idtheft  
 
we value the trust our customer place in u to protect their privacy  take our responsibility to safeguard their personal information seriously and apologize for any inconvenience or concern this incident might cause our affect customer  for further information and assistance regard this incident  please call    from   a m  to   p m  eastern standard time  monday through friday

content of data breach notification letter  june    
 
city dental 
 
 north main st   ste  a 
 
salina  ca  
 
    
 
dear patient  
 
notice of data breach 
 
what happen  
 
on the morning of monday  june     we discover that our computer network have be hack and our computer terminal could not be use  
 
what information be involve  
 
the computer store both dental record and payment information  include social security number of several patient and insurance information  a a result  your personal information be now potentially accessible to unauthorized individual  
 
what we do 
 
immediately upon discovery  we contact a local it company and another it company in the state of new york to resolve the issue  we pay ransom to the hacker and it company to obtain the data  everything have be resolve  we will report to the state attorney general  fbi  and hhs  
 
what you can do 
 
we encourage you to take the follow step to protect yourself from risk associate with this breach of your data  
 
dental record and dental insurance information  
 
regularly review the explanation of benefit statement that you receive from your insurance administrator  if you see any service list that you do not receive  contact your administrator immediately at the number on your statement  you should also check your credit receipt for dental bill that you do not recognize  if you find anything suspicious  call the credit report agency at the number on the report  
 
social security number  
 
place a fraud alert or security freeze on your credit file  a fraud alert require potential creditor to use what the law refer to a reasonable policy and procedure to verify your identity before issue credit in your name  the alert will remain on your account for  day  a security freeze will lock your credit file so nobody can access them to obtain credit in your name  you can unlock them temporarily or permanently at any time  you can request a fraud alert or security freeze through any one of the three report agency  experian     equifax     and transunion     you can also request a credit report from any of these agency  which you should check for suspicious activity  if you find anything  contact local authority and file a report of identity theft  ask for a copy of the police report  a you may need to supply this to your creditor  
 
financial account number  
 
fortunately  your bank account number or credit card number be not on the computer when receipt of payment have be post  only your credit card number be document on paper with your chart  
 
online account information  
 
reset your username  password  and security question and answer on your email if you furnish your email address  contact your service provider for additional guidance  
 
for more information 
 
if there be anything that city dental can do to assist you  please contact u at      or via email at citydentalsalinasyahoo com  
 
sincerely  
 
doctor  youngrim kim the breach report by city dental appear to be the result of an external hack their computer network and access both dental record and payment information  include social security number of several patient and insurance information

re  data security incident 
 
dear attorney general macdonald  
 
we represent the columbia college chicago  columbia   headquarter in chicago  illinois with respect to a potential data security incident describe in more detail below  columbia take the security and privacy of their student and employee information very seriously and have take step to prevent a similar incident from occur in the future  
 
  nature of the security incident  
 
on or about may     columbia be the victim of a ransomware attack  columbia be first notify on may    of suspicious activity on their network by their information technology department  they immediately proceed to engage a third party computer forensics firm to conduct a thorough investigation into the ransomware incident  the forensics investigation conclude on june     prior to the forensics investigation  columbia begin engage in negotiation with the unknown unauthorized threat actor  during those negotiation it be discover that the unauthorized unknown threat actor exfiltrated some student and employee information  a a result  these individual be be notify of this incident and be provide with credit monitor and identity theft protection service  columbia have receive information that a a result of the ransomware attack the unauthorized unknown threat actor be able to access and exfiltrate some student and employee personal information  this information include their name and social security number  
 
  number of new hampshire resident affect  
 
a total of one    new hampshire resident may have be potentially affect by this incident  notification letter to this individual be mail on july    by first class mail  a sample copy of the notification letter be include with this letter  
 
  step take  
 
columbia take the security and privacy of the information very seriously  and have take step to prevent a similar event from occur in the future  a well a to protect the privacy and security of potentially impact individual information  this include  but be not limit to  implement a remote monitor tool on all columbia own device to prevent the execution of any malware or ransomware on those device  implement multifactor authentication  and remove local administrative right  columbia be also provide affect individual with credit monitor and identify theft protection service  
 
  contact information  
 
columbia remain dedicate to protect the sensitive information in it control  if you have any question or need additional information  please do not hesitate to contact me at anjali daswilsonelser com or       
 
very truly yours  
 
wilson elser moskowitz edelman   dicker llp

re  important security notification   please read this entire letter  
 
dear sir or madam  
 
i be write to inform you of a data security incident experience by zeta tau alpha  zta  that may have involve your personal information describe below  at zta  we take the privacy and security of all information very seriously  while we have no evidence to suggest that any of the impact information be view or misuse during this compromise  it be crucial that we be a supportive and transparent a possible  that be why i be write to inform you of this incident  to offer information about step that can be take to help protect your information  and to let you know about complimentary credit monitor service that we be offer you through transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  
 
i sincerely apologize for any concern that this incident may cause you  let me reassure you that zta be fully commit to support you  
 
what happen  
 
on may     zta become aware of a vulnerability to imis  ztas management software  upon discovery  zta begin the process of update imis to remove the vulnerability  further  zta promptly begin investigate the vulnerability  ztas investigation identify malicious code that be add to the imis software that act a a credit card skimmer between april     and may     a a result  the malicious code may have allow an unauthorized individual to collect credit card data from transaction that occur within this time period  importantly  the vulnerability  a well a the malicious code  have be remove  
 
while we have no reason to believe that any information be actually view or misuse during this compromise  we be provide this notification to you out of an abundance of caution and so that you may diligently monitor your personal information and resource  we take great care in the security of our technology system and regret that this incident have occur  
 
what information be involve  
 
it be important to note  a mention above  that there be no evidence to suggest that any personal information that could have be view by the unauthorized individual s  may have include your first and last name  in combination with your name  address  and credit card information utilize in your recent transaction with zta  
 
what we be do  
 
zta have take every step necessary to address the incident and be commit to fully protect all of the information that you have entrust to u  upon learn of this incident  we immediately begin investigate the vulnerability and take step to secure the imis software  additionally  we be offer you complimentary credit monitor and identity protection service  
 
credit monitor  
 
a a safeguard  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for one year provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  additional information regard how to enroll in the complimentary credit monitor service be enclose  
 
what you can do  
 
in addition to enroll in the complimentary credit monitor service detail within  we recommend that you remain vigilant in regularly review and monitor all of your account statement and credit history to guard against any unauthorized transaction or activity  if you discover any suspicious or unusual activity on your account  please promptly contact your financial institution or company  we have provide additional information below  which contain more information about step you can take to protect yourself against fraud and identity theft  
 
for more information  
 
should you have question or concern regard this matter  please do not hesitate to contact carrie hoffeditz  senior director of operation   personnel at     
 
zta have no relationship more important or more meaningful than the one we share with you  i want to personally express my deepest regret for any worry or inconvenience that this incident may cause you  
 
sincerely  
 
meghan parker 
executive director 
 
additional action to help reduce your chance of identity theft 
 
transunion mytrueidentity provide you with the follow key feature  
 
  the daily credit monitor service will notify you if there be any critical change to your credit file at transunion  include fraud alert  new inquiry  new account  new public record  late payment  change of address  and more  
  one year of unlimited access to your transunion credit report and credit score  
  the service also include access to an identity restoration program that provide assistance in the event that your identity be compromise and up to    in identity theft insurance with no deductible  
 
how to enroll  
 
you can sign up online or via u s  mail delivery  to enroll in this service  go to the mytrueidentity website at www mytrueidentity com and  in the space reference a enter activation code  enter the  letter activation code   insert unique  letter activation code   and follow the three step to receive your credit monitor service online within minute  if you do not have access to the internet and wish to enroll in a similar offline  paper base credit monitor service  via u s  mail delivery  please call the transunion fraud response service toll free hotline at      when prompt  enter the six digit telephone passcode  and follow the step to enroll in the offline credit monitor service  add an initial fraud alert to your credit file  or to speak to a transunion representative if you believe you may be a victim of identity theft  
 
you can sign up for the online or offline credit monitor service anytime between now and october     due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  please note that credit monitor service might not be available for individual who do not have a credit file the personal information and credit card data of customer be skim use a vulnerability to imis  ztas management software  which allow attacker to collect credit card data between april    and may

we take the security of all information in our control seriously and be take step to help prevent a similar event from occur in the future  this include implement a remote monitor tool on all columbia own device to prevent the execution of any malware or ransomware on those device  implement multifactor authentication  and remove local administrative right  
 
we sincerely regret any inconvenience that this matter may cause you and remain dedicate to improve the security and protection of your information  if you have any question  please call     monday through friday    a m  to   p m   eastern time

security freeze  
 
under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement  or insurance statement

a a precaution  we have arrange to provide identity monitor at no cost to you for one year through kroll  a global leader in risk mitigation and response  their team have extensive experience help people who have sustain an unintentional exposure of confidential data  your identity monitor service include credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration  for more information on identity theft prevention and kroll identity monitor  include instruction on how to activate your complimentary one year membership  please visit the below website

additional step you can take 
 
regardless of whether you choose to take advantage of this complimentary credit monitor  it be always advisable to be vigilant in monitor for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at

  equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
  experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
  transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step to take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  
 
contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
  federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud   an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  list above  place a fraud alert on your credit report be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  this make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
  experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
  transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
  equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three ply gem industry experience an unauthorizedaccess to some of their employee email account between july     and november     and determine on june     that an email or an attachment in the account contain some personal information of customer

step you can take to help protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
copy of credit report  
 
you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free     or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can print this form at  you also can contact one of the follow three national credit report agency

fraud alert  
 
you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least  year  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze  
 
you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  there be no charge to place  lift or remove the security freeze  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  
 
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc or from your respective state attorney general about step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state

what happen  
 
on january     verigent learn of a suspicious email send from a verigent employee email account  upon learn of this suspicious message  verigent immediately take step to secure it email environment which include reset the password require to access all verigent employee email account and implement multi factor authentication  verigent also begin a preliminary investigation and engage an independent forensics firm to assist  
 
on january     the forensics firm inform verigent that an unauthorized individual have gain access to certain verigent employee email account  on june     verigent learn that the email account access without authorization contain some of your personal information have be misuse in connection with this incident  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information impact in connection with this incident may have include your name a well a your address  date of birth  social security number  passport number  driver license or other government issue identification number  digital signature  financial account payment card information  medical information  and or online credential  
 
what be we do  
 
a soon a verigent discover this incident  we take the step describe above  in addition  because we take the confidentiality of all information within our possession very seriously  we have take step to enhance the security of our email environment in order to minimize the likelihood of similar incident occur in the future  in addition  we report the incident to the federal bureau of investigation and will provide whatever cooperation be necessary to hold the perpetrator of this incident accountable

dear recipient  
 
the privacy and security of the personal information we maintain be of the utmost importance to coalinga valley health clinic  inc  i be write with important information regard a recent information security incident that may have involve some of your information  we want to provide you with information about the incident  let you know about the service we be provide to you  and let you know that we continue to take significant measure to protect your information  
 
what happen  
on april     we be notify by coalinga police department that an employee allegedly have remove certain document from our office  
 
what we be do  
upon learn of this issue  we terminate the employee and the employee access to our health record  and commence a prompt and thorough investigation to determine the scope of unauthorizedaccess  all document that be remove by the employee at issue be return by the coalinga police department and carefully review  base on our investigation and correspond review of the document  we discover on may     that the document remove by the employee without authorization contain certain medical record  include specific information  we take corrective action step to prevent a privacy incident from reoccurring  include follow our discipline policy and terminate the responsible employee  
 
what information be involve  
the information that be include in your medical record include specific information  
 
what you can do  
to date  there be no find to indicate that this former employee remove your record from our office with the intent to misuse it  nevertheless  out of an abundance of caution  we want to make you aware of the incident  to protect you from potential misuse of your information  we be offer you a one year membership in mytrueidentity provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  for more information on identity theft prevention and mytrueidentity  include instruction on how to activate your one year membership  please see the additional information provide in this letter  this letter also provide other precautionary measure you can take to protect your personal safeguard to protect against medical identity theft  
 
for more information  
please accept our apology that this incident occur  we remain fully commit to maintain the privacy of personal information  a a matter of policy and practice  we have process in place to ensure patient privacy and confidentiality  this incident result from an employee violation of establish policy  such individual be no longer employ or otherwise engage by u  
 
if you have any further question regard this incident  please contact our dedicate and confidential toll free response line at phone number  this response line be staff with professional familiar with this incident and knowledgeable on what you can do to protect against any misuse of your information  the response line be available monday through friday    a m  to   p m  pst  
 
sincerely  
coalinga valley health clinic  inc  
 
other important information 
 
  enroll in complimentary  month credit monitor  
a a safeguard  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for one year provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  to enroll in this service  go to the mytrueidentity website at www mytrueidentity com and in the space reference a enter activation code  enter the follow  letter activation code specific code and follow the three step to receive your credit monitor service online within minute  you can sign up for the online credit monitor service anytime between now and specific date  due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  please note that credit monitor service might not be available for individual who do not have a credit file with transunion  or an address in the unite state  or it territory  and a valid social security number  enroll in this service will not affect your credit score  once you be enroll  you will be able to obtain one year of unlimited access to your transunion credit report and credit score  the daily credit monitor service will notify you if there be any critical change to your credit file at transunion  include fraud alert  new inquiry  new account  new public record  late payment  change of address and more  the service also include access to an identity restoration program that provide assistance in the event your identity be compromise to help you restore your identity and up to    in identity theft insurance with no deductible   policy limitation and exclusion may apply   if you believe you may be a victim of identity theft  please call the toll free transunion fraud response service hotline at phone number  when prompt  enter the follow  digit telephone passcode specific code to speak to a transunion representative about your identity theft issue  
 
special note for minor affect by this incident  the same service refer to above may not be available to affect minor  a an alternative  parent legal guardian can check to see if your child may be a victim of identity theft by use transunions secure online form at www transunion com childidentitytheft to submit your information so transunion can check their database for a credit file with your child social security number  after transunions search be complete  they will respond to you at the email address you provide  if they locate a file in your child name  they will ask you for additional information in order to proceed with step to protect your child from any impact associate with this fraudulent activity  
 
  place a fraud alert on your credit file  
whether or not you choose to use the complimentary  month credit monitor service  we recommend that you place an initial one    year fraud alert on your credit file  at no charge  a fraud alert tell creditor to contact you personally before they open any new account  to place a fraud alert  call any one of the three major credit bureau at the number list below  a soon a one credit bureau confirm your fraud alert  they will notify the others

  consider place a security freeze on your credit file

content of data breach 
 
at senior resource group  llc  srg   safeguard personal information  we want to provide you with information about the event  our response  and should you feel it necessary  the step you may take to better protect yourself against potential misuse of your information  
 
what happen  
 
srg be the subject of an isolate cyber event call a phishing incident in which unauthorized individual s  gain access to certain email account by masquerade a a reputable and recognize personal information that may have be accessible to the unauthorized individual s   this extensive process include a review of each of the individual email and attachment within the specific account that have be impact by the intrusion  a a result of those effort  we be provide you notice that our investigation determine that your information may have be accessible to the unauthorized individual s  between december    and december     
 
what information be involve  
 
although we have no evidence to suggest that your information be actually use by the unauthorized individual s   we be send this letter so you can take step to protect yourself and your information  our investigation confirm that the impact email contain the follow personal information pertain to you  name  impact element  
 
what we be do  
 
we take the security of information in our care very seriously  upon discovery  we immediately force password reset for all company email address and commence a thorough investigation into the nature and scope of the event  in addition  we implement multi factor authentication a an additional security safeguard and launch mandatory companywide training and awareness  we be continue to take step to implement additional safeguard and strengthen policy and procedure relate to data privacy and security  we be also notify regulator  include certain state regulator  and law enforcement of the event a require  
 
a an add precaution and at no cost to you  we be provide  month of credit monitor and identity protection service through experian  to activate your membership and start monitor your personal information please follow the step below  
 
ensure that you enroll by  september     your code will not work after this date   
visit the experian identityworks website to enroll    
provide your activation code  
if you have question about the product  need assistance with identity restoration or would like an alternative to enroll in experian identityworks online  please contact experians customer care team at      by september     be prepare to provide engagement number db a proof of eligibility for the identity restoration service by experian  
 
what you can do  
 
you should review the enclose step you can take to protect your personal information  we also encourage you to review your financial and account statement and immediately report all suspicious activity to the institution that issue the record  
 
for more information  
 
we understand that you may have question about this incident that be not address in this letter  if you have additional question  please contact our dedicate call center at         a m  to   p m  pst  monday through friday and   a m  to   p m  pst  saturday and sunday  
 
we sincerely regret that this incident occur and extend our sincerest apology  the security of your personal information remain a top priority at srg  
 
sincerely  
 
jeff howard 
vice president of information technology 
senior resource group  llc 
 
step you can take to protect your information 
 
monitor your account  to protect against the possibility of identity theft or other financial loss  we encourage you to remain vigilant  to review your account statement  and to monitor your credit report for suspicious activity  under u s  law  you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also contact the three major credit bureau directly to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
security freeze  you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  the description of the breach indicate that an unauthorized individual gain access to employee email account through a phishing attack  the use of multi factor authentication and company wide training and awareness further support the determination that this be a hack

what happen

what information be involve

what we be do

what you can do

re  notification of a data security incident 
 
dear attorney general macdonald  
 
we represent u s  restaurant  inc   usri  in connection with a recent incident that may have impact the personal jurisdiction  
 
nature of the security breach or unauthorized use or access 
 
usri have learn that  on february     an unauthorized third party access a number of usris computer system without authorization and infect those system with ransomware  upon learn of the situation  usri promptly launch an internal investigation and secure it computer system to prevent potential further access  usri also retain a lead forensic security firm to investigate the incident and confirm the security of it computer system  
 
after identify the scope of the incident  usri work with a document review vendor to conduct a programmatic review of the content of the impact account  and then manually review the item identify a potentially at risk by that programmatic review  due to the scope of the incident and the amount of data involve  this process take a considerable amount of time  on june     usri determine the identity of the impact individual and work to identify address for those individual and update the address base on the national change of address database  this research result in usri determine that the impact system contain the personal information of twelve    new hampshire resident  the impact information include individual name and social security number  
 
at this point  usri be not aware of any fraud or identity theft to any individual a a result of this incident  and cannot confirm if any personal information could have be access  
 
number of new hampshire resident affect 
 
usri have identify twelve    new hampshire resident whose information may have be access by the unauthorized third party  an unauthorized third party access the organization computer system without authorization and infect those system with ransomware  the organization promptly launch an internal investigation and secure it computer system to prevent potential further access  a forensic security firm be also retain to investigate the incident and confirm the security of it computer system  due to the scope of the incident and the amount of data involve  it take a considerable amount of time to review the content of the impact account  the impact information include individual name and social security number  and u restaurant inc be notify individual whose personal information could have be access

i be write on behalf of collabera  inc   collabera  to inform you of an incident that may have involve your personal step you may wish to take  
 
what happen  
 
on june     collabera identify malware in it network system consistent with a ransomware attack  we promptly restore access to our data from backup file  and immediately launch an investigation to determine the nature and scope of this event  on june   we become aware that the unauthorized party obtain some data from our system  we be work with outside expert and law enforcement to conduct a more detail review of the incident  
 
what information be involve

what we be do  
 
we take the security of your personal information  
 
in addition  we be offer you complimentary credit monitor for two year through experian  one of the world lead expert in identity protection  a describe below  
 
what you can do

dear sir or madam

i sincerely apologize for any concern that this incident may cause you  let me reassure you that ncea be fully commit to support you  
 
what happen  
on may     ncea become aware of a vulnerability to imis  nceas management software  upon discovery  ncea swiftly take step to secure the imis software which include update imis to remove the vulnerability  further  ncea promptly begin investigate the vulnerability  nceas investigation identify that an unknown individual utilize the vulnerability to add malicious code to the imis software that act a a credit card skimmer between april     and may     a a result  the malicious code may have allow an unauthorized individual to collect credit card data from transaction that occur within this time period  importantly  the vulnerability  a well a the malicious code  have be remove  
 
while we have no reason to believe that any information be actually view or misuse during this compromise  we be provide this notification to you out of an abundance of caution and so that you may diligently monitor your personal information and resource  we take great care in the security of our technology system and regret that this incident have occur  
 
what information be involve

what you can do  
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant to protect against potential fraud and or identity theft by  among other thing  review your account statement and monitor credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you should also promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incident of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  include the police and your state attorney general  a well a the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
other important information  
 
you may wish to review the tip provide by the ftc on fraud alert  security credit freeze  and step you can take to avoid identity theft  for more information and to contact the ftc  please visit www ftc gov idtheft or call   id theft        you may also contact the ftc at federal trade commission   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc   
 
to place a security freeze on your credit report  you must send a write request to each of the three major consumer report agency by regular  certify  or overnight mail at the address below or  if available  comply with the consumer report agency online security freeze request procedure  
 
equifax 
    
www equifax com 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
 
experian security freeze 
    
www experian com 
p o  box  
allen  tx  
 
trans union security freeze 
    
www transunion com 
p o  box  
woodlyn  pa  
 
in order to request a security freeze  you may need to provide the follow information  
 
  your full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  if you have move in the past five    year  provide the address where you have live over the prior five year  
  proof of current address such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    and 
  if you be a victim of identity theft  include a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft  
 
the credit report agency have three    business day after receive your request to place a security freeze on your credit report  the credit bureau must also send write confirmation to you within five    business day and provide you with a unique personal identification number  pin  or password  or both that can be use by you to authorize the removal or lift of the security freeze  
 
to lift the security freeze to allow a specific entity or individual access to your credit report  you must call or send a write request to the credit report agency by mail or  if available  comply with the consumer report agency online procedure for lift a security freeze  and include proper identification  name  address  and social security number  and the pin number or password provide to you when you place the security freeze a well a the identity of those entity or individual you would like to receive your credit report or the specific period of time you want the credit report available  the credit report agency have up to three    business day after receive your request to lift the security freeze for those identify entity or for the specify period of time  
 
other important information  
 
to remove the security freeze  you must send a write request to each of the three credit bureau by mail or  if available  comply with the consumer report agency online procedure for remove a security freeze  and include proper identification  name  address  and social security number  and the pin number or password provide to you when you place the security freeze  the credit bureau have up to three   the notification indicate that tbg west insurance service be impact by a ransomware event that encrypt certain file  it be also mention that they work diligently to locate additional necessary information for mail  suggest that some file be copy from their system  which point towards a hack incident

re  legal notice of information security incident 
 
dear sir or madam  
 
we write on behalf of our client  pivot technology service corp    pivot    to notify you of a security incident which result in the unauthorizedaccess and exfiltration of the personal information of  new hampshire resident  
 
on june     pivot discover that it be the victim of a cybersecurity attack by an unauthorized third party by which the malicious actor deploy ransomware in an attempt to encrypt pivot technology infrastructure  upon detection of the attack  pivot engage an industry lead cyber forensic firm  crowdstrike  to conduct a comprehensive investigation to determine how the security incident occur  the scope of such incident  and to assist it with remediation effort  
 
with the assistance of the forensic firm  pivot immediately implement countermeasure to minimize the encryption of it system  a a result  some pivot employee experience complication with email  however  there be no interruption to it business operation  
 
on july     pivot discover that the unauthorized third party have in fact gain access to and exfiltrated the personal investigation to determine the scope of the information affect  
 
on july     pivot determine that the follow personal information of employee be compromise in the incident  name  address  payroll earn  deduction  k  benefit  bank rout and account number  bank account name  and social security number  from the investigation  we have determine that the unauthorized third party have access to pivot system between june     and june     
 
in response to the incident  pivot expedite the implementation process for multifactor authentication  mfa  for all application that be access remotely  in addition  pivot will implement additional safeguard in accordance with the recommendation of the forensic firm  include crowdstrike falcon  mimecast url filter process  and cisco umbrella  a secure gateway to protect user access  
 
pivot have also conduct a thorough review of the potentially affect record and continue to review exist policy and procedure design to try to prevent a similar occurrence from happen again  in addition  to help protect the identity of impact individual  we be offer a complimentary  year membership of equifax id patrol  this product provide superior identity detection and resolution of identity theft  all potentially affect individual will be notify of the incident on july     a copy of the notification letter be enclose  
 
if you have any question or need further information regard this incident  please contact me      or julie himonortonrosefulbright com  
 
very truly yours

content of data breach  
content of data breach notification letter  notice of data security incident 
 
note  only a subset of braingenie user be impact by this security incident  
 
what happen  
 
in early june  we receive a report mention braingenie a one of the website potentially impact by a security incident  we immediately launch an investigation with the help of forensic expert and law enforcement to determine if any user information be affect  
 
the investigation reveal that our system be access without authorization start in late february  on july   we discover that unauthorized actor obtain a small amount of personal information impact and identify affect individual since then  
 
what information be involve  
 
base on report and our investigation  we believe that the personal information that may have be affect include user login credential for braingenie account  which for some user include a username and or email address and password  although we encrypt our user password  we believe that unauthorized actor may have be able to derive text password for some account  
 
what be we do  
 
after learn of this incident  we review our security protocol and take additional step to enhance our security  we have be in communication with law enforcement and be continue to cooperate with their wider investigation  
 
what you can do  
 
we recommend that you change your password for your braingenie account  the next time you log in to braingenie  you will be prompt to change your password  please choose a strong password that be not easy to guess and be not one that you use for any other online account  
 
we also recommend that you change your password for any other online account for which you use the same username and password or email address and password combination  please contact u if you notice any suspicious activity in your braingenie account  
 
more information 
 
if you have any question about this incident or reset your braingenie password  you may contact u at supportbraingenie com or         
 
although we do not collect or maintain your financial information  we be require by law to notify you of the follow  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and monitor your free credit report  if you believe you be a victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission  ftc  and or the office of the attorney general  ago  in your state  you may also report any suspect identity theft to law enforcement  
 
for more information about step you can take to avoid identity theft  include information about fraud alert and security freeze  you can contact the ftc  your ago  or any of the major credit report agency

dear sir or madam  
 
we represent yogafit locate at  w sahara avenue  las vegas  nv   and write  on behalf of yogafit  to notify your office of an incident that may affect the security of certain payment information of approximately three    new hampshire resident  the investigation into this event be ongoing  and this notice will be supplement with any new significant fact learn subsequent to it submission  by provide this notice  yogafit do not waive any right or defense regard the applicability of new hampshire law  the new hampshire data breach notification statute  or personal jurisdiction  
 
nature of the data event 
 
on or about may     yogafit begin investigate a report from a customer of an unusual payment card charge  yogafit immediately begin investigate this report by work with it web developer to review it website code  the investigation determine that yogafit be the victim of a sophisticate cyberattack that may have result in a compromise to some of it customer credit and debit card use to make purchase on it website  www yogafit com  between april     and may     yogafit take step to confirm the identity of the customer whose personally identifiable information be impact  during the investigation  yogafit take step to address the issue and to secure it website  individual can safely and securely use payment card on yogafits website  the investigation determine that the follow type of information relate to new hampshire resident may have be accessible within the impact account  the cardholder name  address  credit card number  expiration date  cvv  and username and password  
 
notice to new hampshire resident 
 
on or around july     yogafit begin provide write notice of this incident to potentially affect individual  include approximately three    new hampshire resident  write notice be be provide in substantially the same form a the letter attach here a exhibit a  
 
other step take and to be take 
 
upon learn of unusual activity relate to it website  yogafit immediately take step to secure it website and launch an in depth investigation  with the assistance of it web developer  to determine the nature and scope of this incident  a part of yogafits ongoing commitment to the privacy of payment information in it care  yogafit be review it exist policy and procedure and implement additional safeguard to further secure the payment information  yogafit be also notify relevant regulatory authority of this event  a require by applicable law  
 
yogafit be provide potentially affect individual with guidance on how to better protect against identity theft and fraud  include information on how to place a fraud alert and security freeze on one credit file  the contact detail for the national consumer report agency  information on how to obtain a free credit report  a reminder to remain vigilant for incident of fraud and identity theft by review account statement and monitor free credit report  and encouragement to contact the federal trade commission  their state attorney general  and law enforcement to report attempt or actual identity theft and fraud

nevertheless  out of an abundance of caution  iin want to inform you  and the affect resident  of the incident and to explain the step that it be take to help safeguard the impact resident against identity fraud  iin be provide the affect resident with write notification of this incident commence on or about july     in substantially the same form a the letter attach hereto  iin be provide resident with social security number include in the account with  month of credit monitor and be advise the affect resident to always remain vigilant in review financial account statement for fraudulent or irregular activity on a regular basis  iin be advise the affect resident about the process for place a fraud alert and or security freeze on their credit file and obtain free credit report  the affect resident whose financial account information and or credit or debit card information be impact be be advise to contact their financial institution to inquire about step to take to protect their account  the affect resident be also be provide with the contact information for the consumer report agency and the federal trade commission

dear   name     
 
front rush  llc  front rush  be write to inform you about an incident that may have affect the privacy of some of your personal information  front rush provide athletics management software solution to academic institution and amateur athletics organization  institution   one or several of these institution recruit you a a student athlete  or you may have be a member of one or more institution  and some of your information be store within front rushs system due to the institution use of front rush  
 
on or around january     front rush be inform by a security researcher that one of it amazon web service s bucket  the s bucket  be publicly accessible from the internet  the s bucket contain certain attachment  like transcript  injury report  or athletic report  that be place in the platform by the institution  and certain attachment that be upload by student athlete  prospective student athlete  or their parent guardian  in response to prompt in a recruitment questionnaire formulate and disseminate by the institution  
 
upon learn of this event  front rush immediately commence an investigation  work with third party forensic investigator  to assess the nature and scope of the incident  the investigation determine that the s bucket be publicly accessible between january     and january     front rushs own internal database and system be not affect by this incident  we also contact the security researcher  who state that he do not save or share any copy of the data  although we have no evidence to suggest that the s bucket be access by anyone other than the security researcher  log be not sufficient to show whether anyone else have access the data  
 
out of an abundance of caution  we undertake a comprehensive programmatic and manual review of the entire content of the s bucket to confirm the type of information contain in the s bucket and the individual to whom it relate  we receive result of the data mining investigation on may     and begin parse the data to notify impact institution  the institution be notify that your information be confirm to be impact on june     
 
although we do not have any evidence demonstrate that your information be access or acquire  our investigation determine the information present in the s bucket include your name and the follow type of personal information    breach element    
 
front rush take this incident and the security of your personal information in it care  front rush also review it exist policy and procedure to ensure the security of information in it system  front rush will continue work to further secure the information in it system go forward  front rush be also notify state regulatory authority  where require  
 
a an add precaution  front rush be also offer you complimentary access to   cm length   month of identity monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration service through transunion  if you wish to activate these service  you may follow the instruction include in the step you can take to protect your information  
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review your account statement  and to monitor your credit report for suspicious activity  additionally  please review the enclose step you can take to protect your information  you may also enroll to receive the credit monitor and identity theft protection service we be make available to you  front rush be make these service available at no cost to you  however  you will need to enroll yourself in these service  
 
we recognize that you may have question not address in this letter  if you have additional question  please call our dedicate assistance line at     toll free   monday friday    a m  to   p m   eastern time  exclude u s  national holiday   
 
we sincerely regret any inconvenience this incident may cause you  protect your information be important to u  and front rush remain commit to safeguard information in our care  
 
sincerely

content of data breach notification letter  re  important security notification  please read this entire letter  
 
dear sir or madam  
 
i be write to inform you of a data security incident experience by windes  inc   windes  that may have involve your personal information describe below  windes be a recognize leader in the field of accounting  assurance  tax  and business consult service  you may be receive this letter because of a relationship you have with windes or one of windes partner organization  
 
windes take the privacy and security of all information very seriously  while we have no evidence to suggest that any of the impact information be view or misuse during this compromise  it be crucial that we be a supportive and transparent a possible  that be why i be write to inform you of this incident  to offer information about step that can be take to help protect your information  and to let you know about complimentary credit monitor service that we be offer you through transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  i sincerely apologize for any concern that this incident may cause you  let me reassure you that windes be fully commit to provide the best service possible to you  
 
what happen  
 
on or around march     windes learn of a potential compromise to one    of it employee email account  windes swiftly secure the suspect account and engage a third party forensics company to investigate  follow progress by expert in their thorough investigation  it be ultimately determine on may    that two    employee email account experience unauthorizedaccess between march     and on march     upon confirmation of the unauthorizedaccess to the windes employee email account  windes third party forensic expert immediately investigate whether the affect email account contain individual sensitive information  on june     windes learn that the unauthorizedaccess may have enable access to your personal information  
 
while we have no reason to believe that any information within the affect email account be actually view  collect or misuse during this compromise  we be provide this notification to you out of an abundance of caution and so that you may diligently monitor your personal information and resource  we take great care in the security of our technology system  and regret that this incident have occur  
 
what information be involve  
 
it be important to note  a mention above  that there be no evidence to suggest that any personal information that could have be view by the unauthorized individual s  may have include your first and last name  in combination with one or more of the follow data element  date of birth  social security number  driver license number  financial account number  credit card information  tax identification number  passport number  digital signature  username and password combination  diagnosis information  medical treatment information  prescription information  medical record number  medical history and or health insurance member group number  importantly  the information potentially impact a it relate to you may be limit to only one of the above list type of information  
 
what we be do  
 
windes have take every step necessary to address the incident and be commit to fully protect all of the information that you have entrust to u  upon learn of this incident  we immediately secure the affect account and take step to enhance the security of all information to help prevent similar incident from occur in the future  we retain a third party forensic firm to conduct a thorough investigation and be offer you complimentary credit monitor and identity protection service  
 
credit monitor  
 
a a safeguard  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to the data breach     the compromise account contain sensitive personal information

additional step you can take 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal information  
 
after receive your freeze request  each credit bureau will provide you with a unique pin  personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  if you opt for a temporary lift because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit bureau  
 
take advantage of your identity monitor service 
you have be provide with access to the follow service from kroll  
 
single bureau credit monitor 
you will receive alert when there be change to your credit datafor instance  when a new line of credit be apply for in your name  if you do not recognize the activity  you will have the option to call a kroll fraud specialist  who will be able to help you determine if it be an indicator of identity theft  
 
fraud consultation 
you have unlimited access to consultation with a kroll fraud specialist  support include show you the most effective way to protect your identity  explain your right and protection under the law  assistance with fraud alert  and interpret how personal information be access and use  include investigate suspicious activity that could be tie to an identity theft event  
 
identity theft restoration 
if you become a victim of identity theft  an experience kroll license investigator will work on your behalf to resolve relate issue  you will have access to a dedicate investigator who understand your issue and can do most of the work for you  your investigator will be able to dig deep to uncover the scope of the identity theft and then work to resolve it  
 
krolls activation website be only compatible with the current version or one version earlier of chrome  firefox  safari  and edge  to receive credit service  you must be over the age of  and have establish credit in the u s   have a social security number in your name  and have a u s  residential address associate with your credit file  an unauthorized personal information through hack between january     and january

dear attorney general macdonald  
 
i be write to notify you of a data security incident on behalf of my client  otr lease  llc  otr lease be a buyer of late model use tractor  which they then lease and or sell to owner operator

a part of the investigation  otr lease conduct a comprehensive review of the email and attachment in the email account to identify individual whose information may have be involve in this incident  through the investigation  otr lease determine that an unauthorized party access the employee email account between the date of january     and january     the investigation be unable to rule out the possibility that the unauthorized party may have be able to access email and attachment in the account

on july     otr lease will mail notification letter via unite state postal service firstclass mail to the new hampshire resident whose information may have be involve in this incident  in accordance with n h  rev  stats  ann   c   a copy of the notification letter be enclose

we deeply regret any inconvenience or concern that this incident may cause  to help prevent something like this from happen again  we reset all employee password  limit external email access  continue to educate user on how to identify and avoid malicious email  and add additional authentication measure for remote email access

sincerely  
 
patrick meyer 
director of finance

re  notice of data breach 
 
emanate health  formerly citrus valley health partner  value the relationship we have with our current and former employee and understand the importance of protect personal information  paperlesspay be a payroll process company that we have contract with to process and deliver electronic pay stub and w  tax form  this notice explain the incident  the measure that have be take  and some step you can take in response  
 
what happen  
 
we receive notice from paperlesspay on march     inform u that an unauthorized person gain access to it computer server  paperlesspay learn of the incident on february     when the department of homeland security  dhs  contact paperlesspay to inform them that an unknown person be purport to sell access to the paperlesspay database on the dark web  in response  paperlesspay shut down it web server and structure query language  sql  server to prevent any potential unauthorizedaccess  the server shutdown prevent you from access payroll record online for a period of time while the server be offline  
 
over the follow week  paperlesspay cooperate with a joint investigation conduct by dhs and the federal bureau of investigation  fbi   and paperlesspay retain a cybersecurity firm to help with it internal forensic investigation of the incident  the investigation confirm that an unknown individual access paperlesspays sql server where employee data be store on february     the available evidence have not  however  allow dhs  the fbi  or paperlesspays cybersecurity firm to determine what data the individual may have access or view while connect to the sql server  it be possible the personal information  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information store in the sql server about employee consist of the data component that appear on their pay stub and tax form  include their name  address  pay and withhold  last four digit of bank account number  if that information be include on the pay stub   and social security number  these data component be store on the sql server in different table that be associate by user id number  not name  within each table  therefore  the only way to associate any data with an individual would be to run a query against the database and have it aggregate an individual name with his or her other data component  paperlesspay could not conclusively determine whether such query be run  no bank account password or access code be store on the sql server  
 
what be paperlesspay do  
 
paperlesspay have indicate that it have act to secure it network and prevent future incident  in order to resume it service  paperlesspay have rebuild an entirely new domain controller  a new web server  and a new sql server  paperlesspay have also indicate that it then restore database file to the new sql server from backup  assign new ip address to all of the new server  change all password for user and administrator  implement a set that require client to change their password when they log in for the first time  and disable all remote access capability to the new web server and sql server  paperlesspay further report that it install an endpoint detection and response application on the new server and other endpoint within it network that have enable paperlesspay to monitor all activity while paperlesspay complete it investigation of the incident  
 
for emanate health part  we have be work with paperlesspay to obtain detail of the incident and the affect account and to obtain assurance that information about our employee be safe  in order to provide you with information you can use to better protect against identity theft and fraud  emanate health be offer free credit monitor service for  month  instruction for enroll in the credit monitor service  a well a additional information on how to better protect against identity theft and fraud  be include in the attach privacy safeguard and last page of this letter  
 
what can you do  
 
you should review and follow the attach privacy safeguard for how to protect against identity theft and fraud  you can enroll to receive the free credit monitor service by follow the instruction list on the last page of this letter
