we recently learn of a data security incident involve some of our computer system  upon identify the suspicious activity  empire immediately secure the affect system  start an investigation  and a lead cybersecurity firm be hire to assist  through this investigation  empire determine that an unauthorized party access some of our computer server and workstation between february     and march     we have undertake a comprehensive review of the data that could have potentially be access by the unauthorized party and  on july     determine that information include your   variable data    
 
while we have no indication that your information have be misuse  we want to notify you of this incident and assure you that we take it very seriously  in addition  we be offer complimentary identity theft protection service through id expert  the data breach and recovery service expert  to provide you with myidcare  myidcare service include   month of credit and cyberscan monitor  a    insurance reimbursement policy  and fully manage id theft recovery service  with this protection  myidcare will help you resolve issue if your identity be compromise  to enroll in myidcare service  visit  or call      monday through friday from  be  pm eastern time and use the enrollment code provide above  please note the deadline to enroll be october     
 
we regret any inconvenience or concern this incident may cause you  to help prevent something like this from happen in the future  we be implement additional technical security measure and increase employee cybersecurity training  if you have any question  please call      monday through friday from  be  pm eastern time

additional step you can take 
 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
  equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
  experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
  transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
  federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud   an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
  experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
  transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
  equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  if you opt for a temporary lift because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit bureau

  nature of the security incident

  number of new hampshire resident affect  
 
on or about july     ferris finish identify fifty three    new hampshire resident who be potentially affect by this incident  incident notification letter address to these individual be mail on july     via first class mail  a sample copy of the incident notification letter be mail to potentially affect resident of new hampshire be include with this letter  
 
  step take

please read this letter in it entirety  
 
what happen  
 
we recently become aware of a situation where an unauthorized party access one of our employee email account  we discover this situation on april     and take immediate step to shut down access to the account  we promptly engage our it support to help u investigate  evaluate  and respond to the situation  
 
what information be involve  
 
base on their review of the situation and a thorough examination of the impact email account  it be possible that some personal information be compromise or misuse in any manner  we be take appropriate precautionary measure to ensure your financial security and help alleviate concern you may have  
 
what be we do to address this situation  
 
indigo beam have make immediate enhancement to our system  security  and practice  additionally  we have engage appropriate expert to assist u in conduct a full review of our security practice and system to ensure that appropriate security protocol be in place go forward  we be commit to help those people who may have be impact by this unfortunate situation  thats why indigo beam be provide you with access to single bureau credit monitor single bureau credit report  service at no charge  these service provide you with alert for twelve month from the date of enrollment when change occur to your experian credit file  this notification be send to you the same day that the change or update take place with the bureau  in addition  we be provide you with proactive fraud assistance to help with any question that you might have  these service will be provide by cyberscout  a company that specialize in identity theft education and resolution  
 
to enroll in credit monitor  service at no charge  please log on to  and follow the instruction provide  when prompt please provide the follow unique code to receive service   code here   you have  day from the date of this letter to enroll in service  for guidance with the cyberscout service  or to obtain additional information about these service  please call the cyberscout help line     and supply the fraud specialist with your unique code  representative be available to assist you from   be to   pm central time  monday through friday  
 
what you can do to address this situation 
 
cyberscout have be retain to help you with any question or problem you may encounter  include assist you with obtain a credit report and place fraud alert  however  if you choose not to use these service  we be strongly urge all customer to do the follow  
 
if you choose to place a fraud alert on your own  you will need to contact one of the three major credit agency directly at

we be write to inform you of a data security incident that may have impact some of your personal information  we take the security of your protect health information very seriously  and we sincerely apologize for any concern this incident may cause  this letter contain information about what happen  action we have take to prevent a reoccurrence  and step you can take to help protect your information  
 
what happen  
 
on may     we suffer a ransomware attack on our computer system  ransomware be a computer virus that encrypt computer system until and unless we pay money  i e   the ransom  demand by the attacker  these rampant attack continue to challenge everyone in the business and medical community  we believe it be likely the attacker only want money and not the information on our computer but  in an abundance of caution  we be let you know that your information be encrypt by the attacker  these attacker tend to be outside of the u s   china  north korea  russia   and outside the reach of law enforcement  
 
what information be involve  
 
while we have no reason to believe that your healthcare information be access by the attacker  the encrypt system contain your electronic healthcare record which include your name  address  date of birth  social security number  medical insurance and relate health information  
 
what we be do  
 
we take the security of your information seriously and have take measure to reduce the likelihood of a future cyber attack  include increase our defense against these rampant attack  
 
while we do not have any evidence that your information be access or acquire by the attacker  in an abundance of caution  we be offer the service of kroll to provide identity monitor at no cost to you for one year  kroll be a global leader in risk mitigation and response  and their team have extensive experience help people who have sustain an unintentional exposure of confidential data  your identity monitor service include credit monitor   million identity fraud loss reimbursement  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration  
 
visit  to activate and take advantage of your identity monitor service  
 
you have until october    to activate your identity monitor service  
 
membership number    member id   
 
additional information describe your service be include with this letter  
 
what you can do  
 
although we have no report of misuse of your or anyones information  we encourage you to follow the instruction in this letter and enroll in the identity monitor service we be provide at no cost to you  we also recommend that you review the additional information enclose  which contain important step you can take to further protect your personal information  
 
for more information  
 
if you have any question  please call      monday through friday from   be     pm central time  we appreciate your patience and understand  and we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience or concern this incident may cause you  
 
sincerely  
 
robert m  owen  m d

a part of this investigation  our information security and technology expert be engage to determine what  if any  information may have be able to be access  on june     we conclude our investigation and confirm the individual whose nonpublic personal information be affect by this incident  individual will receive write notification of this incident postmark no later than july     a copy of the template notice to individual be be send along with this letter  
 
wealth enhancement group have arrange for affect individual to receive complimentary credit monitor and identity theft protection for two    year  if individual desire to obtain such protection  through experian  
 
in addition to our exist security measure  wealth enhancement group have review and implement additional option to enhance our technology and security practice to reduce the risk of a similar issue occur in the future  include deployment of multi factor authentication and conduct additional employee training

re  notification of data security incident

be advise that the undersign and this law firm have be retain to represent everything kitchen  llc   everything kitchen   in connection with the data security incident describe below  everything kitchen be locate at  w  king street  springfield  mo  and provide kitchenware and appliance to it customer  
 
on may     everything kitchen determine that criminal hacker execute a sophisticate cyber attack on it computer system which result in the attacker gain access to the personal information of a small number of it customer who use debit or credit card a a form of payment on may     include name  address  email address  telephone number  credit card number  credit card expiration date  and credit card verification number  no social security number be compromise a a result of this attack  
 
prior to this incident  everything kitchen have implement a sucuri edge protection firewall on it public face site  in addition to it host provider  nexcess  have it own hardware firewall  everything kitchen site run on magento i and be regularly update with the latest supee security patch from the vendor  the entire public face codebase of the magento i site be under strict source control  use monitor uncommitted file and git repository commit  in addition  the administrative side of everything kitchen site have an  htauth server level password protection  on top of the administrative panel authorization  which be whitelisted to everything kitchen corporate intellectual property  
 
upon learn of this incident  everything kitchen immediately begin address the issue  use industry best practice and professional who specialize in these matter  in particular  everything kitchen swiftly secure the server and clean up all malicious code  scan the rest of the environment for malware a well a verify security patch compliance  everything kitchen then perform full forensics of the breach event and implement multiple security layer to prevent further malicious activity  
 
since the incident  everything kitchen have rework it  htauth server level password protection  remove all whitelists  install recently release magento i supee  eliminate the ability for customer expo  perform a full security audit and virus scan of the server  and be in the process of set up i frame payment through braintree  so credit card track data cannot be compromise in transit  
 
everything kitchen notify one    new hampshire resident of this incident on july     via u s  mail and have partner with id expert  to make available at no cost to affect individual it myidcare identity theft protection solution  the myidcare solution include one year of credit monitor and identity theft protection service  a sample copy of the notice send to the new hampshire resident be enclose

re  notice of data event 
 
dear sir or madam  
 
we represent front rush  llc   front rush    locate at  n  kingsbury street  fl   chicago il    front rush maintain data on behalf of certain data owner and be write to notify your office  on it own behalf and their behalf  of an incident that may affect the privacy of personal jurisdiction  
 
nature of the data event 
 
front rush provide athletics management software solution to academic institution and amateur athletics organization   institution    on january     front rush be inform by a security researcher that one of it amazon web service s bucket   the s bucket   be publicly accessible from the internet  the s bucket contain   a  certain attachment  like transcript  injury report  or athletic report  that be place in the platform by the institution  and  b  certain attachment that be upload by student athlete  prospective student athlete or their parent guardian  in response to prompt in a recruitment questionnaire formulate and disseminate by the institution  upon learn of this event  front rush immediately commence an investigation  work with third party forensic investigator  to assess the nature and scope of the incident  the investigation determine that the s bucket be likely publicly accessible between january     and january     the investigation also determine that front rushs own internal database and system be unaffected by this incident  front rush also contact the security researcher  who state that he do not save or share any copy of the data  although front rush have no evidence to suggest that the s bucket be access by anyone other than the security researcher  log be not sufficient to show whether anyone else have access the data  out of an abundance of caution  front rush undertake a comprehensive programmatic and manual review of the entire content of the s bucket to confirm the type of information contain in the s bucket and the individual to whom it relate  on january     front rush begin notify affect institution that information relate to individual may have be affect by this incident  base on information it have available at that time  once front rush complete the comprehensive review of the entire content of the s bucket to confirm the type of information contain in the bucket and the individual to whom it relate  front rush notify the affect institution  offer to provide notification service  and work with institution to confirm the contact information for these individual  these notification be send to the institution on june     
 
front rush offer the institution the opportunity to opt out of notice and to provide supplemental or additional address information  the investigation determine that the follow type of information relate to new hampshire resident be accessible within the s bucket  social security number  driver license number state id number  other identification number  and financial account information  to date  the investigation have find no evidence of any actual or attempt misuse of personal information a a result of this event  
 
notice to new hampshire resident 
 
on or around july     front rush begin provide write notice of this incident to potentially affect individual  this include approximately one thousand  two hundred ninety three     new hampshire resident whose personal information under new hampshire law may have be accessible  write notice to the individual be be provide in substantially the same form a the letter attach here a exhibit a  
 
other step take and to be take 
 
upon learn of this event  front rush immediately commence an investigation  work with third party forensic investigator  to assess the nature and scope of the incident  a well a what data may potentially be affect  front rush provide notice to data owner institution that have associate individual data potentially accessible through the publicly accessible s bucket  front rush be also offer complimentary access to twelve    month of credit and identity monitor service  include identity restoration service  through transunion or equifax for individual whose social security number or driver license be potentially expose  and the contact information for a dedicate call center for potentially affect individual to contact with question or concern regard this incident  
 
additionally  front rush be provide affect individual with guidance on how to better protect against identity theft and fraud  this guidance include information on how to place a fraud alert and security freeze on one credit file  the contact detail for the national consumer report agency  information on how to obtain a free credit report  a reminder to remain vigilant about incident of identity theft and fraud by review account statement and monitor free credit report  and encouragement to contact the federal trade commission  the respective state attorney general  and law enforcement to report attempt or actual identity theft and fraud  front rush will also be provide notice of this event to other regulator a may be require under applicable state law  
 
contact information

enclosure 
 
very truly yours  
 
edward j  finn of mullen coughlin llc

dear insert adult name  
 
at hoag clinic  we take patient privacy very seriously  we regret to inform you of a recent privacy breach  please continue read below for more information on what occur and the measure we be take to ensure that patient information be protect  
 
what happen 
 
on june     we discover that on that same day  a hoag clinic issue laptop be steal from a staff member vehicle at a worksite parking lot in newport beach  the laptop contain certain protect health information  phi  relate to you  while we do not have any evidence that your information be access and or misuse  we be report this matter to you with detail about the incident and the step we be take to protect your information  
 
what information be involve 
 
the information on the laptop be limit to the follow  first and last name  middle initial  address  phone number  date of birth  age  medical record number  e mail address  physician name  whether he or she be be follow by case management  whether he or she receive covid  test  whether he or she be transfer to case management  whether he or she have a schedule telehealth visit  whether he or she be interest in home health  and note regard communication status  please know that neither your social security number nor financial information be on the laptop  
 
what we be do 
 
a soon a we discover the theft  we file a police report with local law enforcement and begin investigate the issue  our cybersecurity team assess the situation  determine what be on the laptop  and the scope of any potential breach of this nature  some of these step include  
 
  enhance policy relate to transport laptop between worksites  
  re educate it workforce about proper security safeguard  
  conduct a thorough security assessment to ensure all appropriate cybersecurity safeguard be in place  
 
what you can do 
 
while we cannot know whether this theft will result in any adverse effect to you  to help protect your identity  we be offer a complimentary one year membership of experians identityworkssm  this product provide you with superior identity detection and resolution of identity theft  
 
to activate your membership and start monitor your personal information  please follow the step below  
 
  ensure that you enroll by  enrollment end date  your code will not work after this date   
  visit the experian identityworks website to enroll  url 
  provide your activation code  code 
 
if you have question about the product  need assistance with identity restoration  or would like an alternative to enroll in experian identityworks online  please contact experians customer care team at customer service number by enrollment end date  be prepare to provide engagement number engagement   a proof of eligibility for the identity restoration service by experian  
 
additional detail regard the experian identityworks membership 
 
a credit card be not require for enrollment in experian identityworks  you can contact experian immediately regard any fraud issue and have access to the follow feature once you enroll in experian identityworks  
 
  experian credit report at signup  see what information be associate with your credit file  daily credit report be available for online member only   
  credit monitor  actively monitor experian  equifax  and transunion file for indicator of fraud  
  internet surveillance  technology search the web  chat room   bulletin board   to identify trade or sell of your personal information on the dark web  
  identity restoration  identity restoration specialist be immediately available to help you address credit and non credit relate fraud  
  experian identityworks extendcaretm  you receive the same high level of identity restoration support even after your experian identityworks membership have expire  
  up to  million identity theft insurance    provide coverage for certain cost and unauthorized electronic fund transfer  
 
if you believe there be fraudulent use of your information and would like to discuss how you may be able to resolve those issue  please reach out to an experian agent at customer service number  if  after discuss your situation with an agent  it be determine that identity restoration support be need  then an experian identity restoration agent be available to work with you to investigate and resolve each incident of fraud that occur  include  a appropriate  help you with contact credit grantors to dispute charge and close account  assist you in place a freeze on your credit file with the three major credit bureau  and assist you with contact government agency to help restore your identity to it proper condition   please note that this identity restoration support be available to you for one year from the date of this letter and do not require any action on your part at this time  the term and condition for this offer be locate at www experianidworks com restoration  you will also find self help tip and information about identity protection at this site

what information be involve

step you can take to help further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
copy of credit report  you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free     or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can print this form at  you also can contact one of the follow three national credit report agency

we begin investigate the incident a soon a we learn of it and we engage a third party to assist u  since learn of this compromise  herbarium have take measure to ensure that future purchase through it site will be secure  we have determine that the information involve in this breach include customer name  customer bill and mail address  credit or debit card number  and the card expiration date and cvv  
 
herbarium plan to send write notification through first class mail to the affect resident of your state  in this letter  we will be provide  
 
   background information about the breach  
 
   the type of information that may have be compromise  
 
   the step that have be take to address the breach and to prevent one from occur again in the future  
 
   information  include toll free telephone number  website and mail address of the three credit report agency

re  notice of a data breach 
 
dear herbarium customer  
 
what happen 
 
we be devastate to learn recently that the system we use to process transaction through our website be breach  this may have result in a compromise to your credit card or debit card from june     through july     we value you a our customer  many of whom be friend and family  and we be truly sorry  
 
what information be involve 
 
the information involve include customer name  bill and mail address  credit or debit card number  expiration date  and cvv  
 
what we be do 
 
we have notify law enforcement of this breach  though we have take the step recommend to ensure our network be secure  include pci compliance monitor  hacker prevail  we have since remove the malware  migrate our site to a new dedicate server and now route all traffic to our website through a certify web security firm  our website be protect with an advance firewall with active malware detection scan and the ability to block attempt hack and attack in real time  
 
what you can do 
 
we recommend that you closely review the information provide in this letter for step you can take to protect yourself against potential misuse of your credit and debit card information  remain vigilant for incident of fraud and identity theft by regularly review your account statement and monitor free credit report  if you discover any suspicious or unusual activity on your account or suspect fraud  report it immediately  and notify your financial institution  
 
to make amend  we have purchase identity theft protection for you call  mytrueldentity   the plan include twelve month of monitor service  a    insurance reimbursement policy  educational material  and access to identity protection specialist  mytrueldentity be a service of epiq  a lead data breach and recovery company who have partner with transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  
 
mytrueldentity detail 
 
to enroll in mytrueldentity  sign up online or via u s  mail delivery  to enroll in this service online  go to the mytrueldentity website at www mytrueidentity com and  in the space reference a  enter activation code   enter the  letter activation code   insert unique  letter activation code   and follow the three step to receive your credit monitor service online within minute  if you do not have access to the internet and wish to enroll in a similar offline  paper base credit monitor service  via u s  mail delivery  please call the transunion fraud response service toll free hotline at      when prompt  enter the six digit telephone passcode   insert six digit passcode   and follow the step to enroll in the offline credit monitor service  add an initial fraud alert to your credit file  or to speak to a transunion representative if you believe you may be a victim of identity theft  
 
you can sign up for the online or offline credit monitor service anytime between now and november     due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  please note that credit monitor service might not be available for individual who do not have a credit file with trans union or an address in the unite state  or it territory  and a valid social security number  enroll in this service will not affect your credit score  
 
once you be enroll  you will be able to obtain one year of unlimited access to your trans union credit report and credit score  the daily credit monitor service will notify you if there be any critical change to your credit file at trans union  include fraud alert  new inquiry  new account  new public record  late payment  change of address  and more  the service also include access to an identity restoration program that provide assistance in the event that your identity be compromise and up to    in identity theft insurance with no deductible   policy limitation and exclusion may apply   
 
if you discover any suspicious or unusual activity on your account and suspect fraud  be sure to report it immediately and notify your financial institution  in addition  you may contact the federal trade commission   ftc    local law enforcement a well a your attorney general to learn about step you can take to protect yourself from identity theft  to learn more  you can go to the ftcs website  www consumer gov idtheft or call the ftc at    idtheft     or write to federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington dc

what happen  
 
on april     we learn that fraudulent tax return be file for a few of our client  base on this information  we contact our tax software vendor and the internal revenue service a well a the local police and fbi office to investigate the issue  we also engage it professional to perform a scan and analysis of our system  we immediately take step to secure the access to our system and tax software and the client information contain therein  
 
the cyber investigation determine that suspicious activity have occur with one workstation a a result the tax software information be capture  there be no conclusive evidence a to where the breach occur  after conclude that there be an occurrence  we set in place with the irs an opt in system to keep fraudulent return from process  a your information may have be impact  we be write to inform you of this incident and to provide you with information about step that can be take to help protect your information  
 
  service mark with an   require an internet connection and e mail account and may not be available to minor under the age of  year of age  please note that when sign up for monitor service  you may be ask to verify personal information for your own protection to confirm your identity  
 
what information be involve

what be we do to address this situation

if you have receive a  income tax refund check directly from the internal revenue service and the amount do not appear to be correct or you have not file at this time please bring the check to romanazzi   associate so that it may be return and not affect your tax account  if you cash the check or deposit it  the amount will eventually have to be repay to the internal revenue service  also  interest and penalty may apply

we be write to inform you about a recent security incident  please click on the personalize link provide in this email for next step and resource create specifically for your organization  
 
what happen  
 
the cybercrime industry be a constantly grow and change threat to all company worldwide  at blackbaud  our cyber security team successfully defend against million of attack each month and be constantly study the landscape to ensure we stay ahead of this sophisticate criminal industry  in may   we discover and stop a ransomware attack  in a ransomware attack  cybercriminals attempt to disrupt the business by lock company out of their own data and server  after discover the attempt attack  our cyber security team  together with independent forensics expert and law enforcement  successfully prevent the cybercriminal from block our system access and fully encrypt file  and ultimately expel them from our system  
 
prior to our lock the cybercriminal out  the cybercriminal remove a copy of a subset of data from our self host environment  the cybercriminal do not access credit card information  bank account information  or social security number  because protect our customer data be our top priority  we pay the cybercriminals demand with confirmation that the copy they remove have be destroy  
 
base on the nature of the incident  our research  and third party  include law enforcement  investigation  we have no reason to believe that any data go beyond the cybercriminal  be or will be misuse  or will be disseminate or otherwise make available publicly  in accordance with regulatory requirement and in an abundance of caution  we be notify all organization whose data be part of this incident and be provide resource and tool to help them assess this incident  
 
what this mean for your organization specifically  
 
our public cloud environment  microsoft azure and amazon web service  and most of our self host datacenters  product  and customer be not part of this incident  but we have confirm the follow specific to your organization  
 
a copy of your blackbaud etapestry backup be part of this incident  again  the file the cybercriminal remove a copy of do not contain any credit card information  further  the cybercriminal do not gain access to bank account information  usernames  password  or social security number store in your database because they be encrypt  none of your data be lose or corrupt a a result of this incident  and again  base on the nature of the incident  our research  and third party  include law enforcement  investigation  we have no reason to believe that any data go beyond the cybercriminal  be or will be misuse  or will be disseminate or otherwise make available publicly  we have hire a third party team of expert to monitor the dark web a an extra precautionary measure  
 
we have create a resource page for you at www blackbaud com incidentresources that feature a toolkit with a step by step guide to help you a you digest this information  it also contain answer to key question  link to educational webinars  host by rich friedberg  blackbauds chief information security officer and cameron stoll  our head of privacy   information about our future plan  and other resource  
 
it be unlikely but possible  depend on jurisdiction  that our customer may have to make further notification to constituent or other third party  your toolkit provide a write guide to notification law and access to a webinar that help you assess potential notification requirement in your jurisdiction  we advise you to also consult with your organization legal counsel to understand any notification requirement  we want to continue to be your partner through this incident  if you determine that you do need to notify your constituent  we have include template in your toolkit to make it easier  
 
to ensure all your question be answer a quickly a possible  we encourage you to first review the resource we provide at the link above  if you still have question after review these resource  we be here to help  please contact the dedicate team we have establish for this incident

fraud alert

security freeze  
 
under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  
 
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc  or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state

content of data breach q a for business  nonprofit  and legal counsel  
 
in mid july  blackbaud  a software provider use by a significant portion of the nonprofit community  report a ransomware attack that take place in may  and result in the acquisition of data by cybercriminals  accord to public statement  blackbaud claim that it have no reason to believe that any data go beyond the cybercriminal  be or will be misuse  or will be disseminate or otherwise make available publicly  but  to date  have not announce any concrete substantiation of this claim  it be generally difficult to prove that a cybercriminal that have acquire sensitive data have delete it  and absent affirmative proof  one should treat that data a acquire or breach notice act by issue notice to their customer  donor  and others  this q a attempt to address some issue that have arise and provide suggestion base on information that be currently publicly available  the detail of this incident  however  may develop over time  
 
what be consider a security breach notice act can be find in this recently issue guidance  
 
be vermonts breach the consumer reside

what you should do to protect your personal information  
 
  contact the nationwide credit report agency a soon a possible to  
 
  add a fraud alert statement to your credit file at all three national credit report agency  equifax  experian  and transunion  you only need to contact one of the three agency list below  your request will be share with the other two agency  this alert will remain on your credit file for  day  a fraud alert alert credit or of possible fraudulent activity within your report a well a request that they contact you prior to establish any account in your name  once the fraud alert be add to your credit report  all creditor should contact you prior to establish any account in your name  
  add a security freeze to your credit file  a security freeze prevent your credit account from be share with potential creditor  which can help prevent new account identity theft  if you would like to request a security freeze be place on your account  you must write by certify or overnight mail  see address below  to each of the three credit report agency  or through the electronic or internet method make available by the credit report agency  credit report agency charge a  fee to place or remove a security freeze  unless you provide proof that you be a victim of identity theft  in which case there be no fee  a copy of a police report or an investigative report or write ftc complaint document identity theft must be include to avoid a fee  in your request  you also must include  documentation for both the spouse and the victim must be submit when request for the spouse credit report   i  a copy of either the police report or case number document the identity theft  if you be a victim of identity theft   ii  your full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    address  social security number  and date of birth   iii  if you have move in the past  year  the address where you have live over the prior  year   iv  proof of current address such a a current utility bill or phone bill   v  a photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    and  if applicable  vi  payment by check  money order or credit card  visa  master card  american express or discover card only   
  remove your name from mail list of pre approve offer of credit for approximately six month  
  obtain a free copy of your credit report by go to www annualcreditreport com

  review all bill and credit card statement closely to determine whether you have be charge for item you do not contract for or purchase  review all of your bank account statement frequently for check  purchase  or deduction not make by you  note that even if you do not find suspicious activity initially  you should continue to check this information periodically since identity thief sometimes delay their use of steal personal information  
 
  the federal trade commission  ftc  offer consumer assistance and educational material relate to identity theft  privacy issue  and how to avoid identity theft  you can also obtain information from the ftc about fraud alert and security freeze  you may contact the ftc by visit www ftc gov or www consumer gov idtheft  call       or write to the ftc at the address below  if you suspect or know that you be the victim of identity theft  you should contact local police  you can also report such activity to the fraud department of the ftc  which will collect all relevant information and make it available to law enforcement agency  the mail address for the ftc be  federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue  nw washington  dc   you may also obtain information about fraud alert and security freeze from your state attorney general and the credit report agency

dear recipient  
 
the connection inc  be commit to protect the privacy and security of the information we maintain  we be write to inform you about a data security incident that may have involve some of your information  this notice explain the incident  measure we have take  and some step you can take in response  
 
on june     the connection conclude our investigation of an incident that involve unauthorizedaccess to two of our employee email account  the connection first learn of this incident on february     when an employee report experience issue receive email  upon learn of this  we immediately launch an investigation  with the assistance of an outside professional it security firm  
 
through our investigation  we learn that unauthorized party access two employee email account between january     and february     the unauthorized party also attempt to change the connection employee direct deposit information with our payroll department  although it appear that the purpose of the unauthorizedaccess to the account be to change the employee direct deposit information and fraudulently obtain fund from the connection  we could not rule out the possibility that unauthorized party may have be able to access email and attachment in the account  
 
a part of our investigation  we conduct a comprehensive review of the email and attachment in the email account to identify individual whose information may have be accessible to the unauthorized party a a result of this incident  through this review  we determine that the unauthorized party may have access email and attachment that contain your name in combination with your social security number and affiliation with the connection  
 
to date  we be unaware of any misuse of the information maintain in the two employee email account  however  out of an abundance of caution  we want to let you know this happen and assure you we take it very seriously  
 
a a precaution  we have secure the service of experian to offer you a complimentary one year membership of experians identityworkssm  this product help detect possible misuse of your information and provide you with identity protection support focus on immediate identification and resolution of identity theft  identityworks be completely free  and enroll in this program will not hurt your credit score  for more information on identityworks  include instruction on how to activate your complimentary one year membership  a well a some additional step you can take to protect yourself  please see the page that follow this letter  
 
to help prevent something like this from happen again  we have implement multi factor authentication for remote access to email and be now provide additional cybersecurity training to employee  
 
we deeply regret any concern this incident may cause you  if you have any question  please call      monday through friday  from   a m  to   p m   eastern time

my firm represent st  john preparatory school  an all boy catholic preparatory school for grade  through  locate in danvers  massachusetts  st  john prep   pursuant to n  h  rev  stats   c    i be write to notify you of a data breach involve the personal information of twenty five new hampshire resident  
 
on thursday  july     st  john prep be notify by blackbaud inc   a third party software company that st  john prep and many other school and non profit organization use a a database for advancement operation and financial accounting information  of a security breach involve account at blackbaud  accord to blackbaud  in may   blackbaud discover that cybercriminals have access their system and execute a ransomware attack  blackbauds investigation show that the cybercriminals copy and exfiltrated certain data from blackbauds self host environment before the hacker be lock out of the system  the hacker may have have access a early a february     
 
blackbaud have inform st john prep that it investigation show that the cybercriminals be ultimately expel from blackbauds system on or about may     we do not know why it take blackbaud from may    until july    to inform u about the incident  
 
blackbaud share the follow additional detail regard the data breach  
 
in may of   we discover and stop a ransomware attack  in a ransomware attack  cybercriminals attempt to disrupt the business by lock company out of their own data and server  after discover the attack  our cyber security team together with independent forensics expert and law enforcement successfully prevent the cybercriminal from block our system access and fully encrypt file  and ultimately expel them from our system  prior to our lock the cybercriminal out  the cybercriminal remove a copy of a subset of data from our self host environment  
 
the cybercriminal do not access credit card information  bank account information  or social security number  because protect our customer data be our top priority  we pay the cybercriminals demand with confirmation that the copy they remove have be destroy  base on the nature of the incident  our research  and third party  include law enforcement  investigation  we have no reason to believe that any data go beyond the cybercriminal  be or will be misuse  or will be disseminate or otherwise make available publicly  
 
blackbaud inform st  john prep that a legacy st  john prep backup file from august   store by a blackbaud vendor and keep accord to blackbaud policy  have be compromise  blackbaud assure st  john prep that the database contain credit card  bank account  user name  password and social security number be encrypt  and thus that information could not have be access by the cybercriminals  
 
a few week before st  john prep be notify of the blackbaud breach  
 
in addition to these twenty five individual in new hampshire who we be formally notify pursuant to n h  rev  stats   c   there be approximately   additional new hampshire individual in the database whose data do not include personal do not access credit card information  bank account information or social security number  but a small subset of individual have social security or credit card number that have be inadvertently enter into an unencrypted  note  field in the database

what happen

what information be involve  
 
the investigation determine that your name and   data element   may have be accessible by the unauthorized actor  although this information may have be accessible  there be no indication that this information be actually view by an unauthorized actor  however  we be notify you of this incident in an abundance of caution  
 
what we be do  
 
the confidentiality  privacy  and security of personal information a a result of this event  we arrange to have transunion protect your identity for  month at no cost to you a an add precaution

content of data breach notification letter  northwest alumnus and friend  
 
we be write to inform you about a data security incident involve blackbaud  inc   a service provider of the northwest foundation  a you may be aware  blackbaud  an engagement and fundraise software service provider  recently experience a data breachools and non profit that have be affect  the foundation take our relationship with you and our data protection responsibility very seriously  please be assure that we do not store social security number or bank account number and that type of information be not access by the cybercriminal  blackbaud also assure u that the file access by the cybercriminal do not contain any credit card information and that they use encryption to store any financial account information  further detail be below  include step we have take in response  
 
what happen 
 
on july     we be contact by blackbaud  one of the world largest provider of customer relationship management system for not for profit organization and the higher education sector  company representative inform u that a blackbaud service provider have be the victim of a ransomware attack that culminate in may   the cybercriminal be unsuccessful in block access to the database involve in the attack  however  the cybercriminal be able to remove a copy of a subset of data from several of blackbauds client include data of northwest foundation  
 
what information be involve 
 
we would like to reassure our constituent that a detail forensic investigation be undertake  on behalf of blackbaud  by law enforcement and third party cybersecurity expert  a note above  blackbaud have confirm that the investigation find that the cybercriminal do not access your credit or debit card information  bank account information  or social security number because that information be store in an encrypt format  also note that northwest foundation do not store social security number or bank account information  the northwest foundation data access by the cybercriminal in the blackbaud database may have contain some of the follow information in some of the data record  
 
  public information such a name  title  date of birth  spouse 
  address and contact detail such a phone number and e mail address 
  philanthropic interest  give capacity  and give history to the northwest foundation 
  educational attainment 
 
the student record of northwest missouri state university be not involve in this incident  
 
what blackbaud be do 
 
we have be inform by blackbaud that in order to protect constituent data of blackbaud client like northwest foundation and mitigate potential identity theft  it meet the cybercriminals ransomware demand  blackbaud have advise u that it have receive assurance from the cybercriminal and third party expert that the data be destroy and thus be no longer usable or accessible by any unauthorized personal have not be misuse  
 
step we have take in response 
 
upon notification of this breach our investigation and have take the follow step  
 
  we be notify affect alumnus and friend to make them aware of this breach of blackbauds system  
  we be work with blackbaud to understand why there be a delay between it find the breach and notify u  a well a what action blackbaud be take to increase it security  
  we be confer with other blackbaud client to share information about this breach  result corrective action  and identify any additional recommend best practice  
 
additional notification regard this incident will be post to   
 
what you can do 
 
we do not believe there be a need for our constituent to take any action at this time  although there be currently no evidence that your information have be misuse  a a best practice  we recommend people remain vigilant and promptly report any suspicious account activity or suspect identity theft to the proper authority  
 
for question relate to the security incident  contact lori steiner  northwest foundation chief finance officer      foundationnwmissouri edu  we will continue to work with blackbaud to investigate this incident  we regret the inconvenience that this data breach may have cause and share your frustration  please be assure that we take data protection very seriously and be grateful for the continue support of our alumnus and friend  
 
sincerely  
 
doctor  bob burrell 
president  northwest foundation  inc  the breach notification

dear sir or madam  
 
mcdonald hopkins plc represent beaumont health   beaumont    i be write to provide notification of an incident at beaumont that may affect the security of personal jurisdiction  
 
beaumont be the target of an email phishing campaign that result in an unauthorized individual gain access to the email account of a small number of employee  upon learn of the issue  beaumont commence a prompt and thorough investigation  work closely with external cybersecurity professional  after an extensive forensic investigation and comprehensive manual document review  beaumont discover on june    that one or more of the email account that be access between january    and january    contain some of the resident personal and protect health information  one or more of the email account contain the follow information about the resident  medical diagnosis  date you receive medical care  and your age  
 
beaumont have no indication that any information have be misuse  nevertheless  out of an abundance of caution  beaumont want to inform you  and the affect resident  of the incident and to explain the step that it be take to help safeguard the affect resident against identity fraud  beaumont will provide the affect resident with write notification of this incident commence on or about july    in substantially the same form a the letter attach hereto  the affect resident be be provide with advice on step he or she can take to prevent medical identity theft  
 
at beaumont  protect the privacy of personal information  
 
notice be be provide pursuant to the hipaa breach notification rule   cfr    et seq  should you have any question regard this notification  please contact me at      or jgiszczakmcdonaldhopkins com

james j  giszczak

beaumont health 
 
dear 
 
important information please review carefully 
 
the privacy and security of the personal information we maintain be of the utmost importance to beaumont health   beaumont    we be write to inform you of a recent data security incident that we identify and address that may have involve some of your information  this letter provide information about the incident  explain the service we be provide to you  and explain how we protect your information  
 
what happen  
 
beaumont be the target of an email phishing campaign that result in a limit number of employee receive a suspicious email contain a malicious link  a small number of employee fall victim to the phishing campaign  result in an unauthorized individual gain access to those employee email account  upon learn of the incident  beaumont disable the access email account and require mandatory password reset to prevent further misuse  there be no evidence that the purpose of the phishing campaign be to obtain patient information and we have no evidence that any information be actually acquire or use by the unauthorized individual  however  we be provide notice out of an abundance of caution  
 
what we be do  
 
upon learn of this issue  we commence a prompt and thorough investigation  work closely with external cybersecurity professional  after an extensive forensic investigation and comprehensive manual document review  we discover on june    that one or more of the email account that be access between january    and january    contain some of your personal training and education for our employee to increase awareness of the risk of malicious email and to educate employee on identification and handle of malicious email  
 
what information be involve  
 
one or more of the access email account s  contain some of your personal and or protect health information  include medical diagnosis  date you receive medical care  and your age  
 
what you can do  
 
we have no evidence that any of your information have be acquire or misuse  however  we recommend that all patient and personal representative of patient monitor insurance statement for any transaction relate to care or service that have not actually be receive  we be also include a list of step that can be take to help protect your medical information  
 
for more information  
 
please accept our sincere apology that this incident occur  we have take significant measure to prevent this from happen again  include improve our multi factor authentication software  conduct an enterprise wide risk analysis  and retrain our workforce on identify and respond to phishing attack  we remain fully commit to maintain the privacy of all personal safeguard to prevent recurrence of future incident  
 
if you have any further question regard this incident  please call our dedicate and confidential toll free response line that we have set up to respond to question at insert phone number  this response line be staff with professional familiar with this incident and knowledgeable about what you can do to help protect your information  the response line be available monday through friday    a m  to   p m  est  
 
sincerely  
 
beaumont health 
 
protect your medical information  
 
we have no information to date indicate that your medical information involve in this incident be or will be use for any unintended purpose  a a general matter  however  the follow practice can help to protect you from medical identity theft  
 
  only share your health insurance card with your health care provider and other family member who be cover under your insurance plan or who help you with your medical care  
  review your  explanation of benefit statement  which you receive from your health insurance company  follow up with your insurance company or care provider for any item you do not recognize  if necessary  contact the care provider on the explanation of benefit statement and ask for copy of medical record from the date of the potential access  note above  to current date  
  ask your insurance company for a current year to date report of all service pay for you a a beneficiary  follow up with your insurance company or the care provider for any item you do not recognize  
 
north carolina resident

re  notice of data breach 
 
dear name  
 
we be write to inform you about an incident involve your personal information  the recipient forward the report to one of their benefit consultant  who immediately notify metlife of the issue on july     the recipient employer and consultant confirm that they have not share the information and have fully delete it  we do not believe your information be at risk since these party promptly address this matter and be accustom to handle sensitive data  we apologize for this error  
 
the inadvertently disclose report contain your name  social security number  and premium refund information for metlife insurance coverage  
 
we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online three bureau credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for one year  the service be provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  
 
privacy law do not allow u to register you directly to the monitor service  to enroll in this service  go to the mytrueidentity website at www mytrueidentity com and in the space reference a enter activation code  enter the follow  letter activation code    insert unique  letter activation code   and follow the three step to receive access to the credit monitor service online within minute  
 
if you do not have access to the internet  you may enroll in a similar offline paper base credit monitor service via u s  mail delivery  by call the transunion fraud response service toll free hotline at      and when prompt  enter this code   and follow the step to enroll in the offline credit monitor service  
 
you may also add an initial fraud alert to your credit file or speak to a transunion representative if you believe you may be a victim of identity theft  you can sign up for the online or offline credit monitor service anytime within the next  day  please note that credit monitor service might not be available for individual who do not have a credit file with transunion  experian  or equifax  or an address in the unite state or it territory  and a valid social security number  enroll in this service will not affect your credit score  
 
once you be enroll  you will be able to obtain one year of unlimited access to your transunion credit report and credit score  the daily three bureau credit monitor service will notify you if there be any critical change to your credit file at transunion  experian  or equifax  include fraud alert  new inquiry  new account  new public record  late payment  change of address  and more  the service also include access to an identity restoration program that provide assistance in the event your identity be compromise to help you restore your identity and up to    in identity theft insurance with no deductible   policy limitation and exclusion may apply   
 
you should also consider place a  fraud alert  or  security alert  on your credit file  an alert help warn creditor check your file that recent fraudulent activity may have occur or may occur in the future  a potential creditor would then know to contact you before open any new account  to place a fraud alert  contact the credit report agency directly

you should also monitor your financial statement for unauthorized activity  to learn more about identity theft  visit the federal trade commission your national resource about identity theft guidance material at www ftc gov idtheft

free credit report information 
 
under federal law  you be also entitle to one free credit report once every  month from each of the three major nationwide credit report company  to receive yours  call     or make a request online at www annualcreditreport com  
 
even if you do not find any suspicious activity on your initial credit report  the federal trade commission recommend that you check your credit report periodically  victim information sometimes be hold for use or share among a group of thief at different time  check your credit report periodically can help you spot problem and address them quickly  
 
if you find suspicious activity on your credit report or have reason to believe your information be be misuse  call your local law enforcement agency and file a police report  get a copy of the report  many creditor want the information it contain to absolve you of the fraudulent debt  you also should file a complaint with the federal trade commission at www ftc gov idtheft or at   id theft        your complaint will be add to the federal trade commission identity theft data clearinghouse  where it will be accessible to law enforcer for their investigation  also visit the federal trade commission website at www ftc gov idtheft to review the comprehensive information available in the take charge  what to do if your identity be steal step by step guide  you may also call     to request a free copy  the report contain personal information be accidentally send to the wrong recipient  but the recipient have confirm that the information be not share and be promptly delete  the company offer credit monitor service to affect individual a a precaution

dear recipient  
 
we be write to inform you of a recent security incident that may have affect your personal information very seriously  we want to provide you with information about the incident  explain the service we be make available to you  and let you know that we continue to take significant measure to protect your information  
 
what happen  
we recently discover that an unauthorized party may have gain access to a small portion of dent wizard employee email account between january     and february     a a result of a phishing incident  
 
what we be do 
upon learn of the issue  we secure the account and immediately commence a prompt and thorough investigation  we have be work closely with external cybersecurity professional experience in handle these type of incident  after an extensive forensic investigation and manual email review  we discover on july     that the impact email account s  that be access contain some of your personal information  we have no evidence that any of the information have be misuse  nevertheless  out of an abundance of caution  we want to make you aware of the incident  
 
what information be involve  
the impact email account s  contain some of your personal information  
 
what you can do 
to protect you from potential misuse of your information  we be offer a complimentary one year membership of experian identityworks credit b  this product help detect possible misuse of your personal information provide in this letter  
 
this letter also provide other precautionary measure you can take to protect your personally  you should always remain vigilant in review your account statement for fraudulent or irregular activity on a regular basis  
 
for more information 
please accept our apology that this incident occur  we be commit to maintain the privacy of personal familiar with this incident and knowledgeable on what you can do to protect against misuse of your information  
 
sincerely  
 
dent wizard international

to protect you from potential misuse of your information  we be offer you a complimentary one year membership of experian identityworks credit b  this product help detect possible misuse of your personal information provide in this letter  
 
we also recommend that you take additional precautionary measure to protect your personally  you should always remain vigilant in review your account statement for fraudulent or irregular activity on a regular basis  
 
if you have any further question regard this incident  please call our dedicate and confidential toll free response line that we have set up to respond to question  this response line be staff with professional familiar with this incident and knowledgeable on what you can do to protect against misuse of your information  the response line be available monday through friday   a m  to  p m  central time

  consider place a security freeze on your credit file 
if you be very concern about become a victim of fraud or identity theft  you may request a security freeze be place on your credit file  at no charge  a security freeze prohibit  with certain specific exception  the consumer report agency from release your credit report or any information from it without your express authorization  you may place a security freeze on your credit report by send a request in write or by mail  to all three nationwide credit report company  to find out more about how to place a security freeze  you can use the follow contact information  
  equifax security freeze  website  phone number 
  experian security freeze  website  phone number 
  transunion security freeze  website  phone number 
 
in order to place the security freeze  youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal information have be use to file a false tax return  to open an account  or to attempt to open an account in your name or to commit fraud or other crime against you  you may file a police report in the city in which you currently reside  
 
if you do place a security freeze prior to enroll in the credit monitor service a describe above  you will need to remove the freeze to sign up for the credit monitor service  after you sign up for the credit monitor service  you may refreeze your credit file  
 
  obtain a free credit report 
under federal law  you be entitle to one free credit report every  month from each of the above three major nationwide credit report company  call     or request your free credit report online at www annualcreditreport com  once you receive your credit report  review them for discrepancy  identify any account you do not open or inquiry from creditor that you do not authorize  verify all information be correct  if you have question or notice incorrect information  contact the credit report company

dear sir or madam  
 
we represent behavioral health network  inc    bhn   locate at  liberty street  springfield  ma   and be write to notify your office of an incident that may affect the security of some personal jurisdiction  
 
nature of the data event 
 
on may     certain bhn system become infect with a virus that prohibit access to it file  upon discovery  bhn immediately commence an investigation  which include work with third party it and forensic investigator  to determine the full nature and scope of the incident and to secure the bhn network  through this investigation  bhn determine that an unauthorized actor have place malware within the bhn environment that disrupt the operation of certain bhn system  on or about july     bhns investigation further determine that the unauthorized actor have gain access to certain bhn system between may     and may     a a result  the unauthorized actor may have have access to certain file within these system  while the investigation be able to determine these bhn system be access  it be unable to determine whether any specific file contain sensitive information be actually access or acquire by the unauthorized actor  therefore  in an abundance of caution  bhn be notify all current and former individual serve and employee of this incident because the follow type of information be present in the affect system  name  address  date of birth  social security number  medical diagnosis treatment information  and or health insurance claim information  
 
notice to new hampshire resident 
 
on or about july     bhn begin provide notice of this incident to affect individual  which include one hundred fifty two    new hampshire resident  write notice be be provide begin on august     in substantially the same form a the letter attach here a exhibit a  bhn also post notice of this incident on it website  a copy of bhns website notice be attach here a exhibit b

upon learn of the incident from blackbaud  vpr conduct it own investigation of the blackbaud service it use and the information provide by blackbaud to determine what information be involve in the incident  on july     vpr determine that the backup file contain image of check payable to vpr with the name and account number of one new hampshire resident

although we have no indication that your information have be misuse  we encourage you to remain vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement for any unauthorized activity  for more information on identity theft prevention  please see the additional information provide in this letter

additional step you can take

experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com  l    
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  
 
contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the the incident be a ransomware attack on blackbauds network that they discover in may  which affect vermont public radio and thousand of other non profit  the ransomware attack be conduct by an unauthorized person who attempt to encrypt file and demand blackbaud to pay a ransom  blackbaud pay a ransom to destroy the file that have be remove and confirm that they have be work with law enforcement  vermont public radio have investigate the service they use and determine that the backup file have an image of a check of the name and account number of one resident end in  xxxx
