re  notice of data breach 
 
dear salutation  
 
we be write to inform you about a data security incident that may have involve your personal information  the prostate cancer foundation take the protection and proper use of your information very seriously  we be therefore contact you to explain the incident and provide you with step you can take to protect yourself  
 
what happen 
 
we be recently notify by one of our third party service provider of a security incident  at this time  we understand they discover and stop a ransomware attack  after discover the attack  the service provider cyber security team together with independent forensics expert and law enforcement successfully prevent the cybercriminal from block their system access and fully encrypt file  and ultimately expel them from their system  
 
prior to lock the cybercriminal out  the cybercriminal remove a copy of our backup file contain your personal information  this occur at some point begin on february     and could have be in there intermittently until may     
 
what information be involve 
 
it important to note that the cybercriminal do not access your credit card information  bank account information  or social security number  however  we have determine that the file remove may have contain your first and last name  contact information  email address  demographic information  a history of your relationship with our organization  such a donation date and amount  and information that you provide regard a connection to prostate cancer  
 
because protect customer data be their top priority  our third party service provider pay the cybercriminals demand with confirmation that the copy of our back up file which the cybercriminal remove have be destroy  base on the nature of the incident  our vendor research  and third party  include law enforcement  investigation  our vendor do not believe that any data go beyond the cybercriminal  be or will be misuse  or will be disseminate or otherwise make available publicly  
 
what we be do 
 
notwithstanding our belief that the data breach involve constituent data and it internal data protection practice  
 
the prostate cancer foundation want to know procedure be in place to protect your data from any subsequent incident  with respect to this incident  the affect third party vendor assure u that they have identify and correct the vulnerability exploit by the cybercriminal  
 
what you can do 
 
base on the information provide by our third party vendor and our data collection practice  we do not believe your financial account  social security number  tax identification number  driver license number  or credit card information or other information likely to lead to identity theft have be compromise  a a best practice  however  we recommend you remain vigilant  review your account  change your password and pin routinely  and periodically obtain a credit report from one or more of the national credit report agency  
 
the federal trade commission also provide information and assist unite state consumer and can be contact at  
 
federal trade commission

notice of data breach 
 
dear ivan ramrirez  
 
metropolitan community college of kansas city  mcckc  take seriously the privacy and security of it student and employee  and therefore want to timely release information regard a data privacy incident involve name  social security number  driver license number  medical information and bank account information  although we be not aware of any misuse of individual information  it be important to u that we provide information regard this matter  
 
what happen  
 
on june     mcckc determine that your information may have be available to an unauthorized party due to a ransomware attack that result in certain data be encrypt  follow the incident  mcckc immediately engage a third party to conduct a forensic investigation with the objective of identify the potential scope of access the threat actor may have have to the environment during the period of unauthorizedaccess  which include arrive at a determination a to whether sensitive personal information be extract from mccs system or subject to actual or attempt misuse  although the investigation do not find any specific access to any individual information and mcckc have no indication that data have be extract from mcckcs system or misuse  we have choose to notify all potentially impact party of this incident out of an abundance of caution and in full transparency  
 
what we be do  
 
follow confirmation that an unauthorized individual do gain access to the mcckc network  mcckc immediately seek to identify the population of potentially impact individual  privacy of data be a top priority for mcckc and due to our security posture  mcckc do not lose access to it system  backup system  or other operational data  however  in an abundance of caution  mcckc have implement additional safeguard to further secure system information  a a precaution  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for one year provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  this service include credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration  
 
how to enroll  
 
you can sign up online or via u s  mail delivery  to enroll in this service  go to the mytrueidentity website at www mytrueidentity com and  in the space reference a enter activation code  enter the  letter activation code fdkvknzckzhn and follow the three step to receive your credit monitor service online within minute  if you do not have access to the internet and wish to enroll in a similar offline  paper base credit monitor service  via u s  mail delivery  please call the transunion fraud response service toll free hotline at      when prompt  enter the six digit telephone passcode  and follow the step to enroll in the offline credit monitor service  add an initial fraud alert to your credit file  or to speak to a transunion representative if you believe you may be a victim of identity theft  you can sign up for the online or offline credit monitor service anytime between now and november     due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  please note that credit monitor service might not be available for individual who do not have a credit file with transunion or an address in the unite state  or it territory  and a valid social security number  enroll in this service will not affect your credit score  
 
additional detail regard your  month complimentary credit monitor service  
 
once you be enroll  you will be able to obtain one year of unlimited access to your transunion credit report and credit score  the daily credit monitor service will notify you if there be any critical change to your credit file at transunion  include fraud alert  new inquiry  new account  new public record  late payment  change of address  and more  the service also include access to an identity restoration program that provide assistance in the event that your identity be compromise and up to    in identity theft insurance with no deductible   policy limitation and exclusion may apply   
 
what you can do  
 
please review the additional resource section include with this correspondence  this section describe additional step you can take to help protect yourself  include recommendation by the federal trade commission regard identity theft protection and detail on how to place a fraud alert or a security freeze on your credit file  
 
for more information  
 
if you have question  please call    monday through friday from   a m  to   p m  central time  please have your membership number ready  
 
protect your information be important to u  we trust that the service we be offer to you demonstrate our continue commitment to your security and satisfaction  
 
sincerely  
 
john chawana  ph d  
vice chancellor  institutional effectiveness  research   technology 
 
step you can take to protect your information 
 
monitor account 
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review your account statement  and to monitor your credit report for suspicious activity  under u s  law you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also contact the three major credit bureau directly to request a free copy of your credit report  you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal data of student and employee could have be access

notice of breach 
 
we be write to inform you about a recent email incident that may have expose some personal information have be inappropriately use by anyone  we be provide this notice to you a a precautionary measure  to inform you and to explain step that you can take to help protect your information  
 
what happen  
 
on october     we learn that an unauthorized individual attempt to use one of our corporate email address to misdirect a payment intend for nri  we immediately begin an investigation and  base on the available evidence  determine that there have be unauthorizedaccess to two    corporate email account between september     and october     our investigation show that the email account be use by employee from nri and our relate company  on october     we determine that your personal information may have be access  
 
what information be involve  
 
the investigation reveal that in the process of obtain information to misdirect the payment  the malicious actor may have access personal information in the email account  for this reason and because we could not identify what specific information be access  we review the entire content of each employee email box to find out what be in each email  who may have be affect  and where those people reside  that information may have include your   bb text   impact data     
 
what you can do  
 
although we be unaware of any misuse of your or anyones information  to help relieve concern and restore confidence follow this incident  we have secure the service of kroll to provide identity monitor  at no cost to you  for one year  kroll be a global leader in risk mitigation and response  and their team have extensive experience help people who have sustain an unintentional exposure of confidential data  your identity monitor service include credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration  visit   idmonitoringurl   to activate and take advantage of your identity monitor service  you have until   date   to activate your identity monitor service

what we be do  
 
when we discover this incident  we immediately disable the affect email account and have the user reset their password  to further enhance email and network security and to help prevent similar occurrence in the future  we have take or will be take the follow step  
 
  add two factor authentication for remote access to office  service  include email  
  regular review of all remote logins to corporate email account  
  network wide review of all forward rule  
  strengthen our filter to help block dangerous email  
  update our response procedure to more quickly and effectively respond to incident  
  add a warn about phishing attempt and attempt to re route payment to all email  and 
  enhance our cyber training and provide regular communication in order to increase cyber awareness  
 
in addition  we be take step to mitigate any potential misuse of your information by offer you identity monitor service and provide notice of this incident to appropriate regulator

nature of the data event 
 
on june     mcckc determine that student and employee information may have be available to an unauthorized party due to a ransomware attack that result in certain data be encrypt  follow the incident  mcckc immediately engage a third party to conduct a forensic investigation with the objective of identify the potential scope of access the threat actor may have have to the environment during the period of unauthorizedaccess  which include arrive at a determination a to whether sensitive personal data be access by an unauthorized third party  
 
the forensic investigation be recently complete and determine that an unauthorized individual may have have access to the mcckc environment  the forensic investigation do not conclude or preclude that data be extract from mcckcs system however  it be possible that certain personal information be extract from mcckcs system or subject to actual or attempt misuse  
 
although the investigation do not find any specific access to any individual information and mcckc have no indication that data have be extract from mcckcs system or misuse  mcckc have choose to notify all potentially impact party of this incident out of an abundance of caution

content of data breach notification letter  dear recipient  
 
the privacy and security of the personal information we maintain be of the utmost importance to the institute for integrative nutrition  iin   we be write with important information regard a recent security incident that could have impact some of your information  we want to be proactive  provide you with information about the incident  explain the service we be make available to you  and let you know that we continue to take significant measure to ensure our data be protect  
 
what happen  
 
a a result of a phishing incident  an unauthorized party may have obtain access to one iin employee email account  a phishing incident be a form of online fraud which involve send official look email from a company to make unauthorized purchase or mislead account holder into provide personal information  
 
what we be do  
 
upon learn of this issue  we secure the account and commence a prompt and thorough investigation  a part of our investigation  we have work very closely with external cybersecurity professional  after an extensive forensic investigation and manual document review  we discover on june     that the email account that be access march      contain some of your personal information  although we do not have evidence that your information be compromise  we take cybersecurity and communication with our community very seriously  
 
what information be involve  
 
the impact email account contain email message or attachment that contain some of your personal information  specifically your name and social security number  
 
what you can do  
 
we have no forensic evidence that any of your information have be access or misuse  nevertheless  out of an abundance of caution  we want to make you aware of the incident  to protect you from any potential misuse of your information  we be offer you a complimentary one year membership of experian identityworkssm credit b at our expense  this product help detect possible misuse of your personal information provide in this letter  
 
this letter also provide other precautionary measure you can take to protect your personally  you should always remain vigilant in review your account statement for fraudulent or irregular activity on a regular basis  
 
for more information  
 
please accept our sincere apology that this incident occur  we be commit to maintain the privacy of personal information  
 
if you have any further question regard this incident  please call the dedicate and confidential toll free response line that we have set up to respond to question at phone number  this response line be staff with professional familiar with this incident and knowledgeable on what you can do to protect against misuse of your information  
 
sincerely  
 
institute for integrative nutrition

  place a security freeze on your credit file  
 
if you be very concern about become a victim of fraud or identity theft  you may request a security freeze be place on your credit file  at no charge  a security freeze prohibit  with certain specific exception  the consumer report agency from release your credit report or any information from it without your express authorization  you may place a security freeze on your credit report by send a request in write or by mail  to all three nationwide credit report company  to find out more about how to place a security freeze  you can use the follow contact information  
 
  equifax security freeze 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
  
    
 
  experian security freeze 
p o  box  
allen  tx  
  
    
 
  transunion security freeze 
p o  box  
chester  pa  
  
    
 
in order to place the security freeze  youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
if your personal information have be use to file a false tax return  to open an account or to attempt to open an account in your name or to commit fraud or other crime against you  you may file a police report in the city in which you currently reside  
 
if you do place a security freeze prior to enroll in the credit monitor service a describe above  you will need to remove the freeze in order to the breach a name and social security number

dear sir or madam  
 
our law firm represent the city of athens  ohio   athens    a public municipality within the state of ohio  we be write to notify your office of an incident that may affect the security of certain personal jurisdiction  
 
nature of the data event 
 
on february     the city of athens become aware of suspicious activity on one of it computer server and discover it be unable to access certain file on that server  athens immediately secure the server and launch an investigation with the assistance of third party computer forensic specialist  the investigation determine that although there be no evidence of unauthorizedaccess to sensitive information within athens tax  finance  and payroll system  that type of activity could not be rule out with absolute certainty  
 
athens then undertake a lengthy and labor intensive process to identify the individual whose information may have be include in the impact server  that process be complete on july     athens be provide notice to individual whose information may have be impact by the event  the type of information relate to the affect new hampshire resident include the follow  name  mail address  and social security number  
 
notice to new hampshire resident 
 
on august     athens begin provide write notice of this incident to all affect individual  which include ten    new hampshire resident  a sample of the letter be attach hereto and label a exhibit a  
 
other step take and to be take 
 
upon discover the event  athens move quickly to investigate and respond to the incident  assess the security of athens system  and notify potentially affect individual  athens be also work to implement additional safeguard and training to it employee  
 
athens be provide affect individual whose personally  athens be provide impact individual with guidance on how to better protect against identity theft and fraud  include advise individual to report any suspect incident of identity theft or fraud to their credit card company and or bank  
 
athens be provide individual with information on how to place a fraud alert and security freeze on one credit file  the contact detail for the national consumer report agency  information on how to obtain a free credit report  a reminder to remain vigilant for incident of fraud and identity theft by review account statement and monitor free credit report  and encouragement to contact the federal trade commission  their state attorney general  and law enforcement to report attempt or actual identity theft and fraud  
 
athens be also report this matter to other regulator a require

content of data breach notification letter  dear recipient  
 
we be write to inform you of a data security incident that occur at blackbaud  a third party vendor that provide software and service for fundraise and alumnus donor engagement effort at non profit and university worldwide  include the university of detroit mercy  detroit mercy   
 
on july     blackbaud notify detroit mercy of a ransomware attack on their internal system  upon learn of the issue  we immediately launch an investigation and engage external cybersecurity professional experience in handle these type of incident  blackbaud report that they identify an attempt ransomware attack in progress on may     forensic expert and law enforcement be engage to assist in their internal investigation  the investigation conclude that the cybercriminal remove data from blackbauds system intermittently between february     and may     a backup file contain certain information be remove by the cybercriminal  blackbaud pay the cybercriminal to ensure that the backup file be permanently destroy  
 
on july     we determine that the information remove by the threat actor may have contain your full name and social security number  however  the threat actor do not access your payment card information or bank account information because detroit mercy do not store this information in the blackbaud database  
 
blackbaud have take swift action to fix the vulnerability associate with this incident and be accelerate it effort to further harden it environment through enhancement to access management  network segmentation  and deployment of additional endpoint and network base platform  
 
to protect you from potential misuse of your information  we be offer a complimentary one year membership of experian identityworks credit b  this product help detect possible misuse of your personal information and provide you with identity protection service focus on immediate identification and resolution of identity theft  identityworks credit b be completely free to you  and enroll in this program will not impact your credit score  
 
we recommend that you place an initial  year fraud alert on your credit file  at no charge  even if you choose not to use the complimentary  month credit monitor service  a fraud alert tell creditor to contact you personally before they open any new account  you may also consider place a security freeze on your credit file  which prohibit  with certain specific exception  the consumer report agency from release your credit report or any information from it without your express authorization  
 
under federal law  you be entitle to one free credit report every  month from each of the three major nationwide credit report company  we encourage you to review your credit report for discrepancy and to check them periodically for suspicious activity  
 
we apologize for any inconvenience this incident may cause you and remain fully commit to maintain the privacy of personal familiar with this incident and knowledgeable on what you can do to protect against misuse of your information  
 
sincerely

fpa be a los angeles base investment adviser register with the security and exchange commission locate at  wilshire blvd  los angeles  ca   we write to inform you of the nature of the incident and to explain the step that fpa be take to address the incident  include notify potentially impact individual and identify way to help them protect their personal information  
 
nature of the incident 
 
fpa recently determine that two employee email account be temporarily access by an unauthorized third party who send a phishing email that impersonate a company service provider  upon learn of the situation  fpa promptly contain the incident by secure the email account  immediately take remedial action and launch an investigation with the assistance of an independent expert computer forensics firm  the investigation determine that between may    and may     the two email account be access by a third party without authorization  
 
after perform a thorough review to determine who and what information be affect and complete the investigation on or around july     we conclude that the incident do not extend beyond the two email account  a part of the investigation  it be conclude that one or more of the follow type of personal information be present in the two affect email account at the time of the incident  name  mail address  telephone number  email address  date of birth  social security number  and employee health insurance information  
 
there be no evidence that the unauthorized third party view the personal information  however  a a precaution  we be nonetheless notify this office and the individual state resident  include provide them with complimentary credit monitor and identity theft restoration service for  month  
 
resident notify

step take relate to the incident 
 
after learn about the incident  fpa quickly take step to confirm the security of it system  include all of it employee email account  fpa immediately reset the password for the affect email account  and require all other employee not affect by the incident to reset their password  fpa have be implement additional safeguard design to protect it network and have increase the intensity of it phishing test  include target training  fpa also contact federal and state authority  
 
in addition  fpa be provide a telephone number for individual to call with any question they may have  
 
by provide this notice  fpa do not waive any right or defense regard the applicability of new hampshire law  personal jurisdiction or other relate right

subject  external notification of blackbaud data incident 
 
from  santa rosa junior college foundation 
 
to  laggos  sarah 
 
dear sarah  
 
we take the trust of our community member seriously and be commit to protect their personal information  we be write to inform you that blackbaud  the database software provider we use to maintain alumnus  community member  and donor information  experience a ransomware attack  although blackbaud do not believe that your information be misuse in any way  we want to inform you about this incident and the step we be take  
 
what happen  
 
blackbaud be one of the world largest software provider to university  school  charity  and other nonprofit organization and offer data management service for the srjc foundation  on august     blackbaud confirm that in may   they have discover and stop a ransomware attack on their computer system  and srjc foundation data be compromise  
 
to protect against further compromise of customer data and to mitigate potential identity theft  blackbaud meet the cybercriminals ransomware demand  blackbaud report they receive confirmation that the cybercriminal destroy the copy data in exchange for the ransomware payment  
 
blackbaud state that they  have no reason to believe that any data go beyond the cybercriminal  be or will be misuse  or will be disseminate or otherwise make available publicly   they base this on the type of incident  their research  and the involvement of law enforcement and cybersecurity expert  in addition  blackbaud hire a third party team of expert to monitor the dark web a an extra precautionary measure  
 
what information be involve  
 
the cybercriminal do not access your credit card information  bank account information  or social security number  notably  the srjc foundation do not store that information in the blackbaud database  or anywhere else   however  we have determine that the file remove may have contain your contact information  employer information  gender and date of birth  spouse identity  and a history of your relationship with our organization  such a event participation and record of give  
 
what be we do about the situation  
 
we be continue to take measure to understand the full scope of this attack and to protect the personal information from blackbaud regard  
 
  why there be a delay between incident discovery and notification to all those affect 
  why theyre confident the cybercriminals wont misuse or disseminate the data they seize 
  the additional security measure theyve put in place since the incident and any additional measure they plan to implement 
 
what you can do 
 
we want to emphasize again that no credit card  bank account  or other information of that nature be compromise because the srjc foundation do not store that information in the blackbaud database  however  a a best practice  data security expert recommend that individual remain vigilant by review their account statement and credit report closely and report any suspicious activity  for example  
 
  if you receive unsolicited request for donation from u or other nonprofit  please call the number on the organization website to confirm the legitimacy of the solicitation  
  obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit   
  if you detect any suspicious activity  promptly notify the financial institution or company where the account be maintain  you should also report any fraudulent activity or suspect incidence of identity theft to law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  
 
more information 
 
you can learn more about this data incident at   
 
we deeply regret any worry or inconvenience this incident may cause you  if you have any further question or concern regard this matter  please dont hesitate to contact u at foundationsantarosa edu or     m f be pm pst   
 
thank you so much for your involvement in and support of santa rosa junior college  well keep you inform of any further development about this incident if and when they arise  
 
take care  
 
j mullineaux  executive director 
santa rosa junior college foundation 
 
privacy policy  unsubscribe

what happen  
 
on july     we be notify by one of our third party vendor  blackbaud  that it have experience a security incident potentially involve certain limit information it obtain from slf  blackbaud be a widely use constituent relationship management software provider for engagement and fundraise office in higher education and nonprofit  blackbaud inform u that it discover and stop a ransomware attack  but not before some information may have be compromise  accord to information provide to u by blackbaud  the cybercriminal remove a copy of our backup file for the purpose of extort fund from blackbaud  blackbaud state that the ransomware attack and data compromise occur at some point between february     and may     base on the nature of the incident  their research  and third party  include law enforcement  investigation  blackbaud have assure u that it have no reason to believe that any data go beyond this cybercriminal or be disseminate or otherwise make available publicly  blackbaud further state that they have take additional step to ensure that the backup file be permanently delete  
 
what information be involve  
 
blackbaud have inform u that the cybercriminal do not access credit card information  bank account information or social security number  a this information be encrypt and store in a separate backup system from what be compromise  blackbaud have also inform u that the compromise backup file may have contain some of your patient demographic and guarantor information  such a name  mail address  and telephone number a well a your email address and date of birth  and possibly limit medical information about you  such a date of service and department of care  
 
what we be do 
 
a part of it ongoing effort to help avoid an event like this from happen in the future  blackbaud have affirm to slf that it have already implement change to help protect it system from any subsequent incident  since learn of the issue  blackbaud identify the vulnerability associate with this incident  include the tactic use by the cybercriminal  and have take action to fix it  additionally  blackbaud be accelerate their effort to further harden their environment through enhancement to access management  network segmentation  deployment of additional endpoint  and network base platform  a an additional precautionary measure  blackbaud have indicate that it have hire a third party team of expert to monitor the dark web for any further misuse of the data  
 
what you can do 
 
please review the enclose other important information document include with this letter for further step you can take to protect your information  include recommendation by the federal trade commission regard identity theft protection and detail on how to place a fraud alert or a security freeze on your credit file  although no social security number or financial account information be involve  a best practice  we recommend you remain vigilant for incident of fraud and identity theft by review your account statement and monitor your credit report for unauthorized activity

contact information for the three nationwide credit report agency  
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
free credit report  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  to order your annual free credit report please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      you can also order your annual free credit report by mail a complete annual credit report request form  available from the u s  federal trade commission  ftc  website at www consumer ftc gov  to  annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga    
 
fraud alert  you have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on your file at no cost by contact any of the three nationwide credit report agency identify above  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  for that reason  place a fraud alert can protect you  but also may delay you when you seek to obtain credit  if you be a victim of identity theft and have file an identity theft report with law enforcement  you may want to consider place an extend fraud alert  which last for  year  on your credit file  
 
security freeze  you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  free of charge  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you may be able to use an online process  an automate telephone line  or a write request to any of the three credit report agency list above  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that if you be request a credit report for your spouse  this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the breach occur due to a ransomware attack on a third party vendor  blackbaud  between february and may   result in some patient and guarantor information be compromise  no credit card  bank account  or social security number be access  the backup file contain the compromise information be permanently delete  and blackbaud have take step to enhance their security measure to prevent future incident

fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
for those in the military who want to protect their the unauthorized encryption of certain file on some device on eofcus computer network be identify  along with an unauthorizedaccess to some information store in eofcus computer system  include file with the eofcu member information

content of data breach 
 
westcor land title insurance company  westcor  be write to inform you of a recent event that may have impact the security of certain personal information relate to you  we be provide you with information about the event  step take since discover the event  and what you can do to better protect against potential misuse of your information  should you feel it be appropriate to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on january     westcor become aware of unusual activity on it network  westcor conduct an immediate investigation and determine that the network be partially impact by malware  third party forensic investigator be engage to assist in the investigation to determine the nature and scope of the event and identify what personal information may have be impact by this event  
 
through the investigation  westcor identify a database contain sensitive information that be access by the unauthorized individual s  during this event  the database contain individual name and certain data relate to those individual  however  the name be not easily associate with the data relate to those individual  to match the individual with any associate data  particular tool and a specialize understand of the database be require  a such  westcor begin an extensive review of it record to properly identify the address and associate data for the affect individual  this review conclude on july     
 
what information be involve  
 
the follow information about you be include in the impact database  your name  extra item  item  etc  while the data relate to you be not readily associate with your name  we be notify you out of an abundance of caution  
 
what we be do

monitor your account 
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review your account statement  and to monitor your credit report for suspicious activity  under u s  law  you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also contact the three major credit bureau directly to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below  
 
experian

to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  your full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  if you have move in the past five    year  provide the address where you have live over the prior five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    
  if you be a victim of identity theft  include a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft

content of data breach 
 
on behalf of brown forman  we be write to inform you about a recent cyberattack that involve personal information  we sincerely regret any inconvenience this incident may cause you and know that it come at an already difficult time  
 
what happen 
 
on july     we discover suspicious activity in our internal network and promptly begin to investigate and contain it  on august     we learn the cybercriminals steal certain record contain information about some of our current and former employee  in some case  these record contain limit information about employee dependent or beneficiary  out of an abundance of caution  we be provide this letter to all current employee of brown forman a well a former employee who work at brown forman a of  to alert them of this incident  we will notify you separately if your beneficiary or dependent be impact  
 
what information be involve 
 
we believe the incident involve information regard current and former employee  a well a certain beneficiary and dependent of those employee  this include information such a name  social security number  work contact information  such a brown forman email address   home address  position  business title  and salary relate information  such a base pay  hire date  and weekly hour work   
 
what we be do 
 
we begin investigate the incident a soon a we become aware of suspicious activity on our network  we take several step to limit access to our network to prevent further data from be compromise or steal  engage outside forensic expert to help u better understand the impact of this incident  and be cooperate with law enforcement  
 
what you can do 
 
we be provide you with the follow information about general step that you can take to protect against potential misuse of personal information  please remain vigilant for incident of fraud and identity theft  include by regularly review your account statement and monitor free credit report  if you discover any suspicious or unusual activity on your account or suspect identity theft or fraud  be sure to report it immediately to your financial institution  
 
additionally  you may contact the federal trade commission  ftc  or local law enforcement  include your attorney general  to report incident of identity theft or to learn about step you can take to protect yourself from identity theft  to learn more  you can go to the ftcs website at www consumer gov idtheft  call the ftc at    idtheft      or write to ftc at federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc   
 
you may also periodically obtain credit report from each nationwide credit report agency  if you discover information on your credit report arise from a fraudulent transaction  you should request that the credit report agency delete that information from your credit report file  in addition  under the federal fair credit report act  fcra   you be entitle to one free copy of your credit report every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  you may obtain a free copy of your credit report by go to www annualcreditreport com or by call       you may contact the nationwide credit report agency at  
 
equifax       
experian       
transunion       
 
you also have other right under the fcra  for further information about your right under the fcra  please visit    
 
lastly  you can obtain additional information from the ftc and the credit report agency about fraud alert and security freeze  for example  you can add a fraud alert to your credit report file to help protect your credit information  a fraud alert can make it more difficult for someone to get credit in your name because it tell creditor to follow certain procedure to protect you  but it also may delay your ability to obtain credit  you may place a fraud alert in your file by call just one of the three nationwide credit report agency list above  a soon a that agency process your fraud alert  it will notify the other two agency  which then must also place fraud alert in your file  in addition  you can contact the nationwide credit report agency at the follow number to place a security freeze to restrict access to your credit report  
 
equifax

what happen 
 
combe incorporate  combe  value and respect your privacy and be commit to keep your information confidential  our commitment to these value include notify individual if we believe the confidentiality of their personal information

what information be involve 
 
we be notify you because of your purchase on our website when the code be active  a a result of the unauthorized code  some of your information  include your name  email address  physical address  and credit card information end in last four digit  may have be obtain by the third party  the incident do not impact your social security number  
 
what we be do 
 
we have already take step to alert the credit card company of the incident  so that they can monitor your account for potential fraudulent activity  we also recommend that you check your debit or credit card statement for fraudulent charge  we take this situation very seriously and have take additional technical step to further secure comb website and prevent this type of incident from occur in the future  
 
what you can do 
 
a mention above  your social security number be not impact so we do not believe your identity be at risk a a result of this incident  nonetheless  a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant to protect against potential fraud and or identity theft by  among other thing  review your account statement and monitor credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you should also promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incident of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  include the police and your state attorney general  a well a the federal trade commission  ftc

credit and security freeze  
 
you may have the right to place a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  so that no new credit can be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a credit freeze be design to prevent potential credit grantors from access your credit report without your consent  if you place a credit freeze  potential creditor and other third party will not be able to get access to your credit report unless you temporarily lift the freeze  therefore  use a credit freeze may delay your ability to obtain credit  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a credit freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  
 
since the instruction for how to establish a credit freeze differ from state to state  please contact the three major credit report company a specify below to find out more information

content of data breach notification letter  dear parent  
 
we be write to inform you of a recent incident that involve your data  lemoore union high school district  luhsd  be commit to protect the confidentiality and security of our student information and that of their parent  
 
what happen  
 
luhsd use the aeries student information system to provide student and their parent with online access to information regard school event and schedule  in late november   aeries learn that an unauthorized individual attempt to exploit a vulnerability in the aeries software that would allow access to student and parent information  aeries later determine that the exploit be successful  upon discovery  aeries begin an investigation  and law enforcement launch an investigation to identify the person responsible  who aeries believe be now in police custody  on april     aeries confirm to u that this individual may have access luhsds aeries system  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information access by the perpetrator potentially include parent and or student name  home address  phone number  email address  and hash password   a form of render the actual password indecipherable to third party   for the aeries system  
 
what you can do 
 
even though we have no evidence that your personally  if you use the same password for other online account  we recommend change the password for those account a well  
 
what we be do 
 
we understand the importance of protect the privacy and security of personal information  and we regret any inconvenience or concern this incident may cause  in order to avoid the possibility of unauthorizedaccess to the account involve  we be require all account holder whose account be involve to change their password  to help prevent something like this from happen again in the future  we install the software patch that aeries make available to remedy the vulnerability that allow the unauthorized individual to access our aeries system  in addition  we and aeries be review our exist policy and procedure to mitigate any risk associate with this incident and to better prevent future incident  
 
for more information 
 
we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you  if you have any question  please call the luhsd district office between   a m  and   p m   email noreplyluhsd k ca u  and someone will contact you  
 
sincerely  
 
debbie muro  superintendent the data breach an investigation to identify the person responsible  who aeries believe be now in police custody

free credit report  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  to order your annual free credit report please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      you should have any unauthorized transaction delete from your credit report  
 
you can also order your annual free credit report by mail a complete annual credit report request form  available from the u s  federal trade commission   ftc   website at www consumer ftc gov  to  annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga    
 
for colorado  georgia  maine  maryland  massachusetts  new jersey  puerto rico  and vermont resident  you may obtain one or more  depend on the state  additional copy of your credit report  free of charge  you must contact each of the credit report agency directly to obtain such additional report s   
 
fraud alert  you may place a fraud alert in your file by call one of the three nationwide credit report agency above  a fraud alert tell creditor to follow certain procedure  include contact you before they open any new account or change your exist account  for that reason  place a fraud alert can protect you  but also may delay you when you seek to obtain credit  
 
security freeze  you have the ability to place a security freeze on your credit report  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you may be able to use an online process  an automate telephone line  or a write request to any of the three credit report agency list above  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that if you be request a credit report for your spouse  this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past five year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible  display your name and current mail address  and the date of issue  the credit report agency may charge a fee to place a freeze  temporarily lift it  or permanently remove it  the fee be waive if you be a victim of identity theft and have submit a valid investigative or law enforcement report or complaint relate to the identity theft incident to the credit report agency   you must review your state requirement s  and or credit bureau requirement s  for the specific document s  to be submit   
 
for massachusetts resident  the fee for each placement of a freeze  temporary lift of a freeze  or removal of a freeze be   
 
federal trade commission and state attorney general office  if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your home state  you may also contact these agency for information on how to prevent or avoid identity theft  you may contact the federal trade commission by mail at consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc   find help online at www consumer gov idtheft  or call toll free at   idtheft

dear individual  
 
at amphastar pharmaceutical  inc   and it subsidiary international medication system  ltd   and armstrong pharmaceutical  inc   collectively  the company   we take the privacy of our employee and former employee very seriously  it be important to u that you be make aware of an isolate security incident involve your personal information of it employee  
 
what happen  
 
on july     the company learn for the first time that some company data have be post on the internet without authorization on july   most of the information be legacy data  approximately  year old  and include some of your personal information along with other company record  
 
the company immediately investigate this post to learn what happen with the assistance of a lead specialist routinely retain to assess and mitigate cybersecurity incident  the post be determine to be relate to an earlier ransomware attack on may    that have be fully contain without any indication that data have be remove base on available record  no payment be or will be make to the criminal responsible for this malicious criminal act  the company be able to use backup and restore business continuity promptly  a law enforcement and others have report  ransomware attack have increase and have target the healthcare industry in the unite state and around the world include during the global pandemic  
 
what information be involve  
 
the personal information be not involve  for example  the company have conclude that there be no driver license number or government identification number  credit card or financial account number  medical or health insurance information  biometric data  or user name or email address along with a password or security question and answer  
 
what we be do 
 
we want to let you know this happen and assure you we take this matter very seriously  after review and investigate this incident  while we have no evidence that your information be misuse  we conclude that it be important to make you aware of this incident  we be also provide  month of fraud detection and identity restoration service through experian  at no cost to you  a summarize in the attachment  how to enroll in credit monitor   
 
what you can do 
 
we encourage you to consider these measure to monitor and protect your personal information and to remain vigilant for potential incident of fraud and identity theft  
 
vigilance  regularly monitor your financial account and  if you see any unfamiliar activity  promptly contact your financial institution  monitor your credit report  which be available free of charge  a note below  
 
free annual credit report  obtain a free annual credit report from each of the three national consumer credit report company  experian  equifax  and transunion  by call      or by log onto www annualcreditreport com  
 
fraud alert  you may place a fraud alert on your credit file to ask creditor to contact you before they open any new account or change your exist account  this request  which can be make from any of the three national consumer credit report company  can help detect any possible misuse of your personal information  note that a fraud alert may protect you but also may cause delay when you seek to obtain credit  the initial fraud alert be active for  day and can be renew  
 
security freeze  you may place a security freeze on your credit file  a freeze prevent an authorize personal consumer credit report company at the toll free telephone number or website list below  the fee be  for each credit report agency  but the agency may waive the fee if you can prove that identity theft have occur  keep in mind that when you place the freeze  you will not be able to borrow money  obtain instant credit  or get a new credit card until you temporarily lift or permanently remove the freeze

after investigation  jgi have determine that information on blackbauds system at the time of the ransomware incident do not include credit card or bank account information because this information be keep separately and encrypt  nor be social security number of donor or prospective donor impact  because jgi do not keep this information on it system  
 
at this time  jgi have no evidence that the personal information of it affect donor and prospective donor have be use inappropriately  jgis contract with blackbaud require blackbaud to keep jgis donor information confidential and to have security procedure in place  and blackbaud have indicate to jgi that it have successfully retrieve the steal data and prevent it from be use in an unauthorized way  nevertheless  jgi send notification by mail and email to affect donor and prospective donor to explain what happen  what information be involve  what jgi have do and how affect donor and prospective donor can contact jgi with question

wilson elser moskowitz edelman and dicker llp  wilson elser  represent ferris market  inc   ferris   a computer and office equipment wholesaler  with respect to a potential data security incident involve night owl security product llc  night owl   a subsidiary of ferris   hereinafter  the incident  describe in more detail below  ferris take the security and privacy of the information in it control seriously  and have take step to prevent a similar incident from occur in the future  
 
  nature of the security incident  
 
on may     ferris be alert by visa inc   visa  that night owl retail website      be the last common point of purchase  cpp  for credit card legitimately use to purchase product from night owl which be later use to make fraudulent purchase use visa payment card  upon further investigation by ferris  ferris discover on june    that this incident be likely cause by an unknown cyberattackers malicious insertion of a script onto night owl website which allow the cyberattacker to orchestrate a credit card fraud scheme against those who make purchase on night owl website after the malicious script be drop on or around november    and before it be remove on june     
 
at this time  ferris have no evidence to indicate that the individual responsible for the cyber incident view or otherwise acquire any personal information belong to california resident other than name  address  and any payment card information previously use to make a purchase on night owl website  
 
  number of california resident affect  
 
on or about july     ferris finish identify one thousand four hundred and thirty nine     california resident who be potentially affect by this incident  incident notification letter address to these individual be mail on july     via first class mail  a sample copy of the incident notification letter be mail to potentially affect resident of california be include with this letter  
 
  step take  
 
on june     the same day that ferris identify the malware infection on night owl retail website  ferris remove the infection and shut down public access to night owl retail website  during the follow twenty day  ferris take step to ensure the security of night owl website include the migration to a different host provider a well a the performance of upgrade to it network and software  night owl website reopen for public use on june     
 
ferris have take step to prevent a similar event from occur in the future  these step include strengthen ferriss cybersecurity posture by implement enhance software monitor program and firewall protection to resist the future occurrence of any similar cybersecurity event  
 
ferris have also go to great length to identify and notify any individual who be potentially impact a a result of this incident  include the hire of a third party vendor to arrange for any potentially affect resident of california to receive complimentary credit monitor and identity theft protection service for twelve    month

content of data breach 
 
we be write to inform you about a data security incident that may have affect your personal information  however  a a precautionary measure  we be provide this notice to inform you of the step we be take and the measure you can take to protect your information  
 
what happen  
 
we conduct an investigation  with the assistance of a lead cybersecurity firm  into email phishing attempt that target stericycle employee  these phishing attempt aim to compromise stericycle employee email account  on july     we discover that your personal information be actually access by an unauthorized individual  
 
what information be involve  
 
the type of personal information  name  social security number  tax id number  driver license number  passport number  financial account payment card account number  and medical or health insurance information  
 
what we be do 
 
stericycle use robust measure to protect your personal information  stericycle immediately launch an investigation into the suspect phishing activity  secure each impact employee email account  and have continue to monitor for suspicious activity  we have also review and update our employee email security control where appropriate and have continue to train our workforce regard cybersecurity issue  a an add precaution  we be provide access to  month of myidcare credit monitor and identity protection service at no cost to you  through id expert  myidcare service include   month of credit monitor  a    insurance reimbursement policy  and fully manage id theft recovery service  with this protection  myidcare will help you resolve any issue if your identity be compromise  
 
to enroll 
 
please call      or visit  and use the enrollment code provide above  myidcare expert be available monday through friday from  be    pm pacific time  please note the deadline to enroll be november     
 
what you can do 
 
we encourage you to contact id expert with any question and to enroll in free myidcare service  myidcare representative have be fully brief on the incident and can answer any question or concern you may have regard the protection of your personal information  for general question about the incident or the myidcare service  please call      or go to   
 
for more information 
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review your account statement  and to monitor your credit report for suspicious activity  under u s  law  you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free      you may also contact the three major credit bureau directly to request a free copy of your credit report  at no charge  you can also have these credit bureau place a fraud alert on your file that alert creditor to take additional step to verify your identity prior to grant credit in your name

notice of security incident 
 
dear name  
 
the american payroll association  apa  be write to inform you that a data security incident be discover on or around july     which involve some of your personal information  
 
what happen  
 
the apa experience a skim cyberattack in which personal information be access by unauthorized individual  the source of the cyberattack be think to have be a vulnerability in apas content management system  which allow a skimmer to be install on both the login webpage of the apa website  a well a the checkout section of the apas online store  apas it team uncover unusual activity on the site date back to may     at approximately   pm ct  
 
what information be access  
 
the unauthorized individual gain access to login information  i e   username and password  and individual payment card information  i e   credit card information and associate data   by way of account access  the electronic field that may have be access include  first and last name  email address  job title and job role  primary job function and to whom you report  gender  date of birth  address  either business of personal   include country  province or state  city  and postal code  company name and size  employee industry  payroll software use at workplace  time and attendance software use at work  in addition  some account include profile photo and social media username information  
 
what be we do  
 
since discover the cyberattack  apa have install the latest security patch from our content management system to prevent any further exploitation of their website  apa technician also review all code change make to the apa website since january  install additional antivirus software on our server  and increase the frequency of security patch implementation  
 
what can you do  
 
apa want to make you aware of additional step you may take to guard against identity theft or fraud  apa encourage you to be vigilant by regularly review your account statement and online activity  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  
 
use tool from credit provider  
 
carefully review your financial report and bank  credit card  and other account statement  be proactive and create alert on credit card and bank account to notify you of activity  if you discover unauthorized or suspicious activity on your credit report or by any other mean  file an identity theft report with your local police  
 
reset your password  
 
again  apa have also require all affect user to reset their password  if you have not do so  please reset your password information a soon a possible  
 
free credit monitor  
 
apa be offer you  month of free credit monitor and    in identity theft insurance through equifax  with equifax id patrol  you will be provide with daily credit monitor of your equifax  experian  and transunion credit file  daily access to your equifax credit report  and an annual  in  credit report with your credit history a report by the three major credit report agency  you must activate the equifax id patrol by   p m  et on october     in order for it to be effective  to activate  go to www myservices equifax com patrol and enter your activation code   enter activation code   there be a  step enrollment process  which include identity authentication  you will be ask a series of question regard your credit file that you must answer accurately to activate the product  for further product information and detail enrollment instruction  please click here  
 
for more information  
 
you may contact u with question and concern about the potential unauthorizedaccess of your personal information  you may email customerserviceamericanpayroll org  for any question you may have  
 
this notification have not be delay a a result of law enforcement investigation  additionally  you may contact the federal trade commission and the three major credit report agency at the address list below to obtain information about fraud alert and security freeze

content of data breach notification letter  subject  follow up security notification from havenly 
 
dear name  
 
we be write to provide you with additional detail regard a potential security incident involve the username and password use for your account on www havenly com  
 
what happen  
havenly  inc  recently learn that an outside individual gain unauthorizedaccess to a database contain the usernames and hash password of havenly user  base upon the find from an independent forensic investigation  we believe this potential incident may have occur on or around june     
 
what information be involve  
the database contain your first and last name  havenly account username  and the hash password for your account  havenly do not store full credit card number or bill address on it own server  and these type of personal information be not affect by this incident  at this time  no unauthorized activity have be identify in any havenly customer account  
 
what we be do  
we take the privacy of personal investigation and retain an independent forensic investigation firm to assist u in our investigation and response  havenly have be in contact with federal law enforcement regard this matter and be take step to help prevent something like this from recur in the future  include by reset password and enhance security measure relate to our user database  
 
what you can do  
the next time you log in at www havenly com  you will be ask to reset your havenly password  if you have not do so already   you can also change the password of any other online account or service that use the same username and password combination  it be always a best practice to use different password for each online website or service you use  and to change your password on a regular basis  
 
for more information  
for more information about this incident  or if you have additional question or concern  you may contact u at hellohavenly com  we sincerely regret any concern this may cause  
 
sincerely  
cristina devito 
havenly chief financial officer an outside individual gain unauthorizedaccess to a database contain the usernames and hash password of havenly user

assure image  assure  be write to inform you of a recent event that may impact the security of some of your information  although we be unaware of any actual misuse of your information  we be provide you with information about the event  our response  and step you may take to better protect against the possibility of identity theft and fraud  should you feel it be necessary to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on may     assure learn that it electronic medical record system have become encrypt due to ransomware deploy by an unknown actor  because the impact system contain patient and employee information  assure work quickly to    restore access to the patient information so it could continue to care for patient without disruption and    investigate what happen and whether this incident result in any unauthorizedaccess to  or theft of  personal information by the unknown actor  assure conduct an extensive investigation  with the assistance of third party computer forensic specialist to determine the nature and scope of the incident  on july     the investigation confirm assure system be accessible by an unknown actor between may    and may     and certain  limit data be exfiltrated from our system  the investigation be unable to determine the full extent of information that be access by the unknown actor  in an abundance of caution  we perform a comprehensive review of all information store in our system at the time of incident to identify the individual whose information may have be accessible to the unknown actor  we then work to determine the identity and contact information for potentially impact individual  
 
what information be involve  
 
we determine the follow type of information relate to you be present in the affect system and therefore potentially access by the unknown actor during this incident  name  address  date of birth  social security number  driver license number  bank account number  and employee identification number  we be unaware that any of this information be misuse by the unknown actor and assure be provide this notice in an abundance of caution  
 
what we be do  
 
we take this incident and the security of your personal safeguard to further secure the information in our system  assure also notify the u s  department of health and human service and other government regulator  a require  while we be unaware of any misuse of your information a a result of this incident  we be offer you access to  month of credit monitor and identity restoration service through experian

to date  we have no indication that your personal data security training to employee  and have implement more robust security tool to scan and block suspicious message

complimentary one year mytrueidentity credit monitor service
