how to enroll  you can sign up online or via u s  mail delivery  to enroll in this service  go to the mytrueidentity website at www mytrueidentity com and  in the space reference a enter activation code  enter the  letter activation code   insert unique  letter activation code   and follow the three step to receive your credit monitor service online within minute  if you do not have access to the internet and wish to enroll in a similar offline  paper base credit monitor service  via u s  mail delivery  please call the transunion fraud response service toll free hotline at      when prompt  enter the six digit telephone passcode   insert static  digit telephone pass code   and follow the step to enroll in the offline credit monitor service  add an initial fraud alert to your credit file  or to speak to a transunion representative if you believe you may be a victim of identity theft  
 
you can sign up for the online or offline credit monitor service anytime between now and   enrollment deadline    due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  please note that credit monitor service might not be available for individual who do not have a credit file with transunion or an address in the unite state  or it territory  and a valid social security number  enroll in this service will not affect your credit score  
 
additional detail regard your  month complimentary credit monitor service  once you be enroll  you will be able to obtain one year of unlimited access to your transunion credit report and credit score  the daily credit monitor service will notify you if there be any critical change to your credit file at transunion  include fraud alert  new inquiry  new account  new public record  late payment  change of address  and more  the service also include access to an identity restoration program that provide assistance in the event that your identity be compromise and up to    in identity theft insurance with no deductible   policy limitation and exclusion may apply   
 
additional step you can take 
 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  
 
contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal information  
 
after receive your freeze request  each credit bureau will provide you with a unique pin  personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be the breachant solution environment lead to the theft of personal information include name  social security number  and driver license number of their client by an unauthorized actor  the steal information be use to publish name and email address on the dark web

triple bureau credit monitor

fraud consultation 
 
you have unlimited access to consultation with a kroll fraud specialist  support include show you the most effective way to protect your identity  explain your right and protection under the law  assistance with fraud alert  and interpret how personal information be access and use  include investigate suspicious activity that could be tie to an identity theft event  
 
identity theft restoration 
 
if you become a victim of identity theft  an experience kroll license investigator will work on your behalf to resolve relate issue  you will have access to a dedicate investigator who understand your issue and can do most of the work for you  your investigator will be able to dig deep to uncover the scope of the identity theft  and then work to resolve it  
 
krolls activation website be only compatible with the current version or one version earlier of chrome  firefox  safari  and edge  to receive credit service  you must be over the age of  and have establish credit in the u s   have a social security number in your name  and have a u s  residential address associate with your credit file

notice of data breach 
 
dear   firstname    
 
advantage capital fund  llc  advantage capital  take data security very seriously and we understand the importance of protect the information we maintain  we be write to inform you about an incident that may have involve some of your information  this notice explain the incident  measure we have take  and some step you can take in response  
 
what happen  
 
on march     advantage capital confirm a report that it initially receive on february    concern potentially unauthorizedaccess to a third party host database that advantage capital use to store merchant loan application data  advantage capital subsequently take the database offline and a cybersecurity firm be engage to assist with the investigation  through the investigation  advantage capital determine that the unauthorizedaccess occur between february     and march     advantage capital have address the security issue result in this incident  
 
what information be involve  
 
advantage capital have determine that the host database that be subject to unauthorizedaccess contain name  address  email address  date of birth  social security number  driver license number  and financial account number  
 
what you can do  
 
to date  advantage capital be unaware of any misuse of the information maintain in the online database that be subject to unauthorizedaccess  out of an abundance of caution  we encourage you to remain vigilant by review your financial account statement for any unauthorized activity  if you see charge or activity you do not authorize  we suggest that you contact your financial institution immediately  
 
in addition  we have arrange for id expert to provide you with complimentary myidcare identity theft protection service  those service include   month of credit and cyberscan monitor  a    insurance reimbursement policy  and fully manage id theft recovery service  with this protection  myidcare will help you resolve issue if your identity be compromise  
 
to enroll in myidcare service  visit  or call      monday through friday from  be  pm eastern time and use the enrollment code provide above  please note the deadline to enroll be december     
 
what we be do  
 
advantage capital regret any inconvenience or concern this may cause  to help prevent a similar incident from occur in the future  advantage capital have implement a host database service policy  which enhance the service security to help prevent public accessibility to the system  advantage capital have also implement document track and trace in the host database to identify accessibility and have encrypt the database to limit access to select ip address that be only accessible to those with grant access

fraud alert  
 
there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit report company  equifax  experian  or trans union   a fraud alert be free  the credit report company you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit report company will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  
 
you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  
 
there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report company at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
you will need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit report company to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit report company must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the report company must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  
 
if you opt for a temporary lift of the freeze because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit report company  the breach     
content of data breach 
 
vermont student assistance corporation  vsac  be write to inform you of a recent incident that may affect the security of some of your information  on july     vsac receive notice that one of it third party vendor  blackbaud  inc   blackbaud   suffer a cyber incident  blackbaud be a cloud compute provider that offer customer relationship management and financial service tool to many non profit organization  include vsac  while we be unaware of any actual or attempt misuse of your information  we be provide you with information about the incident  our response  and step you may take to better protect yourself  should you feel it necessary to do so  
 
what happen  
 
in may   blackbaud experience a ransomware incident that impact certain system within the blackbaud environment  a a result of this incident  certain blackbaud system be encrypt and a blackbaud database backup file include vsac data be remove from the blackbaud environment by an unauthorized actor  while blackbauds investigation be able to determine that the backup file be remove between february     and may     their investigation be unable to confirm exactly when this occur  a a result  the unauthorized actor may have have access to certain information contain within the backup database  upon learn of this incident  vsac immediately begin an investigation to determine the full nature and scope of the event and what  if any  vsac data may have be impact  on or about august     vsacs investigation determine that the backup database may have contain personal information  
 
what information be involve  
 
while blackbaud report that information be access  blackbaud be unable to confirm what  if any  specific sensitive information be actually access or acquire by the unauthorized actor  blackbaud have also represent to u that they have no reason to believe that any data go beyond the cybercriminal  be or will be misuse  or will be disseminate or otherwise make available publicly  regardless  out of an abundance of caution  vsac be notify you of this incident because you be or be a customer or client of vsac  and information relate to you be potentially present in the database at the time of this incident  our investigation determine that the information relate to you include your name and social security number  to date  vsac have not receive any report of actual or attempt misuse of your information

dear member of the pkd community  
 
we be write to inform you about a data security incident that may involve your personal information  we take the privacy of your information seriously  and a a precautionary measure  we want to let you know what happen  
 
on july     we be contact by blackbaud  one of the world largest provider of customer relationship management system for non profit organization and the higher education sector  blackbaud inform u that a service provider have be the victim of a ransomware attack that culminate in may   although the cybercriminal be unsuccessful in block access to the database involve in the attack  they be able to remove a copy of a subset of data from several of blackbauds client  include data of polycystic kidney disease foundation  
 
we would like to reassure you that a detail forensic investigation be undertake by law enforcement and third party cybersecurity expert on behalf of blackbaud  blackbaud have confirm that the cybercriminal do not access your credit or debit card information  bank account information  or social security number because that information be store in an encrypt format  also  please note that polycystic kidney disease foundation do not store social security number or bank account information  the data access by the cybercriminal in the blackbaud database may have contain some of the follow information in some of the data record  
 
  public information such a name  title  date of birth  spouse 
  address and contact detail such a phone number and email address 
  philanthropic interest  give capacity  and give history to the polycystic kidney disease foundation 
  transplant status 
 
blackbaud have take step to protect constituent data of blackbaud client like polycystic kidney disease foundation and mitigate potential identity theft  blackbaud meet the cybercriminals ransomware demand to ensure that the data be destroy and be no longer usable or accessible by any unauthorized personal have not be misuse  
 
upon notification of this breach our investigation and have take the follow step  
 
  we be notify affect volunteer  donor  employee  and others in our network that may have be affect to make them aware of this breach of blackbauds system  
  we be work with blackbaud to understand why there be a delay between it find the breach and notify u  a well a what action blackbaud be take to increase it security to ensure our data will be protect against future threat  
  we be confer with other blackbaud client to share information about this breach  result corrective action  and identify any additional recommend best practice  
 
we do not believe there be a need for our constituent to take any action at this time  although your financial account information be not access in this security breach of the three major credit report agency once every  month  you may also want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  
 
for more information  please visit identitytheft gov or call   id theft

additional step you can take

if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report

a summary of your right under the fair credit report act  
 
the federal fair credit report act  fcra  promote the accuracy  fairness  and privacy of information in the file of consumer report agency  your major right under the fcra be summarize below  for more information  include information about additional right  go to www consumerfinance gov learnmore or write to  consumer financial protection bureau   g street n w   washington  dc   
 
you must be tell if information in your file have be use against you  
you have the right to know what be in your file  
you have the right to ask for a credit score  
you have the right to dispute incomplete or inaccurate information  
consumer report agency must correct or delete inaccurate  incomplete  or unverifiable information  
consumer report agency may not report outdated negative information  
access to your file be limit  
you must give your consent for report to be provide to employer  
you may limit prescreened offer of credit and insurance you get base on information in your credit report  
you have a right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  
you may seek damage from violator

dear xxxxxxxx  
 
we be write to let you know of a recent data security incident at blackbaud inc   a data service vendor for the hydrocephalus association  ha   blackbaud be a lead provider of software service and host file or backup for hundred of school  foundation  and nonprofit like ha around the world  blackbaud recently inform u that it discover and resolve a cybersecurity incident impact it system  which affect many of it nonprofit client  include ha  
 
what happen  
 
we be contact you regard this incident with blackbaud because some of your personal detail about this incident on it website  
 
what information be involve  
 
first and foremost  please be reassure that your bank account or credit card information be not involve in this incident  a ha do not retain financial information within our database  on august     we determine that specific information you share with u through membership communication  registration  or survey may have be part of this breach  this could include name  address  your connection to ha  the date of birth of you or your love one with hydrocephalus  and limit health information  e g   patient name  age of diagnosis  type of hydrocephalus  and or comorbidities or complication   to the extent you provide this information  
 
for clarity  please know that the incident do not involve information associate with our patient registry  happier  information for that patient registry be store in a separate database at the university of utah  outside of blackbaud  that information be de identify  mean the information that could link it to you have be remove  and it be not part of this incident  information store in hydroassist  our mobile app  be also not a part of this incident  hydroassist data be store in a separate database outside of blackbaud  
 
what we be do  
 
we be extremely frustrate about this event and take this matter very seriously  safeguard your personal information be a top priority for u  we be not aware of any misuse to date of the compromise information  and a previously state  blackbaud have communicate it confidence that the data be destroy  regardless  upon learn of this incident  we immediately begin work to investigate the incident and to identify and notify individual affect  
 
we require blackbaud to keep our information confidential and to maintain security procedure to minimize the risk of information security incident  if an information security incident do occur  blackbaud be require to notify u  to work with u to mitigate negative consequence from the incident  and to implement procedure to prevent a similar incident from occur again  we will review our work with blackbaud to ensure it meet that commitment and be in the process of evaluate our relationship with blackbaud more generally  
 
what you can do  
 
although no credit card or bank account information be compromise a part of this incident  give the increase threat to privacy in our world we recommend that you remain vigilant and regularly review and monitor all of your credit history to guard against any unauthorized transaction or activity  we also recommend that you closely monitor your account statement and notify your financial institution if you suspect any unauthorized activity  additionally  you should not provide personal information in response to electronic communication regard security breachment a contain more information about step you can take to protect yourself against fraud and identity theft

fraud alert  consider contact the three major credit report agency at the address below to place a fraud alert on your credit report  a fraud alert indicate to anyone request your credit file that you suspect you be a possible victim of fraud  a fraud alert do not affect your ability to get a loan or credit  instead  it alert a business that your personal information might have be compromise and require that business to verify your identity before issue you credit  although this may cause some short delay if you be the one apply for the credit  it might protect against someone else obtain credit in your name  
 
to place a fraud alert  contact any of the three major credit report agency list above and request that a fraud alert be put on your file  the agency that you contact must notify the other two agency  a fraud alert be free and last  day but can be renew  
 
credit freeze  a credit freeze prohibit a credit report agency from release any information from a consumer credit report until the freeze be lift  when a credit freeze be in place  no one include you can open a new account  a a result  please be aware that place a security freeze on your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prevent the timely approval of any request you make for new loan  credit  mortgage  employment  house  or other service  place a credit freeze be free  to place a credit freeze  contact all three credit report agency list above and provide the personal information require by each agency to place a freeze  which may include

artech  llc  artech  be write to inform you of an incident that could affect the security of some of your information  this notice provide information about the incident  our response  and resource available to you to help protect your information from possible misuse  should you feel it necessary to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on january     artech receive a report of unusual activity relate to an employee artech user account  we immediately begin investigate this report and through that investigation identify ransomware on certain artech system  that same day we engage a lead third party forensic investigation firm to assess the security of our system and to confirm the nature and scope of the incident  on january     the investigation determine that an unauthorized actor have access to certain artech system between january     and january     artech undertake a comprehensive review of these system and determine that some personal information be contain in one or more of the involve file  
 
what information be involve  
 
our investigation determine that at the time of the incident the involve file contain information include your name  variable text   data element  please note that to date we be unaware of any actual or attempt misuse of your personal information a a result of this incident  
 
what we be do  
 
information privacy and security be among our highest priority  artech have strict security measure in place to protect information in our care  upon learn of this incident  we quickly take step to confirm the security of our system and notify law enforcement of the event  we reset password for all artech user  further strengthen our exist technical control  and implement additional security measure  we also review our policy and procedure relate to data security and be conduct additional employee training  a an add precaution  we be also offer you access to   month of credit monitor and identity protection service through kroll at no cost to you  we encourage you to enroll in these service  a we be not able to act on your behalf to do so  more information about these service and instruction on how to enroll may be find in the enclose step you can take to protect your information  your identity monitor service include credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration  
 
what you can do  
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review your account statement  and to monitor your credit report for suspicious activity  you may also enroll to receive the free credit monitor and identity theft protection service we be offer and review the enclose step you can take to protect your information to learn more about way to protect personal information  
 
for more information  
 
we understand that you may have question about this incident that be not address in this letter  if you have additional question  please contact               monday through friday      a m  to     p m  
 
artech take the privacy and security of the personal information in our care seriously  we sincerely regret any inconvenience or concern this notification may cause you  
 
sincerely  
 
eric szoke 
artech  llc

membership number    member id   
 
service include

you will receive alert when there be change to your credit datafor instance  when a new line of credit be apply for in your name  if you do not recognize the activity  youll have the option to call a kroll fraud specialist  who will be able to help you determine if it be an indicator of identity theft  
 
fraud consultation 
 
you have unlimited access to consultation with a kroll fraud specialist  support include show you the most effective way to protect your identity  explain your right and protection under the law  assistance with fraud alert  and interpret how personal information be access and use  include investigate suspicious activity that could be tie to an identity theft event  
 
identity theft restoration 
 
if you become a victim of identity theft  an experience kroll license investigator will work on your behalf to resolve relate issue  you will have access to a dedicate investigator who understand your issue and can do most of the work for you  your investigator will be able to dig deep to uncover the scope of the identity theft  and then work to resolve it

content of data breach notification letter  dear value bidder  
 
we take the protection of your information very seriously  unfortunately  we be write to inform you about a data security issue affect your liveauctioneers bidder account information  we be deeply sorry for any concern or inconvenience this may have cause  and be work quickly to take the appropriate step to prevent such incident in the future  we hope that in time we can regain your trust  which we value above all  
 
what happen 
 
our cybersecurity team have indeed confirm that follow a cyberattack against one of our it supplier on june     an unauthorized third party manage to access certain personal information from our bidder database  we be notify of the incident on july     and begin notify bidder that day through email and our website  base on how recently the bidder have use their liveauctioneers account  
 
liveauctioneers be one of a number of their partner who experience a breach since this it supplier security be compromise  our cybersecurity team have ensure the unauthorizedaccess have cease  
 
what information be involve 
 
the data that have be expose include user account information like name  email address  mail address  phone number  visit history  and encrypt password  the unauthorized party  however  manage to decrypt password after the cyberattack   not all of this information may have be present on your bidder account  please also know that complete payment card number be not access  and we have no reason to believe auction history be affect  
 
the exposure of your liveauctioneers credential  i e  login and password  could affect other online account you may have  if they use the same or similar credential   you could also be expose to impersonation and phishing attempt  
 
what we be do 
 
a soon a we become aware of this incident  we block the unauthorizedaccess to bidder account information and disable your most recent liveauctioneers password  
 
we have take immediate step to improve our security and prevent such incident in the future  
 
  we have suspend our relationship with the compromise it supplier  
  our security token and password throughout liveauctioneers system have be replace  
  we have implement stronger password encryption  
  we have partner with lead cybersecurity expert to further secure our website  mobile app  and system  
  we be work with government authority to bring the perpetrator to justice  
  multi factor authentication for all back end service have be implement  
  we be analyze and monitor our source code to address any vulnerability  
  we be continue to upgrade our network infrastructure  
  we will be implement stronger password requirement  
 
what you can do 
 
all password create before july     have be disable  if you have not already do so  we encourage you to change your password  
 
for not log in bidder  you can access your account by create a new password  follow the step below  
 
  visit  and click log in on the top right hand corner of the page  
  click forget password on the login window  
  enter your email address use for and click send reset instruction  
  check your email and follow the link provide to reset your password  
 
for already log in bidder  please click the dropdown from your user icon in the top right corner and click account setting  from here  click change password  
 
to help further protect your personal information  please remember  
 
  do not use the same or similar credential for other online account  
  change any and all password that use the same or similar credential a those use for your liveauctioneers account  
  regularly review your online account for suspicious activity  
  be cautious of any unsolicited communication ask for your personal information  we will never ask you to disclose your password via an email or over the phone  for instance  
  avoid click on link or download attachment from suspicious email  
  if you see any unauthorized activity relate to your financial account  promptly contact your financial institution  
  for u s  resident  we also suggest you submit a complaint with the federal trade commission by call   id theft        online at  or by mail to  pennsylvania avenue  nw washington  dc   
  you also may want to monitor your credit report with the major credit report agency

content of data breach 
 
enloe medical center  enloe  be write to inform you of a recent incident that may affect the privacy of some of your information  on thursday  july     enloe receive notification from one of it third party vendor  blackbaud  inc   blackbaud   of a cyber incident  blackbaud be a cloud compute provider that offer customer relationship management and financial service tool to organization  include enloe  upon receive notice of the cyber incident  we immediately commence an investigation to better understand the nature and scope of the incident and any impact on enloes data  this notice provide information about the blackbaud incident  our response  and resource available to you to help protect your information from possible misuse  should you feel it necessary to do so  
 
what happen  
 
blackbaud report that  in may   it experience a ransomware incident that result in encryption of certain blackbaud system  blackbaud report the incident to law enforcement and work with forensic investigator to determine the nature and scope of the incident  follow it investigation  blackbaud notify it customer that an unknown actor may have access or acquire certain blackbaud customer data  blackbaud report that the data be exfiltrated by the threat actor at some point before blackbaud lock the threat actor out of the environment on may     upon learn of the blackbaud incident  enloe immediately commence an investigation to determine what  if any  sensitive enloe data be potentially involve  this investigation include work diligently to gather further information from blackbaud to understand the scope of the incident  the blackbaud event affect thousand of organization across many different state and country  although not the target of the ransomware incident  enloe be one of the countless organization that be impact  
 
what information be involve  
 
our investigation determine that the impact blackbaud system contain your name  address  medical treatment discharge date  and department where you receive care  the system may have also contain your date of birth  phone number  and or email address  your social security number  credit card number  and bank account information be not present in the blackbaud system and be therefore not subject to unauthorizedaccess  please note that  to date  we have not receive confirmation from blackbaud that your specific information be access or acquire by the unknown actor  
 
what we be do  
 
the confidentiality  privacy  and security of information in our care be among our highest priority  and we take this incident very seriously  a part of our ongoing commitment to the security of information in our care  we be work to review our exist policy and procedure regard our third party vendor  and be work with blackbaud to evaluate additional measure and safeguard to protect against this type of incident in the future  we will also be notify the unite state department of health and human service and state regulator  a require  
 
step you can take to help protect your information 
 
we recommend you remain vigilant for attempt to obtain sensitive information from you use social engineer  this be when someone request you provide sensitive information such a bank account information or social security number by use information about your recent medical visit in an attempt to show the request be legitimate  we also encourage you to review the enclose step you can take to help protect your information  there you will find general information on what you can do to help protect your personal information  
 
what can you do

emanate health foundation be dedicate to raise fund and awareness for service that heal and nurture individual and family throughout the san gabriel valley  we work toward fulfil this mission by collaborate with community member to financially sustain emanate health and it award win  not for profit medical facility  emanate health inter community hospital  emanate health queen of the valley hospital  emanate health foothill presbyterian hospital  and emanate health hospice  the foundation develop philanthropic support for these medical facility through charitable donation and community awareness  emanate health physician  staff  and volunteer work tirelessly to enhance the well be of our patient and improve their health outcome  and they rely on the foundation generous contributor a visionary partner in the process  
 
unfortunately  the foundation be recently notify by blackbaud of a security incident involve your personal information a a patient of one of our affiliate medical facility  blackbaud provide service to the foundation and hold information about our donor and prospective donor under a strict confidentiality agreement  we be notify you to explain the circumstance and to summarize the step take a we take the protection and proper use of your information very seriously

what be we do

content of data breach notification letter  dear recipient  
 
we at inova health system  inova  take the privacy and security of your personal information very seriously  we be write to inform you of a recent data security incident at blackbaud  a third party service provider  which may have involve some of the information you provide to inova  blackbaud be a widely use software and service provider for fundraise and alumnus or donor engagement effort at non profit and university worldwide  inova use one or more blackbaud application  and blackbaud recently experience an incident impact information hold on one of those application  we want to provide you with information about the incident and the significant measure we be take to protect your information  
 
what happen 
on july     blackbaud notify inova of a security incident that impact blackbauds client across the world  blackbaud report that they identify an attempt ransomware attack in progress on may     blackbaud inform u that they stop the ransomware attack and engage forensic expert to assist in their internal investigation  that investigation conclude that the threat actor intermittently remove data from blackbauds system between february     and may     accord to blackbaud  they pay the threat actor to ensure that the data be permanently destroy  
 
what information be involve 
on august     we determine that the information remove by the threat actor may have contain some of your personal information  include your full name  address  date of birth  phone number  provider name s   date s  of service  and or hospital department s   your philanthropic give history  such a donation date and amount  may have also be remove by the threat actor  this incident do not impact your social security number  which we do not collect  and your financial account information and or payment card information be also not expose  the inova electronic health record system be not impact by this incident  
 
what we be do 
upon learn of the issue  we commence an immediate and thorough investigation  that investigation be still ongoing  a part of our investigation  in addition to demand detail information from blackbaud about the nature and scope of the incident  we engage cybersecurity professional experience in handle these type of incident  
 
what blackbaud be do 
blackbaud have assure u that they close the vulnerability that allow the incident and that they be enhance their security control and conduct ongoing effort against incident like this in the future  accord to blackbaud  there be no evidence to believe that any data will be misuse  disseminate  or otherwise make publicly available  blackbaud indicate that it have hire a third party team of expert  include a team of forensics accountant  to continue monitor for any such activity  nevertheless  out of an abundance of caution  we want to make you aware of the incident  
 
important information 
please review carefully 
 
what you can do 
this letter provide precautionary measure that you can take to protect your personally  you should always remain vigilant in review your financial account statement and credit report for fraudulent or irregular activity on a regular basis and report any suspicious activity to the proper authority  
 
for more information 
please know the security of our patient and donor information be our top priority  and we deeply apologize for any inconvenience this may cause  we remain fully commit to maintain the privacy of personal information  
 
if you have any further question regard this incident  please call our dedicate and confidential toll free response line that we have set up to respond to question at phone number  this response line be staff with professional familiar with this incident and knowledgeable on what you can do to protect your information  the response line be available monday through friday   be to  pm eastern time  
 
sincerely

  additional helpful resource

dear constituent  
 
we be write to inform you of a recent data breach involve blackbaud  inc  blackbaud  inc  provide donor relation database software system for episcopal community service  ec   on july     ec be notify by blackbaud  inc   one of our third party service provider  of a security incident  blackbaud discover and stop a ransomware attack  after discover the attack  the service provider cyber security team  together with independent forensics expert and law enforcement  successfully prevent the cybercriminal from block their system access and fully encrypt file  and ultimately expel them from their system  however  before lock the cybercriminal out  the cybercriminal remove a copy of a backup file contain some constituent information  this occur at some point begin on february     and could have be in there intermittently until may     
 
it be important to note that the cybercriminal do not access data like credit card information  bank account information  or social security number  however  blackbaud have inform u that donor information such a contact information  name  email address  mail address  and give history could have be a part of the data breach  
 
blackbaud  inc  pay the cybercriminals demand with confirmation that the copy they remove have be destroy  base on the nature of the incident  their research  and third party  include law enforcement  investigation  blackbaud have no reason to believe that any data go beyond the cybercriminal  be or will be misuse  or will be disseminate or otherwise make available publicly  please note that this breach only affect information on blackbauds server for ec donor and have no impact on ec client or program  
 
we be notify you so that you can take immediate action to protect yourself  ensure the safety of our constituent data be of the utmost importance to u  a part of their ongoing effort to help prevent something like this from happen in the future  blackbaud have already implement several change that will protect your data from any subsequent incident  first  blackbauds team be able to quickly identify the vulnerability associate with this incident  include the tactic use by the cybercriminal  and take swift action to fix it  they have confirm through test by multiple third party  include the appropriate platform vendor  that their fix withstand all know attack tactic  additionally  they be accelerate effort to further harden their environment through enhancement to access management  network segmentation  deployment of additional endpoint and network base platform  you can read more about the security breach on blackbauds website    
 
a a best practice  we recommend you remain vigilant and promptly report any suspicious activity or suspect identity theft to the proper law enforcement authority  
 
we apologize for this incident and regret any inconvenience it may cause you  for additional information  please refer to our website at  ecscalifornia org blackbaud  should you have any further question or concern about this incident and or the protection available to you  please do not hesitate to contact me at amuirecscalifornia org  
 
sincerely  
 
andra muir

credit and security freeze

you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below

timeline with information provide to u from nutrikids nutrilink  
 
on september     we be inform by a rocklin unify parent that there be a bug in the nutrilink software that may allow unauthorizedaccess to the nutrikids nutrilink system  the initial report be focus on nutrikids nutrilink database where family can look up information on their student s   which we do use and link to through our district website  follow the step provide  we be able to confirm the ability to access student information and report it immediately to nutrikids nutrilink  on september   we be able to speak with nutrilinks coo brent england who verify they be able to fix the bug and remove the ability to gain access through the portal  
 
this breach status  however  have speak with mr  england  we be able to confirm that no other data element be impact a a result of this incident  social security number  credit card data  or other personal information be not keep in our nutrikids nutrilink database

notice of data breach 
 
fabfitfun value your membership in our community and respect the privacy of your information  which be why we be write to let you know about a recent data security incident that may involve your personal information very seriously  and sincerely regret any concern this incident may cause  
 
what happen  
 
our technical team recently discover that an unauthorized third party insert malicious code on portion of our website that may have enable them to capture certain information in connection with customer sign ups  base on our forensic investigation  this incident concern the new member sign up page of our website during the period between april     and may     and between may     and august     accord to our record  you sign up for fabfitfun during this timeframe  and your information therefore could have be affect  although we believe that only a subset of member who sign up during this period be affect  we be notify everyone that sign up during this timeframe a a precaution  
 
what information be involve  
 
this incident would have involve email and fabfitfun password for customer that sign up use paypal or apple pay  for customer use credit or debit card  the information involve would also have include name  address  payment card account number  card expiration date  and card verification code  please note that because we do not collect highly sensitive personal information like social security number  this type of information be not affect by this incident  
 
what we be do 
 
we take step to address and contain this incident promptly after it be discover  a soon a our technical team identify the issue  we remove the malicious code and take step to secure our website with the help of forensic cybersecurity expert engage to assist with our investigation  we have also report the matter to law enforcement and be cooperate with the investigation  while we be the unauthorized insertion of malicious code into portion of the organization website enable the capture of certain customer information  which amount to a hack

what happen

what information be involve  
the mailbox contain information about individual who formerly or currently receive vision benefit through eyemed  although eyemed could not fully determine whether  and to what extent  if any  the unauthorized individual view or copy personal information that may have be access could include the follow type of information  impact data  
 
what we be do  
eyemed be commit to safeguard your personal mandatory security awareness training  to help relieve concern and restore confidence follow this incident  we have secure the service of kroll to provide identity monitor service at no cost to you for two    year  kroll be a global leader in risk mitigation and response  and their team have extensive experience help people who have sustain an unintended with this letter  
 
what you can do  
eyemed be not aware of any misuse of your information  however  we want to let you know of step you may want to take to guard against potential identity theft or fraud  we encourage you to remain vigilant by regularly review your financial statement  credit report  and explanation of benefit  eobs  from your health insurer for any unauthorized activity  if you identify service that you do not receive or account  charge  or withdrawal that you do not authorize  you should immediately contact and report to the involve company and to credit report agency  please also review the enclose additional resource section include with this letter  this section describe additional step you can take to help protect yourself  include recommendation by the federal trade commission regard identity theft protection and detail on how to place a fraud alert or a security freeze on your credit file

free credit report

you may obtain one or more  depend on the state  additional copy of your credit report  free of charge  you must contact each of the credit report agency directly to obtain such additional report s   
 
fraud alert  
there be two type of fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for at least one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft and you have the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  you can place a fraud alert on your credit report by contact any of the three national credit report agency  
 
security freeze  
you have the ability to place a security freeze  also know a a credit freeze  on your credit report free of charge  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you may use an online process  an automate telephone line  or submit a write request to any of the three credit report agency list above  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that  if you be request a credit report for your spouse  this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past  year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible and display your name  current mail address  and the date of issue  
 
federal trade commission and state attorney general office  
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your home state  you may also contact these agency for information on how to prevent or minimize the risk of identity theft  you may contact the federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc   www ftc gov b an unauthorized individual gain access to an eyemed email mailbox and send phishing email to email address contain in the mailboxs address book  it be determine that the unauthorized individual first gain access to the mailbox on june     and that access terminate on july     eyemed initially notify cover entity of possible impact on july     and confirm impact to cover entitys member on august

anytown  usa  
barcode   
 
dear john doe  
 
at u s  bank  we value your confidence in u and place the privacy and security of your information a a top priority  we be write to let you know about an event that occur at a u s  bank location  which include some of your personal information  
 
what happen  
on july     a computer server contain your information be physically steal from one of our corporate office  since the event  we have be focus on identify who be impact and work with authority to recover the steal server  
 
what information be involve  
the information on the server include personally identifiable information include your name  account number  and social security number  at this time  we be not aware of the information be use fraudulently against you or your account  
 
what be we do  
we apologize for any inconvenience this have cause  a a precautionary measure  if you would like to receive a new account number  you can do so by call our fraud liaison center at    between  a m  to  p m  ct  monday through sunday  we can help you close and reopen your account with a new account number at no charge  
 
we also want to inform you of some step we have take to protect you and some additional step you can take to help protect yourself  
 
free credit monitor and identity restoration service 
to help you protect your identity  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for two year provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  
 
to enroll in this service  go to the mytrueidentity website at mytrueidentity com and in the space reference a enter activation code  enter the follow  letter activation code and follow the three step to receive your credit monitor service online within minute  
 
unique activation code     tu code   
 
once you be enroll  you will be able to obtain an initial  in  credit report and credit score along with two year of unlimited access to your transunion credit report and vantagescore credit score by transunion  the daily three bureau credit monitor service will notify you if there be any critical change to your credit file at transunion  experian and equifax  include fraud alert  new inquiry  new account  new public record  late payment  change of address and more  the service also include dark web internet identity monitor  the ability to lock and unlock your transunion credit report  access to an identity restoration program that provide assistance in the event your identity be compromise to help you restore your identity and up to    in identity theft insurance with no deductible   certain policy limitation and exclusion may apply   
 
if you believe you may be a victim of identity theft  please call the transunion fraud response service toll free hotline at     when prompt  enter the follow  digit telephone pass code  to speak to a transunion representative about your identity theft issue  
 
you can sign up for the mytrueidentity online credit monitor anytime between now and december     due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  please note that credit monitor service might not be available for individual who do not have a credit file with transunion  experian and equifax or an address in the unite state  or it territory  and a valid social security number  or be under the age of   enroll in this service will not affect your credit score  
 
what you can do  free fraud alert information 
whether or not you enroll in credit monitor  we recommend that you place a fraud alert on your credit file  fraud alert message notify potential credit grantors to verify your identification before extend credit in your name in case someone be use your information without your consent  a fraud alert can make it more difficult for someone to get credit in your name  however  please be aware that it also may delay your ability to obtain credit  call only one of the follow three nationwide credit report company to place your fraud alert  transunion  equifax  or experian  a soon a the credit report company confirm your fraud alert  they will also forward your alert request to the other two nationwide credit report company so you do not need to contact each of them separately  the contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be  
 
equifax 
po box  
atlanta  ga  
equifax com 
   
 
transunion 
po box  
chester  pa  
transunion com fraud 
   
 
experian 
po box  
allen  tx  
experian com fraud 
   
 
free credit report information 
under federal law  you be also entitle to one free credit report once every  month from each of the above three major nationwide credit report company  call    or make a request online at annualcreditreport com  
 
even if you do not find any suspicious activity on your initial credit report  the federal trade commission  ftc  recommend that you check your credit report periodically  victim information sometimes be hold for use or share among a group of thief at different time  check your credit report periodically can help you spot problem and address them quickly  
 
if you find suspicious activity on your credit report or have reason to believe your information be be misuse  call your local law enforcement agency and file a police report  get a copy of the report  many creditor want the information it contain to absolve you of the fraudulent debt  you also should file a complaint with the federal trade commission  ftc  at identitytheft gov or at  id theft       your complaint will be add to the ftcs identity theft data clearinghouse  where it will be accessible to law enforcement for their investigation  also visit the ftcs website at ftc gov idtheft to review their free identity theft resource such a their comprehensive step by step guide identity theft   a recovery plan  
 
free credit security freeze information 
you can request a free security freeze  aka credit freeze  on your credit file by contact each of the three nationwide credit report company via the channel outline below  when a credit freeze be add to your credit report  third party  such a credit lender or other company  whose use be not exempt under law will not be able to access your credit report without your consent  a credit freeze can make it more difficult for someone to get credit in your name  however  please be aware that it also may delay your ability to obtain credit

atlanta  ga  
equifax com

chester  pa

between march     through may     and may     through may     customer information be at risk

what you can do

dear friend  
 
we be write to inform you that blackbaud  one of the league of american orchestra database vendor  recently notify u of a data security incident that may have involve your personal information  blackbaud have assure u that this breach  and third party  include law enforcement  investigation  blackbaud conclude that there be no reason to believe that any data be or will be misuse  or will be disseminate or otherwise make available publicly  
 
despite blackbauds assurance that there be a very low risk that any of your information could be misuse  the league of american orchestra take the protection and proper use of your information very seriously  we be therefore contact you to explain the incident and to provide you with additional step you can take to protect yourself  
 
what happen  
 
blackbaud  which work with many nonprofit and educational institution to support their development and donor engagement activity  recently notify u of a security incident  you may have receive a similar email about this incident from other nonprofit or university whose data blackbaud steward  at this time  we understand that blackbaud discover and stop a ransomware attack  after discover the attack  blackbauds cyber security team  together with independent forensics expert and law enforcement  expel the cybercriminal from their system  blackbaud indicate  however  that the cybercriminal do remove a copy of a backup file contain some of your information before be lock out of the system  a full description of the incident be available on blackbauds website at   
 
what information be involve  
 
the cybercriminal do not access your credit card information  bank account information  or social security number  however  blackbaud have determine that the file remove may have contain personal  that the data be or will be misuse  or that the data will be disseminate or otherwise make available publicly  
 
what blackbaud and the league be do  
 
the league be notify you out of an abundance of caution  ensure the safety of our constituent data be of the utmost importance to u  blackbaud have assure u of it commitment to prevent future cyber theft  have already implement several change to better protect your data  blackbauds team be able to quickly identify the vulnerability associate with this incident  include the tactic use by the cybercriminal  and take swift action to fix it  the company have confirm through test by multiple third party  include the appropriate platform vendor  that it fix withstand all know attack tactic  additionally  blackbaud be accelerate their effort to further harden their environment through enhancement to access management  network segmentation  deployment of additional endpoint and network base platform  
 
what you can do  
 
although we currently have no reason to believe that your information will be misuse  we encourage you to remain vigilant and promptly report any suspicious activity or suspect identity theft to u  to blackbaud  and to the proper law enforcement authority  we sincerely apologize for this incident and regret any inconvenience it may cause you  should you have any further question or concern  please do not hesitate to contact u by email at securitybreachestras org or by phone at     
 
sincerely  
 
marc martin

dear client

what happen  
 
on september     we become aware that a firm network server be use to send unauthorized email  and we swiftly engage computer expert to help determine what occur  the investigation find that the account have be access by unauthorized individual  in response  we reset the password to affect email account  turn off the know affect server  and implement additional security control to prevent further unauthorizedaccess  we be not aware of any unauthorizedaccess to the firm data or underlie system  and we be provide this notice to you a a precautionary measure  
 
what you can do  
 
you should remain vigilant for incident of fraud and identity theft by review account statement and monitor your credit report for unauthorized activity  promptly report incident of suspect identity theft or suspicious activity  if you do find any evidence of identity theft  you should let u know  and we will provide you without charge one year of identity theft protection insurance  
 
should you have question or concern regard this matter  please do not hesitate to contact u  
 
sincerely  
 
robert t  bledsoe the information provide in the data breach be likely cause by an external or malware

notice of data security incident 
 
we be write to tell you about a recent data security incident that may have result in the unauthorized acquisition of personal information be to you  we be provide this notice to you a a precautionary measure  to inform you and to explain step that you can take to protect your information  
 
what happen 
 
on august     st  paul center receive notice from a payment process vendor that our website   be a common point of purchase for some unauthorized payment card transaction and that there may have be a possible compromise of our website  we investigate to find out what happen  to prevent something like this from happen again  and to provide notice to potentially affect individual  
 
we determine that a cyber criminal install malware in software that we use to enhance our online purchase  the malware permit the unauthorized collection or scrape of certain payment card data provide through the website  we believe the incident only involve customer who make purchase or donation on the website between march     and august     on august     we determine that the incident may have involve your personal information because you make a payment card purchase or donation use our website during that time period  
 
what information be involve 
 
once we determine that there may have be unauthorized acquisition of payment card information  we review our purchase record to find out who may have be affect and where those people reside  the information may have include your name  address  email address  telephone number  and payment card number  along with the accompany cvv code  pin or expiration date  
 
what we be do about it 
 
when we discover this incident  our technical expert identify and correct the issue  effectively close the point of entry for the website malware  to help prevent a similar incident from occur in the future  we conduct an extensive internal audit to all system and have implement more stringent  ongoing process for identify and eliminate vulnerability  we be also provide notice of this incident to appropriate state regulator  consistent with our compliance obligation and responsibility  
 
what you can do 
 
we recommend that you remain vigilant to the possibility of fraud and identity theft by monitor your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  report any incident of suspect identity theft to your local law enforcement and state attorney general  if you believe your payment card information may have be compromise  you should consider contact your payment card company and or financial institution and request that the card be cancel  we strongly recommend that you review the information provide at the end of this letter  entitle more information about identity theft and way to protect yourself and state specific information  
 
for more information 
 
if you have any question or need more information  please call u  toll free  at      monday through friday  from   a m  to   p m  est  
 
we know that this situation be frustrate to you  and we deeply regret this incident  please know we take your support  and your trust  very seriously  we hope our action move forward will demonstrate this  
 
very truly yours  
 
anthony puorro  chief financial officer

what you can do  the federal trade commission  ftc  recommend that you remain vigilant by check your credit report periodically  check your credit report periodically can help you spot problem and address them quickly  you can also order free copy of your annual report through www annualcreditreport com  you should also monitor your financial account for any suspicious activity  for more information about step you can take to reduce the likelihood of identity theft or fraud  call   id theft       visit the ftcs website at www consumer ftc gov topic identity theft or www identitytheft gov  or write to  federal trade commission   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  d c    if you believe you be the victim of identity theft  you should immediately contact your local law enforcement agency  your state attorney general  or the ftc  
 
for more information  call       when call the toll free number  please provide the follow engagement number  b  we value you a a customer and pet parent  we respect your privacy right  and we sincerely regret that this incident occur  if you have any question  please feel free to contact u at      between m f  be  pm pst  sit sun  be    pm pst  when call the toll free number  please provide the follow engagement number  b

re  cedar county  iowa board of supervisor incident notification 
 
dear sir or madam  
 
mcdonald hopkins plc represent the board of supervisor for cedar county  iowa  cedar county   i be write to provide a voluntary notification of an incident at cedar county that may affect the security of personal information of approximately four hundred and ninety three    iowa resident  two hundred seventeen    of these individual be be notify under hipaa and cedar county have report to ocr  while the remainder be be notify under iowa state law  despite the fact that we be notify fewer than five hundred    iowa resident  we want to voluntarily notify you of this event in the spirit of our relationship  cedar countys investigation be ongoing  and this communication will be supplement with any new or significant fact or find subsequent to this submission  if any  
 
cedar county be the target of an email phishing campaign that result in an unauthorized individual gain access to a limit number of cedar county employee email account  upon learn of the issue  cedar county secure the account and commence a prompt and thorough investigation  a part of that investigation  cedar county have be work very closely with external cybersecurity professional experience in handle these type of incident  after an extensive forensic investigation and manual email review  cedar county discover on september    that the email account that be access between august    and december    contain personal information of the affect resident include social security number  driver license number or state id card number  financial account number  credit or debit card information  and biometric information  
 
to date  cedar county have no evidence that any of the information have be misuse  nevertheless  out of an abundance of caution  cedar county want to inform you  and the affect resident  of the incident and to explain the step it be take to help safeguard the affect resident against identity fraud  cedar county be provide the affect resident with write notification of this incident commence on or about october    in substantially the same form a the letter attach hereto  cedar county be offer the affect resident whose social security number be impact complimentary one year membership with a credit monitor service  cedar county be advise the affect resident about the process for place fraud alert and or security freeze on their credit file and obtain free credit report  the affect resident be also be provide with the contact information for the consumer report agency  the federal trade commission  and the iowa attorney general  
 
at cedar county  protect the privacy of personal information  
 
should you have any question concern this notification  please contact me at    or jgiszczakmcdonaldhopkins com  
 
thank you for your cooperation  
 
very truly yours  
 
james j  giszczak 
 
encl

we be write with important information regard a recent security incident  the privacy and security of the personal information we maintain be of the utmost importance to the cedar county board of supervisor  cedar county   a such  we want to provide you with information about the incident  explain the service we be make available to you  and let you know that we continue to take significant measure to protect your information  
 
what happen

what we be do

substitute notice of data breach 
 
dear value member of the carnival cruise line family  
 
we be write to inform you about a recent cyber event that occur on august     unauthorized third party access to portion of our information technology system be detect  and we act quickly to shut down the intrusion  restore operation  and prevent further unauthorizedaccess  we also engage a major cybersecurity firm to investigate the matter and notify law enforcement and appropriate regulator of the event  
 
while the investigation be ongoing  early indication be that in early august an unauthorized third party gain access to certain personal information  
 
work with our cybersecurity consultant  we take step to recover our file and have evidence indicate a low likelihood of the data be misuse  we be work a quickly a possible to identify the guest  employee  crew  and other individual whose information may have be impact  we expect to complete this process within the next   day and will then send notification to potentially affect individual whose current contact information be available to the company  along with those individual notice  affect individual will be offer complimentary credit monitor  a appropriate  
 
we have issue a news release  post website notice  and establish a dedicate call center to answer question regard the event  when the investigation be complete  caller may confirm whether or not their information be affect  additional information about the event be available at www carnival com  the call center be available toll free in the u s  at         a m  to  p m  eastern time  et   monday through friday  individual outside the u s  may email question to cruisedataeventcyberscout com  and request that a call center representative respond back by phone  
 
a part of our ongoing operation  we be continue to review security and privacy policy and procedure and implement change when need to enhance information security and privacy control  
 
it be always a good idea to remain vigilant against threat of identity theft or fraud  you can do this by regularly review and monitor your account statement and credit history for any sign of unauthorized transaction or activity  while we have no reason to suspect that your information be be misuse  if you ever suspect that you be the victim of identity theft or fraud  you can contact your local police  
 
for additional information about how to protect yourself  please visit the resource provide for australian  canadian  u k   and u s  resident in the appendix below  
 
if you have any question or concern  please contact u at the u s  toll free number      between the hour of  a m  to  p m  eastern time  et   monday through friday  individual outside the u s  may email question to cruisedataeventcyberscout com  a well a request that a call center representative respond back by phone  
 
sincerely  
 
jennifer garone 
director  data privacy

dear   first name     middle name     last name     suffix    
 
at georgia southern university  we understand the importance of protect and secure the personal information we maintain  we be write to notify you of a security incident experience by one of our vendor  blackbaud  this notice explain the incident  measure we and blackbaud have take  and some step you can take in response  
 
what happen

upon learn of the incident from blackbaud  we conduct our own investigation of the blackbaud service we use and the information provide by blackbaud to determine what information be involve in the incident  on september     we determine that the backup file contain certain information pertain to you  
 
what information be involve  
 
the backup file involve contain your name  social security number  and donor profile in field that may have be viewable to the unauthorized person  blackbaud have assure u that the backup file have be destroy by the unauthorized individual and there be no reason to believe any data be or will be misuse or will be disseminate or otherwise make available publicly

visit  to activate and take advantage of your identity monitor service

membership number    member id   
 
what we be do

for more information

additional step you can take

identity theft restoration
