content of data breach 
 
terminix and our former affiliate  servicemaster  take the privacy and security of your personal information very seriously  and we strive to maintain transparency in how we handle your data  it be for this reason we be reach out today  
 
what happen  
 
on september th  the company discover that a teammate have respond to a phishing scam  which allow hacker to gain access to the teammate office  account and cause the teammate email to be auto forward from the teammate inbox to an external email account control by the hacker  the auto forward begin on september th and continue until september nd  please note that this breach involve a hack into office  at the cloud level and there be no malware or malicious software that infect the company internal system  
 
what information be involve  
 
our review of compromise email reveal that one email include a file which contain the name  social security number  date of birth  employment date  k balance  and the name of our k provider for   current and former teammate across the unite state  due to the sensitive nature of this information  it be possible that thief can use it for identity theft  we do not know if the information have be use at this time  we be send this notice to both terminix and servicemaster teammate because these event take place before the completion of the sale of servicemaster brand  when everyone receive this notice be employ under the servicemaster global hold brand  
 
what we be do  
 
we have take and continue to take a number of action in response to the breach incident  we be communicate to our teammate to be sure everyone be especially diligent regard any potential scam a we continue to fight the battle with these criminal from repeat phishing attack  we be require teammate to complete the annual security awareness training  and we have issue specialize training to particularly high risk group to help them recognize extremely sophisticate phishing attempt  we be work with law enforcement agency to investigate this cybercrime and be notify state authority a well  weve notify the provider of our k plan and the major credit agency  we be continue to monitor the security of our system and reinforce message relate to the importance of abide by proper security and data handle measure  
 
what you can do  
 
while we currently have no reason to believe any personal information have be misuse  for your protection  we have arrange to provide identity theft protection service through id expert  the data breach and recovery service expert at no cost to you for two year  myidcare service include two year of credit and cyberscan monitor  a    insurance reimbursement policy  and fully manage id theft recovery service  with this protection  myidcare will help you resolve issue if your identity be compromise

step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant and review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you should also promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  the ftc   
 
copy of credit report  you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free     or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can also contact one of the follow three national credit report agency  
 
equifax

atlanta  ga  
    
www equifax com 
 
experian 
p o  box  
allen  tx  
    
www experian com 
 
transunion 
p o  box  
chester  pa  
    
www transunion com 
 
fraud alert  you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least  day  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  there be no charge to place  lift  or remove the security freeze  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement  or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc  or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state  contact information for the ftc be  federal trade commission   pennsylvania ave  nw  washington  dc   www consumer ftc gov or www ftc gov idtheft       resident of new york  maryland  north carolina  and rhode island can obtain more information from their attorney general use the contact information below

what you can do  free fraud alert information

free credit report information 
 
under federal law  you be also entitle to one free credit report once every  month from each of the above three major nationwide credit report company  call    or make a request online at annualcreditreport com  
 
even if you do not find any suspicious activity on your initial credit report  the federal trade commission  ftc  recommend that you check your credit report periodically  victim information sometimes be hold for use or share among a group of thief at different time  check your credit report periodically can help you spot problem and address them quickly  
 
if you find suspicious activity on your credit report or have reason to believe your information be be misuse  call your local law enforcement agency and file a police report  get a copy of the report  many creditor want the information it contain to absolve you of the fraudulent debt  you also should file a complaint with the federal trade commission  ftc  at identitytheft gov or at  id theft       your complaint will be add to the ftcs identity theft data clearinghouse  where it will be accessible to law enforcement for their investigation  also visit the ftcs website at ftc gov idtheft to review their free identity theft resource such a their comprehensive step by step guide identity theft   a recovery plan

on september     sam club learn that in the previous week  an unauthorized party use certain member login credential  email address and password  to access their sam club account  base on the company investigation  sam club believe the credential the unauthorized party use be steal from source unrelated to sam club and be not obtain from sam club  the unauthorized party use these steal credential to conduct fraudulent transaction involve certain member sam club cash reward  
 
in addition to the login credential that be steal from source outside of the sam club environment  the unauthorized party may have access certain information in member account  include name  phone number  postal address  sam club online membership id  membership type  cash reward  balance  amount earn and spend   and membership expiration date  
 
sam club contact law enforcement and promptly take a number of step to protect potentially affect member  within a day of detect the issue  the company send email to these member indicate that sam club have reset their online password due to suspicious activity on their account  the company be issue a new sam club membership number to certain affect member  in addition  sam club have implement certain fraud defense measure with respect to cash reward balance  include place a temporary hold on any cash reward currently in certain member account  the company continue to monitor for suspicious activity and have encourage affect member to change their password for other online account  e g   email  bank or social media  if they use login credential similar to those that they use for their sam club membership account  
 
there be approximately   iowa resident whose cash reward account be affect by this issue  enclose for your reference be a draft copy of the notification letter be mail to these individual  and sam club have arrange to offer them complimentary identity protection and credit monitor service

dear parent  
 
mount diablo unify school district  the district  be commit to protect the confidentiality and security of our student information  and that of our parent  we be write to address a recent incident that may have involve your data  this notice explain the incident  protective measure we have take  and step you can take in response  
 
what happen  
 
on monday  september     the district be inform that when certain parent be use the schoolmessenger mobile application  they be able to view a list of roughly thirty    unique name  email  and phone number not associate with their family  after initial verification of the incident  our district immediately contact intrado  which be the parent company for schoolmessenger  to shut down all parent access to the schoolmessenger application  in addition  together with intrado  the district be work to investigate the specific about what take place and how it can be prevent in the future  
 
what information be involve  
 
intrado have notify the district that due to their code error  the schoolmessenger application randomly disclose other parent and student contact information  name  email  and phone number  to parent access their application  
 
what be we do  
 
we at mt  diablo unify school district take our responsibility of safeguard the confidentiality and security of student and parent information very seriously  for that reason  we immediately require intrado to shut down the schoolmessenger application  pending resolution of the code error  and further investigation  
 
what can you do  
 
even though we have no evidence that your personal contact information have be misuse or be inadvertently release by schoolmessenger  we want to let you know this incident happen and that we take it very seriously  we will take all step to ensure student data be always protect and safeguard by our third party provider  thus  the schoolmessenger application will remain shut until a the district assess it overall security  and consider alternative  we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you  if you have any question  please call      x  or email u at breachconcernsmdusd org  
 
respectfully  
the office of the superintendent on behalf of the technology   information service department

fraud alert  
 
you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least  day  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any new account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three national credit report agency use the contact information list above  additional information be available at   
 
credit and security freeze  
 
you may have the right to place a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  so that no new credit can be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a credit freeze be design to prevent potential credit grantors from access your credit report without your consent  if you place a credit freeze  potential creditor and other third party will not be able to get access to your credit report unless you temporarily lift the freeze  therefore  use a credit freeze may delay your ability to obtain credit  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a credit freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  since the instruction for how to establish a credit freeze differ from state to state  please contact the three major credit report company use the contact information above

notice of security incident 
 
dear   first name     middle name     last name     suffix    
 
we be write to inform you that ascend clinical  a clinical reference laboratory specialize in test service for kidney disease  experience a data security incident that may have expose some of your personal information  a a patient who have receive laboratory test service from ascend  we be contact you directly to explain the circumstance of the incident  although we have not receive any indication that the information have be use by any unauthorized individual  
 
what happen  
 
on or about may     ascend detect irregularity in it data system  include some ascend data that have become encrypt through an unknown source  upon a thorough investigation  ascend determine that an unauthorized user have access and download ascend business record  include some personally identifiable information  pii  of ascend patient  under a federal law know a the health insurance portability and accountability act  hipaa   this pii be consider protect health information  phi   ascend have notify federal and local law enforcement authority and retain a lead third party cybersecurity firm to investigate the nature and scope of the incident  ascend be also in the process of notify state and federal agency responsible for enforce privacy law  a require by law  
 
what information be involve  
 
the individual behind the data security incident gain access to and download file contain pii and phi  at no time do the unauthorized user access ascend electronic health record  where the majority of ascend phi be store  the information that may have be compromise include your name and address  and may also include medical diagnosis  medical condition  medical record number  medication  medication dosage  and or your social security number  please note that this incident do not impact the accuracy of your test result in any way  
 
what we be do  
 
ascend internal team work diligently with forensic consultant to restore and secure the impact system  this include the installation of forensic tool on all system and the isolation of impact system until ascend could confirm that they be secure  ascend also implement countermeasure and further upgrade it security system to prevent future incident such a this from occur  ascend have secure the service of kroll to provide identity monitor at no cost to you for one year  kroll be a global leader in risk mitigation and response  and their team have extensive experience help people who have sustain an unintended with this letter

contact information for the three nationwide credit report agency

free credit report  
 
it be recommend that you remain vigilant by review account statement and monitor your credit report for unauthorized activity  especially activity that may indicate fraud and identity theft  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  to order your annual free credit report please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      you can also order your annual free credit report by mail a complete annual credit report request form  available from the u s  federal trade commission  ftc  website at www consumer ftc gov  to  annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga    
 
for colorado  georgia  maine  maryland  massachusetts  new jersey  puerto rico  and vermont resident  
 
you may obtain one or more  depend on the state  additional copy of your credit report  free of charge  you must contact each of the credit report agency directly to obtain such additional report s   
 
fraud alert  
 
there be two type of fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for at least one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft and you have the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  you can place a fraud alert on your credit report by contact any of the three national credit report agency  
 
security freeze  
 
you have the ability to place a security freeze  also know a a credit freeze  on your credit report free of charge  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you may use an online process  an automate telephone line  or submit a write request to any of the three credit report agency list above  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that  if you be request a credit report for your spouse  this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past  year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible and display your name  current mail address  and the date of issue  
 
federal trade commission and state attorney general office  
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your home state  you may also contact these agency for information on how to prevent or minimize the risk of identity theft

we be write to inform you that we recently become aware of a cyber attack target the email account of an individual associate with our production company    company     we believe that your personal information be involve in the incident  this notice provide important information regard what happen  what information may have be affect  what measure we be take  and what you can do in response  
 
what happen  the cyber attack involve the unauthorizedaccess of an email account of an individual associate with   company     we become aware of this incident on september     when we be notify that an unauthorized entity successfully send several spam email from the affect email account to various email address unfamiliar to the account holder  since this unauthorized entity have access to the account holder mailbox  it be possible that data contain within the mailbox may have be acquire and disclose to others  upon become aware of this incident  we take immediate action to secure the account and investigate the incident  a a result of the investigation  we determine that there be unauthorizedaccess to the email account from september     to september     when the account be lock  the affect email account contain information about some of the individual with whom we have a business relationship  include you  
 
what information be involve  although we be still investigate the incident  our current understand be that your affect personal information include one or more of the follow  your social security number  government issue identification information  such a a driver license number  passport number  or tax identification number   date of birth  financial account information  such a a bank account number or payment card number   and health information  
 
what we be do  a soon a we learn of the cyber attack  we take immediate step to secure the email account and launch an investigation  we be also review and update our security practice  in addition  we be provide you with a subscription to credit monitor and identity theft protection service  a describe below

notice of data breach 
 
at trinity health  safety be a top priority include the safety of our patient and donor personal information of donor and certain patient  
 
what happen  
 
on july     blackbaud notify trinity health and other customer of a cyber attack involve blackbauds network  include ransomware  that impact certain donor database backup file maintain by blackbaud  include trinity health donor database  blackbaud report the cyberattack occur between april      may     blackbaud report that base on it investigation  the cybercriminals responsible for the attack could have obtain access to various type of information in the client backup file  
 
what we be do  
 
upon receive this notice  trinity health take immediate step to begin it own investigation to determine what  if any  sensitive trinity health data be potentially impact  please note that this attack do not occur within the information system of trinity health or any affiliate ministry  unfortunately  a sophisticate attack against blackbaud circumvent blackbauds security measure protect the information in their care lead to this incident  trinity health and it affiliate ministry take security of your information seriously and make significant investment in the protection of your information to reduce this type of event from occur  trinity and it affiliate ministry be work with blackbaud to keep this type of event from occur again  
 
what information be involve  
 
our forensic investigation determine that some data field be encrypt and would not be accessible to the cybercriminals  other field be not encrypt and could have be accessible to the cybercriminals include information such a  donor relation to patient  patient discharge status  patient insurance and patient department of service  this database information span from  to   
 
your personally identifiable information and protect health information data element that could have be expose in the cyberattack be  full name  address  phone number  email    bb text  impacteddata      
 
why be patient information in the database  
 
limit patient information be include for the purpose of the trinity health grateful patient program consistent with the permit use of limit patient information for fund raise under hipaa  
 
how do blackbaud secure the data  
 
blackbaud report that they quickly lock out the cybercriminals and resolve the issue  additional detail about the security incident be available by visit blackbauds website at  which include information about blackbauds step to ensure this issue do not happen again  we continue to work with blackbaud on the measure they be take to further secure the information in their care  
 
we deeply regret that this incident occur and apologize for any concern or inconvenience you may experience from this notification

monitor account 
 
trinity health encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review your account statement  and to monitor your credit report for suspicious activity  under u s  law you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also contact the three major credit bureau directly to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below  
 
experian po box  allen  tx      www experian com freeze center html 
transunion p o  box  woodlyn  pa      www transunion com credit freeze 
equifax po box  atlanta  ga       www equifax com personal credit report service 
 
in order to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  your full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  if you have move in the past five    year  provide the address where you have live over the prior five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    
  if you be a victim of identity theft  include a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft  
 
a an alternative to a security freeze  you have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on your file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the agency list below

dear recipient  
 
we be write to notify you that we and many other institution be recently notify by blackbaud that it experience a security incident  this notice explain the incident and measure take in response  
 
what happen  
 
blackbaud be a cloud base software company that provide service to thousand of school  hospital  and other nonprofit  on july     blackbaud notify u that it have discover a ransomware attack on blackbauds network in may   blackbaud report that it conduct an investigation  determine that backup file contain information from it client have be take from it network  and an attempt be make to encrypt file to convince blackbaud to pay a ransom  blackbaud pay a ransom and obtain confirmation that the file remove from it network have be destroy  blackbaud report that it have be work with law enforcement  
 
upon learn of the incident from blackbaud  we conduct our own investigation of the blackbaud service we use and the information provide by blackbaud to determine what information be involve in the incident  on august     we determine that the backup file contain certain information pertain to you  
 
what information be involve  
 
the backup file involve contain your name and indicate the breast cancer diagnosis that you have provide to u  blackbaud have assure u that the backup file have be destroy by the unauthorized individual and there be no reason to believe any data be or will be misuse  disseminate  or otherwise make available publicly  
 
what you can do  
 
even though there be no evidence that your personal information provide in the follow page  
 
what we be do  
 
we be notify you of this incident and share the step that we  and blackbaud  be take in response  blackbaud have inform u that they identify and fix the vulnerability associate with this incident  implement several change that will better protect your data from any subsequent incident  and be undertake additional effort to harden their environment through enhancement to access management  network segmentation  and deployment of additional endpoint and network base security monitor  
 
for more information

security freeze  
 
under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement

fraud alert  
 
there be two type of fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for at least one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft and you have the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  you can place a fraud alert on your credit report by contact any of the three national credit report agency  
 
security freeze  
 
you have the ability to place a security freeze  also know a a credit freeze  on your credit report free of charge  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you may use an online process  an automate telephone line  or submit a write request to any of the three credit report agency list above  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that  if you be request a credit report for your spouse  this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past  year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible and display your name  current mail address  and the date of issue  
 
federal trade commission and state attorney general office  
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your home state  you may also contact these agency for information on how to prevent or minimize the risk of identity theft  
 
you may contact the federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc   www ftc gov bcp edu microsites idtheft     idtheft      
 
for maryland resident  you may contact the maryland office of the attorney general  consumer protection division   st  paul place  baltimore  md   www oag state md u       
 
for north carolina resident  you may contact the north carolina office of the attorney general  consumer protection division   mail service center  raleigh  nc    www ncdoj gov       
 
for new york resident  the attorney general may be contact at  office of the attorney general  the capitol  albany  ny           
 
for connecticut resident  you may contact the connecticut office of the attorney general   capitol avenue  hartford  ct        www ct gov ag  
 
for massachusetts resident  you may contact the office of the massachusetts attorney general   ashburton place  boston  ma        www mass gov ago contact u html 
 
report of identity theft and obtain a police report  
 
for iowa resident  you be advise to report any suspect identity theft to law enforcement or to the iowa attorney general  
 
for massachusetts resident  you have the right to obtain a police report if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
for oregon resident  you be advise to report any suspect identity theft to law enforcement  the federal trade commission  and the oregon attorney general  the breach be classify under the health insurance portability and accountability act  hipaa  a protect health information  phi

you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below

free credit report information 
 
under federal law  you be also entitle to one free credit report once every  month from each of the above three major nationwide credit report company  call    or make a request online at annualcreditreport com  
 
even if you do not find any suspicious activity on your initial credit report  the federal trade commission  ftc  recommend that you check your credit report periodically  victim information sometimes be hold for use or share among a group of thief at different time  check your credit report periodically can help you spot problem and address them quickly  
 
if you find suspicious activity on your credit report or have reason to believe your information be be misuse  call your local law enforcement agency and file a police report  get a copy of the report  many creditor want the information it contain to absolve you of the fraudulent debt  you also should file a complaint with the federal trade commission  ftc  at identitytheft gov or at  id theft       your complaint will be add to the ftcs identity theft data clearinghouse  where it will be accessible to law enforcement for their investigation  also visit the ftcs website at ftc gov idtheft to review their free identity theft resource such a their comprehensive step by step guide identity theft   a recovery plan  
 
free credit security freeze information 
 
you can request a free security freeze  aka credit freeze  on your credit file by contact each of the three nationwide credit report company via the channel outline below  when a credit freeze be add to your credit report  third party  such a credit lender or other company  whose use be not exempt under law will not be able to access your credit report without your consent  a credit freeze can make it more difficult for someone to get credit in your name  however  please be aware that it also may delay your ability to obtain credit

content of data breach notification letter  additional step you can take 
 
we remind you that it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud   an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  if you opt for a temporary lift because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit bureau  the letter do not provide clear information about how the breach more accurately

re  notice of data breach 
 
dear   first name     
 
this letter be to notify you that la tax service  llp  la tax service  be the victim of a data security incident that might have result in unauthorizedaccess to some of your personal information very seriously  we regret any inconvenience this may cause  this letter contain information about what happen  step we have take  and resource we be make available to you to help protect your identity  
 
what happen  
 
on september     we be notify by lacerte intuit  our tax software  that some tax return pertain to our client be fraudulently file  to date  we be aware of approximately  tax return fraudulently file  if your tax return be among these  tax return  we already notify you  upon receipt of lacerte intuit notification  we promptly engage a specialize cybersecurity firm to conduct a forensic investigation to determine the nature and scope of the incident  the forensic investigation be complete on october     reveal that tax return of our client be potentially expose to an unauthorized third party in june  and september   after an internal investigation conclude on october     we determine that you be among the individual potentially impact by the incident  
 
what information be involve  
 
base on the investigation  it appear the expose information may include the information present on your tax return  such a your name  address  taxpayer information  and social security number  out of an abundance of caution  we want to inform you of this incident  
 
what we be do  
 
we take the privacy and security of your information very seriously  upon discovery of this incident  we immediately change all computer password and improve our computer security setting by enable of a two factor authentication for our email  we also install the webroot anti virus on all our workstation for centralize management  remove user from be local admin of computer  create an ad user that have local admin to avoid login to computer and cache credential during software installation   additionally  we be upgrade our email license to include spam filter  update firewall  and anti virus  at this time we be not aware of your information be use in an unauthorized manner  but out of an abundance of caution  we want to make you aware of this matter and offer resource to help you protect your information  
 
to enroll  please call      
or visit    
enrollment code    xxxxxxxx   
 
what you can do  
 
we be offer identity theft protection service through idx  the data breach minor receive a separate letter with an individual code to activate the above list service  you can also obtain an identity protection pin  ip pin  with the irs by follow the instruction at this link    
 
for more information  
 
we sincerely regret any inconvenience that this incident may cause you and remain dedicate to protect your personal information  should you have any question or concern about this incident  please contact     between   a m  and   p m  eastern standard time for more information  
 
sincerely  
 
esther eisenstein  cpa 
aaron rubenstein  ea

step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
copy of credit report  
you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free     or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you also can contact one of the follow three national credit report agency  
 
transunion 
p o  box  
chester  pa  
    
www transunion com

p o  box  
allen  tx  
    
www experian com 
 
equifax 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
    
www equifax com 
 
free annual report 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
    
annualcreditreport com 
 
fraud alert  
you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least  day  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze  
under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc  or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state  
 
federal trade commission 
 pennsylvania ave  nw 
washington  dc  
consumer ftc gov  and www ftc gov idtheft

important security notification  please read this entire letter  
 
dear   name     
 
i be write to inform you of a data security incident experience by imperial community college district  iccd  that may have involve your personal information a describe below  iccd take the privacy and security of your information very seriously  while we have no evidence to suggest that any of the impact information be view or misuse during this compromise  it be crucial that we be a supportive and transparent a possible  consequently  below you will find information about step that can be take to help protect your information  include complimentary credit monitor service that we be offer you through transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  i sincerely apologize for any concern that this incident may cause you  let me reassure you that iccd be fully commit to support you  
 
what happen  
 
on august     iccd become aware of a potential compromise on our computer network  upon discovery  iccd swiftly engage a third party forensic company to investigate and we dedicate all of our it and engineer resource to resolve the problem  follow progress by expert in their thorough investigation  it be ultimately determine that  on august     the administrative account of one employee be hack and compromise by an unknown source  which allow unauthorizedaccess onto iccds computer network  upon confirmation of this unauthorizedaccess  iccds third party forensic expert immediately investigate whether the affect database contain individual sensitive information  on october     after a thorough investigation  iccd learn that the unauthorizedaccess may have enable access to individual personal information and resource  we take great care in the security of our technology system  and regret that this incident have occur  
 
what information be involve  
 
it be important to note  a mention above  that there be no evidence to suggest that any personal information that could have be view by the unauthorized individual s  may have include your first and last name  in combination with your social security number  tax identification number  financial account information  health information  and or a username and password  
 
what we be do  
 
iccd have take every step necessary to address the incident and be commit to fully protect all of the information that you have entrust to u  unfortunately  network intrusion have become more common and this incident experience by iccd be similar to others experience by other school  company  and industry  upon learn of this incident  we immediately secure the affect account  reset password  and take step to enhance the security of all information to help prevent similar incident from occur in the future  we retain a third party forensic firm to conduct a thorough investigation and be offer you complimentary credit monitor and identity protection service  
 
credit monitor  
 
a a safeguard  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for twelve    month provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  additional information regard how to enroll in the complimentary credit monitor service be enclose  
 
what you can do  
 
in addition to enroll in the complimentary credit monitor service detail within  we recommend that you remain vigilant in regularly review and monitor all of your account statement and credit history to guard against any unauthorized transaction or activity  if you discover any suspicious or unusual activity on your account  please promptly contact your financial institution or company  additionally  please report any suspicious incident to local law enforcement and or your state attorney general  we have provide additional information below  which contain more information about step you can take to protect yourself against fraud and identity theft  
 
for more information  
 
should you have question or concern regard this matter  please do not hesitate to contact u at    between   a m  and   p m  pacific time  monday through friday  
 
imperial community college district have no relationship more important or more meaningful than the one we share with you  i want to personally express my deepest regret for any worry or inconvenience that this incident may cause you  
 
sincerely  
 
martha o  garcia  ed d

content of data breach notification letter  dear recipient  
 
we be write to inform you of a data security incident that occur at blackbaud  a third party vendor that provide software and service for fundraise and alumnus donor engagement effort at non profit and university worldwide  include stetson university  
 
on july     blackbaud notify stetson university of a ransomware attack on their internal system  we immediately launch an investigation with the help of external cybersecurity professional  blackbaud report that they identify an attempt ransomware attack on may     and engage forensic expert and law enforcement to assist in their internal investigation  the investigation conclude that the cybercriminal intermittently remove data from blackbauds system between february     and may     the cybercriminal remove a backup file contain certain information  which blackbaud pay to have permanently destroy  
 
we discover on september     that the compromise file may have contain your information  blackbaud have state that their team be able to quickly identify the vulnerability associate with this incident and take action to fix it  they have confirm through test by multiple third party  include the appropriate platform vendor  that their fix withstand all know attack tactic  additionally  they be accelerate their effort to further harden their environment through enhancement to access management  network segmentation  deployment of additional endpoint and network base platform  
 
while there be no evidence to believe that any data will be misuse  disseminate  or otherwise make publicly available  we want to make you aware of the incident out of an abundance of caution  to protect you from potential misuse of your information  we be offer a complimentary one year membership of experian identityworks credit b  this product help detect possible misuse of your personal information and provide you with identity protection service focus on immediate identification and resolution of identity theft  identityworks credit b be completely free to you  and enroll in this program will not hurt your credit score  
 
for more information on identity theft prevention and identityworks credit b  include instruction on how to activate your complimentary one year membership  please see the additional information provide in this letter  this letter also provide other precautionary measure you can take to protect your personally  you should always remain vigilant in review your account statement for fraudulent or irregular activity on a regular basis  
 
we apologize for this incident and regret any inconvenience it may cause you  if you have any further question regard this incident  please call our dedicate and confidential toll free response line at phone number  the response line be staff with professional familiar with this incident and knowledgeable on what you can do to protect against misuse of your information

woodland unify school district  woodland  be write to notify you of an event that may affect the security of some of your personal information  we take the protection and proper use of this information very seriously  and it be important to u that you be make aware of this event  
 
what happen

what information be involve  
 
our investigation in this matter confirm that our aeries sister contain your name  physical address  email address  aeries sister username  and password in hash form  
 
what be we do  
 
information privacy and security be among our highest priority  woodland have strict measure in place to protect information in our care  upon learn of this incident  we take step to determine the content of our aeries sister which be affect by the aeries incident and identify any potentially impact individual  we be also work with aeries to confirm action they be take and measure they be put in place to prevent the reoccurrence of the november  event  additionally  we have report this incident to state regulator  a require

step you can take to protect your information 
 
monitor your account 
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review your account statement  and to monitor your credit report for suspicious activity  under u s  law  you be entitle to one    free credit report annually from each of the three    major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also contact the three    major credit bureau list below directly to request a free copy of your credit report  you may wish to stagger your request so that you receive a free report by one of the three credit bureau every four month  
 
you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below  
 
experian 
p o  box  
allen  tx  
    
www experian com freeze center html 
 
transunion 
p o  box  
woodlyn  pa  
    
www transunion com credit freeze 
 
equifax 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga   
    
www equifax com personal credit report service 
 
a an alternative to a security freeze  you have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on your file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a one year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven    year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the agency list below

additional information 
 
you can further educate yourself regard identity theft  fraud alert  security freeze  and the step you can take to protect yourself by contact the consumer report agency  the federal trade commission  or your state attorney general  the federal trade commission can be reach at   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc   www identitytheft gov    id theft        and tty       the federal trade commission also encourage those who discover that their information have be misuse to file a complaint with them  you can obtain further information on how to file such a complaint by way of the contact information list above  you have the right to file a police report if you ever experience identity theft or fraud  please note that in order to file a report with law enforcement for identity theft  you will likely need to provide some proof that you have be a victim  instance of know or suspect identity theft should also be report to law enforcement and your state attorney general  this notice have not be delay by law enforcement  
 
for maryland resident  the attorney general may be contact at   st  paul place  th floor  baltimore  md        or www oag state md u  for new mexico resident  you have right pursuant to the fair credit report act  such a the right to be tell if information in your credit file have be use against you  the right to know what be in your credit file  the right to ask for your credit score  and the right to dispute incomplete or inaccurate information  further  pursuant to the fair credit report act  the consumer report agency must correct or delete inaccurate  incomplete  or unverifiable information  consumer report agency may not report outdated negative information  access to your file be limit  you must give your consent for credit report to be provide to employer  you may limit prescreened offer of credit and insurance you get base on information in your credit report  and you may seek damage from violator  you may have additional right under the fair credit report act not summarize here

notice of data breach 
 
dear xxx  
 
at methodist hospital of southern california  mhsc   we take our responsibility to maintain the privacy and security of our patient personal information very seriously  this commitment include notify our patient if we believe their information have potentially be subject to disclosure  this letter be to provide you with such notice  
 
what happen  
 
the methodist hospital foundation  the foundation  be a nonprofit corporation that be organize to fund charitable fund for the benefit of mhsc  
 
in accordance with our policy and procedure  and a describe in our notice of privacy practice provide to our patient  mhsc provide limit information about our patient to the foundation  which contract with blackbaud inc   a well respect provider of cloud and data service for charitable organization  
 
on september     we be notify by the foundation that blackbaud discover and stop a ransomware attack that include the foundation donor database  a well a those of many other nonprofit organization  the ransomware attack occur between february and may   but blackbaud and the foundation take time to determine which organization be impact before we be notify of the attack  
 
in it investigation  blackbaud state that it cybersecurity team  together with independent forensics expert and law enforcement  successfully prevent the cybercriminal from block blackbauds system access  blackbaud ultimately expel the cybercriminal from it system  prior to lock the cybercriminal out  however  the cybercriminal remove a copy of a backup file contain some of the information about you  
 
blackbaud state that they pay the ransom and receive confirmation that the cybercriminal have destroy the copy of the data remove from the system  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information we have provide to the foundation  which be copy and  presumably  destroy by the cybercriminal may have include your  
 
  full name 
  contact information  such a telephone number  email address  and mail address 
  demographic information  such a date of birth and sex 
  medical record number and possibly admission date 
 
we have not provide other health information  such a insurance information or social security number  to the foundation  
 
base on the nature of the incident  blackbauds research  and third party  include law enforcement  investigation  blackbaud have assure u that it have no reason to believe that any data go beyond this cybercriminal or be disseminate or otherwise make available publicly  blackbaud further state that they have take additional step to ensure that the backup file be permanently delete  
 
what we be do 
 
blackbaud have take several step in response to this incident  a part of it ongoing effort to help avoid an event like this from happen in the future  blackbaud have inform u that it have implement change to help protect it system from any future incident  since learn of the issue  blackbaud identify the vulnerability associate with this incident  include the tactic use by the cybercriminal  and have take action to fix it  additionally  blackbaud be accelerate it effort to further improve it system through enhancement to access management  network segmentation  and other network base platform  a an additional safety measure  blackbaud have indicate that it have hire a third party team of expert to monitor the dark web for any further misuse of the data  
 
in response to blackbauds notification  mhsc initiate a full investigation once the incident be identify and have take the necessary step to prevent a similar event from occur again  include review and minimize the sensitive data element that be provide to the foundation and or blackbaud  in addition  we have report this incident to the california department of public health  
 
what you can do 
 
i want to emphasize again that blackbaud have assure u that no social security number  credit card  bank account  or other information of that nature be compromise  however  we recommend you remain attentive by review your account statement and credit report closely and report any suspicious activity  
 
we also want to make you aware of some precaution you can take to protect yourself against the possibility of become a victim of identity theft  please see the enclosure to learn more about these precaution and service  
 
i hope this letter provide some assurance regard this incident and that you will accept our sincere apology for any undue concern you have experience a a result of this event  please feel free to contact me at    if you have any question or concern that i may not have address  
 
we look forward to be able to serve you better in the future  
 
sincerely  
 
cari toneck  vp  ccro 
chief compliance risk officer 
methodist hospital of southern california 
 
step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity 
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and monitor free credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  from whom you may be able to obtain a police report   
 
we also recommend that you regularly review the explanation of benefit statement that you receive from your insurer  if you see any service that you believe you do not receive  please contact your insurer at the number on the statement  you may also want to check for any medical bill that you do not recognize  
 
keep a copy of this notice for your record in case of future problem with your medical record  you may also want to request a copy of your medical record from your provider  to serve a a baseline  
 
if you be a california resident  we suggest that you visit the website of the california office of privacy protection at www privacy ca gov to find more information about your medical privacy  
 
copy of credit report 
 
you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by contact one of the follow entity  
 
transunion 
p o  box  
chester  pa  
    
www transunion com 
 
experian 
p o  box  
allen  tx  
    
www experian com 
 
equifax 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
    
www equifax com 
 
free annual report 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
    
annualcreditreport com 
 
fraud alert 
 
you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least  day  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  
 
security freeze 
 
in some u state  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  if you request a security freeze from a consumer report agency  there may be a fee up to  to place  lift  or remove the security freeze  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you  include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement  or insurance statement  
 
additional resource on identity theft 
 
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  federal trade commission  or from your respective state attorney general about step you can take toward prevent identity theft  include information about how to establish fraud alert or a security freeze on your credit file  you may also report suspect identity theft to the federal trade commission or to the attorney general in your state  
 
federal trade commission 
 pennsylvania ave  nw 
washington  dc  
consumer ftc gov

content of data breach 
 
on behalf of amtrak  i be write to inform you about a recent incident that potentially affect some of your personal information  amtrak have address the situation and engage outside cybersecurity expert to assist with it response  while i be glad the issue be now resolve  i sincerely apologize for any concern and inconvenience it could cause  
 
what happen 
 
on july     amtrak detect that an unknown third party may have gain unauthorizedaccess to certain amtrak guest reward account  your account be not among these account  however  in respond  our security team identify some suspicious activity relate to other reward account include your account  we reset the password for potentially affect account and implement additional safeguard  
 
what information be involve 
 
we have determine that compromise usernames and password be use to access certain account and some personal information may have be view  no financial data  credit card information or social security number be compromise  
 
what we be do 
 
amtrak take this matter very seriously and be take step to help prevent incident like this from happen again  to help protect your identity  we be offer a complimentary one year membership of experians identityworkssm at no charge to you  this product provide you with superior identity detection and resolution of identity theft  to activate your membership and start monitor your personal information please follow the step below  
 
ensure that you enroll by      your code will not work after this date   
visit the experian identityworks website to enroll    
provide your activation code  
if you have question about the product  need assistance with identity restoration or would like an alternative to enroll in experian identityworks online  please contact experians customer care team at    by     be prepare to provide engagement number db a proof of eligibility for the identity restoration service by experian  
 
additional detail regard your  month experian identityworks membership  
 
a credit card be not require for enrollment in experian identityworks  you can contact experian immediately regard any fraud issue  and have access to the follow feature once you enroll in experian identityworks  
 
experian credit report at signup  see what information be associate with your credit file  daily credit report be available for online member only   
credit monitor  actively monitor experian file for indicator of fraud  
identity restoration  identity restoration agent be immediately available to help you address credit and non credit relate fraud  
experian identityworks extendcaretm  you receive the same high level of identity restoration support even after your experian identityworks membership have expire  
up to  million identity theft insurance    provide coverage for certain cost and unauthorized electronic fund transfer  
 
if you believe there be fraudulent use of your information and would like to discuss how you may be able to resolve those issue  please reach out to an experian agent at     if  after discuss your situation with an agent  it be determine that identity restoration support be need  then an experian identity restoration agent be available to work with you to investigate and resolve each incident of fraud that occur  include  a appropriate  help you with contact credit grantors to dispute charge and close account  assist you in place a freeze on your credit file with the three major credit bureau  and assist you with contact government agency to help restore your identity to it proper condition   
 
please note that this identity restoration support be available to you for one year from the date of this letter and do not require any action on your part at this time  the term and condition for this offer be locate at www experianidworks com restoration  you will also find self help tip and information about identity protection at this site  
 
what you can do 
 
while we have no indication that your information be misuse in any way  you should always remain vigilant for incident of fraud and identity theft by regularly review your account statement and monitor your free credit report  if you discover any suspicious or unusual activity on your account or suspect identity theft or fraud  report it immediately to your financial institution  in addition  you the content of the data breach remain vague and inconclusive

dear customer name  
 
at u s  bank  we value your confidence in u and place the privacy and security of your information a a top priority  we be write to let you know about an event that occur at a u s  bank location  which include some of your personal information  
 
what happen  
 
on july     a computer server contain your information be physically steal from one of our corporate office  since the event  we have be focus on identify who may have be impact and work with authority to recover the steal server  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information on the server include personally identifiable information include your name  account number  and social security number  at this time  we be not aware of the information be use fraudulently against you or your account  
 
what be we do  
 
we apologize for any inconvenience this have cause  a a precautionary measure  if you would like to receive a new account number  you can do so by call our fraud liaison center at    between  a m  to  p m  ct  monday through sunday  we can help you close and reopen your account with a new account number at no charge  
 
we also want to inform you of some step we have take to protect you and some additional step you can take to help protect yourself  
 
free credit monitor and identity restoration service 
 
to help you protect your identity  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for two year provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  
 
to enroll in this service  go to the mytrueidentity website at mytrueidentity com and in the space reference a enter activation code  enter the follow  letter activation code and follow the three step to receive your credit monitor service online within minute  
 
unique activation code    tu code   
 
once you be enroll  you will be able to obtain an initial  in  credit report and credit score along with two year of unlimited access to your transunion credit report and vantagescore credit score by transunion  the daily three bureau credit monitor service will notify you if there be any critical change to your credit file at transunion  experian and equifax  include fraud alert  new inquiry  new account  new public record  late payment  change of address and more  the service also include dark web internet identity monitor  the ability to lock and unlock your transunion credit report  access to an identity restoration program that provide assistance in the event your identity be compromise to help you restore your identity and up to    in identity theft insurance with no deductible   certain policy limitation and exclusion may apply   
 
if you believe you may be a victim of identity theft  please call the transunion fraud response service toll free hotline at     when prompt  enter the follow  digit telephone pass code  to speak to a transunion representative about your identity theft issue  
 
you can sign up for the mytrueidentity online credit monitor anytime between now and december     due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  please note that credit monitor service might not be available for individual who do not have a credit file with transunion  experian and equifax or an address in the unite state  or it territory  and a valid social security number  or be under the age of   enroll in this service will not affect your credit score  
 
what you can do  free fraud alert information 
 
whether or not you enroll in credit monitor  we recommend that you place a fraud alert on your credit file  fraud alert message notify potential credit grantors to verify your identification before extend credit in your name in case someone be use your information without your consent  a fraud alert can make it more difficult for someone to get credit in your name  however  please be aware that it also may delay your ability to obtain credit  call only one of the follow three nationwide credit report company to place your fraud alert  transunion  equifax  or experian  a soon a the credit report company confirm your fraud alert  they will also forward your alert request to the other two nationwide credit report company so you do not need to contact each of them separately  the contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be

free credit report information 
 
under federal law  you be also entitle to one free credit report once every  month from each of the above three major nationwide credit report company  call    or make a request online at annualcreditreport com  
 
even if you do not find any suspicious activity on your initial credit report  the federal trade commission  ftc  recommend that you check your credit report periodically  victim information sometimes be hold for use or share among a group of thief at different time  check your credit report periodically can help you spot problem and address them quickly  
 
if you find suspicious activity on your credit report or have reason to believe your information be be misuse  call your local law enforcement agency and file a police report  get a copy of the report  many creditor want the information it contain to absolve you of the fraudulent debt  you also should file a complaint with the federal trade commission  ftc  at identitytheft gov or at  id theft       your complaint will be add to the ftcs identity theft data clearinghouse  where it will be accessible to law enforcement for their investigation  also visit the ftcs website at ftc gov idtheft to review their free identity theft resource such a their comprehensive step by step guide identity theft   a recovery plan  
 
free credit security freeze information 
 
you can request a free security freeze  aka credit freeze  on your credit file by contact each of the three nationwide credit report company via the channel outline below  when a credit freeze be add to your credit report  third party  such a credit lender or other company  whose use be not exempt under law will not be able to access your credit report without your consent  a credit freeze can make it more difficult for someone to get credit in your name  however  please be aware that it also may delay your ability to obtain credit
