content of data breach notification letter  dear customer name  
 
we be write to inform you that we have discover evidence of unauthorizedaccess to some of your personal information seriously and want to assure you that we be do everything we can to address the situation  
 
on october     we be alert to unusual activity on our website  thenorthface com  which prompt u to investigate immediately  follow a careful investigation  we conclude that a credential stuff attack have be launch against our website on october  and     a credential stuff attack be a specific type of cybersecurity attack in which the attacker use account authentication credential steal from another source to gain unauthorizedaccess to user account  
 
base on our investigation  we believe that the attacker previously gain access to your email address and password from another source  not from the north face  and subsequently use those same credential to access your account on thenorthface com  we do not believe that the attacker obtain information from u that would require u to notify you of a data security breach under applicable law  but we be notify you of the incident voluntarily  out of an abundance of caution  
 
the information that may have be access include your email address  password  product you have purchase on our website  product you have save to your favorite  your bill address  your ship address e   your vipeak customer loyalty point total  your email preference  your first and last name  your birthday  if you save it to your account   and your telephone number  if you save it to your account   if you save your payment card  credit  debit or store value card  to your account on thenorthface com  the attacker be not able to view your payment card number  expiration date  nor your cvv  the short code on the back of your card   because we do not keep a copy of that information on thenorthface com  
 
we have take step to address the incident  include implement measure that limit account logins from source that we believe be suspicious or in pattern that be suspicious  a a further precaution  we disable all password from account that be access during the timeframe of the attack  we also erase all payment card token from all account on thenorthface com  a such  you will need to create a new  unique  password and enter your payment card information again the next time you shop on thenorthface com  
 
we encourage you to take step to reduce the potential risk of misuse of your online account  please change your password at thenorthface com and at all other site where you use the same password  we strongly encourage you not to use the same password for your account at thenorthface com that you use on other website  because if one of those other website be breach  your email address and password could be use to access your account at thenorthface com  in addition  we recommend avoid use easy to guess password  
 
please monitor your financial account for any suspicious activity  for more information about step you can take to reduce the likelihood of identity theft or fraud  call   id theft       visit the ftcs website at  or write to  federal trade commission   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc   however  if you believe you be the victim of identity theft  you should immediately contact your local law enforcement agency  your state attorney general  or the ftc  
 
we apologize for any inconvenience this may have cause and want to assure you that the safety of your information on our website be our utmost concern  if you have any question or concern  please call u at      
 
sincerely  
 
vf outdoors  llc do business a the north face 
 wewatta street 
denver  co

aeries software  inc   aeries   which provide the aeries student information system to san dieguito union high school district  san dieguito   be write to inform you of a security event  this letter include information about the event and step you may take to better protect yourself  should you feel it necessary  please know that we recognize the trust you place in aeries and san dieguito to protect your information  and we sincerely regret any inconvenience or concern this incident may have cause you  
 
what happen  
 
on january th    san dieguito alert aeries that their database may have be potentially subject to unauthorizedaccess  we immediately launch an investigation into the nature and scope of the incident and take measure to secure the database  we also assist san dieguito and it forensic expert with their investigation into the incident  on february     the forensic investigation reveal that san dieguitos aeries database be subject to unauthorizedaccess from april  to january   san dieguito undertake a labor intensive review of the affect database to determine the scope of personal information contain within  san dieguito have ask aeries to notify you out of an abundance of caution because your information be present in the affect database  
 
what information be involve

re  important security breach notification   please read this entire letter  
 
dear individual name  
 
we be contact you regard a data security incident that have occur on august    at cantella   co   inc  this incident involve email thread which be use to entice recipient to open an attachment contain malware  malware be a term use to describe any kind of computer software with malicious intent  recipient of these malicious email open the attachment  believe them to be from a credible source  which in turn install the malware  unfortunately  this malware be very difficult to detect  and almost none of the virus scanner available out there today be able to do so  in total  we identify  infect computer across our organization  regrettably  some of your personal information  it be important to note that we have no evidence to support any attempt to misuse private client information thus far  but there be a possibility that your name  address  social security number  and other identify information may have be potentially expose to others  
 
we value your business and respect the privacy of your information  a such  we be provide you with complimentary credit monitor for the next two year and we ask that you enroll by follow the step outline below  if you be the victim of identity theft  you can file a police report and obtain a copy of it  you may also place a security freeze on your credit report  free of charge  
 
a security freeze prohibit a credit report agency from release any information from a consumer credit report without write authorization  however  please be aware that place a security freeze on your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prevent the timely approval of any request you make for new loan  credit mortgage  employment  house or other service  under federal law  you cannot be charge to place  lift  or remove a security freeze  you must place your request for a freeze with each of the three major consumer report agency  equifax  www equifax com   experian  www experian com   and transunion  www transunion com   
 
to place a security freeze on your credit report  you may send a write request by regular  certify or overnight mail at the address below  you may also place a security freeze through each of the consumer report agency website or over the phone  use the contact information below  
 
equifax security freeze 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga   
    
  
 
experian security freeze 
p o  box  
allen  tx  
    
  
 
transunion security freeze 
p o  box  
woodlyn  pa  
    
  
 
in order to request a security freeze  you will need to provide some or all of the follow information to the credit report agency  depend on whether you do so online  by phone  or by mail  
 
  your full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  if you have move in the past five    year  the address where you have live over the prior five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill  telephone bill  rental agreement  or deed  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  u s  passport etc    
  social security card  pay stub  or w  
  if you be a victim of identity theft  include a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft  
 
the credit report agency have one    to three    business day after receive your request to place a security freeze on your credit report  base upon the method of your request  the credit bureau must also send write confirmation to you within five    business day and provide you with a unique personal identification number  pin  or password  or both  that can be use by you to authorize the removal or lift of the security freeze  it be important to maintain this pin password in a secure place  a you will need it to lift or remove the security freeze  
 
to lift the security freeze in order to allow a specific entity or individual access to your credit report  you must make a request to each of the credit report agency by mail  through their website  or by phone  use the contact information above   you must provide proper identification  include name  address  and social security number  and the pin number or password provide to you when you place the security freeze  a well a the identity of those entity or individual you would like to receive your credit report  you may also temporarily lift a security freeze for a specify period of time rather than for a specific entity or individual  use the same contact information above  the credit bureau have between one    hour  for request make online  and three    business the breachments design to entice recipient to open it  result in the installation of the malware on the network  affect  computer in the organization

security freeze  
 
under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement  or insurance statement

content of data breach 
 
dear   name     
 
we regret to inform you that  investment counsel recently experience a security incident that may have impact some of our current and former employee personal information extremely seriously  and we sincerely apologize for any concern this incident may cause  
 
what happen  
 
on september     a ic employee discover some unusual activity on their ic work computer  we immediately begin investigate and retain a third party forensic expert to assist  during our investigation  we learn that an unauthorized user gain access to ic computer system  which be operate by a third party manage it service firm with oversight by ic internal technology team  during the forensic analysis  ic be able to quickly take step to prevent further unauthorizedaccess and secure our system  at this time  we do not have any indication that your information be access or misuse  however  because we deeply value you and be commit to transparency  we want to make you aware of this incident  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information we hold about our current and former employee may include one or more of the follow  name  address  social security number  photo id  birthdate  bank account information  payroll information  and contact information  while we have no evidence that any of this information be view by the unauthorized user  we be notify you because we cannot conclusively rule out that possibility  
 
what we be do 
 
we take the security of your information very seriously  and we want to assure you that weve already take step to prevent a recurrence by do additional monitor of our network  further improve access control  and harden our system  a a safeguard  we have also arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online  three bureau credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for two year  this service be provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  we have also secure  regardless of enrollment  identity restoration service  include m in identity theft insurance  for two year  
 
how to enroll  
 
you can sign up online or via u s  mail delivery  to enroll in this service  go to the mytrueidentity website at www mytrueidentity com and  in the space reference a enter activation code  enter the  letter activation code   insert unique  letter activation code   and follow the three step to receive your credit monitor service online within minute  if you do not have access to the internet and wish to enroll in a similar offline  paper base  three bureau credit monitor service  via u s  mail delivery  please call the transunion fraud response service toll free hotline at      when prompt  enter the six digit telephone passcode   insert static  digit telephone pass code   and follow the step to enroll in the offline credit monitor service  add an initial fraud alert to your credit file  or to speak to a transunion representative if you believe you may be a victim of identity theft  
 
for more information 
 
if you have question regard enrollment in the credit monitor service  please call     monday through friday from   a m  to   p m  central time  please have your activation code ready

dear   first name     last name    
 
the privacy and security of your personal information and to advise you of step you can take to protect your privacy  
 
what happen 
 
on june     the university of california san francisco  ucsf  detect a cybersecurity attack that occur in a limit part of the ucsf school of medicine it environment  upon detection of the intrusion  we immediately isolate the impact environment and successfully contain the incident from the core ucsf network  while we stop the attack a it be occur  the attacker obtain certain file and encrypt others with ransomware  ucsf make the difficult decision to pay the attacker  and receive the information we need to decrypt the affect server and data the attacker steal  although we have no evidence that the personal information be impact  
 
what information be involve 
 
the personal information impact could have include  
 
  your name and your social security number  it do not contain any of your financial information  
  your name  social security number  financial information  and some personal information  
  your name  social security number  and some health information  it do not contain any of your financial information  
  your name  social security number  and some health insurance information  
  your name  social security number  and some other personal information  it do not contain any financial information  
  your name  social security number  government identification  and some other personal information  it do not contain any financial information  
  your name  social security number  government identification  and some financial information  
  your name and some of your medical information  it do not contain your social security number or any financial information  
  your name  government identification  financial information  and some other information  it do not contain your social security number  
  your name  government identification  and some other information  it do not contain your social security number or any financial information  
  your name  medical information  and some other information  it do not contain your social security number or any financial information  
  your name  social security number  and some other personal or financial information  
 
what we be do 
 
to enroll  please call  tfn or visit   enrollment code    xxxxxxxx    
 
ucsf be commit to maintain the privacy and security of personal information  in response to this incident  ucsf immediately notify law enforcement and retain a lead data security firm to assist in investigate the incident  ucsf also launch a thorough investigation and begin implementation of a number of enhancement to our security and privacy program to help reduce the risk of this kind of incident from happen again  this include strengthen exist control  data backup  user training and awareness  and other measure  
 
although there be no indication that personal information

notice of data breach 
 
to our value customer  team member  
 
we be write to inform you of a data security incident that occur earlier this year that impact the business system of international cosmetic   perfume  a subsidiary of cosmetique et parfum international  cpi   we recently become aware that due to a series of phishing attack that compromise the email account of some of our employee  an unauthorized individual may have have the opportunity to gain access to your personal information have be access or use  we be notify you out of an abundance of caution to make you aware of these event  
 
what happen 
 
between april and may   certain email account of international cosmetic   perfume employee be affect by a business email compromise attack  we learn about the attack follow an attempt to divert fund to an authorize account  upon learn of the incident  we terminate access to the account and take step to mitigate the risk  include engage local law enforcement and various cybersecurity expert  we continue to work closely with these expert a we investigate the matter in a safe and timely manner  
 
a a result of our investigation  we have become aware that an unknown actor may have be able to access the personal information beyond the compromise account information be acquire or use  
 
what information be involve 
 
we do not yet know whether the unauthorizedaccess to international cosmetic   perfume system result in the actual exposure or copy of any of the information contain in the allegedly affect record  at this time  we do know that file affect by this attack may have contain the follow category of personal information include but not limit to  name  address  email  phone number  business financial account and password  social insurance number or social security number  driver license  and other government issue identification number  
 
what we be do 
 
international cosmetic   perfume have be  and will continue  to work with our cyber and forensic expert to monitor the impact of this incident and any potential risk  in response to this attack  international cosmetic   perfume have expand it implementation of multi factor authentication and endpoint security software  and enhance security training for staff  we continue to assess and monitor new threat and security vulnerability on an ongoing basis  
 
although international cosmetic   perfume do not yet have sufficient information to determine whether your personal information be access  view or disclose  we be notify you of this information security incident on our server base on the sensitivity of the information that could have be access  to help protect your identity  we have secure a complimentary one year membership for you to enroll in credit and cyberscan monitor  a    insurance reimbursement policy  and fully manage id theft recovery service

additional resource and suggestion 
 
credit report security freeze 
 
you may place a security freeze on your credit report  which would prohibit a credit report agency from release any information from your credit report without your write permission  
 
credit report fraud alert 
 
you may place a fraud alert on your credit report  which may help prevent someone from open account in your name or change your exist account  you may contact any one of the major credit bureau list below to do so  when one credit bureau confirm your fraud alert  the others will be notify automatically of the alert  
 
equifax 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
   
www equifax com 
 
equifax canada co  
p o  box  
montreal  qc h z 
   
www equifax ca 
 
experian 
p o  box  
allen  tx  
   
www experian com 
 
transunion llc 
p o  box  
chester  pa  
   
www transunion com 
 
transunion canada inc 
 harvester road 
suite  burlington on ln n 
   
www transunion ca 
 
you may order a copy of your credit report  you be entitle to receive a free credit report annually from each of the credit bureau  list above   even if you do not find suspicious activity on your initial credit report  the federal trade commission and financial consumer agency of canada recommend that you check your credit report and credit card statement periodically  
 
remain vigilant in review your account statement and monitor free credit report to protect yourself against fraud and identity theft  
 
additional information about avoid identity theft 
 
you may obtain additional information about how to avoid identity theft by contact the federal trade commission or financial consumer agency of canada  
 
contact information for the federal trade commission be  federal trade commission   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc         www ftc gov  
 
contact information for the financial consumer agency of canada be  financial consumer agency of canada   laurier avenue west  th floor  ottawa  on kr b          
 
you should be aware  however  that place a security freeze on your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prevent the timely approval of any request you make for new loan  credit mortgage  employment  house or other service  a credit report agency may charge you fee for place  remove  and replace a security freeze  the fee vary from state to state or province to province and depend on your circumstance  if you be an identity theft victim with a valid police report  a credit report agency may provide you with security freeze service free of charge  
 
 you may request an equifax fraud alert online by visit it fraud alert website at   
 
 you may request an alert by visit it credit fraud center at   
 
other 
 
if you suspect that someone have steal or misuse your personal cosmetic  therefore it be difficult to determine the type of breach for this specific organization base on the information give

content of data breach 
 
dear   name     
 
backroads be write to inform you of a recent incident that may affect some of your personal information  should you feel it necessary to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on october     backroads become aware of suspicious activity within it computer network  backroads immediately begin an investigation  work with external forensic specialist  to determine the nature and scope of the activity  our investigation determine that certain file within our environment be encrypt and inaccessible  on october     we discover that certain file have be accessible to unknown actor and that certain personally with appropriate authority in each jurisdiction where we operate globally  thank you for your understand and patience while we work through all the necessary detail  
 
what information be involve  
 
backroads have both legal authority and obligation to maintain personal information might have be access  we be inform employee of the full scope of what could have be compromise due to it presence in impact file  
 
what we be do  
 
the confidentiality  privacy  and security of personal information within our custody be among backroads highest priority  in order to minimize the chance that latent malware could remain on backroads system  we be rebuild our network from the ground up  and add further security measure  to better protect against similar incident in the future  
 
what you can do  
 
please review the enclose step you can take to protect personal information  which contain information on what you can do to better protect against possible misuse of your information  
 
a an add precaution  backroads be offer you access to one year of credit monitor and identity protection service through transunions mytrueidentity  provide by epiq  at no cost to you  detail of this offer and instruction on how to enroll in the service be enclose within this letter

step you can take to protect personal information 
 
enroll in credit monitor and identity restoration service 
 
a a safeguard  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for one year provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  
 
how to enroll  
 
you can sign up online or via u s  mail delivery  to enroll in this service  go to the mytrueidentity website at www mytrueidentity com and  in the space reference a enter activation code  enter the  letter activation code   insert unique  letter activation code   and follow the three step to receive your credit monitor service online within minute  if you do not have access to the internet and wish to enroll in a similar offline  paper base credit monitor service  via u s  mail delivery  please call the transunion fraud response service toll free hotline at      when prompt  enter the six digit telephone passcode   insert static six digit telephone pass code   and follow the step to enroll in the offline credit monitor service  add an initial fraud alert to your credit file  or to speak to a transunion representative if you believe you may be a victim of identity theft  
 
you can sign up for the online or offline credit monitor service anytime between now and   enrollment deadline    due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  please note that credit monitor service might not be available for individual who do not have a credit file with transunion or an address in the unite state  or it territory  and a valid social security number  enroll in this service will not affect your credit score  
 
monitor your account 
 
in addition to enroll in the complimentary service detail above  we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review your account statement and explanation of benefit  and to monitor your credit report for suspicious activity and to detect error  under u s  law you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also contact the three major credit bureau directly to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal information belong to employee  include name  date of birth  social security number  government issue id  financial account information  and health insurance information

subject  notice of data breach 
 
dear   first name     last name    
 
we be write to inform you of a data security incident that may have involve your personal center  ggrc   that be why we be write to inform you about this incident  offer complimentary identity monitor and protection service  and provide you with information relate to step that can be take to help protect the information of individual we serve  
 
what happen  
 
on september     ggrc detect unusual activity in it network environment consistent with a ransomware incident  ransomware incident typically involve an unauthorized actor gain access to an entitys network and deploy malware that encrypt the entitys file  make them inaccessible  the unauthorized actor then commonly demand a ransom payment in exchange for the key to decrypt the entitys file  once ggrc discover this incident  ggrc disable it network  secure it system  immediately begin an investigation  and work to restore operation and data access from backup  ggrc also engage a lead  independent computer forensics firm to determine what happen and whether sensitive information may have be access or acquire by an unknown actor during the incident  base on preliminary find of the computer forensics firm  it be determine on october     that certain information belong to the individual we serve be acquire by an unknown actor  
 
while we have no evidence that any personal or protect health information belong to the individual we serve have be misuse  out of an abundance of caution  we be inform you of the incident and provide you with access to complimentary identity monitor and protection service from idx  
 
what information be involve  
 
the type of information impact may include your   variable text insert data element    
 
what be we do  
 
a soon a ggrc discover the incident  we take the step describe above  we have also take measure to further enhance the security of information in our possession and to prevent similar incident from happen in the future  in addition  we have notify the federal bureau of investigation  fbi  about this incident  and we will work with and provide assistance to law enforcement to hold the perpetrator accountable  
 
we be also provide you with information about step that you can take to help protect your personal information and  a an add precaution  we be offer complimentary identity monitor and protection service for one year through idx

fraud alert

security freeze  
 
under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  
 
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state

what information be involve

under federal law  you be also entitle to one free credit report once every  month from each of the above three major nationwide credit report company  call    or make a request online at annualcreditreport com  
 
even if you do not find any suspicious activity on your initial credit report  the federal trade commission  ftc  recommend that you check your credit report periodically  victim information sometimes be hold for use or share among a group of thief at different time  check your credit report periodically can help you spot problem and address them quickly  
 
if you find suspicious activity on your credit report or have reason to believe your information be be misuse  call your local law enforcement agency and file a police report  get a copy of the report  many creditor want the information it contain to absolve you of the fraudulent debt  you also should file a complaint with the federal trade commission  ftc  at identitytheft gov or at  id theft       your complaint will be add to the ftcs identity theft data clearinghouse  where it will be accessible to law enforcement for their investigation  also visit the ftcs website at ftc gov idtheft to review their free identity theft resource such a their comprehensive step by step guide identity theft   a recovery plan  
 
free credit security freeze information 
you can request a free security freeze  aka credit freeze  on your credit file by contact each of the three nationwide credit report company via the channel outline below  when a credit freeze be add to your credit report  third party  such a credit lender or other company  whose use be not exempt under law will not be able to access your credit report without your consent  a credit freeze can make it more difficult for someone to get credit in your name  however  please be aware that it also may delay your ability to obtain credit

atlanta  ga

university of minnesota physician  umphysicians  be write to make you aware of a data security event that potentially affect the confidentiality of some of your personal information  we have no evidence to suggest that your information be actually view during this event and we be not aware of any attempt or actual misuse of your information  however  we be provide you with information about the event  our response  and step you may take to better protect against the possibility of identity theft and fraud  should you feel it be necessary to do so  
 
what happen  
 
umphysicians identify that cyberattackers use phishing email to fraudulently access two employee email account  the two phishing email attack be identify on january    and february     shortly after they occur  umphysicians take immediate step to secure the email account and begin work with third party computer forensic investigator to determine the nature and scope of the incident  the investigation indicate that an unknown actor have access to one employee email account on january  and january     and another employee email account on february     for a brief period of time  
 
unfortunately  the investigation be unable to determine with certainty to what extent any email within the two email account may have be view by the cyberattackers  base on this  in an abundance of caution  we work with third party specialist to perform a comprehensive review of all information store in the email account at the time of the incident to identify any personal information present in the email account  the employee email account contain information about individual because the email account be use to perform normal business operation relate to health care service provide by umphysicians  upon completion of the third party specialist review of the full content of the email account  which be a detail and lengthy process that involve multiple step to identify the relevant data  we immediately begin assess the result to confirm the identity of potentially affect individual and obtain their current mail address or other contact information  we recently complete this comprehensive review process  
 
what information be involve  
 
our review determine that an email message contain the follow type of information relate to you be present in an affect email account during this incident    bb text   data impact     we have no evidence indicate that your information be actually view during the incident or have be copy or otherwise misuse  however  the perpetrator do have access to the two email account for a limit period of time so it be possible they may have see some of your information  
 
what we be do  
 
umphysicians take this incident and the security of the information in it care very seriously  we quickly identify the attack and take step to secure the affect email account  at the time of the attack  umphysicians have multiple email security control in place  include multi factor authentication  we also require all employee to participate in privacy and security training  and we regularly conduct exercise to try to make sure personal technology that will provide for more enhance detection and prevention of phishing email  in addition  we notify state and federal regulator where we be require to do so  further  while we be unaware of any misuse of your information a a result of this incident  we be offer you access to complimentary identity monitor service for  month through kroll

step you can take to help protect your information 
 
enroll in credit monitor  
 
a a safeguard  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for one year provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  
 
how to enroll  you can sign up online or via u s  mail delivery  to enroll in this service  go to the mytrueidentity website at www mytrueidentity com and  in the space reference a enter activation code  enter the  letter activation code   insert unique  letter activation code   and follow the three step to receive your credit monitor service online within minute  if you do not have access to the internet and wish to enroll in a similar offline  paper base credit monitor service  via u s  mail delivery  please call the transunion fraud response service toll free hotline at      when prompt  enter the six digit telephone passcode   insert static  digit telephone pass code   and follow the step to enroll in the offline credit monitor service  add an initial fraud alert to your credit file  or to speak to a transunion representative if you believe you may be a victim of identity theft  
 
you can sign up for the online or offline credit monitor service anytime between now and   enrollment deadline    due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  please note that credit monitor service might not be available for individual who do not have a credit file with transunion or an address in the unite state  or it territory  and a valid social security number  enroll in this service will not affect your credit score  
 
monitor your account  
 
to protect against the possibility of identity theft or other financial loss  we encourage you to remain vigilant  to review your account statement  and to monitor your credit report for suspicious activity  
 
credit report  under u s  law  you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also contact the three major credit bureau directly to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
security freeze  you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below  
 
experian po box  allen  tx      www experian com freeze center html 
 
transunion p o  box  chester  pa      www transunion com credit freeze 
 
equifax po box  atlanta  ga      www equifax com personal credit report service 
 
to remove the security freeze  you must send a write request to each of the three credit bureau by mail and include proper identification  name  address  and social security number  and the pin number or password provide to you when you place the security freeze  the credit bureau have three    business day after receive your request to remove the security freeze  
 
ab v  
 
a an alternative to a security freeze  you have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on your file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon the breachanical inc s system by an unauthorized actor who also access and acquire certain file in their system

dear full name  
 
we be write to inform you of a data security incident that may have involve your personally identifiable information  pii   we take this incident very seriously and be provide you with information and resource to help you protect your pii  
 
what happen  
on or about october     mineral technology inc   mti  experience a security breach that compromise certain server maintain by mti  in response  mti immediately retain an it firm to conduct a thorough forensic investigation into the incident  on october     base on it preliminary investigation  mti learn that the incident may have result in unauthorizedaccess to the pii of certain mti employee and their dependent  while there be no indication that any personal information have be misuse  we be provide this notification out of an abundance of caution so that you can diligently monitor your account and those of your dependent  
 
what information be involve  
the pii that may have be access by the unauthorized individual may include your or your dependent  if applicable  name  home address  mail address  personal email address  bank information  account type  rout number  account number   dependent information  benefit plan information  include insurance policy number and beneficiary   salary history  and pay history  
 
what mti be do  
the confidentiality of pii be one of mtis top priority  immediately upon learn of the incident  we take step to ensure that the unauthorized individual no longer have access to our system and take step to investigate and contain the incident  we retain a third party it firm to conduct a thorough forensic investigation and to assist in the remediation of our system  include implement additional security measure  a such  we have already strengthen our system and will continue to do so throughout this response process and beyond  
 
credit monitor service  
while mti be not aware of any identity fraud or improper use of any pii a a direct result of this incident  out of an abundance of caution  we have arrange to have transunion provide you and your adult dependent with two    year of complimentary credit monitor and identity theft protection service  in addition  we have arrange to provide your minor dependent  i e   those dependent under  year of age  with access to equifaxs equifax child identity monitor service  to activate your and your dependent membership in these service  please follow the step outline at the end of this letter  
 
what you can do  
we recommend that you remain vigilant in regularly review and monitor all of your and your dependent account statement and credit history to guard against any unauthorized transaction or activity  if you discover any suspicious or unusual activity on your account  please contact your financial institution  we have provide additional information below  which contain more information about step you can take to protect yourself and your dependent against fraud and identity theft  
 
for more information  
if you have any question about this notice or the incident  please call      during our normal hour of operation from   be to   pm est  we value you and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience cause by this incident  thank you for your understand

dear   name     
 
we be write to inform you of an incident we discover regard our website that may affect the security of some of your personal information  between september  and september   we experience a malicious attack  during which our customer information may have be capture  you be receive this notice because you make a purchase on the website during this timeframe  and your payment card information may be at risk  
 
what we be do  
 
we be extremely sorry for any inconvenience or harm that this incident may have cause you and be commit to earn back your trust  the security of your credit card information and privacy of interaction be of utmost importance to u at lazarus natural  we have take exhaustive step to ensure that your information and privacy will be protect in the future and do not take this situation lightly  since the incident be discover  we have take the follow step to secure your information  
 
  immediately remove the malicious code and conduct a thorough internal investigation of what happen  how it happen  and how to prevent it in the future 
  engage a third party forensic investigation team to review our internal process  system  and other relevant information  who confirm we take the proper step to protect our customer  
  enact new security protocol and restructure our server architecture to remove the possibility of a similar situation in the future  
  notify potentially impact customer of the incident via this letter with way you can protect your personal information  
 
at the same time  we be conduct our investigation  we implement a plan migration from our previous website platform on which this incident occur to a new  more secure platform  we do not expect to experience a similar issue on our new website  
 
what happen  
 
on september     we identify suspicious activity on our website and immediately begin an investigation with the assistance of third party forensic specialist to assess the nature and scope of the incident  through the investigation  it be determine that malicious code be insert by an unauthorized party on the checkout page of our website from september     to september     which may have have the ability to capture customer information while make a purchase  
 
what information be involve  
 
our investigation determine the type of information potentially impact by this incident include your name  address  and payment card information  account number  card expiration date  and security code   we do not store any payment information after purchase  so only information enter between september     and september     may have be impact  
 
what can you do

you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below

ia be a lead provider of premium audit service and solution to the p c insurance industry  on behalf of it commercial carrier client  ia audit the commercial insurance policy of thousand of business nationwide  in the course of those audit  ia collect information from it carrier client and their policyholder  
 
on october     attacker deploy a ransomware attack in iass network  immediately after discover the attack on the morning of october   ia retain legal counsel and engage a computer forensics firm to investigate and determine the scope of the attack  ia also notify law enforcement and be cooperate with an investigation  on november     iass forensics team identify evidence consistent with exfiltration of data  on november     ia complete it analysis of the data that we believe may have be compromise to identify those impact by the incident  in consultation with iass legal and forensics team  ia pay the ransom that the attacker demand and receive the key need to decrypt it network  detail regard any information the attacker copy from it network  and confirmation that they have delete any such data  
 
it appear that data belong to ia employee and audit policyholder in iowa be exfiltrated from iass network  with respect to ia employee  the impact data include copy of employee irs form  c  which contain name  address  and social security number  with respect to audit policyholder  the impact data may have include the policyholder business name  business address  phone number  insurance policy number  federal employer identification number  fein   and ia generate usernames and one time use initial password to an ia file transfer portal  in some case  the impact feins may have be social security number  
 
pursuant to iowa code ann  c   ia be provide notice to  employee and   policyholder in iowa  ia notify it employee of the incident by e mail on november     and be in the process of send a follow up letter to those employee  ia be also in the process of disclose this security incident by letter to all impact policyholder in this state  notice will be mail on november     this notice have not be delay a a result of a law enforcement investigation  
 
after a thorough analysis and investigation into the attack  ia believe that the risk of harm to consumer be low  ia pay the ransom the attacker demand and receive confirmation that any data exfiltrated from iass network have be delete  moreover  the policyholder whose feins be impact by this incident be nearly all commercial entity  a such  much of the impact feins be true feins  rather than social security number  a to those consumer  the risk be even further reduce  and the impact data do not qualify a personal information with no mention of business information in definition   ia be choose to disclose to those policyholder because of it inability to determine with certainty that the impact feins be not social security number  nonetheless  and out of an abundance of the breach be discover on october     ia retain legal counsel and engage a computer forensics firm to investigate and determine the scope of the attack  and find evidence consistent with exfiltration of data on november     iass forensics team identify that data belong to ia employee and audit policyholder in iowa be exfiltrated from iass network

we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review your account statement  and to monitor your credit report for suspicious activity  under u s  law  you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also contact the three major credit bureau directly to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  
 
should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below

  if you be a victim of identity theft  include a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft  
 
a an alternative to a security freeze  you have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on your file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the agency list below

dear glofox admin  
 
we regret to inform you that an unknown third party gain unauthorizedaccess to certain data relate to glofox user  we be currently conduct a thorough investigation and want to inform you a soon a possible  
 
what happen  
 
on november th  we discover that an unknown third party have access some user data  include name  email address  phone number  hash scramble password  and other optional information such a date of birth  no plain text password be expose  the user data be from an archive of information date march th    no data collect after that date be access  we can confirm that no credit card or payment method data be access  we do not store any of this information in our system a part of our standard security measure  we can confirm that x of your client be impact  y of these have a password in glofox  z of these have a date of birth in glofox  we have identify and close the path that lead to the unauthorizedaccess  
 
what should glofox administrator do now  
 
we have reset your glofox account password and the password relate to your staff to prevent unauthorizedaccess to your account  you and your staff will need to follow the glofox forget password flow the next time you log in  even though no plain text password have be expose  a a precaution  if you or your staff use your glofox password on other website  we recommend that you change these password  we ask that you pass this recommendation onto your staff  
 
do you need to inform your member  
 
we do not believe that the overall risk associate with your member data be high  however  you may decide to notify your member  if you decide to do so  here be a suggest message you can send them  
 
hi  first name   
 
we have be inform of a security incident on the glofox platform that may impact some of your personal information like date of birth  no financial information or credit card detail have be expose  while no plain text password have be expose  a an abundance of caution we recommend that you reset your password for glofox and  if you have be use your old password across multiple website  we recommend to change those password also  glofox have inform u that this be an isolate incident and they have identify and close the path that lead to the breach  
 
what we be do  
 
data security be a top priority for u here at glofox  we have significantly invest in our security infrastructure over the past  month  while we be deeply disappoint that this incident have occur  we will continue to invest in our infrastructure to prevent incident like this in the future  a we be the controller in respect of the personal data of your member  you will separately need to assess whether you have any obligation to notify your local data protection supervisory authority of this incident  we have initiate communication to all of our impact customer and will be in touch if we have any more information or action  
 
if you have any question  please contact our team at dataprivacyglofox com  
 
kind regard  
 
conor oloughlin 
ceo the breach a date of birth through the glofox platform

sonoma valley hospital  svh  place a high priority on safeguard your personally to explain the circumstance of the incident  
 
what happen  
 
svh experience a ransomware cyberattack on october     by what be believe to be a russian threat actor  this event be part of a broader attack on dozen of hospital across the country  we discover the attack on that same day and immediately respond by shut down all system to contain the damage  we promptly notify law enforcement of the incident and engage a lead external cybersecurity firm to assess the potential disclosure of protect health information  in a ransomware attack  cybercriminals attempt to disrupt the business by lock company out of their own data and server  after discover the attack  our cybersecurity team  in partnership with outside information technology and forensics expert  successfully prevent the cybercriminal from block our system access and ultimately expel them from our system  a recommend  svh do not pay ransom  
 
what information be involve  
 
a thorough forensic investigation determine that information that may have be compromise include health claim data send to insurer electronically  include patient name  address  birthdate  insurer group number and subscriber number  a well a diagnosis or procedure code  date of service  place of service  amount of claim  and secondary payer information  if  and only if  you receive image service or your service result in a grievance  appeal  or quality review  certain additional medical record data such a image test or other may have be disclose  base on the report of the forensics analyst  patient financial information  such a credit card or social security number  be neither access nor disclose  svh be not aware of any misuse or attempt misuse of patient health information  and our forensics expert have search for any potential redisclosures  
 
what we be do  
 
we deeply regret the incident and the concern it have cause to our employee  in response  we activate a series of enhance security measure to improve information security and prevent further ransomware or cybersecurity attack  
 
what you can do  
 
please review the enclose additional resource section include with this letter  this section describe additional step you can take to help protect yourself  include recommendation by the federal trade commission regard identity theft protection  if you have question  please call     monday through friday from   a m  to   p m  central time    a m  to   p m  pacific time

fraud alert  there be two type of fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice   an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for at least one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft and you have the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  you can place a fraud alert on your credit report by contact any of the three national credit report agency

dear spotify user

notice of data breach 
 
we regret to inform you that your spotify account registration information be inadvertently expose to certain of spotifys business partner  firstly  we want to apologize that there have be an incident  although the incident have be contain and remediate  we understand the concern that may come with such incident  because of this  we want to provide you with further information about what happen and inform you of some precautionary step that you can take to ensure that your information remain protect  
 
what happen  
 
on thursday  november th  spotify discover a vulnerability in our system that inadvertently expose your spotify account registration information  which may have include email address  your prefer display name  password  gender  and date of birth only to certain business partner of spotify  spotify do not make this information publicly accessible  we estimate that this vulnerability exist a of april     until we discover it on november     when we take immediate step to correct it  
 
what information be involve  
 
the personal information that may have be expose include your spotify account registration information  include email and password  gender  date of birth  and email address  
 
what we be do 
 
we take any loss of personal information that may have be inadvertently disclose to them have be delete  we also reset your spotify password to help keep your account secure  
 
what you can do 
 
we have no reason to believe that any unauthorized use of your information have or will occur  however  we urge you to change the password of all other online account for which you use the same email address and password  we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause  
 
other important information 
 
again  while we be not aware of any unauthorized use of your personal information  a a precautionary measure  we encourage you to remain vigilant by monitor your account closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on your spotify account  you should promptly notify u  
 
for more information

what happen  on october     we be notify by our tax software provider  lacerte intuit  that h n r  clark be the victim of a cyber security incident  result in some tax return pertain to our client be fraudulently file  to date  we be aware of approximately  tax return fraudulently file  if your tax return be among these  tax return  we already notify you

what we be do  we take the privacy and security of your information very seriously  upon discovery of this incident  we immediately change all computer password and improve our computer security setting by enable of a multi factor authentication for our lacerte tax preparation system  we be deploy a new email system  hnrclark com  which provide higher level of spam filter and threat protection  we will now transmit confidential information via encrypt email  we have upgrade network security with a new firewall to further protect from internet borne threat  in addition  all computer have be wipe and the operate system and application reinstall to remove any trace of malware  all computer have the latest version of virus protection install

a a precautionary measure  we also recommend that you remain vigilant to protect against potential fraud by  among other thing  review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  
 
you may wish to review the tip provide by the ftc on fraud alert  security credit freeze  and step you can take to avoid identity theft  for more information and to contact the ftc  please visit www ftc gov idtheft or call   id theft        you may also contact the ftc at federal trade commission   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc   
 
credit report  you may obtain a free copy of your credit report once every  month from each of the three national credit report agency by visit www annualcreditreport com  by call toll free      or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can print a copy of the request form at

equifax     www equifax com p o  box  atlanta  ga  
 
experian     www experian com p o  box  allen  tx  
 
transunion     www transunion com p o  box  chester  pa  
 
fraud alert  you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  a fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit report for one    year  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you before establish any new account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three national credit report agency use the contact information list above  additional information be available at www annualcreditreport com  
 
credit and security freeze  you may have the right to place a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file so that no new credit can be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a credit freeze be design to prevent potential credit grantors from access your credit report without your consent  if you place a credit freeze  potential creditor and other third party will not be able to get access to your credit report unless you temporarily lift the freeze  therefore  use a credit freeze may delay your ability to obtain credit  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a credit freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  since the instruction for how to establish a credit freeze differ from state to state  please contact the three major credit report agency a specify above to find out more information  
 
individual interact with credit report agency have right under the fair credit report act  we encourage you to review your right under the fair credit report act by visit  or by request information in write from the consumer financial protection bureau   g street n w   washington  dc

content of data breach notification letter  notice of data security event 
 
to   first name     middle name     last name    
 
we be write to inform you of a data security event that occur at mednax service  inc   mednax  and may have impact your personal information  mednax provide revenue cycle management and other administrative service to it affiliate physician practice group  include   bb text   cover entity name  one    from which you may have receive service  
 
what happen  
 
on june     mednax discover that an unauthorized third party gain access to certain microsoft office  host mednax business email account through phishing  phishing occur when an email be send that look like it be from a trustworthy source  but it be not  the phishing email prompt the recipient to share or give access to certain information  upon discovery of this event  mednax immediately take action to prevent any further unauthorized activity  begin an investigation  and engage a national forensic firm  
 
base on the investigation  the unauthorized party be able to access certain business email account between june    and june     the event be limit to a small number of business email account  those email account be separate from mednaxs internal network and system  which be not involve in the event  even though a thorough investigation be conduct  it be not possible to conclusively determine whether personal information may have be in one or more of the impact business email account  
 
what information may have be involve  
 
the patient information may have include     patient contact information  such a patient name  guarantor name  address  email address  and date of birth      social security number  driver license number  state identification number  and or financial account information     health insurance information  payor name  payor contract date  policy information include type and deductible amount and subscriber medicare medicaid number      medical and or treatment information  date of service  location  service request or procedure perform  diagnosis  prescription information  physical record number   and    bill and claim information  invoice  submit claim and appeal  and patient account identifier use by your provider   please note that not all data field may have be involve for all individual  
 
what we be do  
 
mednax take the security of personal information seriously  a soon a we discover the phishing event  we immediately take action to prevent any further unauthorized activity  include reset user password for business   first name     middle name     last name     suffix     address      address      city      state province     postal code     country   email account where unauthorized activity be detect  we have and continue to enhance our security control a appropriate to minimize the risk of any similar event in the future  in addition  we have arrange to offer you identity monitor service for a period of one year  at no cost to you  you have until march     to activate these service  and instruction on how to activate these service be include in the enclose reference guide  
 
what you can do

for more information

sincerely  
 
mary ann e  moore 
chief compliance officer 
 
reference guide 
 
review your account statement 
 
carefully review statement send to you from provider a well a from your insurance company to ensure that all account activity be valid  report any questionable charge promptly to the provider bill office  or for insurance statement  to your insurance company  
 
provide any update personal information to your health care provider 
 
your health care provider office may ask to see a photo id to verify your identity  please bring a photo id with you to every appointment if possible  your provider office may also ask you to confirm your date of birth  address  telephone  and other pertinent information so that they can make sure that all of your information be up to date  please be sure and tell your provider office when there be any change to your information  carefully review this information with your provider office at each visit can help to avoid problem and to address them quickly should there be any discrepancy the breach be cause by an unauthorized third party that gain access to certain microsoft office  host mednax business email account through phishing  the unauthorized party be able to access certain business email account between june     and june

re  notice of data event 
 
dear sir or madam  
 
we represent aftra retirement fund  aftra  locate at  madison avenue  th floor  new york  ny    we be write to notify your office of an incident that may affect the security of some personal jurisdiction  
 
aftra originally notify the media nationwide and place notice of the incident on it website on february     
 
nature of the data event 
 
on october     aftra receive an alert of suspicious activity in it environment  aftra immediately launch an investigation into the nature and scope of the incident  a part of the investigation  which be conduct with the assistance of a third party forensic expert  it be determine that certain file and folder on aftras network may have be subject to unauthorizedaccess for period of time between october    and october     aftra do not have evidence that file contain sensitive information be access  however  access to these file could not be rule out  since provide the initial notice via press release and web post  aftra continue it extensive internal review of the file and folder that may have be subject to unauthorizedaccess  
 
on september     aftra complete it review and produce a list of individual that may have be impact  the information that be potentially subject to unauthorizedaccess include  name  address  date of birth and social security number  
 
notice to iowa resident 
 
aftra originally begin mail notice to impact individual on february     on that same date  aftra provide notification of this event via a press release to major media outlet in iowa and through a post on the homepage of it website  the notification letter suggest that there be an unauthorizedaccess to certain file and folder on aftras network  although aftra do not have evidence that file contain sensitive information be access  access to these file could not be completely rule out  the incident appear to be an unintendeddisclosure not involve hack  intentional breach or physicalloss

step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
copy of credit report  
 
you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free     or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you also can contact one of the follow three national credit report agency  
 
transunion 
p o  box  
chester  pa  
    
www transunion com 
 
experian 
p o  box  
allen  tx  
    
www experian com 
 
equifax 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
    
www equifax com 
 
free annual report 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
    
annualcreditreport com 
 
fraud alert  
 
you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least  day  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze  
 
under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  
 
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc or from your respective state attorney general about step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state  
 
federal trade commission 
 pennsylvania ave  nw 
washington  dc  
consumer ftc gov  and www ftc gov idtheft 
    
 
you also have certain right under the fair credit report act  fcra   
 
these right include to know what be in your file  to dispute incomplete or inaccurate information  to have consumer report agency correct or delete inaccurate  incomplete  or unverifiable information  a well a other right  for more information about the fcra  and your right pursuant to the fcra  please visit

cyberscantm   dark web monitor of underground website  chat room  and malware     to identify trade or sell of personal information like ssns  bank account  email address  medical id number  driver license number  passport number  credit and debit card  phone number  and other unique identifier  
 
identity theft insurance   identity theft insurance will reimburse member for expense associate with restore their identity should they become a victim of identity theft  if a member identity be compromise  the policy provide coverage for up to     with no deductible  from an a m  best a rate carrier  coverage be subject to the term  limit  and or exclusion of the policy

what happen

what information be involve

free credit monitor and identity restoration service

unique activation code     tu code   
 
once you be enroll  you will be able to obtain an initial  in  credit report and credit score along with two year of unlimited access to your transunion credit report and vantagescore credit score by transunion  the daily three bureau credit monitor service will notify you if there be any critical change to your credit file at transunion  experian and equifax  include fraud alert  new inquiry  new account  new public record  late payment  change of address and more  
 
the service also include dark web internet identity monitor  the ability to lock and unlock your transunion credit report  access to an identity restoration program that provide assistance in the event your identity be compromise to help you restore your identity and up to    in identity theft insurance with no deductible   certain policy limitation and exclusion may apply   
 
if you believe you may be a victim of identity theft  please call the transunion fraud response service toll free hotline at     when prompt  enter the follow  digit telephone pass code  to speak to a transunion representative about your identity theft issue  
 
you can sign up for the mytrueidentity online credit monitor anytime between now and march     due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  please note that credit monitor service might not be available for individual who do not have a credit file with transunion  experian and equifax or an address in the unite state  or it territory  and a valid social security number  or be under the age of   enroll in this service will not affect your credit score  
 
what you can do  
 
free fraud alert information 
 
whether or not you enroll in credit monitor  we recommend that you place a fraud alert on your credit file  fraud alert message notify potential credit grantors to verify your identification before extend credit in your name in case someone be use your information without your consent  a fraud alert can make it more difficult for someone to get credit in your name  however  please be aware that it also may delay your ability to obtain credit  
 
call only one of the follow three nationwide credit report company to place your fraud alert  transunion  equifax  or experian  a soon a the credit report company confirm your fraud alert  they will also forward your alert request to the other two nationwide credit report company so you do not need to contact each of them separately

if you find suspicious activity on your credit report or have reason to believe your information be be misuse  call your local law enforcement agency and file a police report  get a copy of the report  many creditor want the information it contain to absolve you of the fraudulent debt  you also should file a complaint with the federal trade commission  ftc  at identitytheft gov or at  id theft       your complaint will be add to the ftcs identity theft data clearinghouse  where it will be accessible to law enforcement for their investigation  also visit the ftcs website at ftc gov idtheft to review their free identity theft resource such a their comprehensive step by step guide identity theft   a recovery plan
