you can take additional step to help protect yourself 
 
place a one year fraud alert on your credit file  
an initial one year fraud alert tell anyone request your credit file that you might be at risk for fraud  a lender should verify that you have authorize any request to open a credit account in your name  increase the credit limit  and or get a new card on an exist account  if the lender cant verify this  they shouldnt process the request  
 
contact any one of the credit report agency to set up an initial one year fraud alert  
  equifax 
  experian 
  transunion 
 
place a security freeze on your credit file  
a security freeze on your credit file prevent anyone from access your credit report and therefore from issue credit in your name  however  place a security freeze also may delay  interfere with  or prevent the timely approval of any request you make for new loan  credit  mortgage  employment  house  or other service  
 
contact all three of the credit report agency above to set up a security freeze with each of them  
 
order your free annual credit report  
visit annualcreditreport com or call     to get a free copy of your credit report  once you receive them  
  verify that all information be correct  
  look for discrepancy such a account you didnt open or creditor inquiry you didnt authorize  
  contact the credit report agency if you notice incorrect information or have question  
 
manage your personal information  
  carry only essential document with you  
  be cautious about share your personal information with anyone else  
  shred receipt  statement  and other document contain sensitive information  
  use anti virus software on your computer and keep it update  
 
use tool to monitor your credit and financial account  
we suggest that you carefully review your credit report and bank  credit card  and other account information on chase com and in statement for any transaction you dont recognize  we can provide copy of past statement at no cost to you  call u at     to report unauthorized transaction  work with u to close your account s  and open new one with new account number  create alert with your credit card company and bank to notify you of activity

what happen

base on the investigation  the unauthorized party be able to access a business email account   bb text   incident timeline     bb text   incident timeline continue     the email account be separate from internal network and system  which be not involve in the event  even though a thorough investigation be conduct  it be not possible to conclusively determine whether personal information may have be in the impact business email account  
 
what information may have be involve  
 
the patient information may have include     patient contact information  such a patient name  guarantor name  address  email address  date of birth  and or electronic signature      social security number  driver license number  non resident and alien registration number  and or financial account information     health insurance information  payor name  payor contract date  policy information include type and deductible amount and subscriber or medicare number      medical and or treatment information  date of service  location  service request or procedure perform  diagnosis  physical record number   and    bill and claim information  invoice  submit claim and appeal  and patient account identifier use by your provider   please note that not all data field may have be involve for all individual

reference guide 
 
review your account statement 
 
carefully review statement send to you from provider a well a from your insurance company to ensure that all account activity be valid  report any questionable charge promptly to the provider bill office  or for insurance statement  to your insurance company  
 
provide any update personal information to your health care provider 
 
your health care provider office may ask to see a photo id to verify your identity  please bring a photo id with you to every appointment if possible  your provider office may also ask you to confirm your date of birth  address  telephone  and other pertinent information so that they can make sure that all of your information be up to date  please be sure and tell your provider office when there be any change to your information  carefully review this information with your provider office at each visit can help to avoid problem and to address them quickly should there be any discrepancy  
 
order your free credit report 
 
to order your free the data breach be cause by an unauthorized third party who gain access to a business email account through phishing  upon discovery of the event  a forensic firm be engage to conduct an investigation  although personal information may have be in the impact business email account  it be not possible to determine conclusively whether the unauthorized party access any sensitive data  a a result  the company be offer individual complimentary identity monitor service for one year  
content of data breach notification letter  december    
 
notice of data breach 
 
what happen  
 
on monday  december     netgalley experience a data security incident  what initially seem like a simple defacement of our homepage have  with further investigation  result in the unauthorized and unlawful access to a backup file of the netgalley database  our database backup be store in the amazon cloud  one of our test server have be leave unsecured  and the credential become easily attainable by a hacker  
 
what information be involve  
 
it be possible that your netgalley profile information be expose a a result of this incident  this information include your login name and password  first last name  email address  and country  also  if supply by you  your bio  mail address  phone number  birthday  company name  and kindle email address  there be no financial information store in the netgalley database  so none be lose  
 
what be we do  
 
we re secure our test site and update our protocol to ensure their security go forward  we have also  
 
 revise our database backup procedure to ensure this data be never again expose 
 
 change all legacy password that have access to any netgalley system or data 
 
 add new security feature into the site to improve the security of your personal information 
 
 we be continue to investigate this incident and ensure that no further damage be incur  
 
what can you do  
 
to better protect your account security  netgalley be require all member to reset their password  start december rd  youll be require to reset your password before sign in to your netgalley account  
 
other important information  
 
we have inform the fbi of this data breach  your privacy and the integrity of our service be very important  we be commit to improve our protection of your personal information  
 
for more information  
 
if you have any additional question  please contact conciergenetgalley com  the breach be store in the amazon cloud  due to the test server be leave unsecured and become easily attainable by a hacker

other important information

credit report  you may obtain a free copy of your credit report once every  month from each of the three national credit report agency by visit www annualcreditreport com  by call toll free      or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can print a copy of the request form at   
 
alternatively  you may elect to purchase a copy of your credit report by contact one of the three national credit report agency  contact information for the three national credit report agency for the purpose of request a copy of your credit report or for general inquiry be a follow  
 
equifax     www equifax com p o  box  atlanta  ga  
 
experian     www experian com p o  box  allen  tx  
 
transunion     www transunion com p o  box  chester  pa  
 
fraud alert  you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  a fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit report for one    year  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any new account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three national credit report agency use the contact information list above  additional information be available at www annualcreditreport com  
 
credit and security freeze  you may have the right to place a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  so that no new credit can be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a credit freeze be design to prevent potential credit grantors from access your credit report without your consent  if you place a credit freeze  potential creditor and other third party will not be able to get access to your credit report unless you temporarily lift the freeze  therefore  use a credit freeze may delay your ability to obtain credit  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a credit freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  since the instruction for how to establish a credit freeze differ from state to state  please contact the three major credit report company a specify below to find out more information  
 
equifax security freeze     www equifax com p o  box  atlanta  ga  
 
experian security freeze     www experian com p o  box  allen  tx  
 
transunion security freeze     www transunion com p o  box  woodlyn  pa  
 
individual interact with credit report agency have right under the fair credit report act  we encourage you to review your right under the fair credit report act by visit  or by request information in write from the consumer financial protection bureau   g street n w   washington  dc   
 
this notice be not delay by a law enforcement investigation

notice of data breach 
 
dear insert customer name  
 
we be write to inform you of a cybersecurity incident that occur at tree top  inc  and it wholly own subsidiary northwest natural  inc  
 
what happen  
 
on november     we discover that unauthorized third party have gain access to tree top computer network  the hacker use a compromise user account to gain access to several of our corporate computer system and then encrypt a number of our server contain personal information use ransomware  we immediately launch a forensic investigation with the help of lead cybersecurity expert and take step to secure and restore our system  we be confident that there be no ongoing unauthorizedaccess to our network or system result from this incident  
 
you be receive this notice because your personal information may have be compromise and potentially expose to third party a a result of this incident  
 
what information be involve  
 
the personal information  a describe below  
 
  if you be a current or former employee  dependent or beneficiary  or job applicant of treetop or northwest natural   this incident may have involve your personal information  include your name  address  date of birth  social security number  bank account information  health insurance subscriber number  and in some limit case  medical information  
  if you be a member of the tree top cooperative   this incident may have involve your name  address  social security number  or tax identification number  
  if you be a mail order customer of tree top   this incident may have involve your name  address  credit card number and three digit security code  
 
what be we do  
 
upon learn of this incident  we immediately terminate the attacker access to our network and take step to ensure the security of our network and system  and to restore operation of our system  we have conduct a thorough forensic investigation with the assistance of outside cybersecurity expert  and that investigation be ongoing  we have also upgrade our security control company wide and install lead information security technology that provide around the clock monitor of our system and network to detect threat and automatically block suspicious activity in real time  
 
what can you do  
 
we strongly encourage you to review the information provide below in the section entitle step you can take to protect your personal information  
 
for more information 
 
if you have additional question  please contact our dedicate assistance line at     mon fri  be  pm pacific time  sit sun  be  pm pacific time  except holiday

we be provide complimentary credit monitor

  ensure that you enroll by  march     your code will not work after this date   
  visit the experian identityworks website to enroll

you can contact experian immediately regard any fraud issue and have access to the follow feature once you enroll in experian identityworks

  credit monitor  actively monitor of experian file for indicator of fraud  
  identity restoration  agent be available to help you address credit and non credit relate fraud

you may also monitor your account  
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review your account statement  and to monitor your free credit report for suspicious activity and to detect error  under u s  law  you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free      
 
you may also contact the three major credit bureau directly to request a free copy of your credit report  you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  you should be aware  however  that use a security freeze may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit until you lift the freeze  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report

re  incident notification 
 
dear sir or madam  
 
we be write on behalf of certain dickeys bbq pit franchisee entity  collectively   dickeys    to notify you of a security incident potentially involve iowa resident  dickeys corporate headquarter be locate at  cole avenue  suite   dallas  tx   
 
after receive report on october     that a payment card security incident may have occur at certain dickeys franchise restaurant  dickeys immediately take action to identify and stop the unauthorized activity and begin work with it franchise to conduct a coordinate and thorough investigation  forensic investigation firm be engage  dickeys also notify law enforcement and work with the payment card network to coordinate the investigation  additionally  dickeys provide a preliminary notice of the incident by post a statement on the dickeys corporate website on november     while the investigation be ongoing  
 
the investigation be nearly complete  the investigation find the installation of unauthorized code design to find payment card data at certain franchise restaurant location at different time over the general period of june     to november     for most location and a few week later for a few location  the unauthorized code be remove during the investigation  the unauthorized code be only find at approximately fifty five franchise location  there be other franchise location that be investigate  and the unauthorized code be not find  in iowa  the investigation do not identify unauthorized code at any franchise location  
 
in addition to these location  there be other location that update their payment application server or system before the investigation begin or that otherwise have a server or system that be no longer available for analysis  include one franchise location in iowa  if the unauthorized code have be install at those location  the change or update end the operation of the unauthorized code  because the investigation identify some location that still have their original payment application server or system and that have no evidence of the installation of unauthorized code  dickeys do not believe that every location that change or update it payment application server or system would have have unauthorized code install  
 
the code search for data in the format of track data read from the magnetic stripe of a payment card a it be be rout through a restaurant server  that data may have include the cardholder name  primary account number  expiration date  and internal verification value  
 
although the investigation be largely able to identify the location and time frame involve or potentially involve  it be not able to identify the specific individual potentially involve  consequently  dickeys be provide substitute notice today by issue a press release  post a statement on the dickeys corporate website  and email it big yellow cup reward member who use a payment card at an involve or potentially involve franchise location during the time frame for that location  copy of the press release  website statement  and email be attach  the website will contain a tool that customer can use to look up the franchise location and time frame involve  in addition  dickeys have establish a dedicate  toll free call center that customer can call to obtain more information regard the incident  
 
before this incident occur  many dickeys franchise restaurant have already implement a new payment system that use emv payment technology  dickeys have request that any franchisee who have not yet do so complete that implementation  dickeys also deploy an endpoint detection and response tool to device in it corporate environment during the investigation and be develop plan to keep an edr tool in place move forward  dickeys be explore additional measure to further enhance payment card security and to help prevent a similar incident from occur in the future  
 
please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any question regard this matter  
 
sincerely  
 
craig a  hoffman 
partner

content of data breach 
 
dear   name    
 
valley presbyterian hospital foundation  valley presbyterian  be write to inform you of an incident that may affect the privacy of some of your information  on thursday  july     valley presbyterian receive notification from one of our third party vendor  blackbaud  inc   blackbaud   of a cyber incident  blackbaud be a cloud compute provider that offer customer relationship management and financial service tool to organization  include valley presbyterian  upon receive notice of the cyber incident  we immediately commence an investigation to better understand the nature and scope of the incident and any impact on valley presbyterian data  this notice provide information about the blackbaud incident  our response  and resource available to you to help protect your information from possible misuse  should you feel it necessary to do so  
 
what happen  
 
blackbaud report that it experience a ransomware incident that result in encryption of certain blackbaud system between may     and may     blackbaud advise it report the incident to law enforcement and work with forensic investigator to determine the nature and scope of the incident  follow it investigation  blackbaud notify it customer that an unknown actor may have access or acquire certain blackbaud customer data  blackbaud report that the data be exfiltrated by the threat actor at some point before blackbaud lock the threat actor out of the environment on may     upon learn of the blackbaud incident  valley presbyterian immediately commence an investigation to determine what  if any  sensitive valley presbyterian data be potentially involve  this investigation include work diligently to gather further information from blackbaud to understand the scope of the incident  and on december     we determine the total population of affect individual and their contact information  
 
what information be involve  
 
our investigation determine that the involve blackbaud system contain your name and   data element    please note that  to date  we have not receive confirmation from blackbaud that your specific information be access or acquire by the unknown actor  
 
what we be do  
 
the confidentiality  privacy  and security of information in our care be among our highest priority  and we take this incident very seriously  we will also be notify state and federal regulator  a require  we be also provide  at no cost to you  complimentary credit monitor through the service of transunion for twelve month  please note that while we be make these service available to you  we be unable to enroll you in these service ourselves  enrollment information be below  
 
a a safeguard  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for one year provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company

you can sign up for the online or offline credit monitor service anytime between now and   enrollment deadline    due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  please note that credit monitor service might not be available for individual who do not have a credit file with transunion  or an address in the unite state  or it territory  and a valid social security number  or be under the age of   enroll in this service will not affect your credit score  
 
once you be enroll  you will be able to obtain one year of unlimited access to your transunion credit report and credit score  the daily credit monitor service will notify you if there be any critical change to your credit file at transunion  include fraud alert  new inquiry  new account  new public record  late payment  change of address  and more  the service also include access to an identity restoration program that provide assistance in the event your identity be compromise to help you restore your identity and up to    in identity theft insurance with no deductible   policy limitation and exclusion may apply

step you can take to help protect your information 
 
monitor account 
 
in general  we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review your account statement  and to monitor your credit report for suspicious activity  under u s  law  you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also contact the three major credit bureau directly to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below  
 
experian

allen  tx

  your full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  if you have move in the past five year  the address where you have live over the prior five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    and 
  if you be a victim of identity theft  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  the breach be due to a ransomware incident and exfiltration by an unknown actor  indicate hack by an external

step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
copy of credit report  
you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free     or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can print this form at  you also can contact one of the follow three national credit report agency  
 
transunion 
p o  box  
chester  pa  
    
www transunion com

p o  box  
allen  tx  
    
www experian com 
 
equifax 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
    
www equifax com 
 
free annual report 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
    
annualcreditreport com 
 
fraud alert  
you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least  day  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze  
under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc  or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state  resident of maryland  north carolina  and rhode island can obtain more information from their attorney general use the contact information below

the international union of bricklayer and ally craftworkers  bac  be write to inform you of a recent incident that may impact the privacy of some of your personal information  we want to provide you with information about the incident  our response  and step you may take to better protect against the possibility of identity theft and fraud  should you feel it necessary  
 
what happen  
 
on june     bac discover suspicious activity relate to certain bac employee email account  bac immediately change the password for the email account and begin an investigation with assistance from outside computer forensics specialist to determine the nature and scope of the incident  the investigation determine that the employee email account be subject to unauthorizedaccess between june     and july     while our investigation be able to confirm access to the account  the investigation be unable to rule out access to any email or attachment within the account  a a result  and with the assistance of third party forensics  we begin an extensive review of the email account to determine whether they contain any sensitive information and to whom the information relate  the forensic investigator complete it careful  time consume analysis of the content of the email account on september     and prepare a list of potentially impact individual whose information be determine to be present in the email or attachment possibly view by the unauthorized personal record to locate the address for certain potentially affect individual  bac also notify state regulator  a require  
 
what information be involve  
 
the follow type of personal information have be subject to actual or attempt misuse in relation to this incident  
 
what we be do  
 
we take this incident and the security of personal safeguard to further secure the information in our system  we also notify regulatory authority  a require by law  a an add precaution  bac be also offer twelve    month of complimentary access to credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration service through transunion  individual who wish to receive these service must enroll by follow the attach enrollment instruction  
 
what you can do

for more information

bac sincerely regret any inconvenience or concern this incident may have cause you

content of data breach 
 
dear   first name     middle name     last name     suffix    
 
we regret to inform you that one of our third party vendor  blackbaud  experience a cyber incident that may have allow access to some of your personal information  a a result  you be entitle to free credit monitor and fraud assistance service  
 
what happen  
 
blackbaud be an engagement and fundraise software service provider that offer multiple solution to non profit company  school  and institution across the unite state  blackbaud be the target of a ransomware attack  and the cyber criminal may have have access to specific personal information identify below between february and may     
 
once blackbaud detect the intrusion  it be able to halt further system access  the cyber criminal only gain access to certain back up file in specific blackbaud solution  blackbaud  in conjunction with the fbi  investigate the incident and ultimately pay a ransom to the cyber criminal under the assurance that any exfiltrated file would be destroy  their system be fully restore after ransom payment  through vigilant monitor post incident  blackbaud report that there have be no evidence of improper use of any of the data file that may have be expose  blackbaud have already implement change to their data security protocol to prevent a similar incident from occur again  
 
a part of their continue investigation  blackbaud discover when it merge data from previous version of some of their solution into current version  there be hide table contain the older data  which include unencrypted personal information  merge into the new program which be not visible  we be notify of this new exposure on september     and take action to verify and determine scope  we be notify you now of the breach  a it take time to coordinate with blackbaud and their cooperation in produce the hide data file  accord to blackbaud  the information be expose because the company fail to destroy or encrypt certain legacy file after a migration of our file to a new platform  
 
what pi be expose  
 
at this time  we be inform that sensitive personal information  include your name  phone number  address  and social security or tax identification number  may have be expose  this be older data from the prior legacy version of the program that be use before migration  
 
what you can do  
 
to help you guard against identity theft or other potential fraud a a result of this incident  blackbaud be offer free credit monitor and fraud assistance service for  month  information about how to access these service accompany this letter  although service be available to you  it be important to remain vigilant and promptly report any suspect fraud to law enforcement  for information on avoid identity theft  please visit www ftc gov idtheft  
 
in addition  security expert suggest that you contact your financial institution and all major credit bureau immediately to inform them of such a breach and then take whatever step be recommend to protect your interest  include the possible placement of a fraud alert on your credit file

what happen

what information be involve

step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  
 
a a precautionary measure  i recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
copy of credit report  
 
you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free     or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can print this form at  you also can contact one of the follow three national credit report agency

fraud alert  
 
you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least  day  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze  
 
under federal law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  you cannot be charge to place  lift or remove a security freeze  
 
additional free resource  
 
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state  contact information for the ftc be  federal trade commission   pennsylvania ave  nw  washington  dc   www consumer ftc gov or www ftc gov idtheft       
 
you also have certain right under the fair credit report act  fcra   
 
these right include know what be in your file  to dispute incomplete or inaccurate information  to have consumer report agency correct or delete inaccurate  incomplete  or unverifiable information  a well a others  for more information about the fcra  and your right under the fcra  please visit  the incident involve compromise of payment card information belong to individual who make purchase through the organization online store

content of data breach 
 
we be write to inform you that your personal information may have be compromise due to a possible data breach within our system  we regret to inform you of this incident and want to assure you that we be take step to address the issue  
 
what happen  
 
between october th to th  our office receive several irs e file rejection due to tax return already be on file with the irs for  for client we be then process  
 
what information be involve  
 
the type of information that we believe may have be compromise include  
 
  name 
  address 
  social security number 
  bank account information  if in our system for refund or electronic fund withdrawal for tax file 
  date of birth 
  driver license number  if you have provide this to u for e file in the past 
  dependent s  name  social security number s  and date s  of birth 
 
what be we do  
 
after receive several irs e file rejection  we spend the next several week work with multiple it forensic service to determine if our office be the source of the issue  during the course of these investigation  a malware file be detect and immediately delete  we have not be inform that the malware specifically operate in any particular manner  however  base on the investigation conduct  it be determine that it be more likely than not that the malware file be the source of the compromise that lead to the fraudulent tax return  we have reason to believe that on september     a malware file gain access to one of our server and allow a perpetrator to access  and  income tax data  
 
a part of our ongoing commitment to the security of your information  we implement increase security measure  include a top tier anti virus software  eset  on all of our workstation  please know that since this determination  our office have be in contact with the internal revenue service  where an independent review be be perform to determine whether your tax account have be compromise and to attempt to identify the perpetrator

you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below

re  notification to american anesthesiology patient of business associate data security event 
 
dear name  
 
we be write to inform you of a security event that may have impact your personal information be store within email account that be access by an unauthorized party follow a phishing event  
 
we want to assure you that we take patient privacy very seriously  and while we be not aware of any actual or attempt misuse of personal information  
 
what happen  
 
on july     we be notify that an unauthorized party have gain access to several email account on our business associate microsoft office  host email system  o system  between june     and june     through phishing  base on the investigation that our business associate perform  and ultimately complete in november   your personal information be store within one or more of these email account  we cannot tell from available forensic evidence if these file be actually view by the unauthorized party  the unauthorized action we be able to see in these email account all appear to be in furtherance of unsuccessful payroll fraud attempt  effort to change the bank detail for employee pay be not successful  
 
what information be available  
 
our business associate have report that personal information may have include  
 
  patient contact information  such a patient name  guarantor name  address  email address  and date of birth  
  state identification number and or social security number 
  health insurance information  payor name  payor contract date  policy information include type and deductible amount and subscriber medicare medicaid number  
  medical and or treatment information  date of service  location  service request or procedure perform  diagnosis  prescription information  physical record number  
  bill  payment  and claim information  invoice  payment detail  submit claim and appeal  and patient account identifier use by your provider  
 
please note that not all of these data field may have be involve for all individual  
 
what we be do 
 
after discover the phishing event  our business associate take step to terminate the unauthorized party access to the o system  this include  for example  reset each user password for the email account where unauthorized activity be detect  the email account on the o system that be use by american anesthesiology employee have now be move over to our email system  we have add authentication requirement to restrict access to the email account of these american anesthesiology employee  we also will be introduce additional authentication and security training requirement for all of our employee in  to counteract phishing and other social engineer technique

identity protection reference guide 
 
  review your credit report  we recommend that you remain vigilant by monitor your credit report for any activity you do not recognize  under federal law  you be entitle every  month to one free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report company  
 
  place fraud alert with the three credit bureau  you can place a fraud alert at one of the three major credit bureau by phone and also via experians or equifaxs website  
 
  place security freeze  by place a security freeze  someone who fraudulently acquire your personally identify information will not be able to use that information to open new account or borrow money in your name  
 
  monitor your account statement  we encourage you to carefully monitor your financial account statement  medical provider statement  and insurance statement for fraudulent activity and report anything suspicious to the respective institution or provider  
 
  you can obtain additional information about the step you can take to avoid identity theft and more information about fraud alert and security freeze from the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
detail regard your experian identityworks membership 
 
american anesthesiology  inc  be offer you a one year  complimentary membership for identityworkssm  a product offer by experian  to help with detection and resolution the breach be cause by outsider who gain unauthorizedaccess to the system through phishing  
content of data breach notification letter  re  notice of data incident 
 
dear   name     
 
u fertility  usf  provide it platform and service to several infertility clinic  include   variable data  practice    usf be commit to protect the security and confidentiality of health information we gather in provide service  we be write to make you aware of a recent incident that may affect the privacy of some of your protect health information  please read this letter carefully and be sure to contact u with any question or concern you may have  
 
what happen  
 
on september     usf experience an it security event  the incident  that involve the inaccessibility of certain computer system on our network a a result of a malware infection  we respond to the incident immediately and retain third party computer forensic specialist to assist in our investigation  through our immediate investigation and response  we determine that data on a number of server and workstation connect to our domain have be encrypt by ransomware  we proactively remove a number of system from our network upon discover the incident  with the assistance of our third party computer forensic specialist  we remediate the malware identify  ensure the security of our environment  and reconnected system on september     we also notify federal law enforcement authority of the incident and continue to cooperate with their investigation  the forensic investigation be now conclude and confirm that the unauthorized actor acquire a limit number of file during the period of unauthorizedaccess  which occur between august    and september     when the ransomware be execute  
 
what information be involve  
 
we have be work diligently with a specialize team of third party data auditor to perform a comprehensive review of all information contain in the file access without authorization a a result of the incident  the purpose of this review be to accurately identify any individual whose personal information may have be present within the impact file and therefore accessible to the unauthorized actor  we recently receive the result of this review and determine on december     that the follow information relate to you be include in the impact file when they be access without authorization  name and   breach element    the impact file may have also contain your date of birth  please note  however  that we have no evidence of actual misuse of your information a a result of the incident  
 
what we be do  
 
in response to the incident  usf have take the follow action to mitigate any risk of compromise to your information and to better prevent a similar event from recur     fortify the security of our firewall     utilize the forensic specialist engage to monitor network activity and remediate any suspicious activity     provide notification to potentially impact individual a quickly a possible  we be also adapt our exist employee training protocol relate to data protection and security  include training target at recognize phishing email  we believe these step will be effective in mitigate any potential harm to you  a always  we encourage you to review your account statement  explanation of benefit  and credit report carefully for unexpected activity and to report any questionable activity to the associate institution immediately

the american federation of musician and employer pension fund  afmepf  be write to inform you of a recent incident that may impact the privacy of some of your personal information  we want to provide you with information about the incident  our response  and step you may take to better protect against the possibility of identity theft and fraud  should you feel it necessary  
 
what happen  
 
on august     afmepf discover suspicious activity relate to an afmepf employee email account  afmepf immediately change the user password and begin an investigation with assistance from outside cyber forensic specialist to determine the nature and scope of the incident  the investigation determine that unauthorizedaccess to the email account occur between may     and august     however  the forensic investigation be unable to determine access to specific email and or attachment  afmepf  in an abundance of caution and with the assistance of third party forensics  begin an extensive review of the email account to determine whether it contain any sensitive information and if so  to whom the information relate  this review be complete on october     at which time afmepf search it internal record to locate the address for the potentially affect individual  this review be conclude on december     
 
what information be involve  
 
the follow type of information be find within the impact email account  your name and   breach element    to date  we have no indication that any information have be subject to actual or attempt misuse in relation to this incident

due to the complex nature of the data involve  an extensive review be require to ascertain the type of data that may have be affect  this review be conduct a swiftly a possible but take month to complete  it be determine that your information may have be involve in the incident  a a result  we be contact you to offer credit and identity monitor service at no cost to you  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information involve may have include your name  address  telephone number  email address  date of birth  social security or other governmental id number  financial account information  medical relate information  health insurance or medical id number and or other relate employment record  
 
what we be do  
 
a soon a we discover this incident  we take the measure reference above  we engage in a thorough review of this incident and have undertake effort to minimize the likelihood of such an incident happen again

what you can do

other important information  
 
by take the follow simple step and avail yourself of the experian service describe above  you can further protect your personal information  
 
review your credit report  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review account statement and monitor credit report  you can receive free credit report by place fraud alert and through your credit monitor  under federal law  you also be entitle every  month to one free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report company  to obtain a free annual credit report  go to www annualcreditreport com  call      or complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   
 
you can also contact one of the follow three national credit report agency  
 
equifax     p o  box  atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
experian     p o  box  allen  tx  www experian com 
 
transunion     p o  box  chester  pa  www transunion com 
 
you may wish to stagger your request so that you receive a free report by one of the three credit bureau every four month  
 
if you discover any suspicious item and have enroll with experian  notify them immediately by call or by visit their member website and file a theft report  
 
if you file a theft report with experian  you will be contact by a member of the recovery department who will help you determine the cause of the suspicious item  in the unlikely event that you fall victim to identity theft a a consequence of this incident  you will be assign a recovery advocate who will work on your behalf to identify  stop  and reverse the damage quickly  
 
notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  you should know that you have the right to file a police report if you ever experience identity fraud  please note that in order to file a crime report or incident report with law enforcement for identity theft  you will likely need to provide some kind of proof that you have be a victim  a police report be often require to dispute fraudulent item  you can report suspect incident of identity theft to local law enforcement  
 
fraud alert  you may want to consider place a fraud alert with the three credit bureau  you can place a fraud alert at one of the three major credit bureau by phone and also via experians website  a fraud alert tell creditor to follow certain procedure  include contact you  before they open any new account or change your exist account  for that reason  place page  a fraud alert can protect you  but also may delay you when you seek to obtain credit  the contact information to place fraud alert at all three bureau be a follow  
 
equifax fraud report     p o  box  atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
experian fraud report     p o  box  allen  tx  www experian com 
 
transunion fraud report     fraud victim assistance division p o  box  fullerton  ca   www transunion com 
 
it be necessary to contact only one of these bureau and use only one of these method to place a fraud alert  a soon a one of the three bureau confirm your fraud alert  the others be notify to place alert on their record a well  you will receive confirmation letter in the mail and will then be able to order all three credit report  free of charge  for your review  
 
security freeze  by place a freeze  someone who fraudulently acquire your personal credit report bureau list above in write to place the freeze  keep in mind that when you place the freeze  you will not be able to borrow money  obtain instant credit  or get a new credit card until you temporarily lift or permanently remove the freeze  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
you also have certain right under the fair credit report act  fcra   these right include to know what be in your file  to dispute incomplete or inaccurate information  to have consumer report agency correct or delete inaccurate  incomplete  or unverifiable information  a well a other right  for more information about the fcra  and your right pursuant to the fcra  please visit

dear   name

what happen  
 
on september     we become aware of some unusual activity involve one of the third party vendor that operate our website  we take immediate action to secure the system and investigate the situation  include engage forensic investigator to assess what occur  during the investigation  we discover that an unauthorized third party access some of our cloud storage on september     
 
what information be involve  
 
we complete a review of the content of the impact cloud storage  however  the investigation be unable to determine whether the unauthorized party actually view any specific data in the system  in an abundance of caution  we be notify anyone whose personal information be store in the access cloud storage  which may include your   variable data element    
 
what we be do  
 
upon discover the unauthorized user  we make change to our system to prevent that unauthorized party from further access our system  to help prevent something like this from happen in the future  we be take step to enhance our exist security program  implement multiple layer of protective measure  ensure that we follow best practice in the security of our data storage  and re educate our staff in proper handle of secure data  
 
what you can do  
 
while we have no indication that your information be actually view by the unauthorized party  or that it have be misuse  we want to notify you of this incident and remind you that it be always advisable to remain vigilant for sign of unauthorized activity by review your financial account statement  if you see charge or activity you do not authorize  we suggest that you contact the provider immediately  in an abundance of caution  we be offer you a complimentary membership in experians identityworkssm  this product provide you with identity detection and resolution of identity theft  identityworks be completely free to you  and enroll in this program will not hurt your credit score  for more information on identityworks  include instruction on how to activate your complimentary one year membership  a well a some additional step you can take in response  please see the additional information provide in the follow page

if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record

fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on the unauthorized party be able to access certain employee email account between december     and may     which lead to the potential compromise of personal information contain within the email and attachment  while the investigation could not determine if any email or attachment be view by the unauthorized actor  the incident involve unauthorizedaccess by a third party to the organization computer system  which fall under the hack type of breach  
content of data breach 
 
dear   name     
 
i be write to inform you of a data security incident that may have involve your personal information  
 
what happen  
 
ale become aware of unusual activity within it network environment and discover that it have be the victim of data encryption by an unknown actor  upon discover this activity  we take immediate step to secure our environment and launch an investigation with the assistance of lead independent digital forensics and cybersecurity expert  our investigation determine that unauthorized party may have gain access to or download certain ale data a a result of this incident between april and june   we promptly begin a thorough review of the potentially affect data  which reveal that some of your personal information may have be contain therein  on december     we complete our review and gather contact information need to notify all potentially affect individual  
 
what information be involve  
 
the potentially affect information may include your name and social security number  
 
what be we do  
 
a soon a ale discover the incident  we take the measure describe above  we have also improve our system to reduce the likelihood of a similar incident occur in the future  these improvement include deployment of an advance threat detection tool with twenty four hour active monitor by a cybersecurity operation team  implement harden procedure for network administration  and implement multifactor user authentication  
 
in addition  we be provide you with information about step that you can take to help protect your personal information and  a an add precaution  we be offer you a one year membership to transunion interactives mytrueidentity credit monitor and identity restoration service at no cost to you  this product provide you with premier credit monitor and identity theft resolution  include up to  million of identity theft insurance coverage  to receive these service  you must be over the age of   have establish credit in the u s   have a social security number in your name  and have a u s  residential address associate with your credit file  the deadline to enroll be   enrollment deadline    
 
what can you do  
 
you can follow the recommendation include with this letter to help protect your information  specifically  we recommend that you review your credit report for unusual activity  if you see anything that you do not understand or that look suspicious  you should contact the consumer report agency for assistance use the contact information include with this letter  in addition  you can enroll in the free credit monitor service that we be offer to you through transunion interactive  enrollment instruction be include with this letter  
 
for more information  
 
further information about how to protect your personal information  
 
we take your trust in u and this matter very seriously and we deeply regret any worry or inconvenience that this may cause you  
 
sincerely  
 
robert zimmers  ceo 
ale solution  inc  
 
step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant  especially over the next  to  month  and review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you should also promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  the ftc   
 
copy of credit report  
 
you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free     or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can also contact one of the follow three national credit report agency

fraud alert  
 
you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least  day  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze  
 
in some u s  state  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  
 
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state  contact information for the ftc be  federal trade commission   pennsylvania ave  nw  washington  dc   www consumer ftc gov or www ftc gov idtheft       resident of new york  maryland  north carolina  and rhode island can obtain more information from their attorney general use the contact information below

dear   first name     middle name     last name     suffix    
 
we regret to inform you that our third party fundraise software provider  blackbaud  experience a global data security breachool  unfortunately  this incident involve the potential exposure of personal information of some of our community member  
 
the compromise data do not contain any credit card information or other personally identifiable information such a bank account information  usernames  password  or social security number  
 
while the cyber attack do not occur at wildwood school or a a result of any action on our part  we take the protection of our communitys information very seriously and want to make you aware of the incident  what it may mean to you  and step you can take to secure your information  
 
what happen  
 
blackbaud be a software service provider use by non profit company  school  and institution  earlier this year  blackbaud be the subject of a ransomware attack  and the cyber criminal may have have access to specific personal under the assurance that any exfiltrated file would be destroy  and their system be fully restore after ransom payment  through vigilant monitor post incident  blackbaud report that there have be no evidence of improper use of any of the data file that may have be expose  blackbaud have already implement change to their data security protocol to prevent a similar incident from occur again  
 
what be expose  
 
wildwood receive notice of this incident in july   include information on the specific blackbaud solution back ups expose  we immediately take action to understand the potential exposure and scope of personal information or financial information be expose  a all such information be encrypt  
 
what you can do  
 
we advise you to remain vigilant in review your account statement  monitor and place a fraud alert on your free credit report  please refer to the enclose information for the resource available to you  and the step that you can take to further protect your personal information  
 
security expert suggest that you contact your financial institution and all major credit bureau immediately to inform them of such a breach and then take whatever step be recommend to protect your interest  include the possible placement of a fraud alert on your credit file  
 
for more information  
 
we recognize that you may have question not address in this letter  if you have additional question  please call kroll at  xxx xxx xxxx  monday through friday    a m  to   p m  central time  kroll representative have be fully verse on the incident and can answer question or concern you may have regard protection of your personal information

fraud alert  you can place fraud alert with the three credit bureau by phone and online with equifax  transunion  or experian  a fraud alert tell creditor to follow certain procedure  include contact you  before they open any new account or change your exist account  for that reason  place a fraud alert can protect you  but also may delay you when you seek to obtain credit  a of september     initial fraud alert last for one year  victim of identity theft can also get an extend fraud alert for seven year  the phone number for all three credit bureau be at the bottom of this page  
 
monitor  you should always remain vigilant and monitor your account for suspicious or unusual activity  
 
security freeze  you also have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you need to make a request to each consumer report agency  you may make that request by certify mail  overnight mail  regular stamp mail  or by follow the instruction find at the website list below  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that if you be request a credit report for your spouse or a minor under the age of   this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past five year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible  display your name and current mail address  and the date of issue  a of september     it be free to place  lift  or remove a security freeze  you may also place a security freeze for child under the age of   you may obtain a free security freeze by contact any one or more of the follow national consumer report agency

content of data breach 
 
dear friend of fairmont private school  
 
we regret to inform you that one of our third party vendor  blackbaud  experience a cyber incident that may have allow access to some of your personal information  a a result  you be entitle to free credit monitor and fraud assistance service  
 
what happen  
 
blackbaud be a software service provider that offer engagement and fundraise solution to non profit company  school  and institution across the unite state  between february and may     blackbaud be the victim of a ransomware attack  and the cyber criminal may have have access to specific personal under the assurance that any exfiltrated file would be destroy  after the ransom payment  their system be fully restore  through vigilant monitor post incident  blackbaud report that there have be no evidence of improper use of any of the data file that may have be expose  blackbaud have already implement change to their data security protocol to prevent a similar incident from occur again  
 
a part of their continue investigation  blackbaud discover that when it merge data from previous version of some of their solution into current version  there be hide table contain the older data  which include unencrypted personal information  merge into the new program which be not visible  we be notify of this new exposure on september     and take action to verify and determine scope  which require the cooperation of blackbaud in produce the hide data file  accord to blackbaud  the information be expose because the company fail to destroy or encrypt certain legacy file after a migration of our file to a new platform  
 
what pi be expose  
 
at this time  we be inform that sensitive personal information  include your name  phone number  address  and social security or tax identification number  be expose  this be older data from the prior legacy version of the program that be use prior to migration  
 
what you can do  
 
to help you guard against identity theft or other potential fraud a a result of this incident  blackbaud be offer free credit monitor and fraud assistance service for  month  information about how to access these service accompany this letter  although service be available to you  it be important to remain vigilant and promptly report any suspect fraud to law enforcement  for information on avoid identity theft  please visit www ftc gov idtheft  
 
in addition  security expert suggest that you contact your financial institution and all major credit bureau immediately to inform them of such a breach and then take whatever step be recommend to protect your interest  include the possible placement of a fraud alert on your credit file  
 
we encourage you to contact cyberscout to enroll in free cyberscout service by go to  and use the enrollment code provide above  please note the deadline to enroll be march     
 
again  at this time  there be no evidence that your information have be misuse  however  we encourage you to take full advantage of this service offer  enclose hereto you will find additional information regard the resource available to you  and the step that you can take to further protect your personal information  
 
for more information  
 
if you have additional question  please call kroll at                monday through friday    a m  to   p m  central time  kroll representative have be fully inform about the incident and can answer question or concern you may have regard protection of your personal information  
 
fairmont private school value the security of your personal data  and we apologize for any inconvenience that this incident have cause  
 
sincerely  
 
chad jackson

content of data breach notification letter  re  important security notification 
 
please read this entire letter  communication worker of america  afl cio  cwa  recently discover an incident that may affect the security of your personal information  we want to provide you with information about the incident  step we be take in response  and step you may take to guard against identity theft and fraud  should you feel it be appropriate to do so  
 
what happen  
 
a document  originally create in  and contain in an unencrypted format certain information pertain to you  be copy to a private server and be available without a login or password for an unknown period  
 
what information be involve  
 
the document contain your personal information  include your name and social security number  
 
what we be do  
 
we take the protection of your personal information seriously and be take step to prevent a similar occurrence  upon discovery that your data be more accessible than intend  cwa promptly remove the data from the server and begin effort to determine whether the information have be access without authorization  cwa have not maintain data in the format in which it appear on this server for some time  a an add precaution  staff will receive extra data handle and cybersecurity training in order to ensure that member information continue to be handle with the utmost care  
 
to help protect your identity  we be offer complimentary access to experian identity workssm for twelve    month  if you believe there be fraudulent use of your information a a result of this incident and would like to discuss how you may be able to resolve those issue  please reach out to an experian agent  if  after discuss your situation with an agent  it be determine that identity restoration support be need then an experian identity restoration agent be available to work with you to investigate and resolve each incident of fraud that occur from the date of the incident  include  a appropriate  help you with contact credit grantors to dispute charge and close account  assist you in place a freeze on your credit file with the three major credit bureau  and assist you with contact government agency to help restore your identity to it proper condition   
 
please note that identity restoration be available to you for twelve    month from the date of this letter and do not require any action on your part at this time  the term and condition for this offer be locate at www experianidworks com restoration  
 
while identity restoration assistance be immediately available to you  we also encourage you to activate the fraud detection tool available through experian identityworks a a complimentary twelve    month membership  this product provide you with superior identity detection and resolution of identity theft  to start monitor your personal information  please follow the step below  
 
ensure that you enroll by april     your code will not work after this date   visit the experian identityworks website to enroll   provide your activation code

re  notice of data event 
 
dear sir or madam  
 
we represent national western life insurance company  nwl  locate at  north mopac expressway  build   austin  tx   and be write to supplement our previous notification to your office of an incident that may affect the security of some personal information relate to iowa resident  nwl be share confidential commercial and financial information  should there be a request to share this information beyond the department  we ask that you advise u of same  disclosure of such information could harm or impair nwls private interest in control the availability of intrinsically valuable record  include record relate to security and business operation  
 
nature of the data event 
 
a discuss in nwls preliminary notice to your office  on august     nwl discover a malware incident impact certain company system  nwl immediately launch an investigation  with the assistance of third party investigator  to determine the nature and scope of this event  the investigation determine that certain file be access by an unauthorized actor a a result of this event  on or about september    a third party firm be engage to programmatically and manually review the file at issue to identify all impact individual and the type of data associate with those individual  a significant number of file require review and that review be ongoing  concurrently  nwl internally review their database and on december     preliminarily determine the scope of impact individual a a result of this internal review  on january    nwl confirm that seven thousand six hundred three     iowa resident be include in the impact individual identify through their preliminary internal review  this notice will be supplement with additional information upon completion of the the breach be cause by a malware incident that impact certain company system and file be access by an unauthorized actor  
content of data breach

what happen

what information be involve

what blackbaud be do

what we be do

a a precaution  we be offer you a complimentary one year membership from mytrueidentity through transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  the service be completely free to you and enroll in this program will not hurt your credit score  we encourage you to remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report for any unauthorized activity
