additional step you can take  
 
enroll in credit monitor  
 
a a safeguard  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online  three bureau credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for one year provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  
 
how to enroll  
 
you can sign up online or via u s  mail delivery  to enroll in this service  go to the mytrueidentity website at www mytrueidentity com and  in the space reference a enter activation code  enter the  letter activation code    letter activation code   and follow the three step to receive your credit monitor service online within minute  if you do not have access to the internet and wish to enroll in a similar offline  paper base  three bureau credit monitor service  via u s  mail delivery  please call the transunion fraud response service toll free hotline at      when prompt  enter the six digit telephone passcode   telephone pass code   and follow the step to enroll in the offline credit monitor service  add an initial fraud alert to your credit file  or to speak to a transunion representative if you believe you may be a victim of identity theft  
 
you can sign up for the online or offline credit monitor service anytime between now and   enrollment deadline    due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  please note that credit monitor service might not be available for individual who do not have a credit file with transunion or an address in the unite state  or it territory  and a valid social security number  enroll in this service will not affect your credit score  
 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
 
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
 
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  
 
contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud   an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  
 
there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal information  
 
after receive your freeze request  each credit bureau will provide you with a unique pin  personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  
 
a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  if you opt for a temporary lift because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit bureau  
 
a summary of your right under the fair credit report act  
 
the federal fair credit report act  fcra  promote the accuracy  fairness  and privacy of information in the file of consumer report agency  there be many type of consumer report agency  include credit bureau and specialty agency  such a agency that the breach involve the unauthorizedaccess to computer system contain personal gain access to some of the system

  your full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc

  date of birth

  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    
  if you be a victim of identity theft  include a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft  
 
a an alternative to a security freeze  you have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on your file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a one year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the agency list below

content of data breach notification letter  dear   name     
 
we regret to inform you that on december     the thyssenkrupp material group of company in the unite state and canada  tk material  experience a ransomware attack that encrypt our server and workstation  we immediately take action to investigate and isolate the attack and secure our it environment  
 
the threat actor have access to the data in our system which could include hr information about our current and former employee  the information we maintain about you may include one or more of the follow  name  address  social security number  birthdate  direct deposit information  payroll information  health information  and contact information  
 
we take the security of personal information very seriously  and we want to assure you that we have already take step to prevent a reoccurrence by increase the monitor of our network  further improve access control  and harden our system  
 
a previously communicate  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online  three bureau credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for two year provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  
 
to enroll in this service  go to the mytrueidentity website at www mytrueidentity com and enter the  letter activation code   insert unique  letter activation code    if you do not have access to the internet and wish to enroll in a similar offline  paper base  three bureau credit monitor service  via u s  mail delivery  please call the transunion fraud response service toll free hotline at

please review the enclose additional important information section include with this letter  this section describe additional step you can take to help protect yourself  include recommendation by the federal trade commission  ftc   regard identity theft protection and detail on how to place a fraud alert or a security freeze on your credit file  should you choose to do so  you can also contact the ftc for more information  
 
if you have additional question or concern regard this incident  please call     monday through friday from   a m  to   p m  eastern time  
 
we take the security of all information in our system very seriously  please know that the protection of your personal information be our utmost priority  and we sincerely regret any concern or inconvenience that this matter may cause you

ellen wood

additional important information  
 
for resident of iowa  you be advise to report any suspect identity theft to law enforcement or to the attorney general  
 
for resident of oregon  you be advise to report any suspect identity theft to law enforcement  include the attorney general  and the federal trade commission  
 
for resident of new mexico  you be advise to review your personal account statement and credit report  a applicable  to detect error result from the security incident  and your right pursuant to the federal fair credit report act  please see the contact information for the federal trade commission list below  
 
for resident of the district of columbia  illinois  maryland  new york  north carolina  and rhode island  you can obtain information from the district of columbia  maryland  north carolina  new york  and rhode island office of the attorney general and the federal trade commission about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  
 
for resident of massachusetts and rhode island  you have the right to obtain a police report if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
for resident of all state  it be recommend that you remain vigilant for incident of fraud and identity theft by review payment card account statement and monitor your credit report for unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  whether or not you suspect any unauthorized activity on your account  you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  to order your free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com  or call toll free at      you can also order your annual free credit report by mail a complete annual credit report request form to  annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga     
 
fraud alert  you can place fraud alert with the three credit bureau by phone and online with equifax  experian  or transunion  a fraud alert tell creditor to follow certain procedure  include contact you  before they open any new account or change your exist account  for that reason  place a fraud alert can protect you  but also may delay you when you seek to obtain credit  initial fraud alert last for one year  victim of identity theft can also get an extend fraud alert for seven year  
 
monitor  you should always remain vigilant and monitor your account for suspicious or unusual activity  
 
security freeze  you also have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you need to make a request to each consumer report agency by certify mail  overnight mail  regular stamp mail  or by follow the instruction find at the website list below  it be free to place  lift  or remove a security freeze  the data breach notification describe a ransomware attack by an external that encrypt server and workstation of the thyssenkrupp material group of company  include hr information about it current and former employee

notice of data breach 
 
on behalf of auris health  inc   i be write to inform you about a data relate incident that unfortunately involve certain personal information seriously  which be why we want to make you aware of this incident and the step we be take in response  
 
what happen 
 
we discover that an unauthorized actor have access to an auris employee email account begin in march   upon learn of this event  we terminate the unauthorized actor access to our employee email account and undertake an internal investigation  
 
what information be involve 
 
base on our investigation  we have determine that the personal information  social security number  tax identification number  passport number  health insurance number  health information  payment card information  and financial account number s   
 
what we be do 
 
in addition to provide notice to all potentially impact individual and applicable regulator  we be work to determine the full nature and scope of the event so that we can remediate any identify vulnerability and ensure the security of our system  we also plan to take additional measure design to enhance our security control and prevent this type of incident from recur  include implement additional email login authentication measure  
 
what you can do 
 
please know that protect the privacy and security of your information be critical to u  and we regret any inconvenience or frustration this incident may cause  additionally and consistent with certain law  we be provide you with the information below about general step that you can take to protect against potential misuse of personal information  a a precaution  we have arrange for you  at your option  to enroll in a complimentary two year credit and identity monitor service  we have engage equifax to provide you with id patrol b  which be equifaxs three bureau credit and identity fraud monitor service  you have until july     to activate the free credit monitor service by use the follow activation code        this code be unique for your use and should not be share  to enroll  go to www myservices equifax com patrol  
 
for more information 
 
we have establish a toll free phone number with equifax to answer any question or concern you may have or if you want additional information  the number be      you can also email u at inquiriesaurishealth com  
 
page  of  
ny  v 
 
sincerely  
 
eric davidson 
president  flexible robotics 
auris health  inc  
 
step you can take to protect against potential misuse of personal information 
 
always remain vigilant for incident of fraud and identity theft  include by regularly review your account statement and monitor free credit report  if you discover any suspicious or unusual activity on your account or suspect identity theft or fraud  be sure to report it immediately to your financial institution  
 
in addition  you may contact the federal trade commission  ftc  or your attorney general  to report incident of identity theft or to learn about step you can take to protect yourself from identity theft  to learn more  you can go to the ftcs web site  at www consumer gov idtheft  or call the ftc  at    idtheft     or write to federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc   
 
periodically obtain credit report from each nationwide credit report agency  if you discover information on your credit report arise from a fraudulent transaction  you should request that the credit report agency delete that information from your credit report file  in addition  under the federal fair credit report act  fcra   you be entitle to one free copy of your credit report every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  you may obtain a free copy of your credit report by go to www annualcreditreport com or by call       you may contact the nationwide credit report agency at

what happen 
 
since   the officer  director  and staff of the brotherhood relief   compensation fund have work tirelessly to serve the membership  the fund have face many challenge through the year  and we know that will always be the case  unfortunately  the latest challenge occur when the fund become the target of a cyber attack on january     the fund immediately launch a system recovery effort and engage the service of a highly recommend digital forensic investigation firm  unfortunately  the result of the investigation cannot identify the criminal responsible  
 
what information be involve 
 
although there be no evidence that any personal information be compromise  the follow type of information be contain in the fund database  name  address  date of birth  social security insurance number  telephone number  and bank account information  if provide  
 
what we be do 
 
the fund have conduct a review of system security  we have deploy additional  redundant safeguard to protect member information  we be also reassess our business relationship with several information technology provider  
 
in addition to fully comply with all report requirement  the fund will extend credit monitor and identity protective service to every individual in our database out of an abundance of caution  we be offer identity theft protection service through idx  the data breach and recovery service expert  idx identity protection service include   month  month of credit and cyberscan monitor  a    insurance reimbursement policy  and fully manage id theft recovery service  with this protection  idx will help you resolve issue if your identity be compromise

content of data breach 
 
dear   name     
 
san francisco conservatory of music  sfcm  be write to make you aware of a data privacy event at our third party vendor  blackbaud  inc   blackbaud   that may affect the privacy of some of your personal information  blackbaud be a cloud compute provider that offer customer relationship management and financial service tool to organization  include sfcm  this notice provide information about the blackbaud incident  sfcms response  and resource available to you to help protect your information from possible misuse  should you feel it necessary to do so  
 
what happen  
 
sfcm receive information from blackbaud that it experience an attempt ransomware incident that impact certain blackbaud system  blackbaud report the incident to law enforcement and work with forensic investigator to determine the nature and scope of the incident  blackbauds investigation determine that an unknown actor may have access or acquire certain blackbaud customer data  blackbaud further report that data be exfiltrated by the threat actor at some point before blackbaud lock the threat actor out of the environment on may     sfcm receive a supplemental notification from blackbaud on september     that this incident impact personal list of affect individual be complete on or about january     
 
what information be involve  
 
our investigation  and that of blackbaud  determine that the involve blackbaud system contain your name and   impact data element    
 
what we be do  
 
the confidentiality  privacy  and security of information in our care be among our highest priority  and we take this incident very seriously  a part of our ongoing commitment to the security of information in our care  we be work to review our exist policy and procedure regard our third party vendor  and be work with blackbaud to evaluate additional measure and safeguard to protect against this type of incident in the future  
 
we be also offer you access to complimentary credit monitor and identity protection service for  month through cyberscout  these service include fraud consultation and identity theft restoration service  enrollment instruction can be find in the enclose step you can take to help protect your information  
 
what you can do  
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review your account statement  and credit report for suspicious activity  you may also review the information contain in the attach step you can take to help protect your information  there you will also find more information on the credit monitor and identity protection service we be make available to you

notice of data breach 
 
dear   first name     last name    
 
we be write to inform you of a data security incident affect sn service corporation  sn  that have result in the exposure of some of your personal information  although we be not aware of the misuse of any of your information  we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this incident may cause  
 
what happen 
 
on or about october     sn experience a cybersecurity attack know a ransomware  during a ransomware attack  cyberattackers attempt to digitally lock a company data and hold it for ransom  in response to the incident  sn immediately lock down affect system and engage a third party team of forensics expert to determine the potential impact to our borrower  in addition  sn immediately notify the appropriate authority of the incident  
 
what information be involve 
 
base on the preliminary result of the investigation  we determine that some of your information have be acquire by the individual s  responsible for the incident  this information be largely limit to march  bill statement and fee notice which may include  but be potentially not limit to  your name  address  loan number  balance information and bill information such a charge assess  owe and or pay  
 
we be still in the process of conduct a comprehensive investigation of this incident and you will be notify in the event we discover that any additional nonpublic personally identifiable information  pii  pertain to you be expose  that be say  we feel it necessary to notify you of this event  a discuss above  we have no evidence at this time that any of your information have be misuse  
 
what we be do 
 
sn be bolster it cybersecurity posture by  
 
  replace email filter tool  malware software  and internet monitor tool with more robust solution that utilize artificial intelligence  ai  to detect and block know and newly introduce malware  
  block all inbound and outbound internet  email  and network traffic to foreign country  
  upgrade infrastructure to improve backup and recovery effort if need  
 
what you can do 
 
out of an abundance of caution  we be encourage you to remain vigilant over the next twelve    to twenty four    month  review your account statement and immediately report any suspicious activity  we also recommend that you regularly obtain credit report from each nationwide credit report agency and have information relate to fraudulent transaction  if any  delete  if you believe you have be the victim of identity theft or need additional guidance with respect to identify theft  we encourage you contact the federal trade commission  ftc   the ftc can be reach via telephone at   idtheft     or online at  further  we encourage you to review the enclose list of recommend step you can take to protect yourself  
 
a a safeguard  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for one year provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  to enroll in this service  go directly to the mytrueidentity website at www mytrueidentity com and in the space reference a enter activation code  enter the follow  letter activation code fdyrvywbkgxt and follow the three step to receive your credit monitor service online within minute  if you do not have access to the internet and wish to enroll in a similar offline  paper base  credit monitor service  via u s  mail delivery  please call the transunion fraud response service toll free hotline at      when prompt  enter the follow  digit telephone passcode  and follow the step to enroll in the offline credit monitor service  add an initial fraud alert to your credit file  or to speak to a transunion representative if you believe you may be a victim of identity theft  you can sign up for the online or offline credit monitor service anytime between now and may     due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  please note that credit monitor service might not be available for individual who do not have a credit file with transunion  or an address in the unite state  or it territory  and a valid social security number  or be under the age of   enroll in this service will not affect your credit score  
 
once you be enroll  you will be able to obtain one year of unlimited access to your transunion credit report and credit score  the daily credit monitor service will notify you if there be any critical change to your credit file at transunion  include fraud alert  new inquiry  new account  new public record  late payment  change of address and more  the service also include access to an identity restoration program that provide assistance in the event your identity be compromise to help you restore your identity and up to    in identity theft insurance with no deductible   policy limitation and exclusion may apply   
 
for additional information 
 
again  we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience cause by this incident  we also want to assure you be commit to full transparency about the incident  if you have any question  please contact u at     between the hour of  pst and  pst  
 
sincerely  
 
sn service corporation

you may have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  so that no new credit can be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate a freeze  a credit freeze be design to prevent potential credit grantors from access your credit report without your consent  if you place a credit freeze  potential creditor and other third party will not be able to get access to your credit report unless you temporarily lift the freeze  therefore  use a credit freeze may delay your ability to obtain credit  there shall be no charge for a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a credit freeze on your credit file at each credit report company

what information be involve

if you find suspicious activity on your credit report or have reason to believe your information be be misuse  call your local law enforcement agency and file a police report  get a copy of the report  many creditor want the information it contain to absolve you of the fraudulent debt  you also should file a complaint with the federal trade commission  ftc  at identitytheft gov or at  id theft       your complaint will be add to the ftcs identity theft data clearinghouse  where it will be accessible to law enforcement for their investigation  also visit the ftcs website at ftc gov idtheft to review their free identity theft resource such a their comprehensive step by step guide identity theft   a recovery plan

what you can do

what happen 
 
an unauthorized individual gain access to an employee email account  potentially allow them to view document contain certain personal information be include in the document  we be notify you of the incident  
 
what information be involve

what we be do 
 
a soon a grand river discover what happen  we immediately terminate access to the account and begin investigate  our it department analyze the entire network for any unauthorized activity  in addition  we hire an outside forensic incident response team which specialize in these type of incident to determine the extent of the breachanged all relevant password  add multi factor authentication  and isolate the compromise account from the system  we have implement all additional safeguard recommend by our third party forensic consultant in order to prevent similar attack in the future  while we do not have any evidence to suggest that your personal information be actually access  export  or use by the attacker  we recognize that the information involve be sensitive and could be use to commit identity theft

step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
copy of credit report  you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free     or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can print this form at  you also can contact one of the follow three national credit report agency

fraud alert  you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least  day  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze  under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc  or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state  resident of maryland  north carolina  and rhode island can obtain more information from their attorney general use the contact information below

in december   we discover that third party it hardware use by sbi have vulnerability that allow unauthorizedaccess between july  and december   after a thorough investigation  sbi determine that certain patient information may have be access by unauthorized party during that time  the information that may have be access include the study date  patient name  date of birth  type of image procedure  and patient and study number  both internal number create by sbi   
 
it be important to note that the information potentially expose do not include social security number  credit card number  or any medical diagnose  medical image  or medical report or note  
 
sbi take privacy and security matter very seriously  we conduct a thorough investigation and take several critical step to address the identify it vulnerability and to prevent a similar incident from happen again  sbi close certain firewall port to prevent future access and also engage third party it consultant to perform a thorough analysis and bolster our security control go forward

attachment 
 
action to help reduce your chance of identity theft  
 
place a fraud alert on your credit file 
 
an initial security alert indicate to anyone request your credit file that you suspect you be a victim of fraud  when you or someone else attempt to open a credit account in your name  increase the credit limit on an exist account  or obtain a new card on an exist account  the lender should take step to verify that you have authorize the request  if the creditor cannot verify this  the request should not be satisfy  there be no cost to you to place a fraud alert and it remain on your credit file for at least one year  you may contact one of the credit report company below for assistance  
 
equifax 
    
www equifax com 
 
experian 
    
www experian com 
 
transunion 
    
www transunion com 
 
order your free annual credit report 
 
visit www annualcreditreport com or call     once you receive your credit report  review them for discrepancy  identify any account you do not open or inquiry from creditor that you do not authorize  verify all information be correct  if you have question or notice incorrect information  contact the credit report company  
 
use tool from credit provider 
 
carefully review your credit report and bank  credit card  and other account statement  be proactive and create alert on credit card and bank account to notify you of activity  if you discover unauthorized or suspicious activity on your credit report or by any other mean  file an identity theft report with your local police and contact a credit report company  you may also contact your state attorney general if you believe you have be the victim of identity theft  
 
review your explanation of benefit statement 
 
regularly review the explanation of benefit statement s  that you receive from your health care provider or health plan  if you see any service that you believe you do not receive  you should contact your health care provider or health plan at the telephone number list on the explanation of benefit statement  if you do not receive regular explanation of benefit statement  contact your health care provider or health plan and ask that they send you a copy after each visit you make to your health care provider  
 
obtain more information about identity theft and way to protect yourself 
 
the federal trade commission have an identity theft hotline      tty       they also provide information online at www ftc gov idtheft  please keep a copy of this notice for your record in case of future problem with your medical record or credit information

content of data breach 
 
harvard eye associate and alicia surgery center value our patient and their privacy  that be why we be write you this letter together to let you know about an incident that involve your personal information  
 
what happen 
 
harvard eye associate contract with a vendor for online data storage  on january     the vendor notify harvard eye that hacker have access the vendor computer system and take some of our data  
 
the vendor inform harvard eye that the hacker have demand money to return the data they have take  after consult with cybersecurity expert and the fbi  the vendor make the payment  the hacker then return the data and tell the vendor that they have not disclose the data or keep any copy  the vendor determine  through it investigation  that the hacker might have be able to access harvard eye data a early a october     the vendor cybersecurity expert have be monitor the internet and have not find any evidence that the hacker use or disclose any of the data  
 
what information be involve 
 
the information take by the hacker include some of harvard eye own patient information  it also include information about patient of alicia surgery center  which harvard eye be use in order to perform administrative service for the surgery center  
 
the data take by the hacker might have include your name  address  phone number  email address  date of birth  medical history  health insurance information  medication  and information about treatment you receive from harvard eye  if you have have eye surgery at alicia surgery center  the data might also have include medical information relate to your surgery  
 
the hacker do not have access to your social security number  driver license number  other government id number  or credit or debit card information  
 
what we be do 
 
when the vendor learn of this incident  it notify the fbi  hire cybersecurity expert  investigate  block further access by the hacker  and strengthen it security measure to help prevent future incident  
 
at harvard eye and alicia surgery center  we have take step to review and analyze the incident  and we will continue our ongoing effort to maintain and enhance the security of our patient data

rakuten usa  inc  dba rakuten america  rakuten  be write to inform you of a recent data security event that involve some of your personal information  should you feel it be appropriate to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on or about january     rakutens data security team detect that an employee who be in the process of voluntarily leave the company have transfer a number of file off their rakuten issue computer  a soon a we learn about this personal device and account where they be discover  although we do not have any indication of misuse of the data at this time  we cannot be certain what occur once the data be outside of our environment  include whether the data be further transfer or other copy be make  rakuten have be in touch with law enforcement and be continue to work to ensure the security of this information  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information involve include your name  social security number  and date of birth  
 
what we be do in response  
 
the security of information in our care be among our highest priority  although we do not have any knowledge of actual or attempt misuse of the expose information at this time  we be notify you so that you may take further step to best protect yourself from potential harm  we be offer you access to complimentary credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration service through transunion  in which you can enroll use the information on the attach page  in addition  we be provide notice to appropriate regulatory authority  besides our investigation into this particular incident  we be review our exist policy and procedure and will implement additional safeguard  a need  
 
what can you do

you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below

dear insert customer name  
 
we be contact you regard a data security incident that have occur on january    at axlehire  inc  a a result  your personal information may have be potentially expose to others  please be assure that we have take every step necessary to address the incident  
 
what happen 
 
when we be prepare the  tax form for our driver in january   there be a software glitch that result in some driver receive the wrong  form  the error be isolate  and therefore  only cause error within a small random subset of our driver population  after the incident  we be able to determine which driver receive incorrect  form and will maintain this record internally in the event any issue arise in the future  in the meantime  we have contact all driver who receive a  form other than their own and have request that they discard the information they receive about other driver  
 
what information be involve 
 
this incident involve your name  address  and social security number  
 
what we be do 
 
axlehire have fix the software issue above and send out correct  form to each driver  furthermore  in order to avoid the opportunity for error in the future  axlehire will instead post a password protect  for each driver within the driver app link accessible only under a driver unique login credential  to help further protect your identity  we be offer a complimentary two year membership of experians identityworkssm  this product provide you with superior identity detection and resolution of identity theft  to activate your membership and start monitor your personal information  please follow the step below

content of data breach 
 
harvard eye associate and alicia surgery center value our patient and their privacy  that be why we be write you this letter together to let you know about an incident that involve your personal information  
 
what happen 
 
harvard eye associate contract with a vendor for online data storage  on january     the vendor notify harvard eye that hacker have access the vendor computer system and take some of our data  
 
the vendor inform harvard eye that the hacker have demand money to return the data they have take  after consult with cybersecurity expert and the fbi  the vendor make the payment  the hacker then return the data and tell the vendor that they have not disclose the data or keep any copy  the vendor determine  through it investigation  that the hacker might have be able to access harvard eye data a early a october     the vendor cybersecurity expert have be monitor the internet and have not find any evidence that the hacker use or disclose any of the data  
 
what information be involve 
 
the information take by the hacker include some of harvard eye own patient information  it also include information about patient of alicia surgery center  which harvard eye be use in order to perform administrative service for the surgery center  
 
the data take by the hacker might have include your name  address  phone number  email address  date of birth  medical history  health insurance information  medication  and information about treatment you receive from harvard eye  if you have have eye surgery at alicia surgery center  the data might also have include medical information relate to your surgery  the hacker do not have access to your social security number  driver license number  other government id number  or credit or debit card information  
 
what we be do 
 
when the vendor learn of this incident  it notify the fbi  hire cybersecurity expert  investigate  block further access by the hacker  and strengthen it security measure to help prevent future incident  
 
at harvard eye and alicia surgery center  we have take step to review and analyze the incident  and we will continue our ongoing effort to maintain and enhance the security of our patient data

fraud alert  you may place a fraud alert in your file by contact one of the three nationwide credit report agency list above  a fraud alert tell creditor to follow certain procedure  include contact you before they open any new account or change your exist account  for that reason  place a fraud alert can protect you but also may delay you when you seek to obtain credit  
 
security freeze  you have the ability to place a security freeze on your credit report at no charge  a security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent but may delay your ability to obtain credit  to place a security freeze  you must contact each of the three credit bureau list above and may be require to provide your full name  ssn  date of birth  the address where you have live over the past five year  proof of current address  such a a utility bill or telephone bill  a copy of a government issue identification card  and if you be the victim of identity theft  the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency  
 
fraud or identity theft  if you suspect incident of identity theft  you should file a report to law enforcement  the ftc  or the attorney general  if you be the victim of fraud or identity  you have the right to    notify the police and attorney general of your state  and    to obtain and file a police report relate to this incident  
 
federal fair credit report act right  the fair credit report act  fcra  be federal legislation that regulate how consumer report agency use your information  a a consumer  you have certain right under the fcra  which the ftc have summarize a follow  you must be tell if information in your file have be use against you  you have the right to know what be in your file  you have the right to ask for a credit score  you have the right to dispute incomplete or inaccurate information  consumer report agency must correct or delete inaccurate  incomplete  or unverifiable information  consumer report agency may not report outdated negative information  access to your file be limit  you must give your consent for report to be provide to employer  you may limit prescreened offer of credit and insurance you get base on information in your credit report  you may seek damage from violator  identify theft victim and active duty military personal right  for more information about these right  you may go to www ftc gov credit or write to  consumer response center  room  a  federal trade commission   pennsylvania ave  n w   washington  d c

security freeze  
 
you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  there be no charge to place  lift  or remove the security freeze  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you  include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement  or insurance statement

notice of data breach 
 
dear first middle last suffix  
 
we be write to inform you of a cybersecurity incident that occur at sequoia capital operation  llc  sequoia   we understand the importance of keep personal information safe and secure  and we deeply regret that this incident have occur  below you will find information about what happen  what we be do  and what you can do  
 
what happen  
 
on or about january     we discover that an unauthorized third party have gain remote access to the business email mailbox of one sequoia employee  with the apparent aim of conduct a wire diversion scam  our investigation have find no evidence of compromise beyond this single mailbox  we quickly take step to secure our network and begin to investigate the incident with the support of outside cybersecurity expert  
 
the unauthorizedaccess to the mailbox might have allow the third party to acquire a copy of file contain the personal information  and that the unauthorized third party might have access or acquire a copy of it  
 
what information be involve  
 
base on our review  the unauthorized third party could have acquire personal information include your   insert expose pii    
 
what we be do 
 
we take prompt step to address this incident  include contact law enforcement and engage outside cybersecurity expert to help remediate and ensure the ongoing security of our system  a part of these ongoing effort  we have enhance cybersecurity protection throughout our environment to detect any future anomalous activity  specifically  we have  
 
  identify and remediate the configuration that permit the initial access  
  deploy additional prevention and detection technology at multiple layer to improve visibility into anomalous user activity and malicious email content  
  review the method we use to store and share sensitive information inside and outside the company  include email message forward rule  and 
  refresh our security training with additional emphasis on phishing awareness and proper data handle  
 
out of an abundance of caution  sequoia have also conduct dark web monitor to determine whether any of the data from the business email mailbox be be sell or trade by cybercriminals  and we have not see any indication that the email mailbox data be be exploit for any purpose  
 
to protect you further  we be offer credit monitor and identity theft protection service through experian for  month  free of charge  you can find further detail below on how to sign up  
 
what you can do 
 
we strongly encourage you to contact experian and take advantage of the credit monitor and identity theft protection service we be provide to you free of charge  remain vigilant and carefully review your account for any suspicious activity  
 
if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should change the password and security question associate with the account  and promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain and any relevant government agency  such a the irs  ssa  or state dmv  a applicable  
 
if you would like to take additional the data breach  
insufficient information there be not enough information available in the description of the breach

dear sir or madam  
 
we be write on behalf of our client  iwi motor part  iwi   to notify you of a security incident involve iowa resident  iwi be a company in the automotive aftermarket business  iwi be headquarter in dubuque  ia and also have operation in illinois and wisconsin  
 
iwi have conduct an investigation involve unauthorizedaccess to some of it company server  that investigation determine that the access occur on october     upon discover the incident  iwi immediately take step to secure it system and launch an investigation with the assistance of a professional security firm to determine the nature and scope of the incident  
 
iwis investigation determine that an unauthorized person access certain file on it server and transfer at least some of those file outside of the network  on january     iwi determine that the file access and or transfer out of it network by the unauthorized person contain information pertain to certain individual  on february     iwi determine that the information of  iowa resident may have be access  include their name and one or more of the follow  social security number and or financial account number  
 
begin today  february     iwi be provide write notice to the iowa resident via first class u s  mail  a sample copy of the notification letter be enclose  iwi be offer the iowa resident whose social security number be involve a complimentary one year membership in credit monitor and identity theft protection service through kroll  iwi have also establish a dedicate call center where all individual may obtain more information regard the incident  
 
to further protect personal measure to further enhance and strengthen it exist security process  
 
please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any question regard this incident

take advantage of your identity monitor service 
 
you have be provide with access to the follow service from kroll  
 
triple bureau credit monitor 
you will receive alert when there be change to your credit data at any of the three national credit bureausfor instance  when a new line of credit be apply for in your name  if you do not recognize the activity  you will have the option to call a kroll fraud specialist  who will be able to help you determine if it be an indicator of identity theft  
 
fraud consultation 
you have unlimited access to consultation with a kroll fraud specialist  support include show you the most effective way to protect your identity  explain your right and protection under the law  assistance with fraud alert  and interpret how personal information be access and use  include investigate suspicious activity that could be tie to an identity theft event  
 
identity theft restoration 
if you become a victim of identity theft  an experience kroll license investigator will work on your behalf to resolve relate issue  you will have access to a dedicate investigator who understand your issue and can do most of the work for you  your investigator will be able to dig deep to uncover the scope of the identity theft  and then work to resolve it  
 
krolls activation website be only compatible with the current version or one version earlier of chrome  firefox  safari and edge  to receive credit service  you must be over the age of  and have establish credit in the u s   have a social security number in your name  and have a u s  residential address associate with your credit file

content of data breach 
 
we be write to inform you about a data security incident that affect accellion  which be use by the kroger family of company and many other company for secure file transfer  this incident involve your personal information a a result of this incident  nevertheless  we be notify you to explain the circumstance a we understand them  and to make you aware of the step we have take to respond and the resource we be make available to you  
 
what happen  
 
we be recently make aware of a data security incident affect accellion  which be use by the kroger family of company  a well a many other company  for secure file transfer  accellion have confirm that an unauthorized person gain access to certain kroger family of company file by exploit a vulnerability in accellions file transfer service  we learn that the accellion incident impact krogers file on january     take immediate action  and we discontinue use of accellions service and investigate the scope and impact of the incident  the incident be isolate to accellions service  and our own it system have not be affect by this incident  no grocery store data be impact  however  the accellion software be use for secure file transfer of certain kroger associate benefit information  
 
what information be involve  
 
our investigation into the scope of the incident be ongoing  however  we believe impact information may include name  contact information  date of birth  and benefit information from the kroger employee health plan include your plan  prescription id  and certain claim process detail  while grocery store system or data be not impact  customer of the pharmacy or little clinic may receive a separate notice relate to this incident if your pharmacy or clinic information be impact  
 
what we be do 
 
the safety of your personal information be of utmost importance to u  we have discontinue the use of the accellion service  report the incident to federal law enforcement  and begin an investigation to understand the scope and impact of the incident  in addition  we have arrange for any impact associate to receive comprehensive credit monitor and identity theft protection service through experian for two year at no cost to you

  review your account statement often and report any suspicious activity immediately to the service provider

  update your current password on any online account you may have with a strong password

direction for place a fraud alert 
a fraud alert be a consumer statement add to your credit report  this statement alert creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report a well a request that they contact you prior to establish any account in your name  once the fraud alert be add to your credit report  all creditor should contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a  day fraud alert on your credit file  log into the equifax member center and click on the fraud alert tab  visit www fraudalerts equifax com or call our auto fraud line at      and follow the simple prompt  once the fraud alert have be place with equifax  a notification will be send to the other two credit report agency  experian and trans union  on your behalf  fraud alert last  day unless you manually renew it or use the automatic fraud alert feature within your credit watch subscription

dear   first name     last name     
 
itochu international inc   iii  understand the importance of protect the information we maintain  we be write to inform you of an incident that may have involve some of your information  this notice explain the incident  measure we have take  and some step you may consider take  
 
what happen  
iii recently conclude it investigation of an incident that involve unauthorizedaccess to one employee email account  upon first suspect unauthorizedaccess to the employee email account  we immediately secure the account and launch an investigation  a third party cybersecurity forensics firm be engage to assist  
 
in connection with that investigation  we learn that an unauthorized party gain access to the employee email account between september     and september     our investigation be unable to determine whether the unauthorized party actually view any email or attachment in the account  in an abundance of caution  we review the email and attachment that may have be view in the email account to identify individual whose personal information may have be accessible to the unauthorized party  
 
what information be involve  
on december     we determine that the account include an email and or attachment contain your name and one or more of the follow data element  social security number  driver license number  and or financial account number  
 
what we be do  
to help prevent a similar incident from occur in the future  we have implement additional security measure to enhance the security of our network  and we be retrain our employee concern data retention and security  
 
what you can do  
while we have no indication that your information be actually view by the unauthorized person  or that it have be misuse  we want to notify you of this incident  a a precaution  we have arrange for kroll to provide identity monitor at no cost to you for one year  your identity monitor service include credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration  for more information on kroll identity monitor  include instruction on how to activate your complimentary one year membership  please visit the below website  we encourage you to remain vigilant by regularly review your financial account statement for any unauthorized activity  if you see charge or activity you do not authorize  please contact your financial institution immediately

take advantage of your identity monitor service 
you have be provide with access to the follow service from kroll  
 
triple bureau credit monitor 
you will receive alert when there be change to your credit data at any of the three national credit bureausfor instance  when a new line of credit be apply for in your name  if you do not recognize the activity  you will have the option to call a kroll fraud specialist  who will be able to help you determine if it be an indicator of identity theft  
 
fraud consultation 
you have unlimited access to consultation with a kroll fraud specialist  support include show you the most effective way to protect your identity  explain your right and protection under the law  assistance with fraud alert  and interpret how personal information be access and use  include investigate suspicious activity that could be tie to an identity theft event  
 
identity theft restoration 
if you become a victim of identity theft  an experience kroll license investigator will work on your behalf to resolve relate issue  you will have access to a dedicate investigator who understand your issue and can do most of the work for you  your investigator will be able to dig deep to uncover the scope of the identity theft  and then work to resolve it  
 
krolls activation website be only compatible with the current version or one version earlier of chrome  firefox  safari  and edge  to receive credit service  you must be over the age of  and have establish credit in the u s   have a social security number in your name  and have a u s  residential address associate with your credit file  
 
additional step you can take 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      
 
contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  
 
contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert  
there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  
you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  
there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal information  
 
after receive your freeze request  each credit bureau will provide you with a unique pin  personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  
a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  if you opt for a temporary lift because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit bureau  the organization experience unauthorizedaccess to an employee email account due to a third party gain access to the account between september th and september th    personal information such a name  social security number  driver license number  and or financial account number be potentially accessible to the unauthorized party  the investigation be unable to determine whether any email or attachment be view  
content of data breach 
 
dear   first name     middle name     last name     suffix    
 
we be write to inform you of a data security incident that occur at one of our vendor  blackbaud  inc   blackbaud   this notice explain the incident and measure take in response  
 
what happen  
 
blackbaud be a cloud base software company that provide service to thousand of school  hospital  and other non profit  blackbaud notify u and many other institution on july     that it have discover an attempt ransomware attack on blackbauds network in may   blackbaud report that it conduct an investigation  determine that there have be unauthorizedaccess to it system between february     and may     that backup file contain information from it client have be take from it network  and an attempt be make to encrypt file to convince blackbaud to pay a ransom  blackbaud pay a ransom and obtain confirmation that the file that have be remove have be destroy  blackbaud report that it have be work with law enforcement  
 
initially  blackbaud inform u that the field in the database backup contain personal information be encrypt and not accessible by the unauthorized individual  however  further investigation determine that this be not the case  and blackbaud inform u of their update find on september     follow receipt of the notification about the incident from blackbaud  we launch our investigation and work with blackbaud to identify the individual whose information may have be involve  on november     we determine that the unencrypted blackbaud backup file contain some of your information  
 
what information be involve  
 
the blackbaud backup file involve contain your name and social security number  blackbaud have assure u that the backup file have be destroy by the unauthorized individual  and there be no reason to believe any data be or will be misuse or will be disseminate or otherwise make available publicly  
 
what you can do 
 
even though we have no evidence that your personal information provide in the follow page  
 
what we be do 
 
we be notify you of this incident and share the step that blackbaud be take in response  blackbaud have inform u that they identify and fix the vulnerability associate with this incident  implement several change that will better protect your data from any subsequent incident  and be undertake additional effort to harden their environment through enhancement to access management  network segmentation  and deployment of additional endpoint and network base platform

additional information 
 
credit report  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  whether or not you suspect any unauthorized activity on your account  you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  to order your free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com  or call toll free at      you can also order your annual free credit report by mail a complete annual credit report request form  available at  to  annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga     
 
security freeze  you also have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you need to make a request to each consumer report agency  you may make that request by certify mail  overnight mail  regular stamp mail  or by follow the instruction find at the website list below  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that if you be request a credit report for your spouse or a minor under the age of   this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past five year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible  display your name and current mail address  and the date of issue  a of september     it be free to place  lift  or remove a security freeze  you may also place a security freeze for child under the age of   you may obtain a free security freeze by contact any one or more of the follow national consumer report agency

experian

what information be involve

base on our review of the material that be acquire  the personal information acquire by the unauthorized third party consist of your   bb text  impacteddata

we have also secure the service of kroll to provide identity service at no cost to you for two year  below please find information on sign up for a complimentary two year membership  kroll be a global leader in risk mitigation and response  and their team have extensive experience help people who have sustain an unintentional exposure of confidential data  your identity monitor service include one bureau credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration

take advantage of your identity monitor service

single bureau credit monitor 
you will receive alert when there be change to your credit data  for instance  when a new line of credit be apply for in your name  if you do not recognize the activity  you will have the option to call a kroll fraud specialist  who will be able to help you determine if it be an indicator of identity theft  
 
fraud consultation 
you have unlimited access to consultation with a kroll fraud specialist  support include show you the most effective way to protect your identity  explain your right and protection under the law  assistance with fraud alert  and interpret how personal information be access and use  include investigate suspicious activity that could be tie to an identity theft event  
 
identity theft restoration 
if you become a victim of identity theft  an experience kroll license investigator will work on your behalf to resolve relate issue  you will have access to a dedicate investigator who understand your issue and can do most of the work for you  your investigator will be able to dig deep to uncover the scope of the identity theft  and then work to resolve it  
 
krolls activation website be only compatible with the current version or one version earlier of chrome  firefox  safari  and edge  to receive credit service  you must be over the age of  and have establish credit in the u s   have a social security number in your name  and have a u s  residential address associate with your credit file  
 
additional resource

you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit file free of charge  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or telephone bill  
 
the fair credit report act  fcra  be federal legislation that regulate how consumer report agency use your information  it promote the accuracy  fairness  and privacy of consumer information in the file of consumer report agency  a a consumer  you have certain right under the fcra  which the ftc have summarize a follow  you must be tell if information in your file have be use against you  you have the right to know what be in your file  you have the right to ask for a credit score  you have the right to dispute incomplete or inaccurate information  consumer report agency must correct or delete inaccurate  incomplete  or unverifiable information  consumer report agency may not report outdated negative information  access to your file be limit  you must give your consent for report to be provide to employer  you may limit prescreened offer of credit and insurance you get base on information in your credit report  you may seek damage from violator  identity theft victim and active duty military personal right  
 
for more information about these right  you may go to www ftc the information receive indicate that an unauthorized third party have access to the organization network to disrupt operation  obtain internal company information  and publish it on a publicly accessible website  the personal information of individual  include the recipient of the notification  be impact  the incident be investigate with the support of outside cybersecurity expert  and the organization have take step to enhance it cybersecurity protection

security freeze  
under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement
