content of data breach 
 
dear friend of la jolla country day school  
 
we be write to inform you that one of our third party vendor  blackbaud  experience a cyber incident that may have allow access to some of your personal information  a a result  you be entitle to free credit monitor and fraud assistance service  
 
what happen  
 
blackbaud be a software service provider that offer engagement and fundraise solution to non profit company  school  and institution across the unite state  between february and may     blackbaud be the victim of a ransomware attack that allow a cyber criminal to access certain personal under the assurance that any exfiltrated file would be destroy  their system be fully restore after ransom payment  blackbaud report that there have be no evidence of improper use of any of the data file that may have be expose  blackbaud have already implement change to their data security protocol to prevent a similar incident from occur again  
 
a part of their continue investigation  blackbaud discover that when it merge data from previous version of some of their solution into current version  there be hide table contain the older data  which include unencrypted personal information  merge into the new program which be not visible  we be notify of this new exposure on september     and take action to verify and determine scope  which require the cooperation of blackbaud in produce the hide data file  accord to blackbaud  the information be expose because the company fail to destroy or encrypt certain legacy file after a migration of our file to a new platform  
 
what pi be expose  
 
at this time  we be inform that sensitive personal information  include your name  phone number  address  birth date  and social security number  be expose  this be older data from the prior legacy version of the program that be use prior to migration  
 
what you can do  
 
to help you guard against identity theft or other potential fraud a a result of this incident  blackbaud be offer free credit monitor and fraud assistance service for  month  information about how to access these service accompany this letter  although service be available to you  it be important to remain vigilant and promptly report any suspect fraud to law enforcement  for information on avoid identity theft  please visit www ftc gov idtheft  
 
in addition  security expert suggest that you contact your financial institution and all major credit bureau immediately to inform them of such a breach and then take whatever step be recommend to protect your interest  include the possible placement of a fraud alert on your credit file  
 
we encourage you to contact cyberscout to enroll in free cyberscout service by go to  and use the enrollment code provide above  please note the deadline to enroll be april     
 
again  at this time  there be no evidence that your information have be misuse  however  we encourage you to take full advantage of this service offer  
 
enclose hereto you will find additional information regard the resource available to you  and the step that you can take to further protect your personal information  
 
for more information  
 
we recognize that you may have question not address in this letter  if you have additional question  please call our call center at               monday through friday   be to   pm pacific time  our representative have be fully verse on the incident and can answer question or concern you may have regard protection of your personal information  
 
la jolla country day school value the security of your personal data  and we apologize for any inconvenience that this incident have cause  
 
sincerely  
 
dave sigal 
chief financial officer

what happen  
on october     we become aware that we be the victim of an attack that result in the encryption of several system within the cardinal logistics management corporation environment  in response  we launch an investigation of the incident to understand the nature and of scope of the incident  during our investigation  we become aware that some information relate to some current employee be hold on our impact server and be potentially subject to unauthorizedaccess  upon this discovery  we continue to investigate the extent to which employee data be impact in the event  our investigation conclude on february     when we confirm that certain information relate to current and former employee be impact during this event  while we be unaware of any actual misuse of your data stem from this event  we be notify you out of an abundance of caution  
 
what information be involve  
our investigation determine that at the time of the incident  the potentially accessible information include your name and   data element    
 
what we be do 
the security of information in our care be among our highest priority  upon learn of this incident  we quickly take step to ensure the safety and security of all information hold on our system  in an abundance of caution  we be also notify potentially affect individual  include you  so that you may take further step to best protect your personal information a a result of this event  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for   cm length   month provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  
 
what you can do 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review your account statement  and monitor your credit report for suspicious activity for the next twelve    to twenty four    month  you may also review the information contain in the attach step you can take to protect your information  there you will also find more information on the credit monitor and identity protection service we be make available to you  while cardinal logistics management corporation will cover the cost of these service  you will need to complete the activation process  
 
for more information

dear guest  
 
we be write to inform you of a data security incident that have affect some hurtigruten guest information  our investigation indicate that information for a limit number of guest who book expedition voyage with two ship  m fram and m midnatsol  during a certain time period  have be affect by the incident  for m fram  the relevant time period be from  to   for m midnatsol  the relevant time period be from  to   we recently learn that your information have be affect by this incident  
 
what happen  
 
on december     we learn that an unauthorized actor gain remote access to our network and encrypt part of our computer system  at that time  however  we be unable to determine which guest may have be affect  if any  and what information might have be access  we immediately disable affect computer system  take down their internet connection to prevent any further intrusion  and launch a forensic investigation to determine the nature and scope of the incident  we understand that hurtigruten be one of many company that be a victim of this type of intrusion  
 
what information be involve  
 
base on our investigation  we have recently determine that your affect information involve  
 
  name and date of birth  
  if you be sail with m midnatsol  your passport number and passport expiration date  and 
  for some guest  the affect information involve e mail address  mail address  and or phone number  
 
base on our investigation to date  the unauthorized actor do not gain access to your credit or debit card information  social security number  driver license number  or other government issue identification card number  hurtigruten do not store credit or debit card information  
 
what we be do  
 
a note above  we immediately take step to contain the issue and commence an investigation to determine the data and individual that may have be affect  we report this matter to norwegian law enforcement and the norwegian data protection authority  since hurtigruten be base in norway  and the federal bureau of investigation  we also notify other applicable privacy regulatory authority  over the past year  we have make significant investment in data privacy and cybersecurity  since this incident  we have further strengthen these effort  and our internal expert be work closely with third party cybersecurity expert to further enhance the security of our system and reduce the risk of a similar event happen in the future  
 
what can you do  
 
on february     we discover the unauthorized actor place some of the above information on a difficult to access part of the web  we do not have any indication of actual harm to affect individual a a result of this incident  but we still recommend you follow the enclose additional step that you can take to protect your personal information  we sincerely regret any concern or inconvenience that this incident may cause you  
 
for more information

re  data security incident 
 
dear director whitney  
 
a outside counsel for americold realty trust  a publicly trade reit focus on the ownership  operation  acquisition  and development of temperature control warehouse  we write to inform you of the recent discovery of a data security incident and to explain the step the company have take and continue to take to address it  include notify potentially impact individual and provide them way with which to protect their personal information  
 
on november     americold determine that it computer network have be affect by a ransomware incident  the company immediately begin an investigation to assess the incident scope  engage a third party cybersecurity firm at the direction of counsel to assist  a a containment measure  the company preemptively shut down it system and then undertake a secure  manage restoration from backup system  the company also promptly notify law enforcement and have be cooperate with their investigation of the incident  in addition  the company have take step to further strengthen and enhance the security of system in it network  include update administrative and technical safeguard  
 
the company diligently have work to complete it review of the potentially affect data  engage external support to assist with the review and locate up to date address information  while this review be underway  on december     the company proactively send letter to all current associate in the unite state  offer them a complimentary two year consumer protection division membership of experians identityworkssm  which provide identity theft detection and resolution service  
 
the company complete it review of the data on about february     and find personal information for   state resident in file that may have be access or acquire without authorization  the company be notify this office and the individual state resident and be provide them with complimentary credit monitor and identity theft service for  month through experian  the company also be send follow up notice to the individual who receive the december  letter  unaddressed copy of each letter be attach  those letter be to be mail on march   in addition  the company have establish a call center to answer consumer question  
 
please do not hesitate to contact u if you have any question regard this letter  
 
very truly yours  
 
scott ferber    
sumon dantiki

we be contact you regard a security incident that may have involve some of your personal assistance in protect against potential identity theft  a further describe in this letter  we be offer you complimentary credit monitor and identity theft restoration service  
 
what happen 
 
on november     we determine that our computer network be affect by a data security incident  we immediately begin an investigation to assess the incident scope and engage a third party cybersecurity firm to assist with that investigation  we preemptively shut down our system to contain the incident and then undertake a secure  manage restoration  in addition  we promptly notify law enforcement and have be cooperate with their investigation of the incident

re  notice of data event 
 
dear sir or madam  
 
we represent the american arm force mutual aid association  aafmaa   locate at  sheridan avenue  fort myer  va   and be write to notify your office of an incident that may affect the security of some information relate to six hundred fifty five    iowa resident  the investigation into this matter be ongoing  and this notice may be supplement with any new significant fact learn subsequent to it submission  
 
by provide this notice  aafmaa do not waive any right or defense regard the applicability of iowa law  the applicability of the iowa data event notification statute  or personal jurisdiction  
 
nature of the data event 
 
on january     aafmaa become aware of suspicious activity relate to it system and immediately launch an investigation to determine the nature and scope of the activity  aafmaa determine that an unauthorized actor gain access to certain aafmaa system between january     and january     and remove and or view certain file from the aafmaa network  aafmaa thereafter undertake a comprehensive and time intensive review of all file that be identify a impact  the review of the file be complete on february     
 
the information that could have be subject to unauthorizedaccess or acquisition include name  address  social security number  and bank account information  
 
notice to iowa resident 
 
on or about march     aafmaa provide write notice of this incident to all potentially affect individual  which include six hundred fifty five    iowa resident  write notice be provide in substantially the same form a the letter attach here a exhibit a  
 
other step take and to be take 
 
upon discover the event  aafmaa move quickly to investigate and respond to the incident  assess the security of aafmaa system  and notify potentially affect individual  aafmaa provide notice of the incident to the federal bureau of investigation  fbi   aafmaa be also work to implement additional safeguard and training to it employee  
 
aafmaa be provide access to credit monitor service for twenty four    month  through experian  to individual whose personally  aafmaa be provide impact individual with guidance on how to better protect against identity theft and fraud  include advise individual to report any suspect incident of identity theft or fraud to their credit card company and or bank  
 
aafmaa be provide individual with information on how to place a fraud alert and security freeze on one credit file  the contact detail for the national consumer report agency  information on how to obtain a free credit report  a reminder to remain vigilant for incident of fraud and identity theft by review account statement and monitor free credit report  and encouragement to contact the federal trade commission  their state attorney general  and law enforcement to report attempt or actual identity theft and fraud

notice of data breach 
 
dear   name     
 
at the los angeles philharmonic association  we understand the importance of secure and protect the personal information  this notice explain the incident  measure we have take  and some step you can take in response  
 
what happen 
 
we recently complete an investigation into suspicious activity originate from one employee email account on december     a soon a we become aware of the suspicious activity  we immediately take measure to secure the email account  contact law enforcement  and launch an internal investigation  a cybersecurity firm be engage to assist in a full forensic analysis of this incident  the investigation determine that an unauthorized person access the employee email account at various time between december     and december     
 
what information be involve 
 
our investigation be unable to determine what message  if any  be access  therefore  we perform a comprehensive review of the mailbox  and on february     determine that information store in the email account may have contain your name  address  date of birth  passport number  and social security number  
 
what you can do 
 
though we have no indication that your information have be misuse  we be notify you out of an abundance of caution and offer you a complimentary membership of experians identityworks  for more information on identityworks  include instruction on how to activate your complimentary membership  the contact number for    customer support  a well a some additional step you can take to protect your information  please see the page that follow this letter  
 
what we be do 
 
your confidence and trust be important to u  and we regret any inconvenience or concern this incident may cause  to further protect personal step to enhance our exist electronic security protocol and re educate our staff for awareness on these type of incident

content of data breach notification letter  dear   first name    
 
we be write to inform you of an incident that may have affect your personal information  on january     we discover unusual activity relate to an employee email account  we take immediate action to identify the source and nature of the activity and determine that an unauthorized individual may have access the email account between january     and january     although we have no evidence of any misuse of information in the email account  we conduct a review of the content of the account and find that certain information relate to you may have be accessible  include your full name  address  telephone number  date of birth  email address  and medical information such a medical record number  treatment information  and bill information  
 
we take this matter very seriously and have secure the email account to prevent further unauthorizedaccess  a a precautionary measure  we be offer you one year of free identity monitor service through kroll  a global leader in risk mitigation and response  the service include credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration  to activate your identity monitor service  please visit  before june     your membership number be   member id    
 
we deeply regret any inconvenience or concern this situation may have cause you  trinity health and saint alphonsus be commit to protect your personal information through significant investment in a strong security program that include a dedicate cybersecurity team     monitor  and test of security control  
 
if you have any question or concern  please call our call center at     monday through friday from   a m  to   p m  central time  please have your membership number ready  
 
sincerely  
 
chelsea treharne 
privacy officer 
 
additional resource  
 
contact information for the three nationwide credit report agency

  experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com

free credit report  
it be recommend that you remain vigilant by review account statement and monitor your credit report for unauthorized activity  especially activity that may indicate fraud and identity theft  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      you can also order your annual free credit report by mail a complete annual credit report request form  available from the u s  federal trade commission  ftc  website at www consumer ftc gov  to  annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga    
 
for colorado  georgia  maine  maryland  massachusetts  new jersey  puerto rico  and vermont resident  
you may obtain one or more  depend on the state  additional copy of your credit report  free of charge  you must contact each of the credit report agency directly to obtain such additional report s   
 
fraud alert  
there be two type of fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud   an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for at least one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft and you have the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  you can place a fraud alert on your credit report by contact any of the three national credit report agency  
 
security freeze
